GE09ram_05_u:2: 5.001.001c iyeṣa padam anveṣṭuṃ cāraṇācarite pathi 5.001.002a atha vaidūryavarṇeṣu śādvaleṣu
GE09ram_05_u:4: 5.001.003a dvijān vitrāsayan dhīmān urasā pādapān haran
GE09ram_05_u:5: 5.001.003c mṛgāṃś ca subahūn nighnan pravṛddha iva kesarī
GE09ram_05_u:6: 5.001.004a nīlalohitamāñjiṣṭhapadmavarṇaiḥ sitāsitaiḥ 5.001.004c svabhāvavihitaiś citrair dhātubhiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:9: 5.001.006a sa tasya girivaryasya tale nāgavarāyute 5.001.006c tiṣṭhan kapivaras tatra hrade nāga ivābabhau
GE09ram_05_u:10: 5.001.007a sa sūryāya mahendrāya pavanāya svayambhuve 5.001.007c bhūtebhyaś cāñjaliṃ kṛtvā cakāra gamane matim
GE09ram_05_u:12: 5.001.008c tato hi vavṛdhe gantuṃ dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_05_u:14: 5.001.009c vavṛdhe rāmavṛddhyarthaṃ samudra iva parvasu 5.001.010a niṣpramāṇa śarīraḥ saṃl lilaṅghayiṣur arṇavam 5.001.010c bāhubhyāṃ pīḍayām āsa caraṇābhyāṃ ca parvatam
GE09ram_05_u:15: 5.001.011a sa cacālācalāś cāru muhūrtaṃ kapipīḍitaḥ 5.001.011c tarūṇāṃ puṣpitāgrāṇāṃ sarvaṃ puṣpam aśātayat 5.001.012a tena pādapamuktena puṣpaugheṇa sugandhinā
GE09ram_05_u:16: 5.001.012c sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaḥ śailo babhau puṣpamayo yathā
GE09ram_05_u:17: 5.001.013a tena cottamavīryeṇa pīḍyamānaḥ sa parvataḥ 5.001.013c salilaṃ saṃprasusrāva madaṃ matta iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:18: 5.001.014a pīḍyamānas tu balinā mahendras tena parvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:20: 5.001.014e mumoca ca śilāḥ śailo viśālāḥ samanaḥśilāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:22: 5.001.015c guhāviṣṭāni bhūtāni vinedur vikṛtaiḥ svaraiḥ 5.001.016a sa mahāsattvasaṃnādaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:23: 5.001.016c pṛthivīṃ pūrayām āsa diśaś copavanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:25: 5.001.017c vamantaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ dadaṃśur daśanaiḥ śilāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:26: 5.001.018a tās tadā saviṣair daṣṭāḥ kupitais tair mahāśilāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:27: 5.001.018c jajvaluḥ pāvakoddīptā vibhiduś ca sahasradhā 5.001.019a yāni cauṣadhajālāni tasmiñ jātāni parvate 5.001.019c viṣaghnāny api nāgānāṃ na śekuḥ śamituṃ viṣam
GE09ram_05_u:28: 5.001.020a bhidyate 'yaṃ girir bhūtair iti matvā tapasvinaḥ 5.001.020c trastā vidyādharās tasmād utpetuḥ strīgaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:30: 5.001.021c pātrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi karakāṃś ca hiraṇmayān
GE09ram_05_u:31: 5.001.022a lehyān uccāvacān bhakṣyān māṃsāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:32: 5.001.022c ārṣabhāṇi ca carmāṇi khaḍgāṃś ca kanakatsarūn
GE09ram_05_u:34: 5.001.023c raktākṣāḥ puṣkarākṣāś ca gaganaṃ pratipedire 5.001.024a hāranūpurakeyūra pārihārya dharāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:35: 5.001.024c vismitāḥ sasmitās tasthur ākāśe ramaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:37: 5.001.025c sahitās tasthur ākāśe vīkṣāṃ cakruś ca parvatam
GE09ram_05_u:38: 5.001.026a śuśruvuś ca tadā śabdam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:42: 5.001.028a rāmārthaṃ vānarārthaṃ ca cikīrṣan karma duṣkaram
GE09ram_05_u:43: 5.001.028c samudrasya paraṃ pāraṃ duṣprāpaṃ prāptum icchati
GE09ram_05_u:44: 5.001.029a dudhuve ca sa romāṇi cakampe cācalopamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:45: 5.001.029c nanāda ca mahānādaṃ sumahān iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:46: 5.001.030a ānupūrvyāc ca vṛttaṃ ca lāṅgūlaṃ romabhiś citam
GE09ram_05_u:48: 5.001.031a tasya lāṅgūlam āviddham ativegasya pṛṣṭhataḥ 5.001.031c dadṛśe garuḍeneva hriyamāṇo
GE09ram_05_u:50: 5.001.032c sasāda ca kapiḥ kaṭyāṃ caraṇau saṃcukopa ca
GE09ram_05_u:51: 5.001.033a saṃhṛtya ca bhujau śrīmāṃs tathaiva ca śirodharām
GE09ram_05_u:52: 5.001.033c tejaḥ sattvaṃ tathā vīryam āviveśa sa vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:54: 5.001.034c rurodha hṛdaye prāṇān ākāśam avalokayan 5.001.035a padbhyāṃ dṛḍham avasthānaṃ kṛtvā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:55: 5.001.035c nikuñcya karṇau hanumān utpatiṣyan mahābalaḥ 5.001.035e vānarān vānaraśreṣṭha idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.001.036a yathā rāghavanirmuktaḥ śaraḥ śvasanavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:56: 5.001.036c gacchet tadvad gamiṣyāmi laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām 5.001.037a na hi drakṣyāmi yadi tāṃ laṅkāyāṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_05_u:57: 5.001.037c anenaiva hi vegena gamiṣyāmi surālayam 5.001.038a yadi vā tridive sītāṃ na drakṣyāmi
GE09ram_05_u:60: 5.001.039c ānayiṣyāmi vā laṅkāṃ samutpāṭya sarāvaṇām 5.001.040a evam uktvā tu hanumān vānarān
GE09ram_05_u:62: 5.001.041a samutpatati tasmiṃs tu vegāt te nagarohiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:63: 5.001.041c saṃhṛtya viṭapān sarvān samutpetuḥ samantataḥ 5.001.042a sa mattakoyaṣṭibhakān pādapān puṣpaśālinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:65: 5.001.043a ūruvegoddhatā vṛkṣā muhūrtaṃ kapim anvayuḥ 5.001.043c prasthitaṃ dīrgham adhvānaṃ svabandhum iva bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:66: 5.001.044a tam ūruvegonmathitāḥ sālāś cānye nagottamāḥ 5.001.044c anujagmur hanūmantaṃ sainyā iva mahīpatim 5.001.045a supuṣpitāgrair bahubhiḥ pādapair anvitaḥ kapiḥ 5.001.045c hanumān parvatākāro babhūvādbhutadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:68: 5.001.046c bhayād iva mahendrasya parvatā varuṇālaye 5.001.047a sa nānākusumaiḥ kīrṇaḥ kapiḥ sāṅkurakorakaiḥ 5.001.047c śuśubhe meghasaṃkāśaḥ khadyotair iva parvataḥ 5.001.048a vimuktās tasya vegena muktvā puṣpāṇi te drumāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:69: 5.001.048c avaśīryanta salile nivṛttāḥ suhṛdo yathā 5.001.049a laghutvenopapannaṃ tad vicitraṃ sāgare 'patat
GE09ram_05_u:72: 5.001.050c babhau megha ivodyan vai vidyudgaṇavibhūṣitaḥ 5.001.051a tasya vegasamudbhūtaiḥ puṣpais toyam adṛśyata 5.001.051c tārābhir abhirāmābhir uditābhir ivāmbaram
GE09ram_05_u:74: 5.001.052c parvatāgrād viniṣkrāntau pañcāsyāv iva pannagau 5.001.053a pibann iva babhau cāpi sormijālaṃ mahārṇavam
GE09ram_05_u:75: 5.001.053c pipāsur iva cākāśaṃ dadṛśe sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:79: 5.001.055c cakṣuṣī saṃprakaśete candrasūryāv iva sthitau 5.001.056a mukhaṃ nāsikayā tasya tāmrayā tāmram ābabhau
GE09ram_05_u:80: 5.001.056c saṃdhyayā samabhispṛṣṭaṃ yathā sūryasya maṇḍalam 5.001.057a lāṅgalaṃ ca samāviddhaṃ plavamānasya śobhate 5.001.057c ambare vāyuputrasya śakradhvaja ivocchritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:86: 5.001.060c kakṣāntaragato vāyur jīmūta iva garjati 5.001.061a khe yathā nipataty ulkā uttarāntād
GE09ram_05_u:87: 5.001.061c dṛśyate sānubandhā ca tathā sa kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:89: 5.001.062c pravṛddha iva mātaṃgaḥ kakṣyayā badhyamānayā 5.001.063a upariṣṭāc charīreṇa chāyayā cāvagāḍhayā
GE09ram_05_u:90: 5.001.063c sāgare mārutāviṣṭā naur ivāsīt tadā kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:91: 5.001.064a yaṃ yaṃ deśaṃ samudrasya jagāma sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:92: 5.001.064c sa sa tasyāṅgavegena sonmāda iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_05_u:94: 5.001.065c abhighnaṃs tu mahāvegaḥ pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:95: 5.001.066a kapivātaś ca balavān meghavātaś ca niḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:96: 5.001.066c sāgaraṃ bhīmanirghoṣaṃ kampayām āsatur bhṛśam 5.001.067a vikarṣann ūrmijālāni bṛhanti lavaṇāmbhasi
GE09ram_05_u:97: 5.001.067c atyakrāman mahāvegas taraṅgān gaṇayann iva 5.001.068a plavamānaṃ samīkṣyātha bhujaṅgāḥ sāgarālayāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:98: 5.001.068c vyomni taṃ kapiśārdūlaṃ suparṇam iti menire
GE09ram_05_u:101: 5.001.070a śvetābhraghanarājīva vāyuputrānugāminī 5.001.070c tasya sā śuśubhe chāyā vitatā
GE09ram_05_u:102: 5.001.071a plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā plavagaṃ tvaritaṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:104: 5.001.072a tatāpa na hi taṃ sūryaḥ plavantaṃ vānareśvaram
GE09ram_05_u:105: 5.001.072c siṣeve ca tadā vāyū rāmakāryārthasiddhaye 5.001.073a ṛṣayas tuṣṭuvuś cainaṃ plavamānaṃ vihāyasā 5.001.073c jaguś ca devagandharvāḥ praśaṃsanto mahaujasaṃ 5.001.074a nāgāś ca tuṣṭuvur yakṣā rakṣāṃsi vibudhāḥ khagāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:109: 5.001.076a sāhāyyaṃ vānarendrasya yadi nāhaṃ hanūmataḥ 5.001.076c kariṣyāmi bhaviṣyāmi sarvavācyo vivakṣatām
GE09ram_05_u:112: 5.001.078a tathā mayā vidhātavyaṃ viśrameta yathā kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:113: 5.001.078c śeṣaṃ ca mayi viśrāntaḥ sukhenātipatiṣyati 5.001.079a iti kṛtvā matiṃ sādhvīṃ samudraś channam ambhasi
GE09ram_05_u:117: 5.001.081a tvam eṣāṃ jñātavīryāṇāṃ punar evotpatiṣyatām 5.001.081c pātālasyāprameyasya dvāram āvṛtya tiṣṭhasi
GE09ram_05_u:118: 5.001.082a tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva śaktis te śailavardhitum
GE09ram_05_u:119: 5.001.082c tasmāt saṃcodayāmi tvām uttiṣṭha nagasattama 5.001.083a sa eṣa kapiśārdūlas tvām uparyeti vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:120: 5.001.083c hanūmān rāmakāryārthaṃ bhīmakarmā kham āplutaḥ 5.001.084a tasya sāhyaṃ mayā kāryam ikṣvākukulavartinaḥ 5.001.084c mama ikṣvākavaḥ pūjyāḥ paraṃ pūjyatamās tava
GE09ram_05_u:121: 5.001.085a kuru sācivyam asmākaṃ na naḥ kāryam atikramet
GE09ram_05_u:122: 5.001.085c kartavyam akṛtaṃ kāryaṃ satāṃ manyum udīrayet
GE09ram_05_u:123: 5.001.086a salilād ūrdhvam uttiṣṭha tiṣṭhatv eṣa kapis tvayi
GE09ram_05_u:124: 5.001.086c asmākam atithiś caiva pūjyaś ca plavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:125: 5.001.087a cāmīkaramahānābha devagandharvasevita 5.001.087c hanūmāṃs tvayi viśrāntas tataḥ śeṣaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:126: 5.001.088a kākutsthasyānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca maithilyāś ca vivāsanam 5.001.088c śramaṃ ca plavagendrasya samīkṣyotthātum arhasi 5.001.089a hiraṇyanābho maināko niśamya lavaṇāmbhasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:128: 5.001.090a sa sāgarajalaṃ bhittvā babhūvātyutthitas tadā 5.001.090c yathā jaladharaṃ bhittvā dīptaraśmir divākaraḥ 5.001.091a śātakumbhamayaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ sakiṃnaramahoragaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:130: 5.001.092a tasya jāmbūnadaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ parvatasya samutthitaiḥ 5.001.092c ākāśaṃ śastrasaṃkāśam abhavat kāñcanaprabham
GE09ram_05_u:131: 5.001.093a jātarūpamayaiḥ śṛṅgair bhrājamānaiḥ svayaṃ prabhaiḥ 5.001.093c ādityaśatasaṃkāśaḥ so 'bhavad girisattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:132: 5.001.094a tam utthitam asaṃgena hanūmān agrataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:133: 5.001.094c madhye lavaṇatoyasya vighno 'yam iti niścitaḥ 5.001.095a sa tam ucchritam atyarthaṃ mahāvego mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:134: 5.001.095c urasā pātayām āsa jīmūtam iva mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:135: 5.001.096a sa tadā pātitas tena kapinā parvatottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:136: 5.001.096c buddhvā tasya kaper vegaṃ jaharṣa ca nananda ca 5.001.097a tam ākāśagataṃ vīram ākāśe samavasthitam 5.001.097c prīto hṛṣṭamanā vākyam abravīt parvataḥ kapim
GE09ram_05_u:137: 5.001.097e mānuṣaṃ dharayan rūpam ātmanaḥ śikhare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:138: 5.001.098a duṣkaraṃ kṛtavān karma tvam idaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_05_u:139: 5.001.098c nipatya mama śṛṅgeṣu viśramasva yathāsukham 5.001.099a rāghāvasya kule jātair udadhiḥ parivardhitaḥ 5.001.099c sa tvāṃ rāmahite yuktaṃ pratyarcayati sāgaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:140: 5.001.100a kṛte ca pratikartavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:141: 5.001.100c so 'yaṃ tat pratikārārthī tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati 5.001.101a tvannimittam anenāhaṃ bahumānāt pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:142: 5.001.101c yojanānāṃ śataṃ cāpi kapir eṣa samāplutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:143: 5.001.101e tava sānuṣu viśrāntaḥ śeṣaṃ prakramatām iti
GE09ram_05_u:144: 5.001.102a tiṣṭha tvaṃ hariśārdūla mayi viśramya gamyatām
GE09ram_05_u:145: 5.001.102c tad idaṃ gandhavat svādu kandamūlaphalaṃ bahu
GE09ram_05_u:147: 5.001.103a asmākam api saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhyas tvayāsti vai
GE09ram_05_u:149: 5.001.104a vegavantaḥ plavanto ye plavagā mārutātmaja 5.001.104c teṣāṃ mukhyatamaṃ manye tvām ahaṃ kapikuñjara
GE09ram_05_u:151: 5.001.105c dharmaṃ jijñāsamānena kiṃ punar yādṛśo bhavān
GE09ram_05_u:152: 5.001.106a tvaṃ hi devavariṣṭhasya mārutasya mahātmanaḥ 5.001.106c putras tasyaiva vegena sadṛśaḥ kapikuñjara 5.001.107a pūjite tvayi dharmajña pūjāṃ prāpnoti mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:153: 5.001.107c tasmāt tvaṃ pūjanīyo me śṛṇu cāpy atra kāraṇam 5.001.108a pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge tāta parvatāḥ pakṣiṇo 'bhavan
GE09ram_05_u:155: 5.001.109a tatas teṣu prayāteṣu devasaṃghāḥ saharṣibhiḥ 5.001.109c bhūtāni ca bhayaṃ jagmus teṣāṃ patanaśaṅkayā
GE09ram_05_u:156: 5.001.110a tataḥ kruddhaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ parvatānāṃ śatakratuḥ 5.001.110c pakṣāṃś ciccheda vajreṇa tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:157: 5.001.111a sa mām upagataḥ kruddho vajram udyamya devarāṭ
GE09ram_05_u:159: 5.001.112a asmiṃl lavaṇatoye ca prakṣiptaḥ plavagottama 5.001.112c guptapakṣaḥ samagraś ca tava pitrābhirakṣitaḥ 5.001.113a tato 'haṃ mānayāmi tvāṃ mānyo hi mama mārutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:160: 5.001.113c tvayā me hy eṣa saṃbandhaḥ kapimukhya mahāguṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:161: 5.001.114a asminn evaṃgate kārye sāgarasya mamaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:162: 5.001.114c prītiṃ prītamanā kartuṃ tvam arhasi mahākape
GE09ram_05_u:163: 5.001.115a śramaṃ mokṣaya pūjāṃ ca gṛhāṇa kapisattama
GE09ram_05_u:164: 5.001.115c prītiṃ ca bahumanyasva prīto 'smi tava darśanāt 5.001.116a evam uktaḥ kapiśreṣṭhas taṃ nagottamam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:166: 5.001.117a tvarate kāryakālo me ahaś cāpy ativartate
GE09ram_05_u:167: 5.001.117c pratijñā ca mayā dattā na sthātavyam ihāntarā
GE09ram_05_u:168: 5.001.118a ity uktvā pāṇinā śailam ālabhya haripuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:169: 5.001.118c jagāmākāśam āviśya vīryavān prahasann iva 5.001.119a sa parvatasamudrābhyāṃ bahumānād avekṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:171: 5.001.120a athordhvaṃ dūram utpatya hitvā śailamahārṇavau 5.001.120c pituḥ panthānam āsthāya jagāma vimale 'mbare
GE09ram_05_u:172: 5.001.121a bhūyaś cordhvagatiṃ prāpya giriṃ tam avalokayan
GE09ram_05_u:174: 5.001.122a tad dvitīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_05_u:175: 5.001.122c praśaśaṃsuḥ surāḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:176: 5.001.123a devatāś cābhavan hṛṣṭās tatrasthās tasya karmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:177: 5.001.123c kāñcanasya sunābhasya sahasrākṣaś ca vāsavaḥ 5.001.124a uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān paritoṣāt sagadgadam 5.001.124c sunābhaṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ svayam eva śacīpatiḥ 5.001.125a hiraṇyanābhaśailendraparituṣṭo 'smi te bhṛśam 5.001.125c abhayaṃ te prayacchāmi tiṣṭha saumya yathāsukham
GE09ram_05_u:178: 5.001.126a sāhyaṃ kṛtaṃ te sumahad vikrāntasya hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:179: 5.001.126c kramato yojanaśataṃ nirbhayasya bhaye sati 5.001.127a rāmasyaiṣa hi dautyena yāti dāśarather hariḥ
GE09ram_05_u:180: 5.001.127c satkriyāṃ kurvatā śakyā toṣito 'smi dṛḍhaṃ tvayā 5.001.128a tataḥ praharṣam alabhad vipulaṃ parvatottamaḥ 5.001.128c devatānāṃ patiṃ dṛṣṭvā parituṣṭaṃ śatakratum 5.001.129a sa vai dattavaraḥ śailo babhūvāvasthitas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:181: 5.001.129c hanūmāṃś ca muhūrtena vyaticakrāma sāgaram 5.001.130a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:183: 5.001.131a ayaṃ vātātmajaḥ śrīmān plavate sāgaropari 5.001.131c hanūmān nāma tasya tvaṃ muhūrtaṃ vighnam ācara
GE09ram_05_u:184: 5.001.132a rākṣasaṃ rūpam āsthāya sughoraṃ parvatopamam 5.001.132c daṃṣṭrākarālaṃ piṅgākṣaṃ vaktraṃ kṛtvā nabhaḥspṛśam 5.001.133a balam icchāmahe jñātuṃ bhūyaś cāsya parākramam
GE09ram_05_u:185: 5.001.133c tvāṃ vijeṣyaty upāyena viṣadaṃ vā gamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:186: 5.001.134a evam uktā tu sā devī daivatair abhisatkṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:187: 5.001.134c samudramadhye surasā bibhratī rākṣasaṃ vapuḥ 5.001.135a vikṛtaṃ ca virūpaṃ ca sarvasya ca bhayāvaham
GE09ram_05_u:188: 5.001.135c plavamānaṃ hanūmantam āvṛtyedam uvāca ha 5.001.136a mama bhakṣaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam īśvarair vānararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:189: 5.001.136c ahaṃ tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi praviśedaṃ mamānanam 5.001.137a evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjalir vānararṣabhaḥ 5.001.137c prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.001.138a rāmo dāśarathir nāma praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 5.001.138c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā vaidehyā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_05_u:191: 5.001.139c tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:192: 5.001.140a tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ dūto 'haṃ gamiṣye rāmaśāsanāt 5.001.140c kartum arhasi rāmasya sāhyaṃ viṣayavāsini 5.001.141a atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
GE09ram_05_u:193: 5.001.141c āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇomi te
GE09ram_05_u:194: 5.001.142a evam uktā hanumatā surasā kāmarūpiṇī 5.001.142c abravīn nātivarten māṃ kaś cid eṣa varo mama 5.001.143a evam uktaḥ surasayā kruddho vānarapuṃgavaḥ 5.001.143c abravīt kuru vai vaktraṃ yena māṃ viṣahiṣyase
GE09ram_05_u:195: 5.001.144a ity uktvā surasāṃ kruddho daśayojanam āyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:197: 5.001.145a taṃ dṛṣṭvā meghasaṃkāśaṃ daśayojanam āyatam 5.001.145c cakāra surasāpy āsyaṃ viṃśadyojanam āyatam 5.001.146a hanumāṃs tu tataḥ kruddhas triṃśadyojanam āyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:198: 5.001.146c cakāra surasā vaktraṃ catvāriṃśat tathocchritam 5.001.147a babhūva hanumān vīraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:199: 5.001.147c cakāra surasā vaktraṃ ṣaṣṭiyojanam āyatam 5.001.148a tathaiva hanumān vīraḥ saptatiṃ yojanocchritaḥ 5.001.148c cakāra surasā vaktram aśītiṃ yojanāyatam 5.001.149a hanūmān acala prakhyo navatiṃ yojanocchritaḥ 5.001.149c cakāra surasā vaktraṃ śatayojanam āyatam 5.001.150a tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ vāyuputraḥ sa buddhimān 5.001.150c dīrghajihvaṃ surasayā sughoraṃ narakopamam
GE09ram_05_u:200: 5.001.151a sa saṃkṣipyātmanaḥ kāyaṃ jīmūta iva mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:202: 5.001.152a so 'bhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ niṣpatya ca mahājavaḥ 5.001.152c antarikṣe sthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:203: 5.001.153a praviṣṭo 'smi hi te vaktraṃ dākṣāyaṇi namo 'stu te
GE09ram_05_u:204: 5.001.153c gamiṣye yatra vaidehī satyaṃ cāstu vacas tava
GE09ram_05_u:205: 5.001.154a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vadanān muktaṃ candraṃ rāhumukhād iva
GE09ram_05_u:206: 5.001.154c abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:207: 5.001.155a arthasiddhyai hariśreṣṭha gaccha saumya yathāsukham 5.001.155c samānaya ca vaidehīṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā 5.001.156a tat tṛtīyaṃ hanumato dṛṣṭvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_05_u:208: 5.001.156c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni praśaśaṃsus tadā harim
GE09ram_05_u:209: 5.001.157a sa sāgaram anādhṛṣyam abhyetya varuṇālayam 5.001.157c jagāmākāśam āviśya vegena
GE09ram_05_u:210: 5.001.158a sevite vāridhāribhiḥ patagaiś ca niṣevite 5.001.158c carite kaiśikācāryair airāvataniṣevite
GE09ram_05_u:212: 5.001.159c vimānaiḥ saṃpatadbhiś ca vimalaiḥ samalaṃkṛte 5.001.160a vajrāśanisamāghātaiḥ pāvakair upaśobhite
GE09ram_05_u:214: 5.001.161a bahatā havyam atyantaṃ sevite citrabhānunā 5.001.161c grahanakṣatracandrārkatārāgaṇavibhūṣite
GE09ram_05_u:219: 5.001.164a bahuśaḥ sevite vīrair vidyādharagaṇair varaiḥ 5.001.164c kapinā kṛṣyamāṇāni mahābhrāṇi cakāśire
GE09ram_05_u:220: 5.001.165a praviśann abhrajālāni niṣpataṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:221: 5.001.165c prāvṛṣīndur ivābhāti niṣpatan praviśaṃs tadā 5.001.166a plavamānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃhikā nāma rākṣasī
GE09ram_05_u:222: 5.001.166c manasā cintayām āsa pravṛddhā kāmarūpiṇī 5.001.167a adya dīrghasya kālasya bhaviṣyāmy aham āśitā
GE09ram_05_u:223: 5.001.167c idaṃ hi me mahat sattvaṃ cirasya vaśam āgatam 5.001.168a iti saṃcintya manasā chāyām asya samakṣipat
GE09ram_05_u:224: 5.001.168c chāyāyāṃ saṃgṛhītāyāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ 5.001.169a samākṣipto 'smi sahasā paṅgūkṛtaparākramaḥ 5.001.169c pratilomena vātena mahānaur iva sāgare 5.001.170a tiryag ūrdhvam adhaś caiva vīkṣamāṇas tataḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:225: 5.001.170c dadarśa sa mahāsattvam utthitaṃ lavaṇāmbhasi 5.001.171a kapirājñā yad ākhyātaṃ sattvam adbhutadarśanam 5.001.171c chāyāgrāhi mahāvīryaṃ tad idaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:226: 5.001.172a sa tāṃ buddhvārthatattvena siṃhikāṃ matimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:228: 5.001.173a tasya sā kāyam udvīkṣya vardhamānaṃ mahākapeḥ
GE09ram_05_u:230: 5.001.174a sa dadarśa tatas tasyā vikṛtaṃ sumahan mukham
GE09ram_05_u:231: 5.001.174c kāyamātraṃ ca medhāvī marmāṇi ca mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:232: 5.001.175a sa tasyā vivṛte vaktre vajrasaṃhananaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:233: 5.001.175c saṃkṣipya muhur ātmānaṃ niṣpapāta mahābalaḥ 5.001.176a āsye tasyā nimajjantaṃ dadṛśuḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ 5.001.176c grasyamānaṃ yathā candraṃ pūrṇaṃ parvaṇi rāhuṇā
GE09ram_05_u:234: 5.001.177a tatas tasya nakhais tīkṣṇair marmāṇy utkṛtya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:236: 5.001.178a tāṃ hatāṃ vānareṇāśu patitāṃ vīkṣya siṃhikām
GE09ram_05_u:237: 5.001.178c bhūtāny ākāśacārīṇi tam ūcuḥ plavagarṣabham 5.001.179a bhīmam adya kṛtaṃ karma mahat sattvaṃ tvayā hatam 5.001.179c sādhayārtham abhipretam ariṣṭaṃ plavatāṃ vara 5.001.180a yasya tv etāni catvāri vānarendra yathā tava
GE09ram_05_u:238: 5.001.180c dhṛtir dṛṣṭir matir dākṣyaṃ sa karmasu na sīdati 5.001.181a sa taiḥ saṃbhāvitaḥ pūjyaḥ pratipannaprayojanaḥ 5.001.181c jagāmākāśam āviśya pannagāśanavat kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:239: 5.001.182a prāptabhūyiṣṭha pāras tu sarvataḥ pratilokayan 5.001.182c yojanānāṃ śatasyānte vanarājiṃ dadarśa saḥ 5.001.183a dadarśa ca patann eva vividhadrumabhūṣitam 5.001.183c dvīpaṃ śākhāmṛgaśreṣṭho malayopavanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:241: 5.001.184c sāgarasya ca patnīnāṃ mukhāny api vilokayan
GE09ram_05_u:243: 5.001.185c nirundhantam ivākāśaṃ cakāra matimān matim 5.001.186a kāyavṛddhiṃ pravegaṃ ca mama dṛṣṭvaiva rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:244: 5.001.186c mayi kautūhalaṃ kuryur iti mene mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:245: 5.001.187a tataḥ śarīraṃ saṃkṣipya tan mahīdharasaṃnibham 5.001.187c punaḥ prakṛtim āpede vītamoha ivātmavān 5.001.188a sa cārunānāvidharūpadhārī; paraṃ samāsādya samudratīram
GE09ram_05_u:246: 5.001.188c parair aśakyapratipannarūpaḥ; samīkṣitātmā samavekṣitārthaḥ 5.001.189a tataḥ sa lambasya gireḥ samṛddhe; vicitrakūṭe nipapāta kūṭe
GE09ram_05_u:247: 5.001.189c saketakoddālakanālikere; mahādrikūṭapratimo mahātmā 5.001.190a sa sāgaraṃ dānavapannagāyutaṃ; balena vikramya mahormimālinam
GE09ram_05_u:248: 5.001.190c nipatya tīre ca mahodadhes tadā; dadarśa laṅkām amarāvatīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:249: 5.002.001a sa sāgaram anādhṛṣyam atikramya mahābalaḥ 5.002.001c trikūṭaśikhare laṅkāṃ sthitāṃ svastho dadarśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:251: 5.002.002c abhivṛṣṭaḥ sthitas tatra babhau puṣpamayo yathā
GE09ram_05_u:252: 5.002.003a yojanānāṃ śataṃ śrīmāṃs tīrtvāpy uttamavikramaḥ 5.002.003c aniśvasan kapis tatra na glānim adhigacchati
GE09ram_05_u:253: 5.002.004a śatāny ahaṃ yojanānāṃ krameyaṃ subahūny api
GE09ram_05_u:254: 5.002.004c kiṃ punaḥ sāgarasyāntaṃ saṃkhyātaṃ śatayojanam 5.002.005a sa tu vīryavatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ plavatām api cottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:255: 5.002.005c jagāma vegavāṃl laṅkāṃ laṅghayitvā mahodadhim 5.002.006a śādvalāni ca nīlāni gandhavanti vanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:256: 5.002.006c gaṇḍavanti ca madhyena jagāma nagavanti ca
GE09ram_05_u:257: 5.002.007a śailāṃś ca tarusaṃchannān vanarājīś ca puṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:259: 5.002.008a sa tasminn acale tiṣṭhan vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:260: 5.002.008c sa nagāgre ca tāṃ laṅkāṃ dadarśa pavanātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:261: 5.002.009a saralān karṇikārāṃś ca kharjūrāṃś ca supuṣpitān
GE09ram_05_u:262: 5.002.009c priyālān muculindāṃś ca kuṭajān ketakān api
GE09ram_05_u:263: 5.002.010a priyaṅgūn gandhapūrṇāṃś ca nīpān saptacchadāṃs tathā
GE09ram_05_u:264: 5.002.010c asanān kovidārāṃś ca karavīrāṃś ca puṣpitān
GE09ram_05_u:265: 5.002.011a puṣpabhāranibaddhāṃś ca tathā mukulitān api 5.002.011c pādapān vihagākīrṇān
GE09ram_05_u:267: 5.002.012c ākrīḍān vividhān ramyān vividhāṃś ca jalāśayān
GE09ram_05_u:269: 5.002.013c udyānāni ca ramyāṇi dadarśa kapikuñjaraḥ 5.002.014a samāsādya ca lakṣmīvāṃl laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām 5.002.014c parikhābhiḥ sapadmābhiḥ sotpalābhir alaṃkṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:271: 5.002.015c samantād vicaradbhiś ca rākṣasair ugradhanvibhiḥ 5.002.016a kāñcanenāvṛtāṃ ramyāṃ prākāreṇa mahāpurīm
GE09ram_05_u:273: 5.002.017c dadarśa hanumāṃl laṅkāṃ divi devapurīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:274: 5.002.018a girimūrdhni sthitāṃ laṅkāṃ pāṇḍurair bhavanaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:275: 5.002.018c dadarśa sa kapiḥ śrīmān puram ākāśagaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:277: 5.002.019c plavamānām ivākāśe dadarśa hanumān purīm 5.002.020a saṃpūrṇāṃ rākṣasair ghorair nāgair bhogavatīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:278: 5.002.020c acintyāṃ sukṛtāṃ spaṣṭāṃ kuberādhyuṣitāṃ purā 5.002.021a daṃṣṭribhir bahubhiḥ śūraiḥ śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:279: 5.002.021c rakṣitāṃ rākṣasair ghorair guhām āśīviṣair api
GE09ram_05_u:280: 5.002.022a vapraprākārajaghanāṃ vipulāmbunavāmbarām 5.002.022c śataghnīśūlakeśāntām aṭṭālakavataṃsakām 5.002.023a dvāram uttaram āsādya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:283: 5.002.024a tasyāś ca mahatīṃ guptiṃ sāgaraṃ ca nirīkṣya saḥ 5.002.024c rāvaṇaṃ ca ripuṃ ghoraṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:285: 5.002.025c na hi yuddhena vai laṅkā śakyā jetuṃ surair api
GE09ram_05_u:286: 5.002.026a imāṃ tu viṣamāṃ durgāṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām
GE09ram_05_u:287: 5.002.026c prāpyāpi sa mahābāhuḥ kiṃ kariṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:288: 5.002.027a avakāśo na sāntvasya rākṣaseṣv abhigamyate 5.002.027c na dānasya na bhedasya naiva yuddhasya dṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:289: 5.002.028a caturṇām eva hi gatir vānarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:290: 5.002.028c vāliputrasya nīlasya mama rājñaś ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:291: 5.002.029a yāvaj jānāmi vaidehīṃ yadi jīvati vā na vā 5.002.029c tatraiva cintayiṣyāmi dṛṣṭvā tāṃ janakātmajām 5.002.030a tataḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:292: 5.002.030c giriśṛṅge sthitas tasmin rāmasyābhyudaye rataḥ 5.002.031a anena rūpeṇa mayā na śakyā rakṣasāṃ purī
GE09ram_05_u:293: 5.002.031c praveṣṭuṃ rākṣasair guptā krūrair balasamanvitaiḥ 5.002.032a ugraujaso mahāvīryo balavantaś ca rākṣasāḥ 5.002.032c vañcanīyā mayā sarve jānakīṃ parimārgitā 5.002.033a lakṣyālakṣyeṇa rūpeṇa rātrau laṅkā purī mayā
GE09ram_05_u:294: 5.002.033c praveṣṭuṃ prāptakālaṃ me kṛtyaṃ sādhayituṃ mahat
GE09ram_05_u:295: 5.002.034a tāṃ purīṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā durādharṣāṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:296: 5.002.034c hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:299: 5.002.036a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:300: 5.002.036c ekām ekaś ca paśyeyaṃ rahite janakātmajām
GE09ram_05_u:302: 5.002.037c viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
GE09ram_05_u:303: 5.002.038a arthānarthāntare buddhir niścitāpi na śobhate 5.002.038c ghātayanti hi kāryāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ 5.002.039a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet 5.002.039c laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet 5.002.040a mayi dṛṣṭe tu rakṣobhī rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:304: 5.002.040c bhaved vyartham idaṃ kāryaṃ rāvaṇānartham icchataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:305: 5.002.041a na hi śakyaṃ kva cit sthātum avijñātena rākṣasaiḥ 5.002.041c api rākṣasarūpeṇa kim utānyena kena cit
GE09ram_05_u:306: 5.002.042a vāyur apy atra nājñātaś cared iti matir mama 5.002.042c na hy asty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid rākṣasānāṃ balīyasām 5.002.043a ihāhaṃ yadi tiṣṭhāmi svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:307: 5.002.043c vināśam upayāsyāmi bhartur arthaś ca hīyate
GE09ram_05_u:308: 5.002.044a tad ahaṃ svena rūpeṇa rajanyāṃ hrasvatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:310: 5.002.045a rāvaṇasya purīṃ rātrau praviśya sudurāsadām 5.002.045c vicinvan bhavanaṃ sarvaṃ drakṣyāmi janakātmajām 5.002.046a iti saṃcintya hanumān sūryasyāstamayaṃ kapiḥ 5.002.046c ācakāṅkṣe tadā vīrā vaidehyā darśanotsukaḥ 5.002.046e pṛṣadaṃśakamātraḥ san babhūvādbhutadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:311: 5.002.047a pradoṣakāle hanumāṃs tūrṇam utpatya vīryavān 5.002.047c praviveśa purīṃ ramyāṃ
GE09ram_05_u:314: 5.002.049a saptabhaumāṣṭabhaumaiś ca sa dadarśa mahāpurīm 5.002.049c talaiḥ sphāṭikasaṃpūrṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:316: 5.002.050c talaiḥ śuśubhire tāni bhavanāny atra rakṣasām
GE09ram_05_u:317: 5.002.051a kāñcanāni vicitrāṇi toraṇāni ca rakṣasām 5.002.051c laṅkām uddyotayām āsuḥ sarvataḥ samalaṃkṛtām 5.002.052a acintyām adbhutākārāṃ dṛṣṭvā laṅkāṃ mahākapiḥ 5.002.052c āsīd viṣaṇṇo hṛṣṭaś ca vaidehyā darśanotsukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:320: 5.002.054a candro 'pi sācivyam ivāsya kurvaṃs; tārāgaṇair madhyagato virājan
GE09ram_05_u:321: 5.002.054c jyotsnāvitānena vitatya lokam; uttiṣṭhate naikasahasraraśmiḥ 5.002.055a śaṅkhaprabhaṃ kṣīramṛṇālavarṇam; udgacchamānaṃ vyavabhāsamānam 5.002.055c dadarśa candraṃ sa kapipravīraḥ; poplūyamānaṃ sarasīva haṃsaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:323: 5.003.001c sattvam āsthāya medhāvī hanumān mārutātmajaḥ 5.003.002a niśi laṅkāṃ mahāsattvo viveśa kapikuñjaraḥ 5.003.002c ramyakānanatoyāḍhyāṃ purīṃ rāvaṇapālitām
GE09ram_05_u:326: 5.003.004c cārutoraṇaniryūhāṃ pāṇḍuradvāratoraṇām 5.003.005a bhujagācaritāṃ guptāṃ śubhāṃ bhogavatīm iva 5.003.005c tāṃ savidyudghanākīrṇāṃ jyotirmārganiṣevitām
GE09ram_05_u:329: 5.003.007c āsādya sahasā hṛṣṭaḥ prākāram abhipedivān 5.003.008a vismayāviṣṭahṛdayaḥ purīm ālokya sarvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:332: 5.003.009c taptahāṭakaniryūhai rājatāmalapāṇḍuraiḥ 5.003.010a vaidūryatalasopānaiḥ sphāṭikāntarapāṃsubhiḥ 5.003.010c cārusaṃjavanopetaiḥ kham ivotpatitaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:335: 5.003.012c kham ivotpatitāṃ laṅkāṃ jaharṣa hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:336: 5.003.013a tāṃ samīkṣya purīṃ laṅkāṃ rākṣasādhipateḥ śubhām
GE09ram_05_u:337: 5.003.013c anuttamām ṛddhiyutāṃ cintayām āsa vīryavān 5.003.014a neyam anyena nagarī śakyā dharṣayituṃ balāt
GE09ram_05_u:340: 5.003.015c prasiddheyaṃ bhaved bhūmir maindadvividayor api 5.003.016a vivasvatas tanūjasya hareś ca kuśaparvaṇaḥ 5.003.016c ṛkṣasya ketumālasya mama caiva gatir bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:341: 5.003.017a samīkṣya tu mahābāho rāghavasya parākramam 5.003.017c lakṣmaṇasya ca vikrāntam abhavat prītimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:343: 5.003.018c yantrāgārastanīm ṛddhāṃ pramadām iva bhūṣitām 5.003.019a tāṃ naṣṭatimirāṃ dīpair bhāsvaraiś ca mahāgṛhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:344: 5.003.019c nagarīṃ rākṣasendrasya dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ 5.003.020a praviṣṭaḥ sattvasaṃpanno niśāyāṃ mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:348: 5.003.021e gṛhamedhaiḥ purī ramyā babhāse dyaur ivāmbudaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:349: 5.003.022a prajajvāla tadā laṅkā rakṣogaṇagṛhaiḥ śubhaiḥ 5.003.022c sitābhrasadṛśaiś citraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:352: 5.003.023c rāghavārthaṃ carañ śrīmān dadarśa ca nananda ca
GE09ram_05_u:354: 5.003.024c strīṇāṃ madasamṛddhānāṃ divi cāpsarasām iva 5.003.025a śuśrāva kāñcīninādaṃ nūpurāṇāṃ ca niḥsvanam 5.003.025c sopānaninadāṃś caiva bhavaneṣu mahātmanam
GE09ram_05_u:355: 5.003.025e āsphoṭitaninādāṃś ca kṣveḍitāṃś ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:356: 5.003.026a svādhyāya niratāṃś caiva yātudhānān dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:358: 5.003.027a rājamārgaṃ samāvṛtya sthitaṃ rakṣobalaṃ mahat 5.003.027c dadarśa madhyame gulme rākṣasasya carān bahūn
GE09ram_05_u:363: 5.003.030a karālān bhugnavaktrāṃś ca vikaṭān vāmanāṃs tathā
GE09ram_05_u:364: 5.003.030c dhanvinaḥ khaḍginaś caiva śataghnī musalāyudhān 5.003.030e parighottamahastāṃś ca vicitrakavacojjvalān
GE09ram_05_u:366: 5.003.031c virūpān bahurūpāṃś ca surūpāṃś ca suvarcasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:368: 5.003.032c kṣepaṇīpāśahastāṃś ca dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ 5.003.033a sragviṇas tv anuliptāṃś ca varābharaṇabhūṣitān 5.003.033c tīkṣṇaśūladharāṃś caiva vajriṇaś ca mahābalān 5.003.034a śatasāhasram avyagram ārakṣaṃ madhyamaṃ kapiḥ 5.003.034c prākārāvṛtam atyantaṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ 5.003.035a triviṣṭapanibhaṃ divyaṃ divyanādavināditam
GE09ram_05_u:370: 5.003.036a rathair yānair vimānaiś ca tathā gajahayaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:372: 5.003.037a bhūṣitaṃ ruciradvāraṃ mattaiś ca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ 5.003.037c rākṣasādhipater guptam āviveśa gṛhaṃ kapiḥ 5.004.001a tataḥ sa madhyaṃ gatam aṃśumantaṃ; jyotsnāvitānaṃ mahad udvamantam
GE09ram_05_u:373: 5.004.001c dadarśa dhīmān divi bhānumantaṃ; goṣṭhe vṛṣaṃ mattam iva bhramantam 5.004.002a lokasya pāpāni vināśayantaṃ; mahodadhiṃ cāpi samedhayantam
GE09ram_05_u:374: 5.004.002c bhūtāni sarvāṇi virājayantaṃ; dadarśa śītāṃśum athābhiyāntam
GE09ram_05_u:375: 5.004.003a yā bhāti lakṣmīr bhuvi mandarasthā; tathā pradoṣeṣu ca
GE09ram_05_u:377: 5.004.003c tathaiva toyeṣu ca puṣkarasthā; rarāja sā cāruniśākarasthā
GE09ram_05_u:378: 5.004.004a haṃso yathā rājatapañjurasthaḥ; siṃho yathā mandarakandarasthaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:379: 5.004.004c vīro yathā garvitakuñjarasthaś; candro 'pi babhrāja tathāmbarasthaḥ 5.004.005a sthitaḥ kakudmān iva tīkṣṇaśṛṅgo; mahācalaḥ śveta ivoccaśṛṅgaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:381: 5.004.006a prakāśacandrodayanaṣṭadoṣaḥ; pravṛddharakṣaḥ piśitāśadoṣaḥ 5.004.006c rāmābhirāmeritacittadoṣaḥ; svargaprakāśo bhagavān pradoṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:382: 5.004.007a tantrī svanāḥ karṇasukhāḥ pravṛttāḥ; svapanti nāryaḥ patibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:384: 5.004.007c naktaṃcarāś cāpi tathā pravṛttā; vihartum atyadbhutaraudravṛttāḥ 5.004.008a mattapramattāni samākulāni; rathāśvabhadrāsanasaṃkulāni
GE09ram_05_u:385: 5.004.008c vīraśriyā cāpi samākulāni; dadarśa dhīmān sa kapiḥ kulāni 5.004.009a parasparaṃ cādhikam ākṣipanti; bhujāṃś ca pīnān adhivikṣipanti
GE09ram_05_u:387: 5.004.010a rakṣāṃsi vakṣāṃsi ca vikṣipanti; gātrāṇi kāntāsu ca vikṣipanti
GE09ram_05_u:388: 5.004.010c dadarśa kāntāś ca samālapanti; tathāparās tatra punaḥ svapanti
GE09ram_05_u:389: 5.004.011a mahāgajaiś cāpi tathā nadadbhiḥ; sūpūjitaiś cāpi tathā
GE09ram_05_u:391: 5.004.011c rarāja vīraiś ca viniḥśvasadbhir; hrado bhujaṅgair iva
GE09ram_05_u:394: 5.004.012c nānāvidhānān rucirābhidhānān; dadarśa tasyāṃ puri yātudhānān
GE09ram_05_u:395: 5.004.013a nananda dṛṣṭvā sa ca tān surūpān; nānāguṇān ātmaguṇānurūpān 5.004.013c vidyotamānān sa ca tān surūpān; dadarśa kāṃś cic ca punar virūpān
GE09ram_05_u:396: 5.004.014a tato varārhāḥ suviśuddhabhāvās; teṣāṃ striyas tatra
GE09ram_05_u:398: 5.004.014c priyeṣu pāneṣu ca saktabhāvā; dadarśa tārā iva suprabhāvāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:399: 5.004.015a śriyā jvalantīs trapayopagūḍhā; niśīthakāle ramaṇopagūḍhāḥ 5.004.015c dadarśa kāś cit pramadopagūḍhā; yathā vihaṃgāḥ kusumopagūḍāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:400: 5.004.016a anyāḥ punar harmyatalopaviṣṭās; tatra priyāṅkeṣu sukhopaviṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:401: 5.004.016c bhartuḥ priyā dharmaparā niviṣṭā; dadarśa dhīmān manadābhiviṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:402: 5.004.017a aprāvṛtāḥ kāñcanarājivarṇāḥ; kāś cit parārdhyās tapanīyavarṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:403: 5.004.017c punaś ca kāś cic chaśalakṣmavarṇāḥ; kāntaprahīṇā rucirāṅgavarṇāḥ 5.004.018a tataḥ priyān prāpya mano'bhirāmān; suprītiyuktāḥ prasamīkṣya rāmāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:404: 5.004.018c gṛheṣu hṛṣṭāḥ paramābhirāmā; haripravīraḥ sa dadarśa rāmāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:405: 5.004.019a candraprakāśāś ca hi vaktramālā; vakrākṣipakṣmāś ca sunetramālāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:406: 5.004.019c vibhūṣaṇānāṃ ca dadarśa mālāḥ; śatahradānām iva cārumālāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:407: 5.004.020a na tv eva sītāṃ paramābhijātāṃ; pathi sthite rājakule prajātām
GE09ram_05_u:408: 5.004.020c latāṃ praphullām iva sādhujātāṃ; dadarśa tanvīṃ manasābhijātām
GE09ram_05_u:409: 5.004.021a sanātane vartmani saṃniviṣṭāṃ; rāmekṣaṇīṃ tāṃ madanābhiviṣṭām
GE09ram_05_u:410: 5.004.021c bhartur manaḥ śrīmad anupraviṣṭāṃ; strībhyo varābhyaś ca sadā viśiṣṭām 5.004.022a uṣṇārditāṃ sānusṛtāsrakaṇṭhīṃ; purā varārhottamaniṣkakaṇṭhīm 5.004.022c sujātapakṣmām abhiraktakaṇṭhīṃ; vane pravṛttām iva nīlakaṇṭhīm
GE09ram_05_u:411: 5.004.023a avyaktalekhām iva candralekhāṃ; pāṃsupradigdhām iva hemalekhām
GE09ram_05_u:412: 5.004.023c kṣataprarūḍhām iva bāṇalekhāṃ; vāyuprabhinnām iva meghalekhām
GE09ram_05_u:413: 5.004.024a sītām apaśyan manujeśvarasya; rāmasya patnīṃ vadatāṃ varasya
GE09ram_05_u:414: 5.004.024c babhūva duḥkhābhihataś cirasya; plavaṃgamo manda ivācirasya
GE09ram_05_u:415: 5.005.001a sa nikāmaṃ vināmeṣu vicaran kāmarūpadhṛk 5.005.001c vicacāra kapir laṅkāṃ lāghavena samanvitaḥ 5.005.002a āsasādātha lakṣmīvān rākṣasendraniveśanam
GE09ram_05_u:416: 5.005.002c prākāreṇārkavarṇena bhāsvareṇābhisaṃvṛtam 5.005.003a rakṣitaṃ rākṣasair bhīmaiḥ siṃhair iva mahad vanam
GE09ram_05_u:419: 5.005.004c vicitrābhiś ca kakṣyābhir dvāraiś ca rucirair vṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:420: 5.005.005a gajāsthitair mahāmātraiḥ śūraiś ca vigataśramaiḥ 5.005.005c upasthitam asaṃhāryair hayaiḥ syandanayāyibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:421: 5.005.006a siṃhavyāghratanutrāṇair dāntakāñcanarājataiḥ 5.005.006c ghoṣavadbhir vicitraiś ca sadā vicaritaṃ rathaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:422: 5.005.007a bahuratnasamākīrṇaṃ parārdhyāsanabhājanam 5.005.007c mahārathasamāvāsaṃ mahārathamahāsanam 5.005.008a dṛśyaiś ca paramodārais tais taiś ca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:424: 5.005.009a vinītair antapālaiś ca rakṣobhiś ca surakṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:425: 5.005.009c mukhyābhiś ca varastrībhiḥ paripūrṇaṃ samantataḥ 5.005.010a muditapramadā ratnaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:426: 5.005.010c varābharaṇanirhrādaiḥ samudrasvananiḥsvanam 5.005.011a tad rājaguṇasaṃpannaṃ mukhyaiś ca varacandanaiḥ 5.005.011c bherīmṛdaṅgābhirutaṃ śaṅkhaghoṣavināditam 5.005.012a nityārcitaṃ parvahutaṃ pūjitaṃ rākṣasaiḥ sadā 5.005.012c samudram iva gambhīraṃ samudram iva niḥsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:431: 5.005.015a gṛhād gṛhaṃ rākṣasānām udyānāni ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:432: 5.005.015c vīkṣamāṇo hy asaṃtrastaḥ prāsādāṃś ca cacāra saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:436: 5.005.017c vibhīṣaṇasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:437: 5.005.018a mahodarasya ca tathā virūpākṣasya caiva hi
GE09ram_05_u:438: 5.005.018c vidyujjihvasya bhavanaṃ vidyunmāles tathaiva ca 5.005.018e vajradaṃṣṭrasya ca tathā pupluve sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:439: 5.005.019a śukasya ca mahāvegaḥ sāraṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:440: 5.005.019c tathā cendrajito veśma jagāma hariyūthapaḥ 5.005.020a jambumāleḥ sumāleś ca jagāma hariyūthapaḥ 5.005.020c raśmiketoś ca bhavanaṃ sūryaśatros tathaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:441: 5.005.021a dhūmrākṣasya ca saṃpāter bhavanaṃ mārutātmajaḥ 5.005.021c vidyudrūpasya bhīmasya ghanasya vighanasya ca 5.005.022a śukanābhasya vakrasya śaṭhasya vikaṭasya ca 5.005.022c hrasvakarṇasya daṃṣṭrasya romaśasya ca rakṣasaḥ 5.005.023a yuddhonmattasya mattasya dhvajagrīvasya nādinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:443: 5.005.024a karālasya piśācasya śoṇitākṣasya caiva hi 5.005.024c kramamāṇaḥ krameṇaiva hanūmān
GE09ram_05_u:444: 5.005.025a teṣu teṣu mahārheṣu bhavaneṣu mahāyaśāḥ 5.005.025c teṣām ṛddhimatām ṛddhiṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:450: 5.005.028a dadarśa vividhān gulmāṃs tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
GE09ram_05_u:451: 5.005.029a raktāñ śvetān sitāṃś caiva harīṃś caiva mahājavān
GE09ram_05_u:454: 5.005.030c nihantṝn parasainyānāṃ gṛhe tasmin dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:455: 5.005.031a kṣarataś ca yathā meghān sravataś ca yathā girīn 5.005.031c meghastanitanirghoṣān durdharṣān samare paraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:459: 5.005.033c śibikā vividhākārāḥ sa kapir mārutātmajaḥ 5.005.034a latāgṛhāṇi citrāṇi citraśālāgṛhāṇi
GE09ram_05_u:461: 5.005.035a kāmasya gṛhakaṃ ramyaṃ divāgṛhakam eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:467: 5.005.038a arcirbhiś cāpi ratnānāṃ tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:468: 5.005.038c virarājātha tad veśma raśmimān iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:469: 5.005.039a jāmbūnadamayāny eva śayanāny āsanāni ca 5.005.039c bhājanāni ca śubhrāṇi dadarśa hariyūthapaḥ 5.005.040a madhvāsavakṛtakledaṃ maṇibhājanasaṃkulam 5.005.040c manoramam asaṃbādhaṃ kuberabhavanaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:470: 5.005.041a nūpurāṇāṃ ca ghoṣeṇa kāñcīnāṃ ninadena ca
GE09ram_05_u:472: 5.005.042a prāsādasaṃghātayutaṃ strīratnaśatasaṃkulam 5.005.042c suvyūḍhakakṣyaṃ hanumān praviveśa mahāgṛham
GE09ram_05_u:474: 5.006.001c yathā mahat prāvṛṣi meghajālaṃ; vidyutpinaddhaṃ savihaṃgajālam 5.006.002a niveśanānāṃ vividhāś ca śālāḥ; pradhānaśaṅkhāyudhacāpaśālāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:475: 5.006.002c manoharāś cāpi punar viśālā; dadarśa veśmādriṣu candraśālāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:477: 5.006.003c sarvaiś ca doṣaiḥ parivarjitāni; kapir dadarśa svabalārjitāni
GE09ram_05_u:478: 5.006.004a tāni prayatnābhisamāhitāni; mayena sākṣād iva nirmitāni
GE09ram_05_u:480: 5.006.005a tato dadarśocchritamegharūpaṃ; manoharaṃ kāñcanacārurūpam 5.006.005c rakṣo'dhipasyātmabalānurūpaṃ; gṛhottamaṃ hy apratirūparūpam
GE09ram_05_u:481: 5.006.006a mahītale svargam iva prakīrṇaṃ; śriyā jvalantaṃ bahuratnakīrṇam
GE09ram_05_u:483: 5.006.007a nārīpravekair iva dīpyamānaṃ; taḍidbhir ambhodavad arcyamānam
GE09ram_05_u:484: 5.006.007c haṃsapravekair iva vāhyamānaṃ; śriyā yutaṃ khe sukṛtāṃ vimānam 5.006.008a yathā nagāgraṃ bahudhātucitraṃ; yathā nabhaś ca
GE09ram_05_u:486: 5.006.008c dadarśa yuktīkṛtameghacitraṃ; vimānaratnaṃ bahuratnacitram 5.006.009a mahī kṛtā parvatarājipūrṇā; śailāḥ kṛtā vṛkṣavitānapūrṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:487: 5.006.009c vṛkṣāḥ kṛtāḥ puṣpavitānapūrṇāḥ; puṣpaṃ kṛtaṃ kesarapatrapūrṇam
GE09ram_05_u:488: 5.006.010a kṛtāni veśmāni ca pāṇḍurāṇi; tathā supuṣpā api puṣkariṇyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:489: 5.006.010c punaś ca padmāni sakesarāṇi; dhanyāni citrāṇi tathā vanāni
GE09ram_05_u:490: 5.006.011a puṣpāhvayaṃ nāma virājamānaṃ; ratnaprabhābhiś ca vivardhamānam
GE09ram_05_u:491: 5.006.011c veśmottamānām api coccamānaṃ; mahākapis tatra mahāvimānam
GE09ram_05_u:492: 5.006.012a kṛtāś ca vaidūryamayā vihaṃgā; rūpyapravālaiś ca tathā vihaṃgāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:493: 5.006.012c citrāś ca nānāvasubhir bhujaṃgā; jātyānurūpās turagāḥ śubhāṅgāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:494: 5.006.013a pravālajāmbūnadapuṣpapakṣāḥ; salīlam āvarjitajihmapakṣāḥ 5.006.013c kāmasya sākṣād iva bhānti pakṣāḥ; kṛtā vihaṃgāḥ sumukhāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:496: 5.006.014a niyujyamānāś ca gajāḥ suhastāḥ; sakesarāś cotpalapatrahastāḥ 5.006.014c babhūva devī ca kṛtā suhastā; lakṣmīs tathā padmini padmahastā
GE09ram_05_u:497: 5.006.015a itīva tad gṛham abhigamya śobhanaṃ; savismayo nagam iva
GE09ram_05_u:499: 5.006.015c punaś ca tat paramasugandhi sundaraṃ; himātyaye nagam iva
GE09ram_05_u:501: 5.006.016a tataḥ sa tāṃ kapir abhipatya pūjitāṃ; caran purīṃ daśamukhabāhupālitām
GE09ram_05_u:502: 5.006.016c adṛśya tāṃ janakasutāṃ supūjitāṃ; suduḥkhitāṃ patiguṇaveganirjitām 5.006.017a tatas tadā bahuvidhabhāvitātmanaḥ; kṛtātmano janakasutāṃ suvartmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:503: 5.006.017c apaśyato 'bhavad atiduḥkhitaṃ manaḥ; sucakṣuṣaḥ pravicarato mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:506: 5.007.002a ardhayojanavistīrṇam āyataṃ yojanaṃ hi tat 5.007.002c bhavanaṃ rākṣasendrasya
GE09ram_05_u:507: 5.007.003a mārgamāṇas tu vaidehīṃ sītām āyatalocanām 5.007.003c sarvataḥ paricakrāma hanūmān
GE09ram_05_u:508: 5.007.004a caturviṣāṇair dviradais triviṣāṇais tathaiva ca 5.007.004c parikṣiptam asaṃbādhaṃ rakṣyamāṇam udāyudhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:509: 5.007.005a rākṣasībhiś ca patnībhī rāvaṇasya niveśanam 5.007.005c āhṛtābhiś ca vikramya rājakanyābhir āvṛtam 5.007.006a tan nakramakarākīrṇaṃ timiṃgilajhaṣākulam
GE09ram_05_u:511: 5.007.007a yā hi vaiśvaraṇe lakṣmīr yā cendre harivāhane
GE09ram_05_u:512: 5.007.007c sā rāvaṇagṛhe sarvā nityam evānapāyinī 5.007.008a yā ca rājñaḥ kuberasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:513: 5.007.008c tādṛśī tad viśiṣṭā vā ṛddhī rakṣo gṛheṣv iha 5.007.009a tasya harmyasya madhyasthaṃ veśma cānyat sunirmitam
GE09ram_05_u:515: 5.007.010a brahmaṇo 'rthe kṛtaṃ divyaṃ divi yad viśvakarmaṇā 5.007.010c vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ nāma sarvaratnavibhūṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:516: 5.007.011a pareṇa tapasā lebhe yat kuberaḥ pitāmahāt
GE09ram_05_u:517: 5.007.011c kuberam ojasā jitvā lebhe tad rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:519: 5.007.012c sukṛtair ācitaṃ stambhaiḥ pradīptam iva ca śriyā
GE09ram_05_u:523: 5.007.014c hemasopānasaṃyuktaṃ cārupravaravedikam 5.007.015a jālavātāyanair yuktaṃ kāñcanaiḥ sthāṭikair api 5.007.015c indranīlamahānīlamaṇipravaravedikam
GE09ram_05_u:524: 5.007.015e vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ divyam āruroha mahākapiḥ 5.007.016a tatrasthaḥ sa tadā gandhaṃ pānabhakṣyānnasaṃbhavam 5.007.016c divyaṃ saṃmūrchitaṃ jighran rūpavantam ivānilam 5.007.017a sa gandhas taṃ mahāsattvaṃ bandhur bandhum ivottamam
GE09ram_05_u:525: 5.007.017c ita ehīty uvāceva tatra yatra sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:526: 5.007.018a tatas tāṃ prasthitaḥ śālāṃ dadarśa mahatīṃ śubhām
GE09ram_05_u:527: 5.007.018c rāvaṇasya manaḥkāntāṃ kāntām iva varastriyam 5.007.019a maṇisopānavikṛtāṃ hemajālavirājitām 5.007.019c sphāṭikair āvṛtatalāṃ dantāntaritarūpikām
GE09ram_05_u:528: 5.007.020a muktābhiś ca pravālaiś ca rūpyacāmīkarair api
GE09ram_05_u:530: 5.007.021a samair ṛjubhir atyuccaiḥ samantāt suvibhūṣitaiḥ 5.007.021c stambhaiḥ pakṣair ivātyuccair divaṃ saṃprasthitām iva
GE09ram_05_u:536: 5.007.024c citrāṃ puṣpopahāreṇa kalmāṣīm iva suprabhām 5.007.025a manaḥsaṃhlādajananīṃ varṇasyāpi prasādinīm
GE09ram_05_u:537: 5.007.025c tāṃ śokanāśinīṃ divyāṃ śriyaḥ saṃjananīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:538: 5.007.026a indriyāṇīndriyārthais tu pañca pañcabhir uttamaiḥ 5.007.026c tarpayām āsa māteva tadā rāvaṇapālitā 5.007.027a svargo 'yaṃ devaloko 'yam indrasyeyaṃ purī bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:539: 5.007.027c siddhir veyaṃ parā hi syād ity amanyata mārutiḥ 5.007.028a pradhyāyata ivāpaśyat pradīpāṃs tatra kāñcanān 5.007.028c dhūrtān iva mahādhūrtair devanena parājitān 5.007.029a dīpānāṃ ca prakāśena tejasā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:540: 5.007.029c arcirbhir bhūṣaṇānāṃ ca pradīptety abhyamanyata 5.007.030a tato 'paśyat kuthāsīnaṃ nānāvarṇāmbarasrajam 5.007.030c sahasraṃ varanārīṇāṃ nānāveṣavibhūṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:542: 5.007.031c krīḍitvoparataṃ rātrau suṣvāpa balavat tadā 5.007.032a tat prasuptaṃ viruruce
GE09ram_05_u:546: 5.007.034a prabuddhānīva padmāni tāsāṃ bhūtvā kṣapākṣaye 5.007.034c punaḥsaṃvṛtapatrāṇi rātrāv iva babhus tadā 5.007.035a imāni mukhapadmāni niyataṃ mattaṣaṭpadāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:547: 5.007.035c ambujānīva phullāni prārthayanti punaḥ punaḥ 5.007.036a iti vāmanyata śrīmān upapattyā mahākapiḥ 5.007.036c mene hi guṇatas tāni samāni salilodbhavaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:548: 5.007.037a sā tasya śuśubhe śālā tābhiḥ strībhir virājitā
GE09ram_05_u:549: 5.007.037c śāradīva prasannā dyaus tārābhir abhiśobhitā 5.007.038a sa ca tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ śuśubhe rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:550: 5.007.038c yathā hy uḍupatiḥ śrīmāṃs tārābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:551: 5.007.039a yāś cyavante 'mbarāt tārāḥ puṇyaśeṣasamāvṛtāḥ 5.007.039c imās tāḥ saṃgatāḥ kṛtsnā iti mene haris tadā 5.007.040a tārāṇām iva suvyaktaṃ mahatīnāṃ śubhārciṣām 5.007.040c prabhāvarṇaprasādāś ca virejus tatra yoṣitām 5.007.041a vyāvṛttagurupīnasrakprakīrṇavarabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:552: 5.007.041c pānavyāyāmakāleṣu nidrāpahṛtacetasaḥ 5.007.042a vyāvṛttatilakāḥ kāś cit kāś cid udbhrāntanūpurāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:553: 5.007.042c pārśve galitahārāś ca kāś cit paramayoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:554: 5.007.043a mukhā hāravṛtāś cānyāḥ kāś cit prasrastavāsasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:555: 5.007.043c vyāviddharaśanā dāmāḥ kiśorya iva vāhitāḥ 5.007.044a sukuṇḍaladharāś cānyā vicchinnamṛditasrajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:556: 5.007.044c gajendramṛditāḥ phullā latā iva mahāvane 5.007.045a candrāṃśukiraṇābhāś ca hārāḥ kāsāṃ cid utkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:557: 5.007.045c haṃsā iva babhuḥ suptāḥ stanamadhyeṣu yoṣitām
GE09ram_05_u:558: 5.007.046a aparāsāṃ ca vaidūryāḥ kādambā iva pakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:560: 5.007.047a haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇāś cakravākopaśobhitāḥ 5.007.047c āpagā iva tā rejur jaghanaiḥ pulinair iva
GE09ram_05_u:562: 5.007.048c bhāvagrāhā yaśastīrāḥ suptā nadya ivābabhuḥ 5.007.049a mṛduṣv aṅgeṣu kāsāṃ cit kucāgreṣu ca saṃsthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:564: 5.007.050a aṃśukāntāś ca kāsāṃ cin mukhamārutakampitāḥ 5.007.050c upary upari vaktrāṇāṃ vyādhūyante punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:565: 5.007.051a tāḥ pātākā ivoddhūtāḥ patnīnāṃ ruciraprabhāḥ 5.007.051c nānāvarṇasuvarṇānāṃ vaktramūleṣu rejire
GE09ram_05_u:566: 5.007.052a vavalguś cātra kāsāṃ cit kuṇḍalāni śubhārciṣām
GE09ram_05_u:568: 5.007.053a śarkarāsavagandhaḥ sa prakṛtyā surabhiḥ sukhaḥ 5.007.053c tāsāṃ vadananiḥśvāsaḥ siṣeve rāvaṇaṃ tadā 5.007.054a rāvaṇānanaśaṅkāś ca kāś cid rāvaṇayoṣitaḥ 5.007.054c mukhāni sma sapatnīnām upājighran punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:569: 5.007.055a atyarthaṃ saktamanaso rāvaṇe tā varastriyaḥ 5.007.055c asvatantrāḥ sapatnīnāṃ priyam evācaraṃs tadā 5.007.056a bāhūn upanidhāyānyāḥ pārihārya vibhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:570: 5.007.056c aṃśukāni ca ramyāṇi pramadās tatra śiśyire
GE09ram_05_u:571: 5.007.057a anyā vakṣasi cānyasyās tasyāḥ kā cit punar bhujam 5.007.057c aparā tv aṅkam anyasyās tasyāś cāpy aparā bhujau 5.007.058a ūrupārśvakaṭīpṛṣṭham anyonyasya samāśritāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:573: 5.007.059c ekīkṛtabhujāḥ sarvāḥ suṣupus tatra yoṣitaḥ 5.007.060a anyonyabhujasūtreṇa strīmālāgrathitā hi sā
GE09ram_05_u:574: 5.007.060c māleva grathitā sūtre śuśubhe mattaṣaṭpadā 5.007.061a latānāṃ mādhave māsi phullānāṃ vāyusevanāt 5.007.061c anyonyamālāgrathitaṃ saṃsaktakusumoccayam 5.007.062a vyativeṣṭitasuskantham anyonyabhramarākulam 5.007.062c āsīd vanam ivoddhūtaṃ strīvanaṃ rāvaṇasya tat
GE09ram_05_u:575: 5.007.063a uciteṣv api suvyaktaṃ na tāsāṃ yoṣitāṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:577: 5.007.064a rāvaṇe sukhasaṃviṣṭe tāḥ striyo vividhaprabhāḥ 5.007.064c jvalantaḥ kāñcanā dīpāḥ prekṣantānimiṣā iva 5.007.065a rājarṣipitṛdaityānāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ ca yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:578: 5.007.065c rakṣasāṃ cābhavan kanyās tasya kāmavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:579: 5.007.066a na tatra kā cit pramadā prasahya; vīryopapannena guṇena labdhā
GE09ram_05_u:580: 5.007.066c na cānyakāmāpi na cānyapūrvā; vinā varārhāṃ janakātmajāṃ tu
GE09ram_05_u:581: 5.007.067a na cākulīnā na ca hīnarūpā; nādakṣiṇā nānupacāra yuktā
GE09ram_05_u:582: 5.007.067c bhāryābhavat tasya na hīnasattvā; na cāpi kāntasya na kāmanīyā 5.007.068a babhūva buddhis tu harīśvarasya; yadīdṛśī rāghavadharmapatnī 5.007.068c imā yathā rākṣasarājabhāryāḥ; sujātam asyeti hi sādhubuddheḥ
GE09ram_05_u:583: 5.007.069a punaś ca so 'cintayad ārtarūpo; dhruvaṃ viśiṣṭā guṇato hi sītā 5.007.069c athāyam asyāṃ kṛtavān mahātmā; laṅkeśvaraḥ kaṣṭam anāryakarma
GE09ram_05_u:584: 5.008.001a tatra divyopamaṃ mukhyaṃ sphāṭikaṃ ratnabhūṣitam 5.008.001c avekṣamāṇo hanumān dadarśa śayanāsanam
GE09ram_05_u:588: 5.008.003c gandhaiś ca vividhair juṣṭaṃ varadhūpena dhūpitam
GE09ram_05_u:594: 5.008.007a vṛtam ābharaṇair divyaiḥ surūpaṃ kāmarūpiṇam 5.008.007c savṛkṣavanagulmāḍhyaṃ prasuptam iva mandaram
GE09ram_05_u:597: 5.008.009a pītvāpy uparataṃ cāpi dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:598: 5.008.009c bhāskare śayane vīraṃ prasuptaṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.008.010a niḥśvasantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ rāvaṇaṃ vānarottamaḥ 5.008.010c āsādya paramodvignaḥ so 'pāsarpat subhītavat
GE09ram_05_u:600: 5.008.011c suptaṃ rākṣasaśārdūlaṃ prekṣate sma mahākapiḥ 5.008.012a śuśubhe rākṣasendrasya svapataḥ śayanottamam
GE09ram_05_u:602: 5.008.013a kāñcanāṅgadanaddhau ca dadarśa sa mahātmanaḥ 5.008.013c vikṣiptau rākṣasendrasya bhujāv indradhvajopamau
GE09ram_05_u:603: 5.008.014a airāvataviṣāṇāgrair āpīḍitakṛtavraṇau 5.008.014c vajrollikhitapīnāṃsau viṣṇucakraparikṣitau 5.008.015a pīnau samasujātāṃsau saṃgatau balasaṃyutau
GE09ram_05_u:606: 5.008.016c vikṣiptau śayane śubhre pañcaśīrṣāv ivoragau 5.008.017a śaśakṣatajakalpena suśītena
GE09ram_05_u:609: 5.008.019a dadarśa sa kapis tasya bāhū śayanasaṃsthitau
GE09ram_05_u:610: 5.008.019c mandarasyāntare suptau mahārhī ruṣitāv iva 5.008.020a tābhyāṃ sa paripūrṇābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ 5.008.020c śuśubhe 'calasaṃkāśaḥ śṛṅgābhyām iva mandaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:611: 5.008.021a cūtapuṃnāgasurabhir bakulottamasaṃyutaḥ 5.008.021c mṛṣṭānnarasasaṃyuktaḥ pānagandhapuraḥsaraḥ 5.008.022a tasya rākṣasasiṃhasya niścakrāma mukhān mahān 5.008.022c śayānasya viniḥśvāsaḥ pūrayann iva tad gṛham
GE09ram_05_u:613: 5.008.023c mukuṭenāpavṛttena kuṇḍalojjvalitānanam 5.008.024a raktacandanadigdhena tathā hāreṇa śobhitā
GE09ram_05_u:617: 5.008.026c gāṅge mahati toyānte prasutamiva kuñjaram 5.008.027a caturbhiḥ kāñcanair dīpair dīpyamānaiś caturdiśam 5.008.027c prakāśīkṛtasarvāṅgaṃ meghaṃ vidyudgaṇair iva
GE09ram_05_u:619: 5.008.028c patnīḥ sa priyabhāryasya tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe
GE09ram_05_u:621: 5.008.030a nṛttavāditrakuśalā rākṣasendrabhujāṅkagāḥ 5.008.030c varābharaṇadhāriṇyo niṣannā dadṛśe kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:623: 5.008.031c dadarśa tāpanīyāni kuṇḍalāny aṅgadāni ca 5.008.032a tāsāṃ candropamair vaktraiḥ śubhair lalitakuṇḍalaiḥ 5.008.032c virarāja vimānaṃ tan nabhas tārāgaṇair iva
GE09ram_05_u:625: 5.008.033c teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu prasuptās tanumadhyamāḥ 5.008.034a kā cid vīṇāṃ pariṣvajya prasuptā saṃprakāśate
GE09ram_05_u:628: 5.008.035c prasuptā bhāminī bhāti bālaputreva vatsalā 5.008.036a paṭahaṃ cārusarvāṅgī pīḍya śete śubhastanī 5.008.036c cirasya ramaṇaṃ labdhvā pariṣvajyeva kāminī 5.008.037a kā cid aṃśaṃ pariṣvajya suptā kamalalocanā
GE09ram_05_u:635: 5.008.040c prasuptā taruṇaṃ vatsam upagūhyeva bhāminī 5.008.041a kā cid āḍambaraṃ nārī bhujasaṃbhogapīḍitam 5.008.041c kṛtvā kamalapatrākṣī prasuptā madamohitā
GE09ram_05_u:636: 5.008.042a kalaśīm apaviddhyānyā prasuptā bhāti bhāminī 5.008.042c vasante puṣpaśabalā māleva parimārjitā
GE09ram_05_u:637: 5.008.043a pāṇibhyāṃ ca kucau kā cit suvarṇakalaśopamau
GE09ram_05_u:640: 5.008.044c anyām āliṅgya suśroṇī prasuptā madavihvalā 5.008.045a ātodyāni vicitrāṇi pariṣvajya
GE09ram_05_u:641: 5.008.045c nipīḍya ca kucaiḥ suptāḥ kāminyaḥ kāmukān iva
GE09ram_05_u:642: 5.008.046a tāsām ekāntavinyaste śayānāṃ śayane śubhe 5.008.046c dadarśa rūpasaṃpannām aparāṃ sa kapiḥ striyam
GE09ram_05_u:644: 5.008.047c vibhūṣayantīm iva ca svaśriyā bhavanottamam 5.008.048a gaurīṃ kanakavarṇābhām iṣṭām antaḥpureśvarīm
GE09ram_05_u:645: 5.008.048c kapir mandodarīṃ tatra śayānāṃ cārurūpiṇīm 5.008.049a sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābāhur bhūṣitāṃ mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:647: 5.008.049e harṣeṇa mahatā yukto nananda hariyūthapaḥ 5.008.050a āshpoṭayām āsa cucumba pucchaṃ; nananda cikrīḍa jagau jagāma
GE09ram_05_u:648: 5.008.050c stambhān arohan nipapāta bhūmau; nidarśayan svāṃ prakṛtiṃ
GE09ram_05_u:650: 5.009.001a avadhūya ca tāṃ buddhiṃ babhūvāvasthitas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:651: 5.009.001c jagāma cāparāṃ cintāṃ sītāṃ prati mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:652: 5.009.002a na rāmeṇa viyuktā sā svaptum arhati bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:653: 5.009.002c na bhoktuṃ nāpy alaṃkartuṃ na pānam upasevitum
GE09ram_05_u:654: 5.009.003a nānyaṃ naram upasthātuṃ surāṇām api ceśvaram
GE09ram_05_u:655: 5.009.003c na hi rāmasamaḥ kaś cid vidyate tridaśeṣv api 5.009.003e anyeyam iti niścitya pānabhūmau cacāra saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:656: 5.009.004a krīḍitenāparāḥ klāntā gītena ca tathā parāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:657: 5.009.004c nṛttena cāparāḥ klāntāḥ pānaviprahatās tathā 5.009.005a murajeṣu mṛdaṅgeṣu pīṭhikāsu ca saṃsthitāḥ 5.009.005c tathāstaraṇamukhyyeṣu saṃviṣṭāś cāparāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:659: 5.009.006c rūpasaṃlāpaśīlena yuktagītārthabhāṣiṇā 5.009.007a deśakālābhiyuktena yuktavākyābhidhāyinā 5.009.007c ratābhiratasaṃsuptaṃ dadarśa hariyūthapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:660: 5.009.008a tāsāṃ madhye mahābāhuḥ śuśubhe rākṣaseśvaraḥ 5.009.008c goṣṭhe mahati mukhyānāṃ gavāṃ madhye yathā vṛṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:661: 5.009.009a sa rākṣasendraḥ śuśubhe tābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ svayam
GE09ram_05_u:663: 5.009.010a sarvakāmair upetāṃ ca pānabhūmiṃ mahātmanaḥ 5.009.010c dadarśa kapiśārdūlas tasya rakṣaḥpater gṛhe 5.009.011a mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca varāhāṇāṃ ca bhāgaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:664: 5.009.011c tatra nyastāni māṃsāni pānabhūmau dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:665: 5.009.012a raukmeṣu ca viśaleṣu bhājaneṣv ardhabhakṣitān 5.009.012c dadarśa kapiśārdūla mayūrān kukkuṭāṃs tathā 5.009.013a varāhavārdhrāṇasakān dadhisauvarcalāyutān 5.009.013c śalyān mṛgamayūrāṃś ca hanūmān anvavaikṣata 5.009.014a kṛkarān vividhān siddhāṃś cakorān ardhabhakṣitān 5.009.014c mahiṣān ekaśalyāṃś ca chāgāṃś ca kṛtaniṣṭhitān
GE09ram_05_u:666: 5.009.014e lekhyam uccāvacaṃ peyaṃ bhojyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:669: 5.009.016a pānabhājanavikṣiptaiḥ phalaiś ca vividhair api 5.009.016c kṛtapuṣpopahārā bhūr adhikaṃ puṣyati śriyam 5.009.017a tatra tatra ca vinyastaiḥ suśliṣṭaiḥ śayanāsanaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:673: 5.009.019a divyāḥ prasannā vividhāḥ surāḥ kṛtasurā api
GE09ram_05_u:674: 5.009.019c śarkarāsavamādhvīkāḥ puṣpāsavaphalāsavāḥ 5.009.019e vāsacūrṇaiś ca vividhair mṛṣṭās tais taiḥ pṛthakpṛthak
GE09ram_05_u:675: 5.009.020a saṃtatā śuśubhe bhūmir mālyaiś ca bahusaṃsthitaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:676: 5.009.020c hiraṇmayaiś ca karakair bhājanaiḥ sphāṭikair api
GE09ram_05_u:678: 5.009.021a rājateṣu ca kumbheṣu jāmbūnadamayeṣu ca 5.009.021c pānaśreṣṭhaṃ tadā bhūri kapis tatra dadarśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:680: 5.009.022c rājatāni ca pūrṇāni bhājanāni mahākapiḥ 5.009.023a kva cid ardhāvaśeṣāṇi kva cit pītāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:681: 5.009.023c kva cin naiva prapītāni pānāni sa dadarśa ha 5.009.024a kva cid bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhān kva cit pānāni bhāgaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:682: 5.009.024c kva cid annāvaśeṣāṇi paśyan vai vicacāra ha
GE09ram_05_u:683: 5.009.025a kva cit prabhinnaiḥ karakaiḥ kva cid āloḍitair ghaṭaiḥ 5.009.025c kva cit saṃpṛktamālyāni jalāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:684: 5.009.026a śayanāny atra nārīṇāṃ śūnyāni bahudhā punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:685: 5.009.026c parasparaṃ samāśliṣya kāś cit suptā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:686: 5.009.027a kā cic ca vastram anyasyā apahṛtyopaguhya ca
GE09ram_05_u:688: 5.009.028a tāsām ucchvāsavātena vastraṃ mālyaṃ ca gātrajam
GE09ram_05_u:689: 5.009.028c nātyarthaṃ spandate citraṃ prāpya mandam ivānilam
GE09ram_05_u:690: 5.009.029a candanasya ca śītasya śīdhor madhurasasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:691: 5.009.029c vividhasya ca mālyasya puṣpasya vividhasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:692: 5.009.030a bahudhā mārutas tatra gandhaṃ vividham udvahan
GE09ram_05_u:693: 5.009.030c snānānāṃ candanānāṃ ca dhūpānāṃ caiva mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:694: 5.009.030e pravavau surabhir gandho vimāne puṣpake tadā
GE09ram_05_u:695: 5.009.031a śyāmāvadātās tatrānyāḥ kāś cit kṛṣṇā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:696: 5.009.031c kāś cit kāñcanavarṇāṅgyaḥ pramadā rākṣasālaye 5.009.032a tāsāṃ nidrāvaśatvāc ca madanena vimūrchitam 5.009.032c padminīnāṃ prasuptānāṃ rūpam āsīd yathaiva hi
GE09ram_05_u:697: 5.009.033a evaṃ sarvam aśeṣeṇa rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ kapiḥ 5.009.033c dadarśa sumahātejā na dadarśa ca jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:698: 5.009.034a nirīkṣamāṇaś ca tatas tāḥ striyaḥ sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:701: 5.009.035c idaṃ khalu mamātyarthaṃ dharmalopaṃ kariṣyati 5.009.036a na hi me paradārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭir viṣayavartinī
GE09ram_05_u:702: 5.009.036c ayaṃ cātra mayā dṛṣṭaḥ paradāraparigrahaḥ 5.009.037a tasya prādurabhūc cintāpunar anyā manasvinaḥ 5.009.037c niścitaikāntacittasya kāryaniścayadarśinī 5.009.038a kāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayā sarvā viśvastā rāvaṇastriyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:703: 5.009.038c na tu me manasaḥ kiṃ cid vaikṛtyam upapadyate 5.009.039a mano hi hetuḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravartate
GE09ram_05_u:704: 5.009.039c śubhāśubhāsv avasthāsu tac ca me suvyavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:705: 5.009.040a nānyatra hi mayā śakyā vaidehī parimārgitum
GE09ram_05_u:706: 5.009.040c striyo hi strīṣu dṛśyante sadā saṃparimārgaṇe
GE09ram_05_u:707: 5.009.041a yasya sattvasya yā yonis tasyāṃ tat parimārgyate
GE09ram_05_u:708: 5.009.041c na śakyaṃ pramadā naṣṭā mṛgīṣu parimārgitum
GE09ram_05_u:709: 5.009.042a tad idaṃ mārgitaṃ tāvac chuddhena manasā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:710: 5.009.042c rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ saraṃ dṛśyate na ca jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:711: 5.009.043a devagandharvakanyāś ca nāgakanyāś ca vīryavān 5.009.043c avekṣamāṇo hanumān naivāpaśyata jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:712: 5.009.044a tām apaśyan kapis tatra paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:713: 5.009.044c apakramya tadā vīraḥ pradhyātum upacakrame 5.010.001a sa tasya madhye bhavanasya vānaro; latāgṛhāṃś citragṛhān niśāgṛhān
GE09ram_05_u:714: 5.010.001c jagāma sītāṃ prati darśanotsuko; na caiva tāṃ paśyati cārudarśanām 5.010.002a sa cintayām āsa tato mahākapiḥ; priyām apaśyan raghunandanasya
GE09ram_05_u:716: 5.010.002c dhruvaṃ nu sītā mriyate yathā na me; vicinvato darśanam eti
GE09ram_05_u:718: 5.010.003a sā rākṣasānāṃ pravareṇa bālā; svaśīlasaṃrakṣaṇa tat parā satī
GE09ram_05_u:719: 5.010.003c anena nūnaṃ pratiduṣṭakarmaṇā; hatā bhaved āryapathe pare sthitā 5.010.004a virūparūpā vikṛtā vivarcaso; mahānanā dīrghavirūpadarśanāḥ 5.010.004c samīkṣya sā rākṣasarājayoṣito; bhayād vinaṣṭā janakeśvarātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:720: 5.010.005a sītām adṛṣṭvā hy anavāpya pauruṣaṃ; vihṛtya kālaṃ saha vānaraiś ciram 5.010.005c na me 'sti sugrīvasamīpagā gatiḥ; sutīkṣṇadaṇḍo balavāṃś ca
GE09ram_05_u:722: 5.010.006a dṛṣṭam antaḥpuraṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇayoṣitaḥ 5.010.006c na sītā dṛśyate sādhvī vṛthā jāto mama śramaḥ 5.010.007a kiṃ nu māṃ vānarāḥ sarve gataṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ 5.010.007c gatvā tatra tvayā vīra kiṃ kṛtaṃ tad vadasva naḥ
GE09ram_05_u:723: 5.010.008a adṛṣṭvā kiṃ pravakṣyāmi tām ahaṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_05_u:724: 5.010.008c dhruvaṃ prāyam upeṣyanti kālasya vyativartane 5.010.009a kiṃ vā vakṣyati vṛddhaś ca jāmbavān aṅgadaś ca saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:725: 5.010.009c gataṃ pāraṃ samudrasya vānarāś ca samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:726: 5.010.010a anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlam anirvedaḥ paraṃ sukham
GE09ram_05_u:727: 5.010.010c bhūyas tāvad viceṣyāmi na yatra vicayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:728: 5.010.011a anirvedo hi satataṃ sarvārtheṣu pravartakaḥ 5.010.011c karoti saphalaṃ jantoḥ karma yac ca karoti saḥ 5.010.012a tasmād anirveda kṛtaṃ yatnaṃ ceṣṭe 'ham uttamam
GE09ram_05_u:729: 5.010.012c adṛṣṭāṃś ca viceṣyāmi deśān rāvaṇapālitān 5.010.013a āpānaśālāvicitās tathā puṣpagṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_05_u:730: 5.010.013c citraśālāś ca vicitā bhūyaḥ krīḍāgṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_05_u:731: 5.010.014a niṣkuṭāntararathyāś ca vimānāni ca sarvaśaḥ 5.010.014c iti saṃcintya bhūyo 'pi vicetum upacakrame 5.010.015a bhūmīgṛhāṃś caityagṛhān gṛhātigṛhakān api
GE09ram_05_u:732: 5.010.015c utpatan nipataṃś cāpi tiṣṭhan gacchan punaḥ kva cit 5.010.016a apāvṛṇvaṃś ca dvārāṇi kapāṭāny avaghaṭṭayan 5.010.016c praviśan niṣpataṃś cāpi prapatann utpatann api
GE09ram_05_u:733: 5.010.016e sarvam apy avakāśaṃ sa vicacāra mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:735: 5.010.017c rāvaṇāntaḥpure tasmin yaṃ kapir na jagāma saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:737: 5.010.018c śvabhrāś ca puṣkariṇyaś ca sarvaṃ tenāvalokitam
GE09ram_05_u:738: 5.010.019a rākṣasyo vividhākārā virūpā vikṛtās tathā 5.010.019c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:739: 5.010.020a rūpeṇāpratimā loke varā vidyādhara striyaḥ 5.010.020c dṛṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu rāghavanandinī
GE09ram_05_u:741: 5.010.021c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na tu sītā sumadhyamā
GE09ram_05_u:742: 5.010.022a pramathya rākṣasendreṇa nāgakanyā balād dhṛtāḥ 5.010.022c dṛṣṭā hanūmatā tatra na sā janakanandinī
GE09ram_05_u:743: 5.010.023a so 'paśyaṃs tāṃ mahābāhuḥ paśyaṃś cānyā varastriyaḥ 5.010.023c viṣasāda mahābāhur hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:744: 5.010.024a udyogaṃ vānarendrāṇaṃ plavanaṃ sāgarasya ca 5.010.024c vyarthaṃ vīkṣyānilasutaś cintāṃ punar upāgamat 5.010.025a avatīrya vimānāc ca hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.010.025c cintām upajagāmātha śokopahatacetanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:745: 5.011.001a vimānāt tu susaṃkramya prākāraṃ hariyūthapaḥ 5.011.001c hanūmān vegavān āsīd yathā vidyudghanāntare 5.011.002a saṃparikramya hanumān rāvaṇasya niveśanān
GE09ram_05_u:746: 5.011.002c adṛṣṭvā jānakīṃ sītām abravīd vacanaṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:747: 5.011.003a bhūyiṣṭhaṃ loḍitā laṅkā rāmasya caratā priyam
GE09ram_05_u:748: 5.011.003c na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ sītāṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanām
GE09ram_05_u:749: 5.011.004a palvalāni taṭākāni sarāṃsi saritas tathā 5.011.004c nadyo 'nūpavanāntāś ca durgāś ca dharaṇīdharāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:750: 5.011.004e loḍitā vasudhā sarvā na ca paśyāmi jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:751: 5.011.005a iha saṃpātinā sītā rāvaṇasya niveśane 5.011.005c ākhyātā gṛdhrarājena na ca paśyāmi tām aham
GE09ram_05_u:752: 5.011.006a kiṃ nu sītātha vaidehī maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:754: 5.011.007a kṣipram utpatato manye sītām ādāya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:755: 5.011.007c bibhyato rāmabāṇānām antarā patitā bhavet 5.011.008a atha vā hriyamāṇāyāḥ pathi siddhaniṣevite 5.011.008c manye patitam āryāyā hṛdayaṃ prekṣya sāgaram
GE09ram_05_u:757: 5.011.009c tayā manye viśālākṣyā tyaktaṃ jīvitam āryayā
GE09ram_05_u:758: 5.011.010a upary upari vā nūnaṃ sāgaraṃ kramatas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:760: 5.011.011a āho kṣudreṇa cānena rakṣantī śīlam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:761: 5.011.011c abandhur bhakṣitā sītā rāvaṇena tapasvinī 5.011.012a atha vā rākṣasendrasya patnībhir asitekṣaṇā 5.011.012c aduṣṭā duṣṭabhāvābhir bhakṣitā sā bhaviṣyati 5.011.013a saṃpūrṇacandrapratimaṃ padmapatranibhekṣaṇam 5.011.013c rāmasya dhyāyatī vaktraṃ pañcatvaṃ kṛpaṇā gatā
GE09ram_05_u:762: 5.011.014a hā rāma lakṣmaṇety eva hāyodhyeti ca maithilī
GE09ram_05_u:763: 5.011.014c vilapya bahu vaidehī nyastadehā bhaviṣyati 5.011.015a atha vā nihitā manye rāvaṇasya
GE09ram_05_u:764: 5.011.015c nūnaṃ lālapyate mandaṃ pañjarastheva śārikā 5.011.016a janakasya kule jātā rāmapatnī sumadhyamā 5.011.016c katham utpalapatrākṣī rāvaṇasya vaśaṃ vrajet 5.011.017a vinaṣṭā vā pranaṣṭā vā mṛtā vā janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:765: 5.011.017c rāmasya priyabhāryasya na nivedayituṃ kṣamam 5.011.018a nivedyamāne doṣaḥ syād doṣaḥ syād anivedane
GE09ram_05_u:766: 5.011.018c kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyaṃ viṣamaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_05_u:767: 5.011.019a asminn evaṃgate karye prāptakālaṃ kṣamaṃ ca kim
GE09ram_05_u:768: 5.011.019c bhaved iti matiṃ bhūyo hanumān pravicārayan
GE09ram_05_u:769: 5.011.020a yadi sītām adṛṣṭvāhaṃ vānarendrapurīm itaḥ 5.011.020c gamiṣyāmi tataḥ ko me puruṣārtho bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:770: 5.011.021a mamedaṃ laṅghanaṃ vyarthaṃ sāgarasya bhaviṣyati 5.011.021c praveśaś civa laṅkāyā rākṣasānāṃ ca darśanam
GE09ram_05_u:771: 5.011.022a kiṃ vā vakṣyati sugrīvo harayo va samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:772: 5.011.022c kiṣkindhāṃ samanuprāptau tau vā daśarathātmajau 5.011.023a gatvā tu yadi kākutsthaṃ vakṣyāmi param apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:773: 5.011.023c na dṛṣṭeti mayā sītā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:774: 5.011.024a paruṣaṃ dāruṇaṃ krūraṃ tīkṣṇam indriyatāpanam 5.011.024c sītānimittaṃ durvākyaṃ śrutvā sa na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:775: 5.011.025a taṃ tu kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcatvagatamānasaṃ 5.011.025c bhṛśānurakto medhāvī na bhaviṣyati lakṣmaṇaḥ 5.011.026a vinaṣṭau bhrātarau śrutvā bharato 'pi mariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:776: 5.011.026c bharataṃ ca mṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā śatrughno na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:777: 5.011.027a putrān mṛtān samīkṣyātha na bhaviṣyanti mātaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:778: 5.011.027c kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca na saṃśayaḥ 5.011.028a kṛtajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca sugrīvaḥ plavagādhipaḥ 5.011.028c rāmaṃ tathā gataṃ dṛṣṭvā tatas tyakṣyanti jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:779: 5.011.029a durmanā vyathitā dīnā nirānandā tapasvinī 5.011.029c pīḍitā bhartṛśokena rumā tyakṣyati jīvitam 5.011.030a vālijena tu duḥkhena pīḍitā śokakarśitā 5.011.030c pañcatvagamane rājñas tārāpi na bhaviṣyati 5.011.031a mātāpitror vināśena sugrīva vyasanena ca 5.011.031c kumāro 'py aṅgadaḥ kasmād dhārayiṣyati jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:780: 5.011.032a bhartṛjena tu śokena abhibhūtā vanaukasaḥ 5.011.032c śirāṃsy abhihaniṣyanti talair muṣṭibhir eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:782: 5.011.033c lālitāḥ kapirājena prāṇāṃs tyakṣyanti vānarāḥ 5.011.034a na vaneṣu na śaileṣu na nirodheṣu vā punaḥ 5.011.034c krīḍām anubhaviṣyanti sametya kapikuñjarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:784: 5.011.035c śailāgrebhyaḥ patiṣyanti sametya viṣameṣu ca 5.011.036a viṣam udbandhanaṃ vāpi praveśaṃ jvalanasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:785: 5.011.036c upavāsam atho śastraṃ pracariṣyanti vānarāḥ 5.011.037a ghoram ārodanaṃ manye gate mayi bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:786: 5.011.037c ikṣvākukulanāśaś ca nāśaś caiva vanaukasām 5.011.038a so 'haṃ naiva gamiṣyāmi kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīm itaḥ 5.011.038c na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ maithilīṃ vinā 5.011.039a mayy agacchati cehasthe dharmātmānau mahārathau 5.011.039c āśayā tau dhariṣyete vanarāś ca manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:790: 5.011.041c citāṃ kṛtvā pravekṣyāmi samiddham araṇīsutam 5.011.042a upaviṣṭasya vā samyag liṅginaṃ sādhayiṣyataḥ 5.011.042c śarīraṃ bhakṣayiṣyanti vāyasāḥ śvāpadāni ca 5.011.043a idam apy ṛṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ niryāṇam iti me matiḥ 5.011.043c samyag āpaḥ pravekṣyāmi na cet paśyāmi jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:792: 5.011.044c prabhagnā cirarātrīyaṃ mama sītām apaśyataḥ 5.011.045a tāpaso vā bhaviṣyāmi niyato vṛkṣamūlikaḥ 5.011.045c netaḥ pratigamiṣyāmi tām adṛṣṭvāsitekṣaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:793: 5.011.046a yadītaḥ pratigacchāmi sītām anadhigamya tām 5.011.046c aṅgadaḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair vānarair na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:794: 5.011.047a vināśe bahavo doṣā jīvan prāpnoti bhadrakam
GE09ram_05_u:795: 5.011.047c tasmāt prāṇān dhariṣyāmi dhruvo jīvati saṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:796: 5.011.048a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ manasā dhārayan muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:797: 5.011.048c nādhyagacchat tadā pāraṃ śokasya kapikuñjaraḥ 5.011.049a rāvaṇaṃ vā vadhiṣyāmi daśagrīvaṃ mahābalam 5.011.049c kāmam astu hṛtā sītā pratyācīrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:798: 5.011.050a athavainaṃ samutkṣipya upary upari sāgaram 5.011.050c rāmāyopahariṣyāmi paśuṃ paśupater iva
GE09ram_05_u:799: 5.011.051a iti cintā samāpannaḥ sītām anadhigamya tām
GE09ram_05_u:800: 5.011.051c dhyānaśokā parītātmā cintayām āsa vānaraḥ 5.011.052a yāvat sītāṃ na paśyāmi rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_05_u:801: 5.011.052c tāvad etāṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vicinomi punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:802: 5.011.053a saṃpāti vacanāc cāpi rāmaṃ yady ānayāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:803: 5.011.053c apaśyan rāghavo bhāryāṃ nirdahet sarvavānarān 5.011.054a ihaiva niyatāhāro vatsyāmi
GE09ram_05_u:804: 5.011.054c na matkṛte vinaśyeyuḥ sarve te naravānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:806: 5.011.055c imām abhigamiṣyāmi na hīyaṃ vicitā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:807: 5.011.056a vasūn rudrāṃs tathādityān aśvinau maruto 'pi ca
GE09ram_05_u:809: 5.011.057a jitvā tu rākṣasān devīm ikṣvākukulanandinīm 5.011.057c saṃpradāsyāmi rāmāyā yathāsiddhiṃ tapasvine
GE09ram_05_u:810: 5.011.058a sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā cintāvigrathitendriyaḥ 5.011.058c udatiṣṭhan mahābāhur hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:811: 5.011.059a namo 'stu rāmāya salakṣmaṇāya; devyai ca tasyai janakātmajāyai
GE09ram_05_u:814: 5.011.060a sa tebhyas tu namaskṛtvā sugrīvāya ca mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:815: 5.011.060c diśaḥ sarvāḥ samālokya aśokavanikāṃ prati 5.011.061a sa gatvā manasā pūrvam aśokavanikāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_05_u:816: 5.011.061c uttaraṃ cintayām āsa vānaro mārutātmajaḥ 5.011.062a dhruvaṃ tu rakṣobahulā bhaviṣyati vanākulā 5.011.062c aśokavanikā cintyā sarvasaṃskārasaṃskṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:817: 5.011.063a rakṣiṇaś cātra vihitā nūnaṃ rakṣanti pādapān
GE09ram_05_u:818: 5.011.063c bhagavān api sarvātmā nātikṣobhaṃ pravāyati 5.011.064a saṃkṣipto 'yaṃ mayātmā ca rāmārthe rāvaṇasya ca 5.011.064c siddhiṃ me saṃvidhāsyanti devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tv iha
GE09ram_05_u:819: 5.011.065a brahmā svayambhūr bhagavān devāś caiva diśantu me
GE09ram_05_u:820: 5.011.065c siddhim agniś ca vāyuś ca puruhūtaś ca vajradhṛt 5.011.066a varuṇaḥ pāśahastaś ca somādityai tathaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:821: 5.011.066c aśvinau ca mahātmānau marutaḥ sarva eva ca
GE09ram_05_u:822: 5.011.067a siddhiṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ caiva yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:823: 5.011.067c dāsyanti mama ye cānye adṛṣṭāḥ pathi gocarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:824: 5.011.068a tad unnasaṃ pāṇḍuradantam avraṇaṃ; śucismitaṃ padmapalāśalocanam 5.011.068c drakṣye tad āryāvadanaṃ kadā nv ahaṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:827: 5.011.069c balābhibhūtā abalā tapasvinī; kathaṃ nu me dṛṣṭapathe 'dya sā bhavet 5.012.001a sa muhūrtam iva dhyatvā manasā cādhigamya tām
GE09ram_05_u:828: 5.012.001c avapluto mahātejāḥ prākāraṃ tasya veśmanaḥ 5.012.002a sa tu saṃhṛṣṭasarvāṅgaḥ prākārastho mahākapiḥ 5.012.002c puṣpitāgrān vasantādau dadarśa vividhān drumān 5.012.003a sālān aśokān bhavyāṃś ca campakāṃś ca supuṣpitān
GE09ram_05_u:829: 5.012.003c uddālakān nāgavṛkṣāṃś cūtān kapimukhān api 5.012.004a athāmravaṇasaṃchannāṃ latāśatasamāvṛtām 5.012.004c jyāmukta iva nārācaḥ pupluve vṛkṣavāṭikām 5.012.005a sa praviṣya vicitrāṃ tāṃ vihagair abhināditām
GE09ram_05_u:830: 5.012.005c rājataiḥ kāñcanaiś caiva pādapaiḥ sarvatovṛtām 5.012.006a vihagair mṛgasaṃghaiś ca vicitrāṃ citrakānanām 5.012.006c uditādityasaṃkāśāṃ dadarśa hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:832: 5.012.007c kokilair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca mattair nityaniṣevitām 5.012.008a prahṛṣṭamanuje kale
GE09ram_05_u:834: 5.012.009c sukhaprasuptān vihagān bodhayām āsa vānaraḥ 5.012.010a utpatadbhir dvijagaṇaiḥ pakṣaiḥ sālāḥ samāhatāḥ 5.012.010c anekavarṇā vividhā mumucuḥ puṣpavṛṣṭayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:838: 5.012.012c dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vasanta iti menire
GE09ram_05_u:839: 5.012.013a vṛkṣebhyaḥ patitaiḥ puṣpair avakīrṇā pṛthagvidhaiḥ 5.012.013c rarāja vasudhā tatra pramadeva vibhūṣitā 5.012.014a tarasvinā te taravas tarasābhiprakampitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:840: 5.012.014c kusumāni vicitrāṇi sasṛjuḥ kapinā tadā 5.012.015a nirdhūtapatraśikharāḥ śīrṇapuṣpaphaladrumāḥ 5.012.015c nikṣiptavastrābharaṇā dhūrtā iva parājitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:841: 5.012.016a hanūmatā vegavatā kampitās te nagottamāḥ 5.012.016c puṣpaparṇaphalāny āśu mumucuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:842: 5.012.017a vihaṃgasaṃghair hīnās te skandhamātrāśrayā drumāḥ 5.012.017c babhūvur agamāḥ sarve māruteneva nirdhutāḥ 5.012.018a vidhūtakeśī yuvatir yathā mṛditavarṇikā
GE09ram_05_u:843: 5.012.018c niṣpītaśubhadantauṣṭhī nakhair dantaiś ca vikṣatā 5.012.019a tathā lāṅgūlahastaiś ca caraṇābhyāṃ ca marditā
GE09ram_05_u:844: 5.012.019c babhūvāśokavanikā prabhagnavarapādapā 5.012.020a mahālatānāṃ dāmāni vyadhamat tarasā kapiḥ 5.012.020c yathā prāvṛṣi vindhyasya meghajālāni mārutaḥ 5.012.021a sa tatra maṇibhūmīś ca rājatīś ca manoramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:845: 5.012.021c tathā kāñcanabhūmīś ca vicaran dadṛśe kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:846: 5.012.022a vāpīś ca vividhākārāḥ pūrṇāḥ paramavāriṇā 5.012.022c mahārhair maṇisopānair upapannās tatas tataḥ 5.012.023a muktāpravālasikatā sphaṭikāntarakuṭṭimāḥ 5.012.023c kāñcanais tarubhiś citrais tīrajair upaśobhitāḥ 5.012.024a phullapadmotpalavanāś cakravākopakūjitāḥ 5.012.024c natyūharutasaṃghuṣṭā haṃsasārasanāditāḥ 5.012.025a dīrghābhir drumayuktābhiḥ saridbhiś ca samantataḥ 5.012.025c amṛtopamatoyābhiḥ śivābhir upasaṃskṛtāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:848: 5.012.026c nānāgulmāvṛtavanāḥ karavīrakṛtāntarāḥ 5.012.027a tato 'mbudharasaṃkāśaṃ pravṛddhaśikharaṃ girim 5.012.027c vicitrakūṭaṃ kūṭaiś ca sarvataḥ parivāritam 5.012.028a śilāgṛhair avatataṃ nānāvṛkṣaiḥ samāvṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:849: 5.012.028c dadarśa kapiśārdūlo ramyaṃ jagati parvatam 5.012.029a dadarśa ca nagāt tasmān nadīṃ nipatitāṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:850: 5.012.029c aṅkād iva samutpatya priyasya patitāṃ priyām
GE09ram_05_u:851: 5.012.030a jale nipatitāgraiś ca pādapair upaśobhitām 5.012.030c vāryamāṇām iva kruddhāṃ pramadāṃ priyabandhubhiḥ 5.012.031a punar āvṛttatoyāṃ ca dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:852: 5.012.031c prasannām iva kāntasya kāntāṃ punar upasthitām
GE09ram_05_u:855: 5.012.033a kṛtrimāṃ dīrghikāṃ cāpi pūrṇāṃ śītena vāriṇā
GE09ram_05_u:856: 5.012.033c maṇipravarasopānāṃ muktāsikataśobhitām 5.012.034a vividhair mṛgasaṃghaiś ca vicitrāṃ citrakānanām 5.012.034c prāsādaiḥ sumahadbhiś ca nirmitair viśvakarmaṇā 5.012.034e kānanaiḥ kṛtrimaiś cāpi sarvataḥ samalaṃkṛtām 5.012.035a ye ke cit pādapās tatra puṣpopagaphalopagāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:858: 5.012.036a latāpratānair bahubhiḥ parṇaiś ca bahubhir vṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:859: 5.012.036c kāñcanīṃ śiṃśupām ekāṃ dadarśa sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:862: 5.012.038a teṣāṃ drumāṇāṃ prabhayā meror iva mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:864: 5.012.039a tāṃ kāñcanais tarugaṇair mārutena ca vījitām
GE09ram_05_u:867: 5.012.040c tām āruhya mahāvegaḥ śiṃśapāṃ parṇasaṃvṛtām 5.012.041a ito drakṣyāmi vaidehīṃ rāma darśanalālasām 5.012.041c itaś cetaś ca duḥkhārtāṃ saṃpatantīṃ yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_05_u:868: 5.012.042a aśokavanikā ceyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ ramyā durātmanaḥ 5.012.042c campakaiś candanaiś cāpi bakulaiś ca vibhūṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:869: 5.012.043a iyaṃ ca nalinī ramyā dvijasaṃghaniṣevitā 5.012.043c imāṃ sā rāmamahiṣī nūnam eṣyati jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:870: 5.012.044a sā rāma rāmamahiṣī rāghavasya priyā sadā
GE09ram_05_u:872: 5.012.045a atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣī vanasyāsya vicakṣaṇā 5.012.045c vanam eṣyati sā ceha rāmacintānukarśitā 5.012.046a rāmaśokābhisaṃtaptā sā devī vāmalocanā
GE09ram_05_u:874: 5.012.047a vanecarāṇāṃ satataṃ nūnaṃ spṛhayate purā 5.012.047c rāmasya dayitā bhāryā janakasya sutā satī
GE09ram_05_u:875: 5.012.048a saṃdhyākālamanāḥ śyāmā dhruvam eṣyati jānakī 5.012.048c nadīṃ cemāṃ śivajalāṃ saṃdhyārthe varavarṇinī 5.012.049a tasyāś cāpy anurūpeyam aśokavanikā śubhā 5.012.049c śubhā yā pārthivendrasya patnī rāmasya saṃmitā
GE09ram_05_u:876: 5.012.050a yadi jivati sā devī tārādhipanibhānanā 5.012.050c āgamiṣyati sāvaśyam imāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm 5.012.051a evaṃ tu matvā hanumān mahātmā; pratīkṣamāṇo manujendrapatnīm 5.012.051c avekṣamāṇaś ca dadarśa sarvaṃ; supuṣpite parṇaghane nilīnaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:877: 5.013.001a sa vīkṣamāṇas tatrastho mārgamāṇaś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:878: 5.013.001c avekṣamāṇaś ca mahīṃ sarvāṃ tām anvavaikṣata
GE09ram_05_u:879: 5.013.002a santāna kalatābhiś ca pādapair upaśobhitām 5.013.002c divyagandharasopetāṃ sarvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:880: 5.013.003a tāṃ sa nandanasaṃkāśāṃ mṛgapakṣibhir āvṛtām 5.013.003c harmyaprāsādasaṃbādhāṃ kokilākulaniḥsvanām 5.013.004a kāñcanotpalapadmābhir vāpībhir upaśobhitām
GE09ram_05_u:881: 5.013.004c bahvāsanakuthopetāṃ bahubhūmigṛhāyutām 5.013.005a sarvartukusumai ramyaiḥ phalavadbhiś ca pādapaiḥ 5.013.005c puṣpitānām aśokānāṃ śriyā sūryodayaprabhām
GE09ram_05_u:882: 5.013.006a pradīptām iva tatrastho mārutiḥ samudaikṣata 5.013.006c niṣpatraśākhāṃ vihagaiḥ kriyamāṇām ivāsakṛt
GE09ram_05_u:885: 5.013.007c puṣpabhārātibhāraiś ca spṛśadbhir iva medinīm 5.013.008a karṇikāraiḥ kusumitaiḥ kiṃśukaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ 5.013.008c sa deśaḥ prabhayā teṣāṃ pradīpta iva sarvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:886: 5.013.009a puṃnāgāḥ saptaparṇāś ca campakoddālakās tathā 5.013.009c vivṛddhamūlā bahavaḥ śobhante sma supuṣpitāḥ 5.013.010a śātakumbhanibhāḥ ke cit ke cid agniśikhopamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:887: 5.013.010c nīlāñjananibhāḥ ke cit tatrāśokāḥ sahasraśaḥ 5.013.011a nandanaṃ vividhodyānaṃ citraṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā 5.013.011c ativṛttam ivācintyaṃ divyaṃ ramyaṃ śriyā vṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:889: 5.013.012c puṣparatnaśataiś citraṃ pañcamaṃ sāgaraṃ yathā 5.013.013a sarvartupuṣpair nicitaṃ pādapair madhugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:890: 5.013.013c nānāninādair udyānaṃ ramyaṃ mṛgagaṇair dvijaiḥ 5.013.014a anekagandhapravahaṃ puṇyagandhaṃ manoramam
GE09ram_05_u:891: 5.013.014c śailendram iva gandhāḍhyaṃ dvitīyaṃ gandhamādanam 5.013.015a aśokavanikāyāṃ tu tasyāṃ vānarapuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:894: 5.013.016c pravālakṛtasopānaṃ taptakāñcanavedikam 5.013.017a muṣṇantam iva cakṣūṃṣi dyotamānam iva śriyā
GE09ram_05_u:897: 5.013.018c upavāsakṛśāṃ dīnāṃ niḥśvasāntīṃ punaḥ punaḥ 5.013.018e dadarśa śuklapakṣādau candrarekhām ivāmalām
GE09ram_05_u:899: 5.013.019c pinaddhāṃ dhūmajālena śikhām iva vibhāvasoḥ 5.013.020a pītenaikena saṃvītāṃ
GE09ram_05_u:900: 5.013.020c sapaṅkām analaṃkārāṃ vipadmām iva padminīm 5.013.021a vrīḍitāṃ duḥkhasaṃtaptāṃ parimlānāṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_05_u:902: 5.013.022a aśrupūrṇamukhīṃ dīnāṃ kṛśām ananaśena ca 5.013.022c śokadhyānaparāṃ dīnāṃ nityaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:903: 5.013.023a priyaṃ janam apaśyantīṃ paśyantīṃ rākṣasīgaṇam 5.013.023c svagaṇena mṛgīṃ hīnāṃ śvagaṇābhivṛtām iva 5.013.024a nīlanāgābhayā veṇyā jaghanaṃ gatayaikayā
GE09ram_05_u:905: 5.013.025a tāṃ samīkṣya viśālākṣīm adhikaṃ malināṃ kṛśām
GE09ram_05_u:906: 5.013.025c tarkayām āsa sīteti kāraṇair upapādibhiḥ 5.013.026a hriyamāṇā tadā tena rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā 5.013.026c yathārūpā hi dṛṣṭā vai tathārūpeyam aṅganā
GE09ram_05_u:908: 5.013.027c kurvantīṃ prabhayā devīṃ sarvā vitimirā diśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:909: 5.013.028a tāṃ nīlakeśīṃ bimbauṣṭhīṃ sumadhyāṃ supratiṣṭhitām 5.013.028c sītāṃ padmapalāśākṣīṃ manmathasya ratiṃ yathā 5.013.029a iṣṭāṃ sarvasya jagataḥ pūrṇacandraprabhām iva 5.013.029c bhūmau sutanum āsīnāṃ niyatām iva tāpasīm
GE09ram_05_u:911: 5.013.030c śokajālena mahatā vitatena na rājatīm 5.013.031a saṃsaktāṃ dhūmajālena śikhām iva vibhāvasoḥ 5.013.031c tāṃ smṛtīm iva saṃdighdām ṛddhiṃ nipatitām iva
GE09ram_05_u:912: 5.013.032a vihatām iva ca śraddhām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:913: 5.013.032c sopasargāṃ yathā siddhiṃ buddhiṃ sakaluṣām iva
GE09ram_05_u:915: 5.013.033c rāmoparodhavyathitāṃ rakṣoharaṇakarśitām 5.013.034a abalāṃ mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ vīkṣamāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ 5.013.034c bāṣpāmbupratipūrṇena kṛṣṇavaktrākṣipakṣmaṇā 5.013.034e vadanenāprasannena niḥśvasantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:918: 5.013.036a tasya saṃdidihe buddhir muhuḥ sītāṃ nirīkṣya tu
GE09ram_05_u:919: 5.013.036c āmnāyānām ayogena vidyāṃ praśithilām iva 5.013.037a duḥkhena bubudhe sītāṃ hanumān analaṃkṛtām 5.013.037c saṃskāreṇa yathāhīnāṃ vācam arthāntaraṃ gatām 5.013.038a tāṃ samīkṣya viśālākṣīṃ rājaputrīm aninditām 5.013.038c tarkayām āsa sīteti kāraṇair upapādayan 5.013.039a vaidehyā yāni cāṅgeṣu tadā rāmo 'nvakīrtayat
GE09ram_05_u:921: 5.013.040a sukṛtau karṇaveṣṭau ca śvadaṃṣṭrau ca susaṃsthitau
GE09ram_05_u:923: 5.013.041a śyāmāni cirayuktatvāt tathā saṃsthānavanti ca 5.013.041c tāny evaitāni manye 'haṃ yāni rāmo 'vnakīrtayat
GE09ram_05_u:924: 5.013.042a tatra yāny avahīnāni tāny ahaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:925: 5.013.042c yāny asyā nāvahīnāni tānīmāni na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:926: 5.013.043a pītaṃ kanakapaṭṭābhaṃ srastaṃ tad vasanaṃ śubham
GE09ram_05_u:927: 5.013.043c uttarīyaṃ nagāsaktaṃ tadā dṛṣṭaṃ plavaṃgamaiḥ 5.013.044a bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni dṛṣṭāni dharaṇītale 5.013.044c anayaivāpaviddhāni svanavanti mahānti ca
GE09ram_05_u:929: 5.013.045c tathā hi nūnaṃ tad varṇaṃ tathā śrīmad yathetarat 5.013.046a iyaṃ kanakavarṇāṅgī rāmasya mahiṣī priyā 5.013.046c pranaṣṭāpi satī yasya manaso na praṇaśyati
GE09ram_05_u:930: 5.013.047a iyaṃ sā yat kṛte rāmaś caturbhiḥ paritapyate
GE09ram_05_u:932: 5.013.048a strī pranaṣṭeti kāruṇyād āśritety ānṛśaṃsyataḥ 5.013.048c patnī naṣṭeti śokena priyeti madanena ca
GE09ram_05_u:933: 5.013.049a asyā devyā yathā rūpam aṅgapratyaṅgasauṣṭhavam 5.013.049c rāmasya ca yathārūpaṃ tasyeyam asitekṣaṇā 5.013.050a asyā devyā manas tasmiṃs tasya cāsyāṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_05_u:934: 5.013.050c teneyaṃ sa ca dharmātmā muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_05_u:935: 5.013.051a duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo ya imāṃ mattakāśinīm
GE09ram_05_u:936: 5.013.051c sītāṃ vinā mahābāhur muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_05_u:937: 5.013.052a evaṃ sītāṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaḥ pavanasaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:938: 5.013.052c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ praśaśaṃsa ca taṃ prabhum
GE09ram_05_u:939: 5.014.001a praśasya tu praśastavyāṃ sītāṃ tāṃ haripuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:941: 5.014.002a sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ 5.014.002c sītām āśritya tejasvī hanumān vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_05_u:943: 5.014.003c yadi sītāpi duḥkhārtā kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:944: 5.014.004a rāmasya vyavasāyajñā lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ 5.014.004c nātyarthaṃ kṣubhyate devī gaṅgeva jaladāgame 5.014.005a tulyaśīlavayovṛttāṃ tulyābhijanalakṣaṇām 5.014.005c rāghavo 'rhati vaidehīṃ taṃ ceyam asitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:945: 5.014.006a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā navahemābhāṃ lokakāntām iva śriyam
GE09ram_05_u:946: 5.014.006c jagāma manasā rāmaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
