GE09ram_05_u:947: 5.014.007a asyā hetor viśālākṣyā hato vālī mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:948: 5.014.007c rāvaṇapratimo vīrye kabandhaś ca nipātitaḥ 5.014.008a virādhaś ca hataḥ saṃkhye rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:949: 5.014.008c vane rāmeṇa vikramya mahendreṇeva śambaraḥ 5.014.009a caturdaśasahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ
GE09ram_05_u:951: 5.014.010a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye triśirāś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:952: 5.014.010c dūṣaṇaś ca mahātejā rāmeṇa viditātmanā 5.014.011a aiśvaryaṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca durlabhaṃ vālipālitam 5.014.011c asyā nimitte sugrīvaḥ prāptavāṃl lokasatkṛtam 5.014.012a sāgaraś ca mayā krāntaḥ śrīmān nadanadīpatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:953: 5.014.012c asyā hetor viśālākṣyāḥ purī ceyaṃ nirīkṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:954: 5.014.013a yadi rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ medinīṃ parivartayet 5.014.013c asyāḥ kṛte jagac cāpi yuktam ity eva me matiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:955: 5.014.014a rājyaṃ vā triṣu lokeṣu sītā vā janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:956: 5.014.014c trailokyarājyaṃ sakalaṃ sītāyā nāpnuyāt kalām 5.014.015a iyaṃ sā dharmaśīlasya maithilasya mahātmanaḥ 5.014.015c sutā janakarājasya sītā bhartṛdṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_05_u:957: 5.014.016a utthitā medinīṃ bhittvā kṣetre halamukhakṣate 5.014.016c padmareṇunibhaiḥ kīrṇā śubhaiḥ kedārapāṃsubhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:959: 5.014.017c snuṣā daśarathasyaiṣā jyeṣṭhā rājño yaśasvinī 5.014.018a dharmajñasya kṛtajñasya rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:960: 5.014.018c iyaṃ sā dayitā bhāryā rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_05_u:961: 5.014.019a sarvān bhogān parityajya bhartṛsnehabalāt kṛtā 5.014.019c acintayitvā duḥkhāni praviṣṭā nirjanaṃ vanam 5.014.020a saṃtuṣṭā phalamūlena bhartṛśuśrūṣaṇe ratā
GE09ram_05_u:962: 5.014.020c yā parāṃ bhajate prītiṃ vane 'pi bhavane yathā 5.014.021a seyaṃ kanakavarṇāṅgī nityaṃ susmitabhāṣiṇī
GE09ram_05_u:963: 5.014.021c sahate yātanām etām anarthānām abhāginī 5.014.022a imāṃ tu śīlasaṃpannāṃ draṣṭum icchati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:964: 5.014.022c rāvaṇena pramathitāṃ prapām iva pipāsitaḥ 5.014.023a asyā nūnaṃ punar lābhād rāghavaḥ prītim eṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:965: 5.014.023c rājā rājyaparibhraṣṭaḥ punaḥ prāpyeva medinīm 5.014.024a kāmabhogaiḥ parityaktā hīnā bandhujanena ca 5.014.024c dhārayaty ātmano dehaṃ tatsamāgamakāṅkṣiṇī
GE09ram_05_u:966: 5.014.025a naiṣā paśyati rākṣasyo nemān puṣpaphaladrumān 5.014.025c ekasthahṛdayā nūnaṃ rāmam evānupaśyati
GE09ram_05_u:967: 5.014.026a bhartā nāma paraṃ nāryā bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇād api
GE09ram_05_u:968: 5.014.026c eṣā hi rahitā tena śobhanārhā na śobhate
GE09ram_05_u:969: 5.014.027a duṣkaraṃ kurute rāmo hīno yad anayā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:970: 5.014.027c dhārayaty ātmano dehaṃ na duḥkhenāvasīdati 5.014.028a imām asitakeśāntāṃ śatapatranibhekṣaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:971: 5.014.028c sukhārhāṃ duḥkhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā mamāpi vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:973: 5.014.029c sā rākṣasībhir vikṛtekṣaṇābhiḥ; saṃrakṣyate saṃprati vṛkṣamūle
GE09ram_05_u:974: 5.014.030a himahatanalinīva naṣṭaśobhā; vyasanaparamparayā nipīḍyamānā 5.014.030c sahacararahiteva cakravākī; janakasutā kṛpaṇāṃ daśāṃ prapannā
GE09ram_05_u:975: 5.014.031a asyā hi puṣpāvanatāgraśākhāḥ; śokaṃ dṛḍhaṃ vai janayaty aśokāḥ 5.014.031c himavyapāyena ca mandaraśmir; abhyutthito naikasahasraraśmiḥ 5.014.032a ity evam arthaṃ kapir anvavekṣya; sīteyam ity eva
GE09ram_05_u:977: 5.014.032c saṃśritya tasmin niṣasāda vṛkṣe; balī harīṇām ṛṣabhas tarasvī
GE09ram_05_u:978: 5.015.001a tataḥ kumudaṣaṇḍābho nirmalaṃ nirmalaḥ svayam 5.015.001c prajagāma nabhaś candro haṃso nīlam ivodakam
GE09ram_05_u:979: 5.015.002a sācivyam iva kurvan sa prabhayā nirmalaprabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:980: 5.015.002c candramā raśmibhiḥ śītaiḥ siṣeve pavanātmajam 5.015.003a sa dadarśa tataḥ sītāṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām 5.015.003c śokabhārair iva nyastāṃ bhārair nāvam ivāmbhasi
GE09ram_05_u:983: 5.015.005a ekākṣīm ekakarṇāṃ ca karṇaprāvaraṇāṃ tathā 5.015.005c akarṇāṃ śaṅkukarṇāṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:987: 5.015.007c lambauṣṭhīṃ cibukauṣṭhīṃ ca lambāsyāṃ lambajānukām 5.015.008a hrasvāṃ dīrghāṃ ca kubjāṃ ca vikaṭāṃ vāmanāṃ tathā 5.015.008c karālāṃ bhugnavastrāṃ ca piṅgākṣīṃ vikṛtānanām 5.015.009a vikṛtāḥ piṅgalāḥ kālīḥ krodhanāḥ kalahapriyāḥ 5.015.009c kālāyasamahāśūlakūṭamudgaradhāriṇīḥ
GE09ram_05_u:990: 5.015.011c gokarṇīr hastikarṇīś ca harikarṇīs tathāparāḥ 5.015.012a anāsā atināsāś ca tiryan nāsā vināsikāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:993: 5.015.013c atimātraśirogrīvā atimātrakucodarīḥ 5.015.014a atimātrāsya netrāś ca dīrghajihvānakhās tathā 5.015.014c ajāmukhīr hastimukhīr gomukhīḥ sūkarīmukhīḥ
GE09ram_05_u:996: 5.015.016a karālā dhūmrakeśīś ca rakṣasīr vikṛtānanāḥ 5.015.016c pibantīḥ satataṃ pānaṃ sadā māṃsasurāpriyāḥ 5.015.017a māṃsaśoṇitadigdhāṅgīr māṃsaśoṇitabhojanāḥ 5.015.017c tā dadarśa kapiśreṣṭho romaharṣaṇadarśanāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:998: 5.015.018c tasyādhastāc ca tāṃ devīṃ rājaputrīm aninditām
GE09ram_05_u:999: 5.015.019a lakṣayām āsa lakṣmīvān hanūmāñ janakātmajām 5.015.019c niṣprabhāṃ śokasaṃtaptāṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1000: 5.015.020a kṣīṇapuṇyāṃ cyutāṃ bhūmau tārāṃ nipatitām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1004: 5.015.022a viyūthāṃ siṃhasaṃruddhāṃ baddhāṃ gajavadhūm iva 5.015.022c candralekhāṃ payodānte śāradābhrair ivāvṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:1005: 5.015.023a kliṣṭarūpām asaṃsparśād ayuktām iva vallakīm 5.015.023c sītāṃ bhartṛhite yuktām ayuktāṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśe
GE09ram_05_u:1007: 5.015.024c tābhiḥ parivṛtāṃ tatra sagrahām iva rohiṇīm
GE09ram_05_u:1008: 5.015.025a dadarśa hanumān devīṃ latām akusumām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1009: 5.015.025c sā malena ca digdhāṅgī vapuṣā cāpy alaṃkṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:1010: 5.015.026a mṛṇālī paṅkadighdeva vibhāti ca na bhāti ca
GE09ram_05_u:1011: 5.015.026c malinena tu vastreṇa parikliṣṭena bhāminīm 5.015.027a saṃvṛtāṃ mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ dadarśa hanumān kapiḥ 5.015.027c tāṃ devīṃ dīnavadanām adīnāṃ bhartṛtejasā 5.015.028a rakṣitāṃ svena śīlena sītām asitalocanām 5.015.028c tāṃ dṛṣṭvā hanumān sītāṃ mṛgaśāvanibhekṣaṇām 5.015.029a mṛgakanyām iva trastāṃ vīkṣamāṇāṃ samantataḥ 5.015.029c dahantīm iva niḥśvāsair vṛkṣān pallavadhāriṇaḥ 5.015.030a saṃghātam iva śokānāṃ duḥkhasyormim ivotthitām 5.015.030c tāṃ kṣāmāṃ suvibhaktāṅgīṃ vinābharaṇaśobhinīm
GE09ram_05_u:1012: 5.015.031a praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mārutiḥ prekṣya maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:1013: 5.015.031c harṣajāni ca so 'śrūṇi tāṃ dṛṣṭvā madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:1014: 5.015.032a mumoca hanumāṃs tatra namaś cakre ca rāghavam
GE09ram_05_u:1015: 5.015.032c namaskṛtvā ca rāmāya lakṣmaṇāya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:1018: 5.016.001c vicinvataś ca vaidehīṃ kiṃ cic cheṣā niśābhavat
GE09ram_05_u:1019: 5.016.002a ṣaḍaṅgavedaviduṣāṃ kratupravarayājinām 5.016.002c śuśrāva brahmaghoṣāṃś ca virātre brahmarakṣasām 5.016.003a atha maṅgalavāditraiḥ śabdaiḥ śrotramanoharaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1021: 5.016.004a vibudhya tu yathākālaṃ rākṣasendraḥ pratāvapān 5.016.004c srastamālyāmbaradharo vaidehīm anvacintayat
GE09ram_05_u:1022: 5.016.005a bhṛśaṃ niyuktas tasyāṃ ca madanena madotkaṭaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1023: 5.016.005c na sa taṃ rākṣasaḥ kāmaṃ śaśākātmani gūhitum
GE09ram_05_u:1024: 5.016.006a sa sarvābharaṇair yukto bibhrac chriyam anuttamām
GE09ram_05_u:1025: 5.016.006c tāṃ nagair vividhair juṣṭāṃ sarvapuṣpaphalopagaiḥ 5.016.007a vṛtāṃ puṣkariṇībhiś ca nānāpuṣpopaśobhitām
GE09ram_05_u:1026: 5.016.007c sadāmadaiś ca vihagair vicitrāṃ paramādbhutām 5.016.008a īhāmṛgaiś ca vividhaiś vṛtāṃ dṛṣṭimanoharaiḥ 5.016.008c vīthīḥ saṃprekṣamāṇaś ca maṇikāñcanatoraṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1029: 5.016.010a aṅganāśatamātraṃ tu taṃ vrajantam anuvrajat 5.016.010c mahendram iva paulastyaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1030: 5.016.011a dīpikāḥ kāñcanīḥ kāś cij jagṛhus tatra yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1032: 5.016.012a kāñcanair api bhṛṅgārair jahruḥ salilam agrataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1033: 5.016.012c maṇḍalāgrān asīṃś caiva gṛhyānyāḥ pṛṣṭhato yayuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1034: 5.016.013a kā cid ratnamayīṃ pātrīṃ pūrṇāṃ pānasya bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:1035: 5.016.013c dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇenaiva tadā jagrāha pāṇinā 5.016.014a rājahaṃsapratīkāśaṃ chatraṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1036: 5.016.014c sauvarṇadaṇḍam aparā gṛhītvā pṛṣṭhato yayau 5.016.015a nidrāmadaparītākṣyo rāvaṇasyottamastriyaḥ 5.016.015c anujagmuḥ patiṃ vīraṃ ghanaṃ vidyullatā iva
GE09ram_05_u:1037: 5.016.016a tataḥ kāñcīninādaṃ ca nūpurāṇāṃ ca niḥsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:1038: 5.016.016c śuśrāva paramastrīṇāṃ sa kapir mārutātmajaḥ 5.016.017a taṃ cāpratimakarmāṇam
GE09ram_05_u:1039: 5.016.017c dvāradeśam anuprāptaṃ dadarśa hanumān kapiḥ 5.016.018a dīpikābhir anekābhiḥ samantād avabhāsitam
GE09ram_05_u:1042: 5.016.019c samakṣam iva kandarpam apaviddha śarāsanam 5.016.020a mathitāmṛtaphenābham arajo vastram uttamam
GE09ram_05_u:1043: 5.016.020c salīlam anukarṣantaṃ vimuktaṃ saktam aṅgade 5.016.021a taṃ patraviṭape līnaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1045: 5.016.022a avekṣamāṇaś ca tato dadarśa kapikuñjaraḥ 5.016.022c rūpayauvanasaṃpannā rāvaṇasya
GE09ram_05_u:1046: 5.016.023a tābhiḥ parivṛto rājā surūpābhir mahāyaśāḥ 5.016.023c tanmṛgadvijasaṃghuṣṭaṃ praviṣṭaḥ pramadāvanam
GE09ram_05_u:1048: 5.016.024c tena viśravasaḥ putraḥ sa dṛṣṭo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1049: 5.016.025a vṛtaḥ paramanārībhis tārābhir iva candramāḥ 5.016.025c taṃ dadarśa mahātejās tejovantaṃ mahākapiḥ 5.016.026a rāvaṇo 'yaṃ mahābāhur iti saṃcintya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1051: 5.016.027a sa tathāpy ugratejāḥ san nirdhūtas tasya tejasā
GE09ram_05_u:1053: 5.016.028a sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ suśroṇīṃ saṃhatastanīm 5.016.028c didṛkṣur asitāpāṅgīm upāvartata rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1054: 5.017.001a tasminn eva tataḥ kāle rājaputrī tv aninditā
GE09ram_05_u:1055: 5.017.001c rūpayauvanasaṃpannaṃ bhūṣaṇottamabhūṣitam 5.017.002a tato dṛṣṭvaiva vaidehī rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.017.002c prāvepata varārohā pravāte kadalī yathā 5.017.003a ūrubhyām udaraṃ chādya bāhubhyāṃ ca payodharau
GE09ram_05_u:1057: 5.017.004a daśagrīvas tu vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ rākṣasīgaṇaiḥ 5.017.004c dadarśa dīnāṃ duḥkhārtaṃ nāvaṃ sannām ivārṇave
GE09ram_05_u:1059: 5.017.005c chinnāṃ prapatitāṃ bhūmau śākhām iva vanaspateḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1064: 5.017.007c duḥkhasyāntam apaśyantīṃ rāmāṃ rāmam anuvratām 5.017.008a veṣṭamānām athāviṣṭāṃ pannagendravadhūm iva
GE09ram_05_u:1066: 5.017.009a vṛttaśīle kule jātām ācāravati dhārmike 5.017.009c punaḥ saṃskāram āpannāṃ jātam iva ca duṣkule
GE09ram_05_u:1067: 5.017.010a sannām iva mahākīrtiṃ śraddhām iva vimānitām
GE09ram_05_u:1068: 5.017.010c prajñām iva parikṣīṇām āśāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1069: 5.017.011a āyatīm iva vidhvastām ājñāṃ pratihatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1070: 5.017.011c dīptām iva diśaṃ kāle pūjām apahṛtām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1071: 5.017.012a padminīm iva vidhvastāṃ hataśūrāṃ camūm iva
GE09ram_05_u:1072: 5.017.012c prabhām iva tapodhvastām upakṣīṇām ivāpagām 5.017.013a vedīm iva parāmṛṣṭāṃ śāntām agniśikhām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1074: 5.017.014a utkṛṣṭaparṇakamalāṃ vitrāsitavihaṃgamām 5.017.014c hastihastaparāmṛṣṭām ākulāṃ padminīm iva
GE09ram_05_u:1075: 5.017.015a patiśokāturāṃ śuṣkāṃ nadīṃ visrāvitām iva 5.017.015c parayā mṛjayā hīnāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe niśām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1080: 5.017.018a ekayā dīrghayā veṇyā śobhamānām ayatnataḥ 5.017.018c nīlayā nīradāpāye vanarājyā mahīm iva 5.017.019a upavāsena śokena dhyānena ca bhayena ca
GE09ram_05_u:1081: 5.017.019c parikṣīṇāṃ kṛśāṃ dīnām alpāhārāṃ tapodhanām 5.017.020a āyācamānāṃ duḥkhārtāṃ prāñjaliṃ devatām iva 5.017.020c bhāvena raghumukhyasya daśagrīvaparābhavam
GE09ram_05_u:1083: 5.017.021c anuvratāṃ rāmam atīva maithilīṃ; pralobhayām āsa vadhāya
GE09ram_05_u:1085: 5.018.001a sa tāṃ parivṛtāṃ dīnāṃ nirānandāṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_05_u:1086: 5.018.001c sākārair madhurair vākyair nyadarśayata rāvaṇaḥ 5.018.002a māṃ dṛṣṭvā nāganāsorugūhamānā
GE09ram_05_u:1087: 5.018.002c adarśanam ivātmānaṃ bhayān netuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_05_u:1088: 5.018.003a kāmaye tvāṃ viśālākṣi bahumanyasva māṃ priye
GE09ram_05_u:1089: 5.018.003c sarvāṅgaguṇasaṃpanne sarvalokamanohare 5.018.004a neha ke cin manuṣyā vā rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1090: 5.018.004c vyapasarpatu te sīte bhayaṃ mattaḥ samutthitam
GE09ram_05_u:1091: 5.018.005a svadharme rakṣasāṃ bhīru sarvathaiṣa na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1092: 5.018.005c gamanaṃ vā parastrīṇāṃ haraṇaṃ saṃpramathya vā
GE09ram_05_u:1093: 5.018.006a evaṃ caitad akāmāṃ ca na tvāṃ sprakṣyāmi maithili 5.018.006c kāmaṃ kāmaḥ śarīre me yathākāmaṃ pravartatām
GE09ram_05_u:1094: 5.018.007a devi neha bhayaṃ kāryaṃ mayi viśvasihi priye
GE09ram_05_u:1095: 5.018.007c praṇayasva ca tattvena maivaṃ bhūḥ śokalālasā
GE09ram_05_u:1096: 5.018.008a ekaveṇī dharāśayyā dhyānaṃ malinam ambaram 5.018.008c asthāne 'py upavāsaś ca naitāny aupayikāni te 5.018.009a vicitrāṇi ca mālyāni candanāny agarūṇi ca
GE09ram_05_u:1097: 5.018.009c vividhāni ca vāsāṃsi divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1098: 5.018.010a mahārhāṇi ca pānāni yānāni śayanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1099: 5.018.010c gītaṃ nṛttaṃ ca vādyaṃ ca labha māṃ prāpya maithili
GE09ram_05_u:1100: 5.018.011a strīratnam asi maivaṃ bhūḥ kuru gātreṣu bhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:1101: 5.018.011c māṃ prāpya tu kathaṃ hi syās tvam anarhā suvigrahe
GE09ram_05_u:1102: 5.018.012a idaṃ te cārusaṃjātaṃ yauvanaṃ vyativartate 5.018.012c yad atītaṃ punar naiti srotaḥ śīghram apām iva 5.018.013a tvāṃ kṛtvoparato manye rūpakartā sa viśvakṛt
GE09ram_05_u:1103: 5.018.013c na hi rūpopamā tv anyā tavāsti śubhadarśane
GE09ram_05_u:1105: 5.018.014c kaḥ pumān ativarteta sākṣād api pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1106: 5.018.015a yad yat paśyāmi te gātraṃ śītāṃśusadṛśānane
GE09ram_05_u:1107: 5.018.015c tasmiṃs tasmin pṛthuśroṇi cakṣur mama nibadhyate
GE09ram_05_u:1108: 5.018.016a bhava maithili bhāryā me moham enaṃ visarjaya
GE09ram_05_u:1110: 5.018.017a lokebhyo yāni ratnāni saṃpramathyāhṛtāni me 5.018.017c tāni te bhīru sarvāṇi rājyaṃ caitad ahaṃ ca te
GE09ram_05_u:1112: 5.018.018c janakāya pradāsyāmi tava hetor vilāsini 5.018.019a neha paśyāmi loke 'nyaṃ yo me pratibalo bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:1113: 5.018.019c paśya me sumahad vīryam apratidvandvam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:1114: 5.018.020a asakṛt saṃyuge bhagnā mayā vimṛditadhvajāḥ 5.018.020c aśaktāḥ pratyanīkeṣu sthātuṃ mama surāsurāḥ 5.018.021a iccha māṃ kriyatām adya pratikarma tavottamam
GE09ram_05_u:1115: 5.018.021c saprabhāṇy avasajjantāṃ tavāṅge bhūṣaṇāni ca 5.018.021e sādhu paśyāmi te rūpaṃ saṃyuktaṃ pratikarmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:1117: 5.018.022c bhuṅkṣva bhogān yathākāmaṃ piba bhīru ramasva ca
GE09ram_05_u:1118: 5.018.022e yatheṣṭaṃ ca prayaccha tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ vā dhanāni ca 5.018.023a lalasva mayi visrabdhā dhṛṣṭam ājñāpayasva ca
GE09ram_05_u:1119: 5.018.023c matprabhāvāl lalantyāś ca lalantāṃ bāndhavās tava
GE09ram_05_u:1120: 5.018.024a ṛddhiṃ mamānupaśya tvaṃ śriyaṃ bhadre yaśaś ca me 5.018.024c kiṃ kariṣyasi rāmeṇa subhage cīravāsasā 5.018.025a nikṣiptavijayo rāmo gataśrīr vanagocaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1121: 5.018.025c vratī sthaṇḍilaśāyī ca śaṅke jīvati vā na vā 5.018.026a na hi vaidehi rāmas tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ vāpy upalapsyate 5.018.026c puro balākair asitair meghair jyotsnām ivāvṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:1122: 5.018.027a na cāpi mama hastāt tvāṃ prāptum arhati rāghavaḥ 5.018.027c hiraṇyakaśipuḥ kīrtim indrahastagatām iva
GE09ram_05_u:1124: 5.018.028c mano harasi me bhīru suparṇaḥ pannagaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1126: 5.018.029c tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sveṣu dāreṣu ratiṃ nopalabhāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:1128: 5.018.030c yāvantyo mama sarvāsām aiśvaryaṃ kuru jānaki
GE09ram_05_u:1129: 5.018.031a mama hy asitakeśānte trailokyapravarāḥ striyaḥ 5.018.031c tās tvāṃ paricariṣyanti śriyam apsaraso yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1130: 5.018.032a yāni vaiśravaṇe subhru ratnāni ca dhanāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1131: 5.018.032c tāni lokāṃś ca suśroṇi māṃ ca bhuṅkṣva yathāsukham 5.018.033a na rāmas tapasā devi na balena na vikramaiḥ 5.018.033c na dhanena mayā tulyas tejasā yaśasāpi vā
GE09ram_05_u:1132: 5.018.034a piba vihara ramasva bhuṅkṣva bhogān; dhananicayaṃ pradiśāmi medinīṃ ca 5.018.034c mayi lala lalane yathāsukhaṃ tvaṃ; tvayi ca sametya lalantu bāndhavās te
GE09ram_05_u:1133: 5.018.035a kusumitatarujālasaṃtatāni; bhramarayutāni samudratīrajāni 5.018.035c kanakavimalahārabhūṣitāṅgī; vihara mayā saha bhīru kānanāni 5.019.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sītā raudrasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1134: 5.019.001c ārtā dīnasvarā dīnaṃ pratyuvāca śanair vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1135: 5.019.002a duḥkhārtā rudatī sītā vepamānā tapasvinī 5.019.002c cintayantī varārohā patim eva pativratā 5.019.003a tṛṇam antarataḥ kṛtvā pratyuvāca śucismitā 5.019.003c nivartaya mano mattaḥ svajane kriyatāṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1136: 5.019.004a na māṃ prārthayituṃ yuktas tvaṃ siddhim iva pāpakṛt 5.019.004c akāryaṃ na mayā kāryam ekapatnyā vigarhitam
GE09ram_05_u:1137: 5.019.004e kulaṃ saṃprāptayā puṇyaṃ kule mahati jātayā
GE09ram_05_u:1138: 5.019.005a evam uktvā tu vaidehī rāvaṇaṃ taṃ yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:1139: 5.019.005c rākṣasaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā bhūyo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1140: 5.019.006a nāham aupayikī bhāryā parabhāryā satī tava
GE09ram_05_u:1141: 5.019.006c sādhu dharmam avekṣasva sādhu sādhuvrataṃ cara
GE09ram_05_u:1142: 5.019.007a yathā tava tathānyeṣāṃ rakṣyā dārā niśācara
GE09ram_05_u:1143: 5.019.007c ātmānam upamāṃ kṛtvā sveṣu dāreṣu ramyatām
GE09ram_05_u:1144: 5.019.008a atuṣṭaṃ sveṣu dāreṣu capalaṃ calitendriyam 5.019.008c nayanti nikṛtiprajñāṃ paradārāḥ parābhavam
GE09ram_05_u:1145: 5.019.009a iha santo na vā santi sato vā nānuvartase 5.019.009c vaco mithyā praṇītātmā pathyam uktaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1146: 5.019.010a akṛtātmānam āsādya rājānam anaye ratam 5.019.010c samṛddhāni vinaśyanti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca 5.019.011a tatheyaṃ tvāṃ samāsādya laṅkā ratnaugha saṃkulā
GE09ram_05_u:1150: 5.019.013a evaṃ tvāṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ vakṣyanti nikṛtā janāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1151: 5.019.013c diṣṭyaitad vyasanaṃ prāpto raudra ity eva harṣitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1152: 5.019.014a śakyā lobhayituṃ nāham aiśvaryeṇa dhanena vā
GE09ram_05_u:1153: 5.019.014c ananyā rāghaveṇāhaṃ bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā 5.019.015a upadhāya bhujaṃ tasya lokanāthasya satkṛtam 5.019.015c kathaṃ nāmopadhāsyāmi bhujam anyasya kasya cit
GE09ram_05_u:1154: 5.019.016a aham aupayikī bhāryā tasyaiva vasudhāpateḥ 5.019.016c vratasnātasya viprasya vidyeva viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1155: 5.019.017a sādhu rāvaṇa rāmeṇa māṃ samānaya duḥkhitām
GE09ram_05_u:1156: 5.019.017c vane vāśitayā sārdhaṃ kareṇveva gajādhipam 5.019.018a mitram aupayikaṃ kartuṃ rāmaḥ sthānaṃ parīpsatā
GE09ram_05_u:1157: 5.019.018c vadhaṃ cānicchatā ghoraṃ tvayāsau puruṣarṣabhaḥ 5.019.019a varjayed vajram utsṛṣṭaṃ varjayed antakaś ciram
GE09ram_05_u:1158: 5.019.019c tvadvidhaṃ na tu saṃkruddho lokanāthaḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1159: 5.019.020a rāmasya dhanuṣaḥ śabdaṃ śroṣyasi tvaṃ mahāsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:1161: 5.019.021a iha śīghraṃ suparvāṇo jvalitāsyā ivoragāḥ 5.019.021c iṣavo nipatiṣyanti rāmalakṣmaṇalakṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1162: 5.019.022a rakṣāṃsi parinighnantaḥ puryām asyāṃ samantataḥ 5.019.022c asaṃpātaṃ kariṣyanti patantaḥ kaṅkavāsasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1165: 5.019.024a apaneṣyati māṃ bhartā tvattaḥ śīghram ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1166: 5.019.024c asurebhyaḥ śriyaṃ dīptāṃ viṣṇus tribhir iva kramaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1167: 5.019.025a janasthāne hatasthāne nihate rakṣasāṃ bale 5.019.025c aśaktena tvayā rakṣaḥ kṛtam etad asādhu vai
GE09ram_05_u:1168: 5.019.026a āśramaṃ tu tayoḥ śūnyaṃ praviśya narasiṃhayoḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1169: 5.019.026c gocaraṃ gatayor bhrātror apanītā tvayādhama 5.019.027a na hi gandham upāghrāya rāmalakṣmaṇayos tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:1170: 5.019.027c śakyaṃ saṃdarśane sthātuṃ śunā śārdūlayor iva
GE09ram_05_u:1171: 5.019.028a tasya te vigrahe tābhyāṃ yugagrahaṇam asthiram
GE09ram_05_u:1173: 5.019.029a kṣipraṃ tava sa nātho me rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha 5.019.029c toyam alpam ivādityaḥ prāṇān ādāsyate śaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1174: 5.019.030a giriṃ kuberasya gato 'thavālayaṃ; sabhāṃ gato vā varuṇasya rājñaḥ 5.019.030c asaṃśayaṃ dāśarather na mokṣyase; mahādrumaḥ kālahato 'śaner
GE09ram_05_u:1176: 5.020.001a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā paruṣaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ 5.020.001c pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ vipriyaṃ priyadarśanām 5.020.002a yathā yathā sāntvayitā vaśyaḥ strīṇāṃ tathā tathā
GE09ram_05_u:1177: 5.020.002c yathā yathā priyaṃ vaktā paribhūtas tathā tathā
GE09ram_05_u:1178: 5.020.003a saṃniyacchati me krodhaṃ tvayi kāmaḥ samutthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1179: 5.020.003c dravato mārgam āsādya hayān iva susārathiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1180: 5.020.004a vāmaḥ kāmo manuṣyāṇāṃ yasmin kila nibadhyate
GE09ram_05_u:1181: 5.020.004c jane tasmiṃs tv anukrośaḥ snehaś ca kila jāyate 5.020.005a etasmāt kāraṇān na tāṃ ghatayāmi varānane
GE09ram_05_u:1183: 5.020.006a paruṣāṇi hi vākyāni yāni yāni bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_05_u:1184: 5.020.006c teṣu teṣu vadho yuktas tava maithili dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1185: 5.020.007a evam uktvā tu vaidehīṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1187: 5.020.008a dvau māsau rakṣitavyau me yo 'vadhis te mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1188: 5.020.008c tataḥ śayanam āroha mama tvaṃ varavarṇini
GE09ram_05_u:1189: 5.020.009a dvābhyām ūrdhvaṃ tu māsābhyāṃ bhartāraṃ mām anicchatīm
GE09ram_05_u:1190: 5.020.009c mama tvāṃ prātarāśārtham ārabhante mahānase 5.020.010a tāṃ tarjyamānāṃ saṃprekṣya rākṣasendreṇa jānakīm 5.020.010c devagandharvakanyās tā viṣedur vipulekṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1192: 5.020.011c sītām āśvāsayām āsus tarjitāṃ tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_05_u:1193: 5.020.012a tābhir āśvāsitā sītā rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.020.012c uvācātmahitaṃ vākyaṃ vṛttaśauṇḍīryagarvitam
GE09ram_05_u:1194: 5.020.013a nūnaṃ na te janaḥ kaś cid asin niḥśreyase sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1195: 5.020.013c nivārayati yo na tvāṃ karmaṇo 'smād vigarhitāt
GE09ram_05_u:1196: 5.020.014a māṃ hi dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ śacīm iva śacīpateḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1197: 5.020.014c tvadanyas triṣu lokeṣu prārthayen manasāpi kaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1199: 5.020.015c uktavān asi yat pāpaṃ kva gatas tasya mokṣyase 5.020.016a yathā dṛptaś ca mātaṅgaḥ śaśaś ca sahitau vane 5.020.016c tathā dviradavad rāmas tvaṃ nīca śaśavat smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1200: 5.020.017a sa tvam ikṣvākunāthaṃ vai kṣipann iha na lajjase 5.020.017c cakṣuṣo viṣayaṃ tasya na tāvad upagacchasi
GE09ram_05_u:1201: 5.020.018a ime te nayane krūre virūpe kṛṣṇapiṅgale
GE09ram_05_u:1202: 5.020.018c kṣitau na patite kasmān mām anāryanirīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1203: 5.020.019a tasya dharmātmanaḥ patnīṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1204: 5.020.019c kathaṃ vyāharato māṃ te na jihvā pāpa śīryate 5.020.020a asaṃdeśāt tu rāmasya tapasaś cānupālanāt 5.020.020c na tvāṃ kurmi daśagrīva bhasma bhasmārhatejasā
GE09ram_05_u:1205: 5.020.021a nāpahartum ahaṃ śakyā tasya rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1206: 5.020.021c vidhis tava vadhārthāya vihito nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1207: 5.020.022a śūreṇa dhanadabhrātā balaiḥ samuditena ca 5.020.022c apohya rāmaṃ kasmād dhi dāracāuryaṃ tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:1208: 5.020.023a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 5.020.023c vivṛtya nayane krūre jānakīm anvavaikṣata 5.020.024a nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśo mahābhujaśirodharaḥ 5.020.024c siṃhasattvagatiḥ śrīmān dīptajihvogralocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1215: 5.020.028c uvāca rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ bhujaṃga iva niḥśvasan
GE09ram_05_u:1217: 5.020.029c nāśayāmy aham adya tvāṃ sūryaḥ saṃdhyām ivaujasā
GE09ram_05_u:1218: 5.020.030a ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1219: 5.020.030c saṃdideśa tataḥ sarvā rākṣasīr ghoradarśanāḥ 5.020.031a ekākṣīm ekakarṇāṃ ca karṇaprāvaraṇāṃ tathā 5.020.031c gokarṇīṃ hastikarṇīṃ ca lambakarṇīm akarṇikām 5.020.032a hastipadya śvapadyau ca gopadīṃ pādacūlikām 5.020.032c ekākṣīm ekapādīṃ ca pṛthupādīm apādikām 5.020.033a atimātraśirogrīvām atimātrakucodarīm 5.020.033c atimātrāsyanetrāṃ ca dīrghajihvām ajihvikām
GE09ram_05_u:1221: 5.020.034a yathā madvaśagā sītā kṣipraṃ bhavati jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:1222: 5.020.034c tathā kuruta rākṣasyaḥ sarvāḥ kṣipraṃ sametya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1225: 5.020.036a iti pratisamādiśya rākṣasendraḥ punaḥ punaḥ 5.020.036c kāmamanyuparītātmā jānakīṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1226: 5.020.037a upagamya tataḥ kṣipraṃ rākṣasī dhānyamālinī 5.020.037c pariṣvajya daśagrīvam idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.020.038a mayā krīḍa mahārājasītayā kiṃ tavānayā 5.020.038c akāmāṃ kāmayānasya śarīram upatapyate
GE09ram_05_u:1227: 5.020.038e icchantīṃ kāmayānasya prītir bhavati śobhanā 5.020.039a evam uktas tu rākṣasyā samutkṣiptas tato balī
GE09ram_05_u:1229: 5.020.040a devagandharvakanyāś ca nāgakanyāś ca tās tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1230: 5.020.040c parivārya daśagrīvaṃ viviśus tad gṛhottamam 5.020.041a sa maithilīṃ dharmaparām avasthitāṃ; pravepamānāṃ paribhartsya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1231: 5.020.041c vihāya sītāṃ madanena mohitaḥ; svam eva veśma praviveśa bhāsvaram 5.021.001a ity uktvā maithilīṃ rājā rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1232: 5.021.001c saṃdiśya ca tataḥ sarvā rākṣasīr nirjagāma ha
GE09ram_05_u:1233: 5.021.002a niṣkrānte rākṣasendre tu punar antaḥpuraṃ gate
GE09ram_05_u:1234: 5.021.002c rākṣasyo bhīmarūpās tāḥ sītāṃ samabhidudruvuḥ 5.021.003a tataḥ sītām upāgamya rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ 5.021.003c paraṃ paruṣayā vācā vaidehīm idam abruvan
GE09ram_05_u:1236: 5.021.004c daśagrīvasya bhāryātvaṃ sīte na bahu manyase
GE09ram_05_u:1237: 5.021.005a tatas tv ekajaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1239: 5.021.006a prajāpatīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ tu caturtho yaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1240: 5.021.006c mānaso brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ pulastya iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1241: 5.021.007a pulastyasya tu tejasvī maharṣir mānasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1242: 5.021.007c nāmnā sa viśravā nāma prajāpatisamaprabhaḥ 5.021.008a tasya putro viśālākṣi rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ 5.021.008c tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:1243: 5.021.008e mayoktaṃ cārusarvāṅgi vākyaṃ kiṃ nānumanyase 5.021.009a tato harijaṭā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1245: 5.021.010a yena devās trayastriṃśad devarājaś ca nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1246: 5.021.010c tasya tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhāryā bhavitum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:1248: 5.021.011c balino vīryayuktasyā bhāryātvaṃ kiṃ na lapsyase
GE09ram_05_u:1249: 5.021.012a priyāṃ bahumatāṃ bhāryāṃ tyaktvā rājā mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1250: 5.021.012c sarvāsāṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ tvām upaiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1252: 5.021.013c antaḥpuraṃ samutsṛjya tvām upaiṣyati rāvaṇaḥ 5.021.014a asakṛd devatā yuddhe
GE09ram_05_u:1253: 5.021.014c nirjitāḥ samare yena sa te pārśvam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1256: 5.021.016a yasya sūryo na tapati bhīto yasya ca mārutaḥ 5.021.016c na vāti smāyatāpāṅge kiṃ tvaṃ tasya na tiṣṭhasi 5.021.017a puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ ca taravo mumucur yasya vai bhayāt
GE09ram_05_u:1257: 5.021.017c śailāś ca subhru pānīyaṃ jaladāś ca yadecchati
GE09ram_05_u:1259: 5.021.018c kiṃ tvaṃ na kuruṣe buddhiṃ bhāryārthe rāvaṇasya hi 5.021.019a sādhu te tattvato devi kathitaṃ sādhu bhāmini
GE09ram_05_u:1260: 5.021.019c gṛhāṇa susmite vākyam anyathā na bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:1261: 5.022.001a tataḥ sītām upāgamya rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ 5.022.001c paruṣaṃ paruṣā nārya ūcus tā vākyam apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:1262: 5.022.002a kiṃ tvam antaḥpure sīte sarvabhūtamanohare 5.022.002c mahārhaśayanopete na vāsam
GE09ram_05_u:1263: 5.022.003a mānuṣī mānuṣasyaiva bhāryātvaṃ bahu manyase 5.022.003c pratyāhara mano rāmān na tvaṃ jātu bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:1264: 5.022.004a mānuṣī mānuṣaṃ taṃ tu rāmam icchasi śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:1265: 5.022.004c rājyād bhraṣṭam asiddhārthaṃ viklavaṃ tam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:1266: 5.022.005a rākṣasīnāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sītā padmanibhekṣaṇā 5.022.005c netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.022.006a yad idaṃ lokavidviṣṭam udāharatha saṃgatāḥ 5.022.006c naitan manasi vākyaṃ me kilbiṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhati
GE09ram_05_u:1267: 5.022.007a na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:1268: 5.022.007c kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ 5.022.007e dīno vā rājyahīno vā yo me bhartā sa me guruḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1269: 5.022.008a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ 5.022.008c bhartsayanti sma paruṣair vākyai rāvaṇacoditāḥ 5.022.009a avalīnaḥ sa nirvākyo hanumāñ śiṃśapādrume 5.022.009c sītāṃ saṃtarjayantīs tā rākṣasīr aśṛṇot kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1270: 5.022.010a tām abhikramya saṃrabdhā vepamānāṃ samantataḥ 5.022.010c bhṛśaṃ saṃlilihur dīptān
GE09ram_05_u:1271: 5.022.011a ūcuś ca paramakruddhāḥ pragṛhyāśu paraśvadhān 5.022.011c neyam arhati bhartāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.022.012a sā bhartsyamānā bhīmābhī rākṣasībhir varānanā 5.022.012c sā bāṣpam apamārjantī śiṃśapāṃ tām upāgamat
GE09ram_05_u:1272: 5.022.013a tatas tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ sītā rākṣasībhiḥ samāvṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:1275: 5.022.014c bhartsayāṃ cakrire bhīmā rākṣasyas tāḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1276: 5.022.015a tatas tāṃ vinatā nāma rākṣasī bhīmadarśanā
GE09ram_05_u:1278: 5.022.016a sīte paryāptam etāvad bhartṛsneho nidarśitaḥ 5.022.016c sarvatrātikṛtaṃ bhadre
GE09ram_05_u:1279: 5.022.017a parituṣṭāsmi bhadraṃ te mānuṣas te kṛto vidhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1280: 5.022.017c mamāpi tu vacaḥ pathyaṃ bruvantyāḥ kuru maithili
GE09ram_05_u:1281: 5.022.018a rāvaṇaṃ bhaja bhartāraṃ bhartāraṃ sarvarakṣasām 5.022.018c vikrāntaṃ rūpavantaṃ ca sureśam iva vāsavam
GE09ram_05_u:1282: 5.022.019a dakṣiṇaṃ tyāgaśīlaṃ ca sarvasya priyavādinam 5.022.019c mānuṣaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ rāmaṃ tyaktvā rāvaṇam āśraya
GE09ram_05_u:1284: 5.022.020c adya prabhṛti sarveṣāṃ lokānām īśvarī bhava
GE09ram_05_u:1285: 5.022.020e agneḥ svāhā yathā devī śacīvendrasya śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:1286: 5.022.021a kiṃ te rāmeṇa vaidehi kṛpaṇena gatāyuṣā
GE09ram_05_u:1287: 5.022.022a etad uktaṃ ca me vākyaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:1288: 5.022.022c asmin muhūrte sarvās tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_05_u:1289: 5.022.023a anyā tu vikaṭā nāma lambamānapayodharā 5.022.023c abravīt kupitā sītāṃ muṣṭim udyamya garjatī
GE09ram_05_u:1291: 5.022.024c anukrośān mṛdutvāc ca soḍhāni tava maithili
GE09ram_05_u:1292: 5.022.024e na ca naḥ kuruṣe vākyaṃ hitaṃ kālapuraskṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:1293: 5.022.025a ānītāsi samudrasya pāram anyair durāsadam 5.022.025c rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ ghoraṃ praviṣṭā cāsi maithili 5.022.026a rāvaṇasya gṛhe rudhā asmābhis tu surakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:1294: 5.022.026c na tvāṃ śaktaḥ paritrātum api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1295: 5.022.027a kuruṣva hitavādinyā vacanaṃ mama maithili 5.022.027c alam aśruprapātena tyaja śokam anarthakam 5.022.028a bhaja prītiṃ praharṣaṃ ca tyajaitāṃ nityadainyatām
GE09ram_05_u:1296: 5.022.028c sīte rākṣasarājena saha krīḍa yathāsukham 5.022.029a jānāsi hi yathā bhīru strīṇāṃ yauvanam adhruvam
GE09ram_05_u:1297: 5.022.029c yāvan na te vyatikrāmet tāvat sukham avāpnuhi
GE09ram_05_u:1298: 5.022.030a udyānāni ca ramyāṇi parvatopavanāni ca 5.022.030c saha rākṣasarājena cara tvaṃ madirekṣaṇe 5.022.031a strīsahasrāṇi te sapta vaśe sthāsyanti sundari
GE09ram_05_u:1299: 5.022.031c rāvaṇaṃ bhaja bhartāraṃ bhartāraṃ sarvarakṣasām 5.022.032a utpāṭya vā te hṛdayaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi maithili
GE09ram_05_u:1300: 5.022.032c yadi me vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ na yathāvat kariṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:1301: 5.022.033a tataś caṇḍodarī nāma rākṣasī krūradarśanā 5.022.033c bhrāmayantī mahac chūlam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1303: 5.022.034c rāvaṇena hṛtāṃ dṛṣṭvā daurhṛdo me mahān abhūt
GE09ram_05_u:1304: 5.022.035a yakṛtplīham athotpīḍaṃ hṛdayaṃ ca sabandhanam 5.022.035c antrāṇy api tathā śīrṣaṃ khādeyam iti me matiḥ 5.022.036a tatas tu praghasā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1305: 5.022.036c kaṇṭham asyā nṛśaṃsāyāḥ pīḍayāmaḥ kim āsyate
GE09ram_05_u:1306: 5.022.037a nivedyatāṃ tato rājñe mānuṣī sā mṛteti ha
GE09ram_05_u:1307: 5.022.037c nātra kaś cana saṃdehaḥ khādateti sa vakṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1308: 5.022.038a tatas tv ajāmukhī nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1309: 5.022.038c viśasyemāṃ tataḥ sarvān samān kuruta pīlukān
GE09ram_05_u:1310: 5.022.039a vibhajāma tataḥ sarvā vivādo me na rocate
GE09ram_05_u:1311: 5.022.039c peyam ānīyatāṃ kṣipraṃ mālyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu
GE09ram_05_u:1312: 5.022.040a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā nāma rākṣasī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1313: 5.022.040c ajāmukhā yad uktaṃ hi tad eva mama rocate 5.022.041a surā cānīyatāṃ kṣipraṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1315: 5.022.042a evaṃ saṃbhartsyamānā sā sītā surasutopamā 5.022.042c rākṣasībhiḥ sughorābhir dhairyam utsṛjya roditi 5.023.001a tathā tāsāṃ vadantīnāṃ paruṣaṃ dāruṇaṃ bahu
GE09ram_05_u:1317: 5.023.002a evam uktā tu vaidehī rākṣasībhir manasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:1319: 5.023.003a na mānuṣī rākṣasasya bhāryā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:1320: 5.023.003c kāmaṃ khādata māṃ sarvā na kariṣyāmi vo vacaḥ 5.023.004a sā rākṣasī madhyagatā sītā surasutopamā 5.023.004c na śarma lebhe duḥkhārtā rāvaṇena ca tarjitā
GE09ram_05_u:1321: 5.023.005a vepate smādhikaṃ sītā viśantīvāṅgam ātmanaḥ 5.023.005c vane yūthaparibhraṣṭā mṛgī kokair ivārditā 5.023.006a sā tv aśokasya vipulāṃ śākhām ālambya puṣpitām
GE09ram_05_u:1322: 5.023.006c cintayām āsa śokena bhartāraṃ bhagnamānasā 5.023.007a sā snāpayantī vipulau stanau netrajalasravaiḥ 5.023.007c cintayantī na śokasya tadāntam adhigacchati 5.023.008a sā vepamānā patitā pravāte kadalī yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1324: 5.023.009a tasyā sā dīrghavipulā vepantyāḥ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_05_u:1325: 5.023.009c dadṛśe kampinī veṇī vyālīva parisarpatī 5.023.010a sā niḥśvasantī duḥkhārtā
GE09ram_05_u:1326: 5.023.010c ārtā vyasṛjad aśrūṇi maithilī vilalāpa ha
GE09ram_05_u:1327: 5.023.011a hā rāmeti ca duḥkhārtā punar hā lakṣmaṇeti ca 5.023.011c hā śvaśru mama kausalye hā sumitreti bhāvini
GE09ram_05_u:1328: 5.023.012a lokapravādaḥ satyo 'yaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ 5.023.012c akāle durlabho mṛtyuḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:1329: 5.023.013a yatrāham ābhiḥ krūrābhī rākṣasībhir ihārditā 5.023.013c jīvāmi hīnā rāmeṇa muhūrtam api duḥkhitā
GE09ram_05_u:1331: 5.023.014c samudramadhye nau pūrṇā vāyuvegair ivāhatā 5.023.015a bhartāraṃ tam apaśyantī rākṣasīvaśam āgatā 5.023.015c sīdāmi khalu śokena kūlaṃ toyahataṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1333: 5.023.016c dhanyāḥ paśyanti me nāthaṃ kṛtajñaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_05_u:1334: 5.023.017a sarvathā tena hīnāyā rāmeṇa viditātmanā 5.023.017c tīṣkṇaṃ viṣam ivāsvādya durlabhaṃ mama jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:1335: 5.023.018a kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā pāpaṃ purā dehāntare kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:1336: 5.023.018c yenedaṃ prāpyate duḥkhaṃ mayā ghoraṃ sudāruṇam
GE09ram_05_u:1337: 5.023.019a jīvitaṃ tyaktum icchāmi śokena mahatā vṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:1338: 5.023.019c rākṣasībhiś ca rakṣantyā rāmo nāsādyate mayā
GE09ram_05_u:1339: 5.023.020a dhig astu khalu mānuṣyaṃ dhig astu paravaśyatām
GE09ram_05_u:1340: 5.023.020c na śakyaṃ yat parityaktum ātmacchandena jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:1346: 5.024.003c rāvaṇena pramathyāham ānītā krośatī balāt 5.024.004a rākṣasī vaśam āpannā bhartyamānā sudāruṇam 5.024.004c cintayantī suduḥkhārtā nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe 5.024.005a na hi me jīvitenārtho naivārthair na ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ 5.024.005c vasantyā rākṣasī madhye vinā rāmaṃ mahāratham
GE09ram_05_u:1347: 5.024.006a dhiṅ mām anāryām asatīṃ yāhaṃ tena vinā kṛtā 5.024.006c muhūrtam api rakṣāmi jīvitaṃ pāpajīvitā 5.024.007a kā ca me jīvite śraddhā sukhe vā taṃ priyaṃ vinā
GE09ram_05_u:1348: 5.024.007c bhartāraṃ sāgarāntāyā vasudhāyāḥ priyaṃ vadam 5.024.008a bhidyatāṃ bhakṣyatāṃ vāpi śarīraṃ visṛjāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:1349: 5.024.008c na cāpy ahaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhaṃ saheyaṃ priyavarjitā
GE09ram_05_u:1350: 5.024.009a caraṇenāpi savyena na spṛśeyaṃ niśācaram 5.024.009c rāvaṇaṃ kiṃ punar ahaṃ kāmayeyaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1351: 5.024.010a pratyākhyātaṃ na jānāti nātmānaṃ nātmanaḥ kulam
GE09ram_05_u:1352: 5.024.010c yo nṛśaṃsa svabhāvena māṃ prārthayitum icchati
GE09ram_05_u:1353: 5.024.011a chinnā bhinnā vibhaktā vā dīpte vāgnau pradīpitā
GE09ram_05_u:1354: 5.024.011c rāvaṇaṃ nopatiṣṭheyaṃ kiṃ pralāpena vaś ciram
GE09ram_05_u:1355: 5.024.012a khyātaḥ prājñaḥ kṛtajñaś ca sānukrośaś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1358: 5.024.013c yenaikena nirastāni sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
GE09ram_05_u:1360: 5.024.014c samarthaḥ khalu me bhartā rāvaṇaṃ hantum āhave
GE09ram_05_u:1362: 5.024.015c raṇe rāmeṇa nihataḥ sa māṃ kiṃ nābhipadyate
GE09ram_05_u:1363: 5.024.016a kāmaṃ madhye samudrasya laṅkeyaṃ duṣpradharṣaṇā 5.024.016c na tu rāghavabāṇānāṃ gatirodhī ha vidyate
GE09ram_05_u:1364: 5.024.017a kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena rāmo dṛḍhaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1366: 5.024.018a ihasthāṃ māṃ na jānīte śaṅke lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1367: 5.024.018c jānann api hi tejasvī dharṣaṇāṃ marṣayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1370: 5.024.020a kṛtaṃ karma mahat tena māṃ tadābhyavapadyatā
GE09ram_05_u:1372: 5.024.021a yadi mām iha jānīyād vartamānāṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1373: 5.024.021c adya bāṇair abhikruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1374: 5.024.022a vidhamec ca purīṃ laṅkāṃ śoṣayec ca mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:1375: 5.024.022c rāvaṇasya ca nīcasya kīrtiṃ nāma ca nāśayet
GE09ram_05_u:1376: 5.024.023a tato nihatanathānāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ gṛhe gṛhe 5.024.023c yathāham evaṃ rudatī tathā bhūyo na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1377: 5.024.023e anviṣya rakṣasāṃ laṅkāṃ kuryād rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1378: 5.024.024a na hi tābhyāṃ ripur dṛṣṭo muhūtam api jīvati 5.024.024c citā dhūmākulapathā
GE09ram_05_u:1379: 5.024.024e acireṇa tu laṅkeyaṃ śmaśānasadṛśī bhavet 5.024.025a acireṇaiva kālena prāpsyāmy eva manoratham 5.024.025c duṣprasthāno 'yam ākhyāti sarveṣāṃ vo viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1380: 5.024.026a yādṛśāni tu dṛśyante laṅkāyām aśubhāni tu
GE09ram_05_u:1382: 5.024.027a nūnaṃ laṅkā hate pāpe rāvaṇe rākṣasādhipe
GE09ram_05_u:1383: 5.024.027c śoṣaṃ yāsyati durdharṣā pramadā vidhavā yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1385: 5.024.028c bhaviṣyati purī laṅkā naṣṭabhartrī yathāṅganā 5.024.029a nūnaṃ rākṣasakanyānāṃ rudantīnāṃ gṛhe gṛhe 5.024.029c śroṣyāmi nacirād eva duḥkhārtānām iha dhvanim
GE09ram_05_u:1387: 5.024.030c bhaviṣyati purī laṅkā nirdagdhā rāmasāyakaiḥ 5.024.031a yadi nāma sa śūro māṃ rāmo raktāntalocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1388: 5.024.031c jānīyād vartamānāṃ hi rāvaṇasya niveśane 5.024.032a anena tu nṛśaṃsena rāvaṇenādhamena me 5.024.032c samayo yas tu nirdiṣṭas tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1389: 5.024.033a akāryaṃ ye na jānanti nairṛtāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1390: 5.024.033c adharmāt tu mahotpāto bhaviṣyati hi sāmpratam
GE09ram_05_u:1391: 5.024.034a naite dharmaṃ vijānanti rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ 5.024.034c dhruvaṃ māṃ prātarāśārthe rākṣasaḥ kalpayiṣyati 5.024.035a sāhaṃ kathaṃ kariṣyāmi taṃ vinā priyadarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:1393: 5.024.036a yadi kaś cit pradātā me viṣasyādya bhaved iha 5.024.036c kṣipraṃ vaivasvataṃ devaṃ paśyeyaṃ patinā vinā
GE09ram_05_u:1394: 5.024.037a nājānāj jīvatīṃ rāmaḥ sa māṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1395: 5.024.037c jānantau tau na kuryātāṃ norvyāṃ hi mama mārgaṇam 5.024.038a nūnaṃ mamaiva śokena sa vīro lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1396: 5.024.038c devalokam ito yātas tyaktvā dehaṃ mahītale
GE09ram_05_u:1397: 5.024.039a dhanyā devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1398: 5.024.039c mama paśyanti ye nāthaṃ rāmaṃ rājīvalocanam
GE09ram_05_u:1399: 5.024.040a atha vā na hi tasyārthe dharmakāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1400: 5.024.040c mayā rāmasya rājarṣer bhāryayā paramātmanaḥ 5.024.041a dṛśyamāne bhavet prītaḥ sauhṛdaṃ nāsty apaśyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1401: 5.024.041c nāśayanti kṛtaghrās tu na rāmo nāśayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1402: 5.024.042a kiṃ nu me na guṇāḥ ke cit kiṃ vā bhāgya kṣayo hi me
GE09ram_05_u:1403: 5.024.042c yāhaṃ sītā varārheṇa hīnā rāmeṇa bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:1404: 5.024.043a śreyo me jīvitān martuṃ vihīnā yā mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:1406: 5.024.044a atha vā nyastaśastrau tau vane mūlaphalāśanau
GE09ram_05_u:1407: 5.024.044c bhrātarau hi nara śreṣṭhau carantau vanagocarau
GE09ram_05_u:1408: 5.024.045a atha vā rākṣasendreṇa rāvaṇena durātmanā 5.024.045c chadmanā ghātitau śūrau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau 5.024.046a sāham evaṃgate kāle martum icchāmi sarvathā
GE09ram_05_u:1409: 5.024.046c na ca me vihito mṛtyur asmin duḥkhe 'pi vartati
GE09ram_05_u:1410: 5.024.047a dhanyāḥ khalu mahātmāno munayaḥ satyasaṃmatāḥ 5.024.047c jitātmāno mahābhāgā yeṣāṃ na staḥ priyāpriye
GE09ram_05_u:1411: 5.024.048a priyān na saṃbhaved duḥkham apriyād adhikaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_05_u:1412: 5.024.048c tābhyāṃ hi ye viyujyante namas teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:1413: 5.024.049a sāhaṃ tyaktā priyeṇeha rāmeṇa viditātmanā 5.024.049c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi pāpasya rāvaṇasya gatā vaśam
GE09ram_05_u:1414: 5.025.001a ity uktāḥ sītayā ghoraṃ rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1415: 5.025.001c kāś cij jagmus tad ākhyātuṃ rāvaṇasya tarasvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1416: 5.025.002a tataḥ sītām upāgamya rākṣasyo ghoradarśanāḥ 5.025.002c punaḥ paruṣam ekārtham anarthārtham athābruvan 5.025.003a hantedānīṃ tavānārye sīte pāpaviniścaye
GE09ram_05_u:1417: 5.025.003c rākṣasyo bhakṣayiṣyanti māṃsam etad yathāsukham 5.025.004a sītāṃ tābhir anāryābhir dṛṣṭvā saṃtarjitāṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:1418: 5.025.004c rākṣasī trijaṭāvṛddhā śayānā vākyam abravīt 5.025.005a ātmānaṃ khādatānāryā na sītāṃ bhakṣayiṣyatha 5.025.005c janakasya sutām iṣṭāṃ snuṣāṃ daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1419: 5.025.006a svapno hy adya mayā dṛṣṭo dāruṇo romaharṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1420: 5.025.006c rākṣasānām abhāvāya bhartur asyā bhavāya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1421: 5.025.007a evam uktās trijaṭayā rākṣasyaḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ 5.025.007c sarvā evābruvan bhītās trijaṭāṃ tām idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1422: 5.025.008a kathayasva tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne 'yaṃ kīdṛśo niśi 5.025.009a tāsāṃ śrutvā tu vacanaṃ rākṣasīnāṃ mukhodgatam
GE09ram_05_u:1425: 5.025.010c yuktāṃ vājisahasreṇa svayam āsthāya rāghavaḥ 5.025.011a svapne cādya mayā dṛṣṭā sītā śuklāmbarāvṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:1427: 5.025.011e rāmeṇa saṃgatā sītā bhāskareṇa prabhā yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1428: 5.025.012a rāghavaś ca mayā dṛṣṭaś caturdantaṃ mahāgajam
GE09ram_05_u:1430: 5.025.013a tatas tau naraśārdūlau dīpyamānau svatejasā 5.025.013c śuklamālyāmbaradharau jānakīṃ paryupasthitau
GE09ram_05_u:1431: 5.025.014a tatas tasya nagasyāgre ākāśasthasya dantinaḥ 5.025.014c bhartrā parigṛhītasya jānakī skandham āśritā 5.025.015a bhartur aṅkāt samutpatya tataḥ kamalalocanā 5.025.015c candrasūryau mayā dṛṣṭā pāṇibhyāṃ parimārjatī 5.025.016a tatas tābhyāṃ kumārābhyām āsthitaḥ sa gajottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1432: 5.025.016c sītayā ca viśālākṣyā laṅkāyā upari sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1435: 5.025.017e lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_05_u:1436: 5.025.018a vimānāt puṣpakād adya rāvaṇaḥ patito bhuvi
GE09ram_05_u:1437: 5.025.018c kṛṣyapāṇaḥ striyā dṛṣṭo muṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇāmbaraḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1439: 5.025.019c prayāto dakṣiṇām āśāṃ praviṣṭaḥ kardamaṃ hradam
GE09ram_05_u:1440: 5.025.020a kaṇṭhe baddhvā daśagrīvaṃ pramadā raktavāsinī 5.025.020c kālī kardamaliptāṅgī diśaṃ yāmyāṃ prakarṣati 5.025.021a varāheṇa daśagrīvaḥ śiṃśumāreṇa cendrajit
GE09ram_05_u:1441: 5.025.021c uṣṭreṇa kumbhakarṇaś ca prayāto dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_05_u:1442: 5.025.022a samājaś ca mahān vṛtto gītavāditraniḥsvanaḥ 5.025.022c pibatāṃ raktamālyānāṃ rakṣasāṃ raktavāsasām
GE09ram_05_u:1443: 5.025.023a laṅkā ceyaṃ purī ramyā savājirathasaṃkulā 5.025.023c sāgare patitā dṛṣṭā bhagnagopuratoraṇā
GE09ram_05_u:1444: 5.025.024a pītva tailaṃ pranṛttāś ca prahasantyo mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1447: 5.025.025c raktaṃ nivasanaṃ gṛhya praviṣṭā gomayahrade 5.025.026a apagacchata naśyadhvaṃ sītām āpnoti rāghavaḥ 5.025.026c ghātayet paramāmarṣī sarvaiḥ sārdhaṃ hi rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1448: 5.025.027a priyāṃ bahumatāṃ bhāryāṃ vanavāsam anuvratām 5.025.027c bhartsitāṃ tarjitāṃ vāpi nānumaṃsyati rāghavaḥ 5.025.028a tad alaṃ krūravākyair vaḥ sāntvam evābhidhīyatām
GE09ram_05_u:1449: 5.025.028c abhiyācāma vaidehīm etad dhi mama rocate
GE09ram_05_u:1450: 5.025.029a yasyā hy evaṃ vidhaḥ svapno duḥkhitāyāḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:1451: 5.025.029c sā duḥkhair bahubhir muktā priyaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
GE09ram_05_u:1452: 5.025.030a bhartsitām api yācadhvaṃ rākṣasyaḥ kiṃ vivakṣayā
GE09ram_05_u:1453: 5.025.030c rāghavād dhi bhayaṃ ghoraṃ rākṣasānām upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:1454: 5.025.031a praṇipāta prasannā hi maithilī janakātmajā 5.025.031c alam eṣā paritrātuṃ rākṣasyo mahato bhayāt
GE09ram_05_u:1455: 5.025.032a api cāsyā viśālākṣyā na kiṃ cid upalakṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:1456: 5.025.032c viruddham api cāṅgeṣu susūkṣmam api lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:1457: 5.025.033a chāyā vaiguṇya mātraṃ tu śaṅke duḥkham upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:1458: 5.025.033c aduḥkhārhām imāṃ devīṃ vaihāyasam upasthitām 5.025.034a arthasiddhiṃ tu vaidehyāḥ paśyāmy aham upasthitām
GE09ram_05_u:1459: 5.025.034c rākṣasendravināśaṃ ca vijayaṃ rāghavasya ca 5.025.035a nimittabhūtam etat tu śrotum asyā mahat priyam
GE09ram_05_u:1460: 5.025.035c dṛśyate ca sphurac cakṣuḥ padmapatram ivāyatam
GE09ram_05_u:1461: 5.025.036a īṣac ca hṛṣito vāsyā dakṣiṇāyā hy adakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1462: 5.025.036c akasmād eva vaidehyā bāhur ekaḥ prakampate
GE09ram_05_u:1464: 5.025.037c vepan sūcayatīvāsyā rāghavaṃ purataḥ sthitam 5.025.038a pakṣī ca śākhā nilayaṃ praviṣṭaḥ; punaḥ punaś cottamasāntvavādī
GE09ram_05_u:1465: 5.025.038c sukhāgatāṃ vācam udīrayāṇaḥ; punaḥ punaś codayatīva hṛṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1466: 5.026.001a sā rākṣasendrasya vaco niśamya; tad rāvaṇasyāpriyam apriyārtā
GE09ram_05_u:1467: 5.026.001c sītā vitatrāsa yathā vanānte; siṃhābhipannā gajarājakanyā 5.026.002a sā rākṣasī madhyagatā ca bhīrur; vāgbhir bhṛśaṃ rāvaṇatarjitā
GE09ram_05_u:1469: 5.026.002c kāntāramadhye vijane visṛṣṭā; bāleva kanyā vilalāpa sītā
GE09ram_05_u:1470: 5.026.003a satyaṃ batedaṃ pravadanti loke; nākālamṛtyur bhavatīti santaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1471: 5.026.003c yatrāham evaṃ paribhartsyamānā; jīvāmi kiṃ cit kṣaṇam apy apuṇyā
GE09ram_05_u:1472: 5.026.004a sukhād vihīnaṃ bahuduḥkhapūrṇam; idaṃ tu nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ sthiraṃ me
GE09ram_05_u:1473: 5.026.004c vidīryate yan na sahasradhādya; vajrāhataṃ śṛṅgam ivācalasya
GE09ram_05_u:1474: 5.026.005a naivāsti nūnaṃ mama doṣam atra; vadhyāham asyāpriyadarśanasya 5.026.005c bhāvaṃ na cāsyāham anupradātum; alaṃ dvijo mantram ivādvijāya
GE09ram_05_u:1475: 5.026.006a nūnaṃ mamāṅgāny acirād anāryaḥ; śastraiḥ śitaiś chetsyati
GE09ram_05_u:1477: 5.026.006c tasminn anāgacchati lokanāthe; garbhasthajantor iva śalyakṛntaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1478: 5.026.007a duḥkhaṃ batedaṃ mama duḥkhitāyā; māsau cirāyābhigamiṣyato dvau
GE09ram_05_u:1479: 5.026.007c baddhasya vadhyasya yathā niśānte; rājāparādhād iva taskarasya
GE09ram_05_u:1480: 5.026.008a hā rāma hā lakṣmaṇa hā sumitre; hā rāma mātaḥ saha me jananyā
GE09ram_05_u:1481: 5.026.008c eṣā vipadyāmy aham alpabhāgyā; mahārṇave naur iva mūḍha vātā 5.026.009a tarasvinau dhārayatā mṛgasya; sattvena rūpaṃ manujendraputrau
GE09ram_05_u:1482: 5.026.009c nūnaṃ viśastau mama kāraṇāt tau; siṃharṣabhau dvāv iva
GE09ram_05_u:1484: 5.026.010a nūnaṃ sa kālo mṛgarūpadhārī; mām alpabhāgyāṃ lulubhe tadānīm
GE09ram_05_u:1485: 5.026.010c yatrāryaputraṃ visasarja mūḍhā; rāmānujaṃ lakṣmaṇapūrvakaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:1486: 5.026.011a hā rāma satyavrata dīrghavāho; hā pūrṇacandrapratimānavaktra 5.026.011c hā jīvalokasya hitaḥ priyaś ca; vadhyāṃ na māṃ vetsi hi rākṣasānām
GE09ram_05_u:1487: 5.026.012a ananyadevatvam iyaṃ kṣamā ca; bhūmau ca śayyā niyamaś ca dharme
GE09ram_05_u:1488: 5.026.012c pativratātvaṃ viphalaṃ mamedaṃ; kṛtaṃ kṛtaghneṣv iva mānuṣāṇām
GE09ram_05_u:1489: 5.026.013a mogho hi dharmaś carito mamāyaṃ; tathaikapatnītvam idaṃ nirartham
GE09ram_05_u:1490: 5.026.013c yā tvāṃ na paśyāmi kṛśā vivarṇā; hīnā tvayā saṃgamane nirāśā
GE09ram_05_u:1491: 5.026.014a pitur nirdeśaṃ niyamena kṛtvā; vanān nivṛttaś caritavrataś ca
GE09ram_05_u:1492: 5.026.014c strībhis tu manye vipulekṣaṇābhiḥ; saṃraṃsyase vītabhayaḥ kṛtārthaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1493: 5.026.015a ahaṃ tu rāma tvayi jātakāmā; ciraṃ vināśāya nibaddhabhāvā
GE09ram_05_u:1494: 5.026.015c moghaṃ caritvātha tapovrataṃ ca; tyakṣyāmi dhig jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:1496: 5.026.016a sā jīvitaṃ kṣipram ahaṃ tyajeyaṃ; viṣeṇa śastreṇa śitena vāpi
GE09ram_05_u:1497: 5.026.016c viṣasya dātā na tu me 'sti kaś cic; chastrasya vā veśmani
GE09ram_05_u:1499: 5.026.017a śokābhitaptā bahudhā vicintya; sītātha veṇyudgrathanaṃ gṛhītvā
GE09ram_05_u:1500: 5.026.017c udbadhya veṇyudgrathanena śīghram; ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi yamasya mūlam
GE09ram_05_u:1501: 5.026.018a itīva sītā bahudhā vilapya; sarvātmanā rāmam anusmarantī
GE09ram_05_u:1503: 5.026.019a upasthitā sā mṛdur sarvagātrī; śākhāṃ gṛhītvātha nagasya tasya
GE09ram_05_u:1504: 5.026.019c tasyās tu rāmaṃ pravicintayantyā; rāmānujaṃ svaṃ ca kulaṃ śubhāṅgyāḥ 5.026.020a śokānimittāni tadā bahūni; dhairyārjitāni pravarāṇi loke
GE09ram_05_u:1505: 5.026.020c prādurnimittāni tadā babhūvuḥ; purāpi siddhāny upalakṣitāni
GE09ram_05_u:1506: 5.027.001a tathāgatāṃ tāṃ vyathitām aninditāṃ; vyapetaharṣāṃ paridīnamānasām 5.027.001c śubhāṃ nimittāni śubhāni bhejire; naraṃ śriyā juṣṭam
GE09ram_05_u:1508: 5.027.002a tasyāḥ śubhaṃ vāmam arālapakṣma; rājīvṛtaṃ kṛṣṇaviśālaśuklam 5.027.002c prāspandataikaṃ nayanaṃ sukeśyā; mīnāhataṃ padmam ivābhitāmram
GE09ram_05_u:1509: 5.027.003a bhujaś ca cārvañcitapīnavṛttaḥ; parārdhya kālāgurucandanārhaḥ 5.027.003c anuttamenādhyuṣitaḥ priyeṇa; cireṇa vāmaḥ samavepatāśu
GE09ram_05_u:1510: 5.027.004a gajendrahastapratimaś ca pīnas; tayor dvayoḥ saṃhatayoḥ sujātaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1511: 5.027.004c praspandamānaḥ punar ūrur asyā; rāmaṃ purastāt sthitam ācacakṣe
GE09ram_05_u:1512: 5.027.005a śubhaṃ punar hemasamānavarṇam; īṣadrajodhvastam ivāmalākṣyāḥ 5.027.005c vāsaḥ sthitāyāḥ śikharāgradantyāḥ; kiṃ cit parisraṃsata
GE09ram_05_u:1514: 5.027.006a etair nimittair aparaiś ca subhrūḥ; saṃbodhitā prāg api
GE09ram_05_u:1516: 5.027.006c vātātapaklāntam iva pranaṣṭaṃ; varṣeṇa bījaṃ pratisaṃjaharṣa
GE09ram_05_u:1517: 5.027.007a tasyāḥ punar bimbaphalopamauṣṭhaṃ; svakṣibhrukeśāntam arālapakṣma 5.027.007c vaktraṃ babhāse sitaśukladaṃṣṭraṃ; rāhor mukhāc candra iva pramuktaḥ 5.027.008a sā vītaśokā vyapanītatandrī; śāntajvarā harṣavibuddhasattvā 5.027.008c aśobhatāryā vadanena śukle; śītānśunā rātrir ivoditena
GE09ram_05_u:1518: 5.028.001a hanumān api vikrāntaḥ sarvaṃ śuśrāva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1519: 5.028.001c sītāyās trijaṭāyāś ca rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjanam
GE09ram_05_u:1520: 5.028.002a avekṣamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ devatām iva nandane
GE09ram_05_u:1521: 5.028.002c tato bahuvidhāṃ cintāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1522: 5.028.003a yāṃ kapīnāṃ sahasrāṇi subahūny ayutāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:1523: 5.028.003c dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante seyam āsāditā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:1524: 5.028.004a cāreṇa tu suyuktena śatroḥ śaktim avekṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:1525: 5.028.004c gūḍhena caratā tāvad avekṣitam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_05_u:1526: 5.028.005a rākṣasānāṃ viśeṣaś ca purī ceyam avekṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:1527: 5.028.005c rākṣasādhipater asya prabhāvo rāvaṇasya ca 5.028.006a yuktaṃ tasyāprameyasya
GE09ram_05_u:1530: 5.028.007c adṛṣṭaduḥkhāṃ duḥkhasya na hy antam adhigacchatīm
GE09ram_05_u:1531: 5.028.008a yadi hy aham imāṃ devīṃ śokopahatacetanām
GE09ram_05_u:1532: 5.028.008c anāśvāsya gamiṣyāmi doṣavad gamanaṃ bhavet 5.028.009a gate hi mayi tatreyaṃ rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:1533: 5.028.009c paritrāṇam avindantī jānakī jīvitaṃ tyajet 5.028.010a mayā ca sa mahābāhuḥ pūrṇacandranibhānanaḥ 5.028.010c samāśvāsayituṃ nyāyyaḥ sītādarśanalālasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1535: 5.028.011c kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyam idaṃ kṛcchra gato hy aham
GE09ram_05_u:1536: 5.028.012a anena rātriśeṣeṇa yadi nāśvāsyate mayā 5.028.012c sarvathā nāsti saṃdehaḥ parityakṣyati jīvitam 5.028.013a rāmaś ca yadi pṛcchen māṃ kiṃ māṃ sītābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1537: 5.028.013c kim ahaṃ taṃ pratibrūyām asaṃbhāṣya sumadhyamām
GE09ram_05_u:1538: 5.028.014a sītāsaṃdeśarahitaṃ mām itas tvarayā gatam 5.028.014c nirdahed api kākutsthaḥ kruddhas tīvreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_05_u:1539: 5.028.015a yadi ced yojayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ rāmakāraṇāt 5.028.015c vyartham āgamanaṃ tasya sasainyasya bhaviṣyati 5.028.016a antaraṃ tv aham āsādya rākṣasīnām iha sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1541: 5.028.017a ahaṃ hy atitanuś caiva vanaraś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1542: 5.028.017c vācaṃ codāhariṣyāmi mānuṣīm iha saṃskṛtām 5.028.018a yadi vācaṃ pradāsyāmi dvijātir iva saṃskṛtām
GE09ram_05_u:1543: 5.028.018c rāvaṇaṃ manyamānā māṃ sītā bhītā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1544: 5.028.019a avaśyam eva vaktavyaṃ mānuṣaṃ vākyam arthavat
GE09ram_05_u:1545: 5.028.019c mayā sāntvayituṃ śakyā nānyatheyam aninditā 5.028.020a seyam ālokya me rūpaṃ jānakī bhāṣitaṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:1546: 5.028.020c rakṣobhis trāsitā pūrvaṃ bhūyas trāsaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1547: 5.028.021a tato jātaparitrāsā śabdaṃ kuryān manasvinī 5.028.021c jānamānā viśālākṣī rāvaṇaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1548: 5.028.022a sītayā ca kṛte śabde sahasā rākṣasīgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1550: 5.028.023a tato māṃ saṃparikṣipya sarvato vikṛtānanāḥ 5.028.023c vadhe ca grahaṇe caiva kuryur yatnaṃ yathābalam
GE09ram_05_u:1551: 5.028.024a taṃ māṃ śākhāḥ praśākhāś ca skandhāṃś cottamaśākhinām
GE09ram_05_u:1553: 5.028.025a mama rūpaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vanaṃ vicarato mahat
GE09ram_05_u:1555: 5.028.026a tataḥ kuryuḥ samāhvānaṃ rākṣasyo rakṣasām api
GE09ram_05_u:1558: 5.028.028a saṃkruddhas tais tu parito vidhaman rakṣasāṃ balam
GE09ram_05_u:1559: 5.028.028c śaknuyaṃ na tu saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1560: 5.028.029a māṃ vā gṛhṇīyur āplutya bahavaḥ śīghrakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1561: 5.028.029c syād iyaṃ cāgṛhītārthā mama ca grahaṇaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:1562: 5.028.030a hiṃsābhirucayo hiṃsyur imāṃ vā janakātmajām 5.028.030c vipannaṃ syāt tataḥ kāryaṃ rāmasugrīvayor idam
GE09ram_05_u:1563: 5.028.031a uddeśe naṣṭamārge 'smin rākṣasaiḥ parivārite 5.028.031c sāgareṇa parikṣipte gupte vasati jānakī 5.028.032a viśaste vā gṛhīte vā rakṣobhir mayi saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:1564: 5.028.032c nānyaṃ paśyāmi rāmasya sahāyaṃ kāryasādhane 5.028.033a vimṛśaṃś ca na paśyāmi yo hate mayi vānaraḥ 5.028.033c śatayojanavistīrṇaṃ laṅghayeta mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:1565: 5.028.034a kāmaṃ hantuṃ samartho 'smi sahasrāṇy api rakṣasām
GE09ram_05_u:1566: 5.028.034c na tu śakṣyāmi saṃprāptuṃ paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadheḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1567: 5.028.035a asatyāni ca yuddhāni saṃśayo me na rocate
GE09ram_05_u:1568: 5.028.035c kaś ca niḥsaṃśayaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāt prājñaḥ sasaṃśayam
GE09ram_05_u:1569: 5.028.036a eṣa doṣo mahān hi syān mama sītābhibhāṣaṇe
GE09ram_05_u:1570: 5.028.036c prāṇatyāgaś ca vaidehyā bhaved anabhibhāṣaṇe 5.028.037a bhūtāś cārthā vinaśyanti
GE09ram_05_u:1571: 5.028.037c viklavaṃ dūtam āsādya tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1572: 5.028.038a arthānarthāntare buddhir niścitāpi na śobhate 5.028.038c ghātayanti hi kāryāṇi dūtāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ 5.028.039a na vinaśyet kathaṃ kāryaṃ vaiklavyaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet 5.028.039c laṅghanaṃ ca samudrasya kathaṃ nu na vṛthā bhavet 5.028.040a kathaṃ nu khalu vākyaṃ me śṛṇuyān nodvijeta ca 5.028.040c iti saṃcintya hanumāṃś cakāra matimān matim
GE09ram_05_u:1577: 5.028.043a śrāvayiṣyāmi sarvāṇi madhurāṃ prabruvan giram 5.028.043c śraddhāsyati yathā hīyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ samādadhe
GE09ram_05_u:1578: 5.028.044a iti sa bahuvidhaṃ mahānubhāvo; jagatipateḥ pramadām avekṣamāṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1579: 5.028.044c madhuram avitathaṃ jagāda vākyaṃ; drumaviṭapāntaram āsthito hanūmān
GE09ram_05_u:1580: 5.029.001a evaṃ bahuvidhāṃ cintāṃ cintayitva mahākapiḥ 5.029.001c saṃśrave madhuraṃ vākyaṃ vaidehyā vyājahāra ha
GE09ram_05_u:1582: 5.029.002c puṇyaśīlo mahākīrtir ṛjur āsīn mahāyaśāḥ 5.029.002e cakravartikule jātaḥ puraṃdarasamo
GE09ram_05_u:1586: 5.029.004c pṛthivyāṃ caturantayāṃ viśrutaḥ sukhadaḥ sukhī 5.029.005a tasya putraḥ priyo jyeṣṭhas tārādhipanibhānanaḥ 5.029.005c rāmo nāma viśeṣajñaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvadhanuṣmatām 5.029.006a rakṣitā svasya vṛttasya svajanasyāpi rakṣitā 5.029.006c rakṣitā jīvalokasya dharmasya ca paraṃtapaḥ 5.029.007a tasya satyābhisaṃdhasya vṛddhasya vacanāt pituḥ 5.029.007c sabhāryaḥ saha ca bhrātrā vīraḥ pravrajito vanam
GE09ram_05_u:1587: 5.029.008a tena tatra mahāraṇye mṛgayāṃ paridhāvatā 5.029.008c janasthānavadhaṃ śrutvā hatau ca kharadūṣaṇau 5.029.008e tatas tv amarṣāpahṛtā jānakī rāvaṇena tu
GE09ram_05_u:1589: 5.029.009c aśrauṣaṃ rāghavasyāhaṃ seyam āsāditā mayā 5.029.010a virarāmaivam uktvāsau vācaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1590: 5.029.010c jānakī cāpi tac chrutvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatā
GE09ram_05_u:1591: 5.029.011a tataḥ sā vakrakeśāntā sukeśī keśasaṃvṛtam 5.029.011c unnamya vadanaṃ bhīruḥ śiṃśapāvṛkṣam aikṣata 5.029.012a sā tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca tathāpy adhastān; nirīkṣamāṇā tam acintya
GE09ram_05_u:1593: 5.029.012c dadarśa piṅgādhipater amātyaṃ; vātātmajaṃ sūryam ivodayastham
GE09ram_05_u:1594: 5.030.001a tataḥ śākhāntare līnaṃ dṛṣṭvā calitamānasā 5.030.001c sā dadarśa kapiṃ tatra praśritaṃ priyavādinam
GE09ram_05_u:1595: 5.030.002a sā tu dṛṣṭvā hariśreṣṭhaṃ vinītavad upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:1596: 5.030.002c maithilī cintayām āsa svapno 'yam iti bhāminī 5.030.003a sā taṃ samīkṣyaiva bhṛśaṃ visaṃjñā; gatāsukalpeva babhūva sītā
GE09ram_05_u:1597: 5.030.003c cireṇa saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya caiva; vicintayām āsa viśālanetrā
GE09ram_05_u:1598: 5.030.004a svapno mayāyaṃ vikṛto 'dya dṛṣṭaḥ; śākhāmṛgaḥ śāstragaṇair niṣiddhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1599: 5.030.004c svasty astu rāmāya salakṣmaṇāya; tathā pitur me janakasya rājñaḥ 5.030.005a svapno 'pi nāyaṃ na hi me 'sti nidrā; śokena duḥkhena ca
GE09ram_05_u:1601: 5.030.005c sukhaṃ hi me nāsti yato 'smi hīnā; tenendupūrṇapratimānanena
GE09ram_05_u:1602: 5.030.006a ahaṃ hi tasyādya mano bhavena; saṃpīḍitā tad gatasarvabhāvā
GE09ram_05_u:1603: 5.030.006c vicintayantī satataṃ tam eva; tathaiva paśyāmi tathā śṛṇomi
GE09ram_05_u:1604: 5.030.007a manorathaḥ syād iti cintayāmi; tathāpi buddhyā ca vitarkayāmi
GE09ram_05_u:1605: 5.030.007c kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya hi nāsti rūpaṃ; suvyaktarūpaś ca vadaty ayaṃ mām 5.030.008a namo 'stu vācaspataye savajriṇe; svayambhuve caiva hutāśanāya
GE09ram_05_u:1606: 5.030.008c anena coktaṃ yad idaṃ mamāgrato; vanaukasā tac ca tathāstu nānyathā 5.031.001a tām abravīn mahātejā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.031.001c śirasy añjalim ādhāya sītāṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_05_u:1608: 5.031.002c drumasya śākhām ālambya tiṣṭhasi tvam aninditā
GE09ram_05_u:1609: 5.031.003a kimarthaṃ tava netrābhyāṃ vāri sravati śokajam
GE09ram_05_u:1612: 5.031.004c yakṣāṇāṃ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca kā tvaṃ bhavasi śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:1613: 5.031.005a kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā varānane
GE09ram_05_u:1614: 5.031.005c vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
GE09ram_05_u:1615: 5.031.006a kiṃ nu candramasā hīnā patitā vibudhālayāt
GE09ram_05_u:1616: 5.031.006c rohiṇī jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭhā śreṣṭhā sarvaguṇānvitā 5.031.007a kopād vā yadi vā mohād bhartāram asitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:1617: 5.031.007c vasiṣṭhaṃ kopayitvā tvaṃ nāsi kalyāṇy arundhatī
GE09ram_05_u:1618: 5.031.008a ko nau putraḥ pitā bhrāta bhartā vā te sumadhyame
GE09ram_05_u:1619: 5.031.008c asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ gataṃ tvam anuśocasi
GE09ram_05_u:1620: 5.031.009a vyañjanāni hi te yāni lakṣaṇāni ca lakṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:1621: 5.031.009c mahiṣī bhūmipālasya rājakanyāsi me matā 5.031.010a rāvaṇena janasthānād balād apahṛtā yadi 5.031.010c sītā tvam asi bhadraṃ te tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ 5.031.011a sā tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmakīrtanaharṣitā 5.031.011c uvāca vākyaṃ vaidehī hanūmantaṃ drumāśritam 5.031.012a duhitā janakasyāhaṃ vaidehasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1622: 5.031.012c sītā ca nāma nāmnāhaṃ bhāryā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1623: 5.031.013a samā dvādaśa tatrāhaṃ rāghavasya niveśane 5.031.013c bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān
GE09ram_05_u:1627: 5.031.015c kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ devī vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1628: 5.031.016a na pibeyaṃ na khādeyaṃ pratyahaṃ mama bhojanam
GE09ram_05_u:1629: 5.031.016c eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
GE09ram_05_u:1630: 5.031.017a yat tad uktaṃ tvayā vākyaṃ prītyā nṛpatisattama
GE09ram_05_u:1631: 5.031.017c tac cen na vitathaṃ kāryaṃ vanaṃ gacchatu rāghavaḥ 5.031.018a sa rājā satyavāg devyā varadānam anusmaran
GE09ram_05_u:1632: 5.031.018c mumoha vacanaṃ śrutvā kaikeyyāḥ krūram apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:1633: 5.031.019a tatas tu sthaviro rājā satyadharme vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1634: 5.031.019c jyeṣṭhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ putraṃ rudan rājyam ayācata
GE09ram_05_u:1635: 5.031.020a sa pitur vacanaṃ śrīmān abhiṣekāt paraṃ priyam
GE09ram_05_u:1636: 5.031.020c manasā pūrvam āsādya vācā pratigṛhītavān 5.031.021a dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyān na brūyat kiṃ cid apriyam 5.031.021c api jīvitahetor hi rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 5.031.022a sa vihāyottarīyāṇi mahārhāṇi mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1637: 5.031.022c visṛjya manasā rājyaṃ jananyai māṃ samādiśat
GE09ram_05_u:1638: 5.031.023a sāhaṃ tasyāgratas tūrṇaṃ prasthitā vanacāriṇī 5.031.023c na hi me tena hīnāyā vāsaḥ svarge 'pi rocate
GE09ram_05_u:1639: 5.031.024a prāg eva tu mahābhāgaḥ saumitrir mitranandanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1641: 5.031.025a te vayaṃ bhartur ādeśaṃ bahu mānyadṛḍhavratāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1642: 5.031.025c praviṣṭāḥ sma purād dṛṣṭaṃ vanaṃ gambhīradarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:1645: 5.031.027a dvau māsau tena me kālo jīvitānugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1646: 5.031.027c ūrdhvaṃ dvābhyāṃ tu māsābhyāṃ tatas tyakṣyāmi jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:1647: 5.032.001a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā hanūmān hariyūthapaḥ 5.032.001c duḥkhād duḥkhābhibhūtāyāḥ sāntam uttaram abravīt 5.032.002a ahaṃ rāmasya saṃdeśād devi dūtas tavāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1648: 5.032.002c vaidehi kuśalī rāmas tvāṃ ca kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1649: 5.032.003a yo brāhmam astraṃ vedāṃś ca veda vedavidāṃ varaḥ 5.032.003c sa tvāṃ dāśarathī rāmo devi kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1650: 5.032.004a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahātejā bhartus te 'nucaraḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1652: 5.032.005a sā tayoḥ kuśalaṃ devī niśamya narasiṃhayoḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1654: 5.032.006a kalyāṇī bata gatheyaṃ laukikī pratibhāti me
GE09ram_05_u:1655: 5.032.006c ehi jīvantam ānado naraṃ varṣaśatād api
GE09ram_05_u:1656: 5.032.007a tayoḥ samāgame tasmin prītir utpāditādbhutā 5.032.007c paraspareṇa cālāpaṃ viśvastau tau pracakratuḥ 5.032.008a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā hanūmān hariyūthapaḥ 5.032.008c sītāyāḥ śokadīnāyāḥ samīpam upacakrame
GE09ram_05_u:1657: 5.032.009a yathā yathā samīpaṃ sa hanūmān upasarpati
GE09ram_05_u:1658: 5.032.009c tathā tathā rāvaṇaṃ sā taṃ sītā pariśaṅkate
GE09ram_05_u:1659: 5.032.010a aho dhig dhik kṛtam idaṃ kathitaṃ hi yad asya me
GE09ram_05_u:1660: 5.032.010c rūpāntaram upāgamya sa evāyaṃ hi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1661: 5.032.011a tām aśokasya śākhāṃ sā vimuktvā śokakarśitā
GE09ram_05_u:1663: 5.032.012a avandata mahābāhus tatas tāṃ janakātmajām 5.032.012c sā cainaṃ bhayavitrastā bhūyo naivābhyudaikṣata 5.032.013a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vandamānaṃ tu sītā śaśinibhānanā
GE09ram_05_u:1664: 5.032.013c abravīd dīrgham ucchvasya vānaraṃ madhurasvarā 5.032.014a māyāṃ praviṣṭo māyāvī yadi tvaṃ rāvaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_05_u:1665: 5.032.014c utpādayasi me bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
GE09ram_05_u:1666: 5.032.015a svaṃ parityajya rūpaṃ yaḥ parivrājakarūpadhṛt 5.032.015c janasthāne mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ sa evāsi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1668: 5.032.016c saṃtāpayasi māṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tan na śobhanam
GE09ram_05_u:1669: 5.032.017a yadi rāmasya dūtas tvam āgato bhadram astu te 5.032.017c pṛcchāmi tvāṃ hariśreṣṭha priyā rāma kathā hi me 5.032.018a guṇān rāmasya kathaya priyasya mama vānara
GE09ram_05_u:1670: 5.032.018c cittaṃ harasi me saumya nadīkūlaṃ yathā rayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1671: 5.032.019a aho svapnasya sukhatā yāham evaṃ cirāhṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:1672: 5.032.019c preṣitaṃ nāma paśyāmi rāghaveṇa vanaukasaṃ 5.032.020a svapne 'pi yady ahaṃ vīraṃ rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam 5.032.020c paśyeyaṃ nāvasīdeyaṃ svapno 'pi mama matsarī 5.032.021a nāhaṃ svapnam imaṃ manye svapne dṛṣṭvā hi vānaram 5.032.021c na śakyo 'bhyudayaḥ prāptuṃ prāptaś cābhyudayo mama
GE09ram_05_u:1673: 5.032.022a kiṃ nu syāc cittamoho 'yaṃ bhaved vātagatis tv iyam
GE09ram_05_u:1674: 5.032.022c unmādajo vikāro vā syād iyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikā
GE09ram_05_u:1675: 5.032.023a atha vā nāyam unmādo moho 'py unmādalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1676: 5.032.023c saṃbudhye cāham ātmānam imaṃ cāpi vanaukasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1677: 5.032.024a ity evaṃ bahudhā sītā saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_05_u:1678: 5.032.024c rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpatvān mene taṃ rākṣasādhipam 5.032.025a etāṃ buddhiṃ tadā kṛtvā sītā sā tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_05_u:1680: 5.032.026a sītāyāś cintitaṃ buddhvā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.032.026c śrotrānukūlair vacanais tadā tāṃ saṃpraharṣayat 5.032.027a āditya iva tejasvī lokakāntaḥ śaśī yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1681: 5.032.027c rājā sarvasya lokasya devo vaiśravaṇo yathā
GE09ram_05_u:1682: 5.032.028a vikrameṇopapannaś ca yathā viṣṇur mahāyaśāḥ 5.032.028c satyavādī madhuravāg devo vācaspatir yathā 5.032.029a rūpavān subhagaḥ śrīmān kandarpa iva mūrtimān
GE09ram_05_u:1683: 5.032.029c sthānakrodhaprahartā ca śreṣṭho loke mahārathaḥ 5.032.029e bāhucchāyām avaṣṭabdho yasya loko mahātmanaḥ 5.032.030a apakṛṣyāśramapadān mṛgarūpeṇa rāghavam
GE09ram_05_u:1684: 5.032.030c śūnye yenāpanītāsi tasya drakṣyasi yat phalam
GE09ram_05_u:1685: 5.032.031a nacirād rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye yo vadhiṣyati vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:1686: 5.032.031c roṣapramuktair iṣubhir jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ 5.032.032a tenāhaṃ preṣito dūtas tvatsakāśam ihāgataḥ 5.032.032c tvadviyogena duḥkhārtaḥ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1688: 5.032.033c abhivādya mahābāhuḥ so 'pi kauśalam abravīt 5.032.034a rāmasya ca sakhā devi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1689: 5.032.034c rājā vānaramukhyānāṃ sa tvāṃ kauśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1690: 5.032.035a nityaṃ smarati rāmas tvāṃ sasugrīvaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1691: 5.032.035c diṣṭyā jīvasi vaidehi rākṣasī vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_05_u:1692: 5.032.036a nacirād drakṣyase rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_05_u:1694: 5.032.037a ahaṃ sugrīvasacivo hanūmān nāma vānaraḥ 5.032.037c praviṣṭo nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ laṅghayitvā mahodadhim 5.032.038a kṛtvā mūrdhni padanyāsaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 5.032.038c tvāṃ draṣṭum upayāto 'haṃ samāśritya parākramam 5.032.039a nāham asmi tathā devi yathā mām avagacchasi
GE09ram_05_u:1695: 5.032.039c viśaṅkā tyajyatām eṣā śraddhatsva vadato mama
GE09ram_05_u:1696: 5.033.001a tāṃ tu rāma kathāṃ śrutvā vaidehī vānararṣabhāt
GE09ram_05_u:1697: 5.033.001c uvāca vacanaṃ sāntvam idaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_05_u:1698: 5.033.002a kva te rāmeṇa saṃsargaḥ kathaṃ jānāsi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:1699: 5.033.002c vānarāṇāṃ narāṇāṃ ca katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1700: 5.033.003a yāni rāmasya liṅgāni lakṣmaṇasya ca vānara
GE09ram_05_u:1701: 5.033.003c tāni bhūyaḥ samācakṣva na māṃ śokaḥ samāviśet
GE09ram_05_u:1702: 5.033.004a kīdṛśaṃ tasya saṃsthānaṃ rūpaṃ rāmasya kīdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:1703: 5.033.004c katham ūrū kathaṃ bāhū lakṣmaṇasya ca śaṃsa me 5.033.005a evam uktas tu vaidehyā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1704: 5.033.005c tato rāmaṃ yathātattvam ākhyātum upacakrame 5.033.006a jānantī bata diṣṭyā māṃ vaidehi paripṛcchasi
GE09ram_05_u:1705: 5.033.006c bhartuḥ kamalapatrākṣi saṃkhyānaṃ lakṣmaṇasya ca 5.033.007a yāni rāmasya cihnāni lakṣmaṇasya ca yāni vai
GE09ram_05_u:1706: 5.033.007c lakṣitāni viśālākṣi vadataḥ śṛṇu tāni me
GE09ram_05_u:1711: 5.033.010a rakṣitā jīvalokasya svajanasya ca rakṣitā 5.033.010c rakṣitā svasya vṛttasya dharmasya ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1712: 5.033.011a rāmo bhāmini lokasya cāturvarṇyasya rakṣitā 5.033.011c maryādānāṃ ca lokasya kartā kārayitā ca saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1713: 5.033.012a arciṣmān arcito 'tyarthaṃ brahmacaryavrate sthitaḥ 5.033.012c sādhūnām upakārajñaḥ pracārajñaś ca karmaṇām 5.033.013a rājavidyāvinītaś ca brāhmaṇānām upāsitā
GE09ram_05_u:1714: 5.033.013c śrutavāñ śīlasaṃpanno vinītaś ca paraṃtapaḥ 5.033.014a yajurvedavinītaś ca vedavidbhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1715: 5.033.014c dhanurvede ca vede ca vedāṅgeṣu ca niṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1717: 5.033.015c gūḍhajatruḥ sutāmrākṣo rāmo devi janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1719: 5.033.016c samaḥ samavibhaktāṅgo varṇaṃ śyāmaṃ samāśritaḥ 5.033.017a tristhiras tripralambaś ca trisamas triṣu connataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1724: 5.033.019c daśapadmo daśabṛhat tribhir vyāpto dviśuklavān 5.033.019e ṣaḍunnato navatanus tribhir vyāpnoti rāghavaḥ 5.033.020a satyadharmaparaḥ śrīmān saṃgrahānugrahe rataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1725: 5.033.020c deśakālavibhāgajñaḥ sarvalokapriyaṃvadaḥ 5.033.021a bhrātā ca tasya dvaimātraḥ saumitrir aparājitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1726: 5.033.021c anurāgeṇa rūpeṇa guṇaiś caiva tathāvidhaḥ 5.033.022a tvām eva mārgamāṇo tau vicarantau vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_05_u:1729: 5.033.023c bhrātur bhāryārtam āsīnaṃ sugrīvaṃ priyadarśanam 5.033.024a vayaṃ tu harirājaṃ taṃ sugrīvaṃ satyasaṃgaram
GE09ram_05_u:1732: 5.033.025c ṛśyamūkasya śailasya ramyaṃ deśam upāgatau 5.033.026a sa tau dṛṣṭvā naravyāghrau dhanvinau vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1733: 5.033.026c abhipluto gires tasya śikharaṃ bhayamohitaḥ 5.033.027a tataḥ sa śikhare tasmin vānarendro vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1734: 5.033.027c tayoḥ samīpaṃ mām eva preṣayām āsa satvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1735: 5.033.028a tāv ahaṃ puruṣavyāghrau sugrīvavacanāt prabhū 5.033.028c rūpalakṣaṇasaṃpannau kṛtāñjalir upasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1737: 5.033.029c pṛṣṭham āropya taṃ deśaṃ prāpitau puruṣarṣabhau
GE09ram_05_u:1738: 5.033.030a niveditau ca tattvena sugrīvāya mahātmane 5.033.030c tayor anyonyasaṃbhāṣād bhṛśaṃ prītir ajāyata 5.033.031a tatra tau kīrtisaṃpannau harīśvaranareśvarau
GE09ram_05_u:1740: 5.033.032a taṃ tataḥ sāntvayām āsa sugrīvaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1741: 5.033.032c strīhetor vālinā bhrātrā nirastam uru tejasā
GE09ram_05_u:1742: 5.033.033a tatas tvan nāśajaṃ śokaṃ rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 5.033.033c lakṣmaṇo vānarendrāya sugrīvāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_05_u:1743: 5.033.034a sa śrutvā vānarendras tu lakṣmaṇeneritaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1744: 5.033.034c tadāsīn niṣprabho 'tyarthaṃ grahagrasta ivāṃśumān 5.033.035a tatas tvadgātraśobhīni rakṣasā hriyamāṇayā
GE09ram_05_u:1746: 5.033.036a tāni sarvāṇi rāmāya ānīya hariyūthapāḥ 5.033.036c saṃhṛṣṭā darśayām āsur gatiṃ tu na vidus tava 5.033.037a tāni rāmāya dattāni mayaivopahṛtāni ca 5.033.037c svanavanty avakīrṇanti tasmin vihatacetasi
GE09ram_05_u:1747: 5.033.038a tāny aṅke darśanīyāni kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1749: 5.033.039a paśyatas tasyā rudatas tāmyataś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1751: 5.033.040a śayitaṃ ca ciraṃ tena duḥkhārtena mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:1752: 5.033.040c mayāpi vividhair vākyaiḥ kṛcchrād utthāpitaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1753: 5.033.041a tāni dṛṣṭvā mahārhāṇi darśayitvā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1754: 5.033.041c rāghavaḥ sahasaumitriḥ sugrīve sa nyavedayat 5.033.042a sa tavādarśanād ārye rāghavaḥ paritapyate 5.033.042c mahatā jvalatā nityam agninevāgniparvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1755: 5.033.043a tvatkṛte tam anidrā ca śokaś cintā ca rāghavam 5.033.043c tāpayanti mahātmānam agnyagāram ivāgnayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1757: 5.033.044c mahatā bhūmikampena mahān iva śiloccayaḥ 5.033.045a kānānāni suramyāṇi nadīprasravaṇāni
GE09ram_05_u:1758: 5.033.045c caran na ratim āpnoti tvam apaśyan nṛpātmaje
GE09ram_05_u:1759: 5.033.046a sa tvāṃ manujaśārdūlaḥ kṣipraṃ prāpsyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1761: 5.033.047a sahitau rāmasugrīvāv ubhāv akurutāṃ tadā 5.033.047c samayaṃ vālinaṃ hantuṃ tava cānveṣaṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_05_u:1762: 5.033.048a tato nihatya tarasā rāmo vālinam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:1764: 5.033.049a rāmasugrīvayor aikyaṃ devy evaṃ samajāyata 5.033.049c hanūmantaṃ ca māṃ viddhi tayor dūtam ihāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:1765: 5.033.050a svarājyaṃ prāpya sugrīvaḥ samanīya mahāharīn 5.033.050c tvadarthaṃ preṣayām āsa diśo daśa mahābalān
GE09ram_05_u:1768: 5.033.052a aṅgado nāma lakṣmīvān vālisūnur mahābalaḥ 5.033.052c prasthitaḥ kapiśārdūlas
GE09ram_05_u:1769: 5.033.053a teṣāṃ no vipranaṣṭānāṃ vindhye parvatasattame 5.033.053c bhṛśaṃ śokaparītanām ahorātragaṇā gatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1770: 5.033.054a te vayaṃ kāryanairāśyāt kālasyātikrameṇa ca 5.033.054c bhayāc ca kapirājasya prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1772: 5.033.055c anāsādya padaṃ devyāḥ prāṇāṃs tyaktuṃ vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1773: 5.033.056a bhṛśaṃ śokārṇave magnaḥ paryadevayad aṅgadaḥ 5.033.056c tava nāśaṃ ca vaidehi vālinaś ca tathā vadham 5.033.056e prāyopaveśam asmākaṃ maraṇaṃ ca jaṭāyuṣaḥ 5.033.057a teṣāṃ naḥ svāmisaṃdeśān nirāśānāṃ mumūrṣatām 5.033.057c kāryahetor ivāyātaḥ śakunir vīryavān mahān 5.033.058a gṛdhrarājasya sodaryaḥ saṃpātir nāma gṛdhrarāṭ 5.033.058c śrutvā bhrātṛvadhaṃ kopād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1774: 5.033.059a yavīyān kena me bhrātā hataḥ kva ca vināśitaḥ 5.033.059c etad ākhyātum icchāmi bhavadbhir vānarottamāḥ 5.033.060a aṅgado 'kathayat tasya janasthāne mahad vadham
GE09ram_05_u:1775: 5.033.060c rakṣasā bhīmarūpeṇa tvām uddiśya yathātatham 5.033.061a jaṭāyos tu vadhaṃ śrutvā duḥkhitaḥ so 'ruṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1776: 5.033.061c tvām āha sa varārohe vasantīṃ rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_05_u:1777: 5.033.062a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saṃpāteḥ prītivardhanam 5.033.062c aṅgadapramukhāḥ sarve tataḥ saṃprasthitā vayam 5.033.062e tvaddarśanakṛtotsāhā hṛṣṭās tuṣṭāḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1778: 5.033.063a athāhaṃ harisainyasya sāgaraṃ dṛśya sīdataḥ 5.033.063c vyavadhūya bhayaṃ tīvraṃ yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1779: 5.033.064a laṅkā cāpi mayā rātrau praviṣṭā rākṣasākulā
GE09ram_05_u:1780: 5.033.064c rāvaṇaś ca mayā dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca śokanipīḍitā
GE09ram_05_u:1781: 5.033.065a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathāvṛttam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:1782: 5.033.065c abhibhāṣasva māṃ devi dūto dāśarather aham
GE09ram_05_u:1783: 5.033.066a tvaṃ māṃ rāmakṛtodyogaṃ tvannimittam ihāgatam 5.033.066c sugrīva sacivaṃ devi budhyasva pavanātmajam 5.033.067a kuśalī tava kākutsthaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ 5.033.067c guror ārādhane yukto lakṣmaṇaś ca sulakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1784: 5.033.068a tasya vīryavato devi bhartus tava hite rataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1785: 5.033.068c aham ekas tu saṃprāptaḥ sugrīvavacanād iha
GE09ram_05_u:1790: 5.033.071a diṣṭyā hi na mama vyarthaṃ devi sāgaralaṅghanam
GE09ram_05_u:1791: 5.033.071c prāpsyāmy aham idaṃ diṣṭyā tvaddarśanakṛtaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1792: 5.033.072a rāghavaś ca mahāvīryaḥ kṣipraṃ tvām abhipatsyate
GE09ram_05_u:1794: 5.033.073a kaurajo nāma vaidehi girīṇām uttamo giriḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1795: 5.033.073c tato gacchati gokarṇaṃ parvataṃ kesarī hariḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1796: 5.033.074a sa ca devarṣibhir dṛṣṭaḥ pitā mama mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1797: 5.033.074c tīrthe nadīpateḥ puṇye śambasādanam uddharat 5.033.075a tasyāhaṃ hariṇaḥ kṣetre jāto vātena maithili
GE09ram_05_u:1798: 5.033.075c hanūmān iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:1799: 5.033.075e viśvāsārthaṃ tu vaidehi bhartur uktā mayā guṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1800: 5.033.076a evaṃ viśvāsitā sītā hetubhiḥ śokakarśitā 5.033.076c upapannair abhijñānair dūtaṃ tam avagacchati 5.033.077a atulaṃ ca gatā harṣaṃ praharṣeṇa tu jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:1802: 5.033.078a cāru tac cānanaṃ tasyās tāmraśuklāyatekṣaṇam 5.033.078c aśobhata viśālākṣyā rāhumukta ivoḍurāṭ
GE09ram_05_u:1803: 5.033.078e hanūmantaṃ kapiṃ vyaktaṃ manyate nānyatheti sā
GE09ram_05_u:1804: 5.033.079a athovāca hanūmāṃs tām uttaraṃ priyadarśanām 5.033.080a hate 'sure saṃyati śambasādane; kapipravīreṇa maharṣicodanāt 5.033.080c tato 'smi vāyuprabhavo hi maithili; prabhāvatas tatpratimaś ca
GE09ram_05_u:1806: 5.034.001a bhūya eva mahātejā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.034.001c abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1808: 5.034.002c rāmanāmāṅkitaṃ cedaṃ paśya devy aṅgulīyakam 5.034.002e samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te kṣīṇaduḥkhaphalā hy asi
GE09ram_05_u:1809: 5.034.003a gṛhītvā prekṣamāṇā sā bhartuḥ karavibhūṣaṇam 5.034.003c bhartāram iva saṃprāptā jānakī muditābhavat 5.034.004a cāru tad vadanaṃ tasyās tāmraśuklāyatekṣaṇam 5.034.004c babhūva praharṣodagraṃ rāhumukta ivoḍurāṭ
GE09ram_05_u:1810: 5.034.005a tataḥ sā hrīmatī bālā bhartuḥ saṃdeśaharṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:1811: 5.034.005c parituṭṣā priyaṃ śrutvā prāśaṃsata mahākapim 5.034.006a vikrāntas tvaṃ samarthas tvaṃ prājñas tvaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_05_u:1815: 5.034.008a na hi tvāṃ prākṛtaṃ manye vanaraṃ vanararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:1816: 5.034.008c yasya te nāsti saṃtrāso rāvaṇān nāpi saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1817: 5.034.009a arhase ca kapiśreṣṭha mayā samabhibhāṣitum 5.034.009c yady asi preṣitas tena rāmeṇa viditātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:1818: 5.034.010a preṣayiṣyati durdharṣo rāmo na hy aparīkṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:1820: 5.034.011a diṣṭyā ca kuśalī rāmo dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1822: 5.034.012a kuśalī yadi kākutsthaḥ kiṃ nu sāgaramekhalām
GE09ram_05_u:1823: 5.034.012c mahīṃ dahati kopena yugāntāgnir ivotthitaḥ 5.034.013a atha vā śaktimantau tau surāṇām api nigrahe
GE09ram_05_u:1824: 5.034.013c mamaiva tu na duḥkhānām asti manye viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1825: 5.034.014a kaccic ca vyathate rāmaḥ kaccin na paripatyate
GE09ram_05_u:1826: 5.034.014c uttarāṇi ca kāryāṇi kurute puruṣottamaḥ 5.034.015a kaccin na dīnaḥ saṃbhrāntaḥ kāryeṣu ca na muhyati 5.034.015c kaccin puruṣakāryāṇi kurute nṛpateḥ sutaḥ 5.034.016a dvividhaṃ trividhopāyam upāyam api sevate 5.034.016c vijigīṣuḥ suhṛt kaccin mitreṣu ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1827: 5.034.017a kaccin mitrāṇi labhate mitraiś cāpy abhigamyate
GE09ram_05_u:1828: 5.034.017c kaccit kalyāṇamitraś ca mitraiś cāpi puraskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1829: 5.034.018a kaccid āśāsti devānāṃ prasādaṃ pārthivātmajaḥ 5.034.018c kaccit puruṣakāraṃ ca daivaṃ ca pratipadyate
GE09ram_05_u:1830: 5.034.019a kaccin na vigatasneho vivāsān mayi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1831: 5.034.019c kaccin māṃ vyasanād asmān mokṣayiṣyati vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1832: 5.034.020a sukhānām ucito nityam asukhānām anūcitaḥ 5.034.020c duḥkham uttaram āsādya kaccid rāmo na sīdati
GE09ram_05_u:1833: 5.034.021a kausalyāyās tathā kaccit sumitrāyās tathaiva ca
GE09ram_05_u:1834: 5.034.021c abhīkṣṇaṃ śrūyate kaccit kuśalaṃ bharatasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1835: 5.034.022a mannimittena mānārhaḥ kaccic chokena rāghavaḥ 5.034.022c kaccin nānyamanā rāmaḥ kaccin māṃ tārayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1836: 5.034.023a kaccid akṣāuhiṇīṃ bhīmāṃ bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ 5.034.023c dhvajinīṃ mantribhir guptāṃ preṣayiṣyati matkṛte 5.034.024a vānarādhipatiḥ śrīmān sugrīvaḥ kaccid eṣyati 5.034.024c matkṛte haribhir vīrair vṛto dantanakhāyudhaiḥ 5.034.025a kaccic ca lakṣmaṇaḥ śūraḥ sumitrānandavardhanaḥ 5.034.025c astravic charajālena rākṣasān vidhamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1837: 5.034.026a raudreṇa kaccid astreṇa rāmeṇa nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:1838: 5.034.026c drakṣyāmy alpena kālena rāvaṇaṃ sasuhṛjjanam 5.034.027a kaccin na tad dhemasamānavarṇaṃ; tasyānanaṃ padmasamānagandhi 5.034.027c mayā vinā śuṣyati śokadīnaṃ; jalakṣaye padmam ivātapena
GE09ram_05_u:1839: 5.034.028a dharmāpadeśāt tyajataś ca rājyāṃ; māṃ cāpy araṇyaṃ nayataḥ padātim 5.034.028c nāsīd vyathā yasya na bhīr na śokaḥ; kaccit sa dhairyaṃ hṛdaye karoti 5.034.029a na cāsya mātā na pitā na cānyaḥ; snehād viśiṣṭo 'sti mayā samo vā
GE09ram_05_u:1840: 5.034.029c tāvad dhy ahaṃ dūtajijīviṣeyaṃ; yāvat pravṛttiṃ śṛṇuyāṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1842: 5.034.030a itīva devī vacanaṃ mahārthaṃ; taṃ vānarendraṃ madhurārtham
GE09ram_05_u:1844: 5.034.030c śrotuṃ punas tasya vaco 'bhirāmaṃ; rāmārthayuktaṃ virarāma rāmā
GE09ram_05_u:1845: 5.034.031a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā mārutir bhīmavikramaḥ 5.034.031c śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:1846: 5.034.032a na tvām ihasthāṃ jānīte rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1847: 5.034.032c śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1850: 5.034.033e kariṣyati purīṃ laṅkāṃ kākutsthaḥ śāntarākṣasām 5.034.034a tatra yady antarā mṛtyur yadi devāḥ sahāsurāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1851: 5.034.034c sthāsyanti pathi rāmasya sa tān api vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1853: 5.034.035c na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1854: 5.034.036a dardareṇa ca te devi śape mūlaphalena ca
GE09ram_05_u:1855: 5.034.036c malayena ca vindhyena meruṇā mandareṇa ca
GE09ram_05_u:1856: 5.034.037a yathā sunayanaṃ valgu bimbauṣṭhaṃ cārukuṇḍalam 5.034.037c mukhaṃ drakṣyasi rāmasya pūrṇacandram ivoditam 5.034.038a kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi vaidehi rāmaṃ prasravaṇe girau
GE09ram_05_u:1858: 5.034.039a na māṃsaṃ rāghavo bhuṅkte na cāpi madhusevate
GE09ram_05_u:1859: 5.034.039c vanyaṃ suvihitaṃ nityaṃ bhaktam aśnāti pañcamam
GE09ram_05_u:1860: 5.034.040a naiva daṃśān na maśakān na kīṭān na sarīsṛpān 5.034.040c rāghavo 'panayed gatrāt tvadgatenāntarātmanā 5.034.041a nityaṃ dhyānaparo rāmo nityaṃ śokaparāyaṇaḥ 5.034.041c nānyac cintayate kiṃ cit sa tu kāmavaśaṃ gataḥ 5.034.042a anidraḥ satataṃ rāmaḥ supto 'pi ca narottamaḥ 5.034.042c sīteti madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ vyāharan pratibudhyate 5.034.043a dṛṣṭvā phalaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā yac cānyat strīmanoharam 5.034.043c bahuśo hā priyety evaṃ śvasaṃs tvām abhibhāṣate
GE09ram_05_u:1861: 5.034.044a sa devi nityaṃ paritapyamānas; tvām eva sītety abhibhāṣamāṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1862: 5.034.044c dhṛtavrato rājasuto mahātmā; tavaiva lābhāya kṛtaprayatnaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1868: 5.035.002c yac ca nānyamanā rāmo yac ca śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1869: 5.035.003a aiśvarye vā suvistīrṇe vyasane vā sudāruṇe
GE09ram_05_u:1870: 5.035.003c rajjveva puruṣaṃ baddhvā kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati 5.035.004a vidhir nūnam asaṃhāryaḥ prāṇināṃ plavagottama 5.035.004c saumitriṃ māṃ ca rāmaṃ ca vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitān 5.035.005a śokasyāsya kadā pāraṃ rāghavo 'dhigamiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:1871: 5.035.005c plavamānaḥ pariśrānto hatanauḥ sāgare yathā 5.035.006a rākṣasānāṃ kṣayaṃ kṛtvā sūdayitvā ca rāvaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:1872: 5.035.006c laṅkām unmūlitāṃ kṛtvā kadā drakṣyati māṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1873: 5.035.007a sa vācyaḥ saṃtvarasveti yāvad eva na pūryate
GE09ram_05_u:1874: 5.035.007c ayaṃ saṃvatsaraḥ kālas tāvad dhi mama jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:1875: 5.035.008a vartate daśamo māso dvau tu śeṣau plavaṃgama
GE09ram_05_u:1876: 5.035.008c rāvaṇena nṛśaṃsena samayo yaḥ kṛto mama
GE09ram_05_u:1877: 5.035.009a vibhīṣaṇena ca bhrātrā mama niryātanaṃ prati
GE09ram_05_u:1878: 5.035.009c anunītaḥ prayatnena na ca tat kurute matim
