GE09ram_05_u:1879: 5.035.010a mama pratipradānaṃ hi rāvaṇasya na rocate
GE09ram_05_u:1880: 5.035.010c rāvaṇaṃ mārgate saṃkhye mṛtyuḥ kālavaśaṃ gatam
GE09ram_05_u:1881: 5.035.011a jyeṣṭhā kanyānalā nama vibhīṣaṇasutā kape 5.035.011c tayā mamaitad ākhyātaṃ mātrā prahitayā svayam
GE09ram_05_u:1882: 5.035.012a avindhyo nāma medhāvī vidvān rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ 5.035.012c dhṛtimāñ śīlavān vṛddho rāvaṇasya susaṃmataḥ 5.035.013a rāmāt kṣayam anuprāptaṃ rakṣasāṃ pratyacodayat 5.035.013c na ca tasyāpi duṣṭātmā śṛṇoti vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_05_u:1883: 5.035.014a āśaṃseti hariśreṣṭha kṣipraṃ māṃ prāpsyate patiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1884: 5.035.014c antarātmā hi me śuddhas tasmiṃś ca bahavo guṇāḥ 5.035.015a utsāhaḥ pauruṣaṃ sattvam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṛtajñatā 5.035.015c vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca santi vānararāghave
GE09ram_05_u:1886: 5.035.016c janasthāne vinā bhrātrā śatruḥ kas tasya nodvijet
GE09ram_05_u:1887: 5.035.017a na sa śakyas tulayituṃ vyasanaiḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1891: 5.035.019a iti saṃjalpamānāṃ tāṃ rāmārthe śokakarśitām 5.035.019c aśrusaṃpūrṇavadanām uvāca hanumān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1892: 5.035.020a śrutvaiva tu vaco mahyaṃ kṣipram eṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1894: 5.035.021a atha vā mocayiṣyāmi tām adyaiva hi rākṣasāt
GE09ram_05_u:1895: 5.035.021c asmād duḥkhād upāroha mama pṛṣṭham anindite
GE09ram_05_u:1896: 5.035.022a tvaṃ hi pṛṣṭhagatāṃ kṛtvā saṃtariṣyāmi sāgaram
GE09ram_05_u:1897: 5.035.022c śaktir asti hi me voḍhuṃ laṅkām api sarāvaṇām 5.035.023a ahaṃ prasravaṇasthāya rāghavāyādya maithili
GE09ram_05_u:1898: 5.035.023c prāpayiṣyāmi śakrāya havyaṃ hutam ivānalaḥ 5.035.024a drakṣyasy adyaiva vaidehi rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam 5.035.024c vyavasāya samāyuktaṃ viṣṇuṃ daityavadhe yathā 5.035.025a tvaddarśanakṛtotsāham āśramasthaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:1900: 5.035.026a pṛṣṭham āroha me devi mā vikāṅkṣasva śobhane
GE09ram_05_u:1901: 5.035.026c yogam anviccha rāmeṇa śaśāṅkeneva rohiṇī 5.035.027a kathayantīva candreṇa sūryeṇeva
GE09ram_05_u:1903: 5.035.028a na hi me saṃprayātasya tvām ito nayato 'ṅgane
GE09ram_05_u:1904: 5.035.028c anugantuṃ gatiṃ śaktāḥ sarve laṅkānivāsinaḥ 5.035.029a yathaivāham iha prāptas tathaivāham asaṃśayam 5.035.029c yāsyāmi paśya vaidehi tvām udyamya vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1905: 5.035.030a maithilī tu hariśreṣṭhāc chrutvā vacanam adbhutam
GE09ram_05_u:1907: 5.035.031a hanūman dūram adhvanaṃ kathaṃ māṃ voḍhum icchasi
GE09ram_05_u:1908: 5.035.031c tad eva khalu te manye kapitvaṃ hariyūthapa
GE09ram_05_u:1909: 5.035.032a kathaṃ vālpaśarīras tvaṃ mām ito netum icchasi
GE09ram_05_u:1910: 5.035.032c sakāśaṃ mānavendrasya bhartur me plavagarṣabha 5.035.033a sītāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.035.033c cintayām āsa lakṣmīvān navaṃ paribhavaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:1911: 5.035.034a na me jānāti sattvaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vāsitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:1912: 5.035.034c tasmāt paśyatu vaidehī yad rūpaṃ mama kāmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1913: 5.035.035a iti saṃcintya hanumāṃs tadā plavagasattamaḥ 5.035.035c darśayām āsa vaidehyāḥ svarūpam arimardanaḥ 5.035.036a sa tasmāt pādapād dhīmān āplutya plavagarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1916: 5.035.037c agrato vyavatasthe ca sītāyā vānararṣabhaḥ 5.035.038a hariḥ parvatasaṃkāśas tāmravaktro mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1917: 5.035.038c vajradaṃṣṭranakho bhīmo vaidehīm idam abravīt 5.035.039a saparvatavanoddeśāṃ sāṭṭaprākāratoraṇām 5.035.039c laṅkām imāṃ sanathāṃ vā nayituṃ śaktir asti me 5.035.040a tad avasthāpya tāṃ buddhir alaṃ devi vikāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_05_u:1918: 5.035.040c viśokaṃ kuru vaidehi rāghavaṃ sahalakṣmaṇam 5.035.041a taṃ dṛṣṭvācalasaṃkāśam uvāca janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:1920: 5.035.042a tava sattvaṃ balaṃ caiva vijānāmi mahākape
GE09ram_05_u:1921: 5.035.042c vāyor iva gatiṃ cāpi tejaś cāgnir ivādbhutam
GE09ram_05_u:1922: 5.035.043a prākṛto 'nyaḥ kathaṃ cemāṃ bhūmim āgantum arhati 5.035.043c udadher aprameyasya pāraṃ vānarapuṃgava
GE09ram_05_u:1923: 5.035.044a jānāmi gamane śaktiṃ nayane cāpi te mama
GE09ram_05_u:1925: 5.035.045a ayuktaṃ tu kapiśreṣṭha mayā gantuṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_05_u:1926: 5.035.045c vāyuvegasavegasya vego māṃ mohayet tava 5.035.046a aham ākāśam āsaktā upary upari sāgaram
GE09ram_05_u:1927: 5.035.046c prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhād bhayād vegena gacchataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1929: 5.035.047c bhayeyam āśu vivaśā yādasām annam uttamam
GE09ram_05_u:1930: 5.035.048a na ca śakṣye tvayā sārdhaṃ gantuṃ śatruvināśana
GE09ram_05_u:1931: 5.035.048c kalatravati saṃdehas tvayy api syād asaṃśayam
GE09ram_05_u:1932: 5.035.049a hriyamāṇāṃ tu māṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1934: 5.035.050a tais tvaṃ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ śūlam udgara pāṇibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1935: 5.035.050c bhaves tvaṃ saṃśayaṃ prāpto mayā vīra kalatravān
GE09ram_05_u:1936: 5.035.051a sāyudhā bahavo vyomni rākṣasās tvaṃ nirāyudhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1937: 5.035.051c kathaṃ śakṣyasi saṃyātuṃ māṃ caiva parirakṣitum
GE09ram_05_u:1938: 5.035.052a yudhyamānasya rakṣobhis tatas taiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ 5.035.052c prapateyaṃ hi te pṛṣṭhad bhayārtā kapisattama
GE09ram_05_u:1939: 5.035.053a atha rakṣāṃsi bhīmāni mahānti balavanti ca
GE09ram_05_u:1940: 5.035.053c kathaṃ cit sāmparāye tvāṃ jayeyuḥ kapisattama
GE09ram_05_u:1941: 5.035.054a atha vā yudhyamānasya pateyaṃ vimukhasya te
GE09ram_05_u:1942: 5.035.054c patitāṃ ca gṛhītvā māṃ nayeyuḥ pāparākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1943: 5.035.055a māṃ vā hareyus tvaddhastād viśaseyur athāpi vā
GE09ram_05_u:1944: 5.035.055c avyavasthau hi dṛśyete yuddhe jayaparājayau 5.035.056a ahaṃ vāpi vipadyeyaṃ rakṣobhir abhitarjitā 5.035.056c tvatprayatno hariśreṣṭha bhaven niṣphala eva tu
GE09ram_05_u:1945: 5.035.057a kāmaṃ tvam api paryāpto nihantuṃ sarvarākṣasān
GE09ram_05_u:1946: 5.035.057c rāghavasya yaśo hīyet tvayā śastais tu rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1947: 5.035.058a atha vādāya rakṣāṃsi nyasyeyuḥ saṃvṛte hi mām
GE09ram_05_u:1948: 5.035.058c yatra te nābhijānīyur harayo nāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1949: 5.035.059a ārambhas tu madartho 'yaṃ tatas tava nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1950: 5.035.059c tvayā hi saha rāmasya mahān āgamane guṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1951: 5.035.060a mayi jīvitam āyattaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 5.035.060c bhrātṝṇāṃ ca mahābāho tava rājakulasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:1952: 5.035.061a tau nirāśau madarthe tu śokasaṃtāpakarśitau 5.035.061c saha sarvarkṣaharibhis tyakṣyataḥ prāṇasaṃgraham
GE09ram_05_u:1953: 5.035.062a bhartur bhaktiṃ puraskṛtya rāmād anyasya vānara
GE09ram_05_u:1954: 5.035.062c nāhaṃ spraṣṭuṃ padā gātram iccheyaṃ vānarottama
GE09ram_05_u:1955: 5.035.063a yad ahaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ rāvaṇasya gatā balāt
GE09ram_05_u:1956: 5.035.063c anīśā kiṃ kariṣyāmi vināthā vivaśā satī
GE09ram_05_u:1957: 5.035.064a yadi rāmo daśagrīvam iha hatvā sarākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1958: 5.035.064c mām ito gṛhya gaccheta tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet 5.035.065a śrutā hi dṛṣṭāś ca mayā parākramā; mahātmanas tasya raṇāvamardinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1959: 5.035.065c na devagandharvabhujaṃgarākṣasā; bhavanti rāmeṇa samā hi saṃyuge 5.035.066a samīkṣya taṃ saṃyati citrakārmukaṃ; mahābalaṃ vāsavatulyavikramam 5.035.066c salakṣmaṇaṃ ko viṣaheta rāghavaṃ; hutāśanaṃ dīptam ivānileritam
GE09ram_05_u:1960: 5.035.067a salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam ājimardanaṃ; diśāgajaṃ mattam iva
GE09ram_05_u:1962: 5.035.067c saheta ko vānaramukhya saṃyuge; yugāntasūryapratimaṃ śarārciṣam 5.035.068a sa me hariśreṣṭha salakṣmaṇaṃ patiṃ; sayūthapaṃ kṣipram ihopapādaya
GE09ram_05_u:1963: 5.035.068c cirāya rāmaṃ prati śokakarśitāṃ; kuruṣva māṃ vānaramukhya
GE09ram_05_u:1965: 5.036.001a tataḥ sa kapiśārdūlas tena vākyena harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1966: 5.036.001c sītām uvāca tac chrutvā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1967: 5.036.002a yuktarūpaṃ tvayā devi bhāṣitaṃ śubhadarśane 5.036.002c sadṛśaṃ strīsvabhāvasya sādhvīnāṃ vinayasya ca 5.036.003a strītvaṃ na tu samarthaṃ hi sāgaraṃ vyativartitum
GE09ram_05_u:1968: 5.036.003c mām adhiṣṭhāya vistīrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam 5.036.004a dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yac ca bravīṣi vinayānvite
GE09ram_05_u:1969: 5.036.004c rāmād anyasya nārhāmi saṃsparśam iti jānaki
GE09ram_05_u:1970: 5.036.005a etat te devi sadṛśaṃ patnyās tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1971: 5.036.005c kā hy anyā tvām ṛte devi brūyād vacanam īdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:1972: 5.036.006a śroṣyate caiva kākutsthaḥ sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ 5.036.006c ceṣṭitaṃ yat tvayā devi bhāṣitaṃ mama cāgrataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1973: 5.036.007a kāraṇair bahubhir devi rāma priyacikīrṣayā 5.036.007c snehapraskannamanasā mayaitat
GE09ram_05_u:1975: 5.036.008c sāmarthyād ātmanaś caiva mayaitat samudāhṛtam 5.036.009a icchāmi tvāṃ samānetum adyaiva raghubandhunā 5.036.009c gurusnehena bhaktyā ca nānyathā tad udāhṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:1976: 5.036.010a yadi notsahase yātuṃ mayā sārdham anindite
GE09ram_05_u:1977: 5.036.010c abhijñānaṃ prayaccha tvaṃ jānīyād rāghavo hi yat
GE09ram_05_u:1978: 5.036.011a evam uktā hanumatā sītā surasutopamā 5.036.011c uvāca vacanaṃ mandaṃ bāṣpapragrathitākṣaram
GE09ram_05_u:1979: 5.036.012a idaṃ śreṣṭham abhijñānaṃ brūyās tvaṃ tu mama priyam 5.036.012c śailasya citrakūṭasya pāde pūrvottare tadā 5.036.013a tāpasāśramavāsinyāḥ prājyamūlaphalodake 5.036.013c tasmin siddhāśrame deśe mandākinyā adūrataḥ 5.036.014a tasyopavanaṣaṇḍeṣu nānāpuṣpasugandhiṣu 5.036.014c vihṛtya salilaklinnā tavāṅke samupāviśam
GE09ram_05_u:1980: 5.036.015a paryāyeṇa prasuptaś ca mamāṅke bharatāgrajaḥ 5.036.016a tato māṃsasamāyukto vāyasaḥ paryatuṇḍayat
GE09ram_05_u:1981: 5.036.016c tam ahaṃ loṣṭam udyamya vārayāmi sma vāyasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:1982: 5.036.017a dārayan sa ca māṃ kākas tatraiva parilīyate
GE09ram_05_u:1983: 5.036.017c na cāpy uparaman māṃsād bhakṣārthī balibhojanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1984: 5.036.018a utkarṣantyāṃ ca raśanāṃ kruddhāyāṃ mayi pakṣiṇe
GE09ram_05_u:1985: 5.036.018c sraṃsamāne ca vasane tato dṛṣṭā tvayā hy aham 5.036.019a tvayā vihasitā cāhaṃ kruddhā saṃlajjitā tadā
GE09ram_05_u:1986: 5.036.019c bhakṣya gṛddhena kālena dāritā tvām upāgatā
GE09ram_05_u:1987: 5.036.020a āsīnasya ca te śrāntā punar utsaṅgam āviśam
GE09ram_05_u:1988: 5.036.020c krudhyantī ca prahṛṣṭena tvayāhaṃ parisāntvitā 5.036.021a bāṣpapūrṇamukhī mandaṃ cakṣuṣī parimārjatī
GE09ram_05_u:1989: 5.036.021c lakṣitāhaṃ tvayā nātha vāyasena prakopitā 5.036.022a āśīviṣa iva kruddhaḥ śvasān vākyam abhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1990: 5.036.022c kena te nāganāsoru vikṣataṃ vai stanāntaram
GE09ram_05_u:1991: 5.036.022e kaḥ krīḍati saroṣeṇa pañcavaktreṇa bhoginā 5.036.023a vīkṣamāṇas tatas taṃ vai vāyasaṃ samavaikṣathāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1992: 5.036.023c nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:1993: 5.036.024a putraḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1994: 5.036.024c dharāntaracaraḥ śīghraṃ pavanasya gatau samaḥ 5.036.025a tatas tasmin mahābāhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:1995: 5.036.025c vāyase kṛtavān krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_05_u:1997: 5.036.026c sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukho dvijam
GE09ram_05_u:1998: 5.036.027a cikṣepitha pradīptāṃ tām iṣīkāṃ vāyasaṃ prati
GE09ram_05_u:1999: 5.036.027c anusṛṣṭas tadā kālo jagāma vividhāṃ gatim
GE09ram_05_u:2000: 5.036.027e trāṇakāma imaṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāra ha
GE09ram_05_u:2001: 5.036.028a sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2002: 5.036.028c trīṃl lokān saṃparikramya tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2003: 5.036.029a taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:2004: 5.036.029c vadhārham api kākutstha kṛpayā paryapālayaḥ 5.036.029e na śarma labdhvā lokeṣu tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ 5.036.030a paridyūnaṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ ca sa tvam āyāntam uktavān
GE09ram_05_u:2005: 5.036.030c moghaṃ kartuṃ na śakyaṃ tu brāhmam astraṃ tad ucyatām
GE09ram_05_u:2006: 5.036.031a tatas tasyākṣi kākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2007: 5.036.032a sa te tadā namaskṛtvā rājñe daśarathāya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2008: 5.036.032c tvayā vīra visṛṣṭas tu pratipede svam ālayam
GE09ram_05_u:2009: 5.036.033a matkṛte kākamātre 'pi brahmāstraṃ samudīritam 5.036.033c kasmād yo māṃ harat tvattaḥ kṣamase taṃ mahīpate 5.036.034a sa kuruṣva mahotsāhaṃ kṛpāṃ mayi nararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:2010: 5.036.034c ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmas tvatta eva mayā śrutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2011: 5.036.035a jānāmi tvāṃ mahāvīryaṃ mahotsāhaṃ mahābalam 5.036.035c apārapāram akṣobhyaṃ gāmbhīryāt sāgaropamam
GE09ram_05_u:2013: 5.036.036a evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavān balavān api
GE09ram_05_u:2014: 5.036.036c kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
GE09ram_05_u:2015: 5.036.037a na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2016: 5.036.037c rāmasya samare vegaṃ śaktāḥ prati samādhitum
GE09ram_05_u:2017: 5.036.038a tasyā vīryavataḥ kaś cid yady asti mayi saṃbhramaḥ 5.036.038c kimarthaṃ na śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kṣayaṃ nayati rākṣasān
GE09ram_05_u:2018: 5.036.039a bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2019: 5.036.039c kasya hetor na māṃ vīraḥ paritrāti mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2021: 5.036.040c surāṇām api durdharṣo kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2022: 5.036.041a mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ 5.036.041c samarthāv api tau yan māṃ nāvekṣete paraṃtapau
GE09ram_05_u:2023: 5.036.042a kausalyā lokabhartāraṃ suṣuve yaṃ manasvinī 5.036.042c taṃ mamārthe sukhaṃ pṛccha śirasā cābhivādaya
GE09ram_05_u:2024: 5.036.043a srajaś ca sarvaratnāni priyā yāś ca varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2025: 5.036.043c aiśvaryaṃ ca viśālāyāṃ pṛthivyām api durlabham
GE09ram_05_u:2026: 5.036.044a pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva saṃmānyābhiprasādya ca 5.036.044c anupravrajito rāmaṃ sumitrā yena suprajāḥ 5.036.044e ānukūlyena dharmātmā tyaktvā sukham anuttamam 5.036.045a anugacchati kākutsthaṃ bhrātaraṃ pālayan vane 5.036.045c siṃhaskandho mahābāhur manasvī priyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2027: 5.036.046a pitṛvad vartate rāme mātṛvan māṃ samācaran
GE09ram_05_u:2028: 5.036.046c hriyamāṇāṃ tadā vīro na tu māṃ veda lakṣmaṇaḥ 5.036.047a vṛddhopasevī lakṣmīvāñ śakto na bahubhāṣitā 5.036.047c rājaputraḥ priyaśreṣṭhaḥ sadṛśaḥ śvaśurasya me 5.036.048a mattaḥ priyataro nityaṃ bhrātā rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2029: 5.036.048c niyukto dhuri yasyāṃ tu tām udvahati vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:2030: 5.036.049a yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavo naiva vṛddham āryam anusmarat
GE09ram_05_u:2031: 5.036.049c sa mamārthāya kuśalaṃ vaktavyo vacanān mama
GE09ram_05_u:2032: 5.036.049e mṛdur nityaṃ śucir dakṣaḥ priyo rāmasya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2033: 5.036.050a idaṃ brūyāś ca me nāthaṃ śūraṃ rāmaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2035: 5.036.050e ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ satyenāhaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_05_u:2037: 5.036.051c trātum arhasi vīra tvaṃ pātālād iva kauśikīm
GE09ram_05_u:2038: 5.036.052a tato vastragataṃ muktvā divyaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ śubham
GE09ram_05_u:2039: 5.036.052c pradeyo rāghavāyeti sītā hanumate dadau 5.036.053a pratigṛhya tato vīro maṇiratnam anuttamam 5.036.053c aṅgulyā yojayām āsa na hy asyā prābhavad bhujaḥ 5.036.054a maṇiratnaṃ kapivaraḥ pratigṛhyābhivādya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2040: 5.036.054c sītāṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā praṇataḥ pārśvataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2041: 5.036.055a harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ sītādarśanajena saḥ 5.036.055c hṛdayena gato rāmaṃ śarīreṇa tu viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2042: 5.036.056a maṇivaram upagṛhya taṃ mahārhaṃ; janakanṛpātmajayā dhṛtaṃ prabhāvāt
GE09ram_05_u:2044: 5.037.001a maṇiṃ dattvā tataḥ sītā hanūmantam athābravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2045: 5.037.001c abhijñānam abhijñātam etad rāmasya tattvataḥ 5.037.002a maṇiṃ tu dṛṣṭvā rāmo vai trayāṇāṃ saṃsmariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2046: 5.037.002c vīro jananyā mama ca rājño daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2047: 5.037.003a sa bhūyas tvaṃ samutsāhe codito harisattama
GE09ram_05_u:2049: 5.037.004a tvam asmin kāryaniryoge pramāṇaṃ harisattama 5.037.004c tasya cintaya yo yatno duḥkhakṣayakaro bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:2050: 5.037.005a sa tatheti pratijñāya mārutir bhīmavikramaḥ 5.037.005c śirasāvandya vaidehīṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2051: 5.037.006a jñātvā saṃprasthitaṃ devī vānaraṃ mārutātmajam 5.037.006c bāṣpagadgadayā vācā maithilī vākyam abravīt 5.037.007a kuśalaṃ hanuman brūyāḥ sahitau rāmalakṣmaṇau 5.037.007c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ vṛddhān sarvāṃś ca vānarān
GE09ram_05_u:2052: 5.037.008a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2053: 5.037.008c asmād duḥkhāmbusaṃrodhāt tvaṃ samādhātum arhasi 5.037.009a jīvantīṃ māṃ yathā rāmaḥ saṃbhāvayati kīrtimān
GE09ram_05_u:2054: 5.037.009c tat tvayā hanuman vācyaṃ vācā dharmam avāpnuhi
GE09ram_05_u:2055: 5.037.010a nityam utsāhayuktāś ca vācaḥ śrutvā mayeritāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2057: 5.037.011a matsaṃdeśayutā vācas tvattaḥ śrutvaiva rāghavaḥ 5.037.011c parākramavidhiṃ vīro vidhivat saṃvidhāsyati
GE09ram_05_u:2058: 5.037.012a sītāyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2059: 5.037.012c śirasy añjalim ādhāya vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2060: 5.037.013a kṣipram eṣyati kākutstho haryṛkṣapravarair vṛtaḥ 5.037.013c yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2061: 5.037.014a na hi paśyāmi martyeṣu nāmareṣv asureṣu vā
GE09ram_05_u:2062: 5.037.014c yas tasya vamato bāṇān sthātum utsahate 'grataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2063: 5.037.015a apy arkam api parjanyam api vaivasvataṃ yamam
GE09ram_05_u:2064: 5.037.015c sa hi soḍhuṃ raṇe śaktas tavahetor viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2065: 5.037.016a sa hi sāgaraparyantāṃ mahīṃ śāsitum īhate
GE09ram_05_u:2066: 5.037.016c tvan nimitto hi rāmasya jayo janakanandini
GE09ram_05_u:2067: 5.037.017a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā samyak satyaṃ subhāṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:2068: 5.037.017c jānakī bahu mene 'tha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2069: 5.037.018a tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2070: 5.037.018c bhartuḥ snehānvitaṃ vākyaṃ sauhārdād anumānayat 5.037.019a yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
GE09ram_05_u:2071: 5.037.019c kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:2072: 5.037.020a mama ced alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:2073: 5.037.020c asya śokasya mahato muhūrtaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:2074: 5.037.021a gate hi hariśārdūla punarāgamanāya tu 5.037.021c prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2075: 5.037.022a tavādarśanajaḥ śoko bhūyo māṃ paritāpayet 5.037.022c duḥkhād duḥkhaparāmṛṣṭāṃ dīpayann iva vānara 5.037.023a ayaṃ ca vīra saṃdehas tiṣṭhatīva mamāgrataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2077: 5.037.024a kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:2078: 5.037.024c tāni haryṛkṣasainyāni tau vā naravarātmajau 5.037.025a trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ sāgarasyeha laṅghane 5.037.025c śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya tava vā mārutasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:2079: 5.037.026a tad asmin kāryaniryoge vīraivaṃ duratikrame 5.037.026c kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ tvaṃ hi kāryavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2080: 5.037.027a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_05_u:2081: 5.037.027c paryāptaḥ paravīraghna yaśasyas te balodayaḥ 5.037.028a balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ rāvaṇaṃ jitya saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:2082: 5.037.028c vijayī svapuraṃ yāyāt tat tu me syād yaśaskaram 5.037.029a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2083: 5.037.029c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet 5.037.030a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2084: 5.037.030c bhaved āhava śūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya
GE09ram_05_u:2085: 5.037.031a tad arthopahitaṃ vākyaṃ sahitaṃ hetusaṃhitam 5.037.031c niśamya hanumāñ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2086: 5.037.032a devi haryṛkṣasainyānām īśvaraḥ plavatāṃ varaḥ 5.037.032c sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpannas tavārthe kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2088: 5.037.033c kṣipram eṣyati vaidehi rākṣasānāṃ nibarhaṇaḥ 5.037.034a tasya vikramasaṃpannāḥ sattvavanto mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2090: 5.037.035a yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2091: 5.037.035c na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2094: 5.037.037a madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2095: 5.037.037c mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:2096: 5.037.038a ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ 5.037.038c na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2097: 5.037.039a tad alaṃ paritāpena devi śoko vyapaitu te
GE09ram_05_u:2098: 5.037.039c ekotpātena te laṅkām eṣyanti hariyūthapāḥ 5.037.040a mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
GE09ram_05_u:2100: 5.037.041a tau hi vīrau naravarau sahitau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_05_u:2101: 5.037.041c āgamya nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ sāyakair vidhamiṣyataḥ 5.037.042a sagaṇaṃ rāvaṇaṃ hatvā rāghavo raghunandanaḥ 5.037.042c tvām ādāya varārohe svapuraṃ pratiyāsyati 5.037.043a tad āśvasihi bhadraṃ te bhava tvaṃ kālakāṅkṣiṇī
GE09ram_05_u:2102: 5.037.043c nacirād drakṣyase rāmaṃ prajvajantam ivānilam 5.037.044a nihate rākṣasendre ca saputrāmātyabāndhave
GE09ram_05_u:2103: 5.037.044c tvaṃ sameṣyasi rāmeṇa śaśāṅkeneva rohiṇī 5.037.045a kṣipraṃ tvaṃ devi śokasya pāraṃ yāsyasi maithili
GE09ram_05_u:2105: 5.037.046a evam āśvasya vaidehīṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.037.046c gamanāya matiṃ kṛtvā vaidehīṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2106: 5.037.047a tam arighnaṃ kṛtātmānaṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam
GE09ram_05_u:2107: 5.037.047c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhanuṣpāṇiṃ laṅkādvāram upasthitam 5.037.048a nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhān vīrān siṃhaśārdūlavikramān
GE09ram_05_u:2108: 5.037.048c vānarān vāraṇendrābhān kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi saṃgatān 5.037.049a śailāmbudanikāśānāṃ laṅkāmalayasānuṣu 5.037.049c nardatāṃ kapimukhyānām ārye yūthāny anekaśaḥ 5.037.050a sa tu marmaṇi ghoreṇa tāḍito manmatheṣuṇā
GE09ram_05_u:2109: 5.037.050c na śarma labhate rāmaḥ siṃhārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2110: 5.037.051a mā rudo devi śokena mā bhūt te manaso 'priyam
GE09ram_05_u:2111: 5.037.051c śacīva pathyā śakreṇa bhartrā nāthavatī hy asi
GE09ram_05_u:2112: 5.037.052a rāmād viśiṣṭaḥ ko 'nyo 'sti kaś cit saumitriṇā samaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2113: 5.037.052c agnimārutakalpau tau bhrātarau tava saṃśrayau 5.037.053a nāsmiṃś ciraṃ vatsyasi devi deśe; rakṣogaṇair adhyuṣito 'tiraudre
GE09ram_05_u:2114: 5.037.053c na te cirād āgamanaṃ priyasya; kṣamasva matsaṃgamakālamātram 5.038.001a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya vāyusūnor mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2116: 5.038.002a tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā priyavaktāraṃ saṃprahṛṣyāmi vānara 5.038.002c ardhasaṃjātasasyeva vṛṣṭiṃ prāpya vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_05_u:2117: 5.038.003a yathā taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ gātraiḥ śokābhikarśitaiḥ 5.038.003c saṃspṛśeyaṃ sakāmāhaṃ tathā kuru dayāṃ mayi
GE09ram_05_u:2118: 5.038.004a abhijñānaṃ ca rāmasya dattaṃ harigaṇottama 5.038.004c kṣiptām īṣikāṃ kākasya kopād ekākṣiśātanīm 5.038.005a manaḥśilāyās tikalo gaṇḍapārśve niveśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2119: 5.038.005c tvayā pranaṣṭe tilake taṃ kila smartum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:2120: 5.038.006a sa vīryavān kathaṃ sītāṃ hṛtāṃ samanumanyase
GE09ram_05_u:2122: 5.038.007a eṣa cūḍāmaṇir divyo mayā suparirakṣitaḥ 5.038.007c etaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣyāmi vyasane tvām ivānagha
GE09ram_05_u:2123: 5.038.008a eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2124: 5.038.008c ataḥ paraṃ na śakṣyāmi jīvituṃ śokalālasā
GE09ram_05_u:2125: 5.038.009a asahyāni ca duḥkhāni vācaś ca hṛdayacchidaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2126: 5.038.009c rākṣasīnāṃ sughorāṇāṃ tvatkṛte marṣayāmy aham 5.038.010a dhārayiṣyāmi māsaṃ tu jīvitaṃ śatrusūdana 5.038.010c māsād ūrdhvaṃ na jīviṣye tvayā hīnā nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_05_u:2127: 5.038.011a ghoro rākṣasarājo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭiś ca na sukhā mayi 5.038.011c tvāṃ ca śrutvā vipadyantaṃ na jīveyam ahaṃ kṣaṇam 5.038.012a vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā karuṇaṃ sāśrubhāṣitam 5.038.012c athābravīn mahātejā hanumān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2128: 5.038.013a tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
GE09ram_05_u:2129: 5.038.013c rāme śokābhibhūte tu lakṣmaṇaḥ paritapyate 5.038.014a dṛṣṭā kathaṃ cid bhavatī na kālaḥ pariśocitum
GE09ram_05_u:2130: 5.038.014c imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
GE09ram_05_u:2131: 5.038.015a tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau rājaputrāv aninditau 5.038.015c tvaddarśanakṛtotsāhau laṅkāṃ bhasmīkariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2132: 5.038.016a hatvā tu samare krūraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
GE09ram_05_u:2133: 5.038.016c rāghavau tvāṃ viśālākṣi svāṃ purīṃ prāpayiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2134: 5.038.017a yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:2135: 5.038.017c prītisaṃjananaṃ tasya bhūyas tvaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:2136: 5.038.018a sābravīd dattam eveha mayābhijñānam uttamam 5.038.018c etad eva hi rāmasya dṛṣṭvā
GE09ram_05_u:2137: 5.038.018e śraddheyaṃ hanuman vākyaṃ tava vīra bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2138: 5.038.019a sa taṃ maṇivaraṃ gṛhya śrīmān plavagasattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2144: 5.038.021c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
GE09ram_05_u:2145: 5.038.022a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2146: 5.038.022c asmād duḥkhāmbusaṃrodhāt tat samādhātum arhasi 5.038.023a imaṃ ca tīvraṃ mama śokavegaṃ; rakṣobhir ebhiḥ paribhartsanaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2148: 5.038.023c brūyās tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpaṃ; śivaś ca te 'dhvāstu
GE09ram_05_u:2150: 5.038.024a sa rājaputryā prativeditārthaḥ; kapiḥ kṛtārthaḥ parihṛṣṭacetāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2151: 5.038.024c tad alpaśeṣaṃ prasamīkṣya kāryaṃ; diśaṃ hy udīcīṃ manasā jagāma 5.039.001a sa ca vāgbhiḥ praśastābhir gamiṣyan pūjitas tayā
GE09ram_05_u:2152: 5.039.001c tasmād deśād apakramya cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2153: 5.039.002a alpaśeṣam idaṃ kāryaṃ dṛṣṭeyam asitekṣaṇā 5.039.002c trīn upāyān atikramya caturtha iha dṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:2154: 5.039.003a na sāma rakṣaḥsu guṇāya kalpate; na danam arthopaciteṣu vartate
GE09ram_05_u:2155: 5.039.003c na bhedasādhyā baladarpitā janāḥ; parākramas tv eṣa mameha rocate 5.039.004a na cāsya kāryasya parākramād ṛte; viniścayaḥ kaś cid
GE09ram_05_u:2157: 5.039.004c hṛtapravīrās tu raṇe hi rākṣasāḥ; kathaṃ cid īyur yad ihādya mārdavam
GE09ram_05_u:2158: 5.039.005a kārye karmaṇi nirdiṣṭo yo bahūny api sādhayet
GE09ram_05_u:2159: 5.039.005c pūrvakāryavirodhena sa kāryaṃ kartum arhati 5.039.006a na hy ekaḥ sādhako hetuḥ svalpasyāpīha karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2160: 5.039.006c yo hy arthaṃ bahudhā veda sa samartho 'rthasādhane
GE09ram_05_u:2161: 5.039.007a ihaiva tāvat kṛtaniścayo hy ahaṃ; yadi vrajeyaṃ plavageśvarālayam
GE09ram_05_u:2162: 5.039.007c parātmasaṃmarda viśeṣatattvavit; tataḥ kṛtaṃ syān mama bhartṛśāsanam 5.039.008a kathaṃ nu khalv adya bhavet sukhāgataṃ; prasahya yuddhaṃ mama
GE09ram_05_u:2163: rākṣasaiḥ saha 5.039.008c tathaiva khalv ātmabalaṃ ca sāravat; samānayen māṃ ca raṇe daśānanaḥ 5.039.009a idam asya nṛśaṃsasya nandanopamam uttamam 5.039.009c vanaṃ netramanaḥkāntaṃ nānādrumalatāyutam
GE09ram_05_u:2164: 5.039.010a idaṃ vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmi śuṣkaṃ vanam ivānalaḥ 5.039.010c asmin bhagne tataḥ kopaṃ kariṣyati sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2165: 5.039.011a tato mahat sāśvamahārathadvipaṃ; balaṃ samāneṣv api
GE09ram_05_u:2167: 5.039.011c triśūlakālāyasapaṭṭiśāyudhaṃ; tato mahad yuddham idaṃ bhaviṣyati 5.039.012a ahaṃ tu taiḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaiḥ; sametya rakṣobhir asaṃgavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2168: 5.039.012c nihatya tad rāvaṇacoditaṃ balaṃ; sukhaṃ gamiṣyāmi kapīśvarālayam
GE09ram_05_u:2169: 5.039.013a tato mārutavat kruddho mārutir bhīmavikramaḥ 5.039.013c ūruvegena mahatā drumān kṣeptum athārabhat 5.039.014a tatas tad dhanumān vīro babhañja pramadāvanam
GE09ram_05_u:2170: 5.039.014c mattadvijasamāghuṣṭaṃ nānādrumalatāyutam 5.039.015a tad vanaṃ mathitair vṛkṣair bhinnaiś ca salilāśayaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2172: 5.039.016a latāgṛhaiś citragṛhaiś ca nāśitair; mahoragair vyālamṛgaiś ca
GE09ram_05_u:2174: 5.039.016c śilāgṛhair unmathitais tathā gṛhaiḥ; pranaṣṭarūpaṃ tad abhūn
GE09ram_05_u:2175: mahad vanam 5.039.017a sa tasya kṛtvārthapater mahākapir; mahad vyalīkaṃ manaso
GE09ram_05_u:2177: 5.039.017c yuyutsur eko bahubhir mahābalaiḥ; śriyā jvalaṃs toraṇam āśritaḥ kapiḥ 5.040.001a tataḥ pakṣininādena vṛkṣabhaṅgasvanena ca
GE09ram_05_u:2179: 5.040.002a vidrutāś ca bhayatrastā vinedur mṛgapakṣuṇaḥ 5.040.002c rakṣasāṃ ca nimittāni krūrāṇi pratipedire 5.040.003a tato gatāyāṃ nidrāyāṃ rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ 5.040.003c tad vanaṃ dadṛśur bhagnaṃ taṃ ca vīraṃ mahākapim 5.040.004a sa tā dṛṣṭva mahābāhur mahāsattvo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2180: 5.040.004c cakāra sumahad rūpaṃ rākṣasīnāṃ bhayāvaham 5.040.005a tatas taṃ girisaṃkāśam atikāyaṃ mahābalam 5.040.005c rākṣasyo vānaraṃ dṛṣṭvā papracchur janakātmajām 5.040.006a ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāyaṃ kiṃnimittam ihāgataḥ 5.040.006c kathaṃ tvayā sahānena saṃvādaḥ kṛta ity uta
GE09ram_05_u:2181: 5.040.007a ācakṣva no viśālākṣi mā bhūt te subhage bhayam 5.040.007c saṃvādam asitāpāṅge tvayā kiṃ kṛtavān ayam
GE09ram_05_u:2182: 5.040.008a athābravīt tadā sādhvī sītā sarvāṅgaśobhanā 5.040.008c rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpāṇāṃ vijñāne mama kā gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2183: 5.040.009a yūyam evāsya jānīta yo 'yaṃ yad vā kariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2184: 5.040.009c ahir eva aheḥ pādān vijānāti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2185: 5.040.010a aham apy asya bhītāsmi nainaṃ jānāmi ko 'nvayam
GE09ram_05_u:2186: 5.040.010c vedmi rākṣasam evainaṃ kāmarūpiṇam āgatam 5.040.011a vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasyo vidrutā drutam
GE09ram_05_u:2187: 5.040.011c sthitāḥ kāś cid gatāḥ kāś cid rāvaṇāya niveditum 5.040.012a rāvaṇasya samīpe tu rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ 5.040.012c virūpaṃ vānaraṃ bhīmam ākhyatum upacakramuḥ 5.040.013a aśokavanikā madhye rājan bhīmavapuḥ kapiḥ 5.040.013c sītayā kṛtasaṃvādas tiṣṭhaty amitavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2188: 5.040.014a na ca taṃ jānakī sītā hariṃ hariṇalocaṇā
GE09ram_05_u:2189: 5.040.014c asmābhir bahudhā pṛṣṭā nivedayitum icchati 5.040.015a vāsavasya bhaved dūto dūto vaiśravaṇasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:2191: 5.040.016a tena tvadbhūtarūpeṇa yat tat tava manoharam
GE09ram_05_u:2193: 5.040.017a na tatra kaś cid uddeśo yas tena na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2194: 5.040.017c yatra sā jānakī sītā sa tena na vināśitaḥ 5.040.018a jānakīrakṣaṇārthaṃ vā śramād vā nopalabhyate 5.040.018c atha vā kaḥ śramas tasya saiva tenābhirakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:2195: 5.040.019a cārupallavapatrāḍhyaṃ yaṃ sītā svayam āsthitā 5.040.019c pravṛddhaḥ śiṃśapāvṛkṣaḥ sa ca tenābhirakṣitaḥ 5.040.020a tasyograrūpasyograṃ tvaṃ daṇḍam ājñātum arhasi 5.040.020c sītā saṃbhāṣitā yena tad vanaṃ ca vināśitam
GE09ram_05_u:2197: 5.040.021c kaḥ sītām abhibhāṣeta yo na syāt tyaktajīvitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2198: 5.040.022a rākṣasīnāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ 5.040.022c hutāgir iva jajvāla
GE09ram_05_u:2199: 5.040.023a ātmanaḥ sadṛśāñ śūrān kiṃkarān nāma rākṣasān
GE09ram_05_u:2205: 5.040.026a te kapiṃ taṃ samāsādya toraṇastham avasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:2206: 5.040.026c abhipetur mahāvegāḥ pataṅgā iva pāvakam 5.040.027a te gadābhir vicitrābhiḥ parighaiḥ kāñcanāṅgadaiḥ 5.040.027c ājaghnur vānaraśreṣṭhaṃ śarair ādityasaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2207: 5.040.028a hanūmān api tejasvī śrīmān parvatasaṃnibhaḥ 5.040.028c kṣitāv āvidhya lāṅgūlaṃ nanāda ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_05_u:2209: 5.040.029c dadṛśuś ca hanūmantaṃ saṃdhyāmegham ivonnatam 5.040.030a svāmisaṃdeśaniḥśaṅkās tatas te rākṣasāḥ kapim 5.040.030c citraiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2210: 5.040.031a sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ sarvataḥ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2212: 5.040.032a sa taṃ parigham ādāya jaghāna rajanīcarān
GE09ram_05_u:2213: 5.040.033a sa pannagam ivādāya sphurantaṃ vinatāsutaḥ 5.040.033c vicacārāmbare vīraḥ parigṛhya ca mārutiḥ 5.040.034a sa hatvā rākṣasān vīraḥ kiṃkarān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2214: 5.040.034c yuddhākāṅkṣī punar vīras toraṇaṃ samupasthitaḥ 5.040.035a tatas tasmād bhayān muktāḥ kati cit tatra rākṣasāḥ 5.040.035c nihatān kiṃkarān sarvān rāvaṇāya nyavedayan 5.040.036a sa rākṣasānāṃ nihataṃ mahābalaṃ; niśamya rājā parivṛttalocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2216: 5.041.001a tataḥ sa kiṃkarān hatvā hanūmān dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2217: 5.041.001c vanaṃ bhagnaṃ mayā caityaprāsādo na vināśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2218: 5.041.001e tasmāt prāsādam apy evam imaṃ vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:2219: 5.041.002a iti saṃcintya hanumān manasā darśayan balam
GE09ram_05_u:2222: 5.041.003a saṃpradhṛṣya ca durdharṣaś caityaprāsādam unnatam 5.041.003c hanūmān prajvalaṃl lakṣmyā pāriyātropamo 'bhavat
GE09ram_05_u:2223: 5.041.004a sa bhūtvā tu mahākāyo hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2224: 5.041.004c dhṛṣṭam āsphoṭayām āsa laṅkāṃ śabdena pūrayan
GE09ram_05_u:2226: 5.041.005c petur vihaṃgā gaganād uccaiś cedam aghoṣayat
GE09ram_05_u:2227: 5.041.006a jayaty atibalo rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2229: 5.041.007a dāso 'haṃ kosalendrasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 5.041.007c hanumāñ śatrusainyānāṃ nihantā mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2230: 5.041.008a na rāvaṇasahasraṃ me yuddhe pratibalaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:2231: 5.041.008c śilābhis tu praharataḥ pādapaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2232: 5.041.009a ardayitvā purīṃ laṅkām abhivādya ca maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:2234: 5.041.010a evam uktvā vimānasthaś caityasthān haripuṃgavaḥ 5.041.010c nanāda bhīmanirhrādo rakṣasāṃ janayan bhayam 5.041.011a tena śabdena mahatā caityapālāḥ śataṃ yayuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2235: 5.041.011c gṛhītvā vividhān astrān prāsān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_05_u:2237: 5.041.012a āvarta iva gaṅgāyās toyasya vipulo mahān
GE09ram_05_u:2238: 5.041.012c parikṣipya hariśreṣṭhaṃ sa babhau rakṣasāṃ gaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2239: 5.041.013a tato vātātmajaḥ kruddho bhīmarūpaṃ samāsthitaḥ 5.041.014a prāsādasya mahāṃs tasya stambhaṃ hemapariṣkṛtam 5.041.014c utpāṭayitvā vegena hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2240: 5.041.014e tatas taṃ bhrāmayām āsa śatadhāraṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2241: 5.041.015a sa rākṣasaśataṃ hatvā vajreṇendra ivāsurān 5.041.015c antarikṣasthitaḥ śrīmān idaṃ vacanam abravīt 5.041.016a mādṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi visṛṣṭāni mahātmanām
GE09ram_05_u:2243: 5.041.017a śataiḥ śatasahasraiś ca koṭībhir ayutair api
GE09ram_05_u:2244: 5.041.017c āgamiṣyati sugrīvaḥ sarveṣāṃ vo niṣūdanaḥ 5.041.018a neyam asti purī laṅkā na yūyaṃ na ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2245: 5.041.018c yasmād ikṣvākunāthena baddhaṃ vairaṃ mahātmanā 5.042.001a saṃdiṣṭo rākṣasendreṇa prahastasya suto balī 5.042.001c jambumālī mahādaṃṣṭro nirjagāma dhanurdharaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2248: 5.042.003a dhanuḥ śakradhanuḥ prakhyaṃ mahad rucirasāyakam 5.042.003c visphārayāṇo vegena
GE09ram_05_u:2249: 5.042.004a tasya visphāraghoṣeṇa dhanuṣo mahatā diśaḥ 5.042.004c pradiśaś ca nabhaś caiva sahasā samapūryata
GE09ram_05_u:2250: 5.042.005a rathena kharayuktena tam āgatam udīkṣya saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2251: 5.042.005c hanūmān vegasaṃpanno jaharṣa ca nanāda ca
GE09ram_05_u:2253: 5.042.006c jambumālī mahābāhur vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ 5.042.007a ardhacandreṇa vadane śirasy ekena karṇinā 5.042.007c bāhvor vivyādha nārācair daśabhis taṃ kapīśvaram
GE09ram_05_u:2254: 5.042.008a tasya tac chuśubhe tāmraṃ śareṇābhihataṃ mukham
GE09ram_05_u:2258: 5.042.010a tarasā tāṃ samutpāṭya cikṣepa balavad balī
GE09ram_05_u:2259: 5.042.010c tāṃ śarair daśabhiḥ kruddhas tāḍayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2260: 5.042.011a vipannaṃ karma tad dṛṣṭvā hanūmāṃś caṇḍavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2261: 5.042.011c sālaṃ vipulam utpāṭya bhrāmayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:2262: 5.042.012a bhrāmayantaṃ kapiṃ dṛṣṭvā sālavṛkṣaṃ mahābalam 5.042.012c cikṣepa subahūn bāṇāñ jambumālī mahābalaḥ 5.042.013a sālaṃ caturbhir ciccheda vānaraṃ pañcabhir bhuje
GE09ram_05_u:2263: 5.042.013c urasy ekena bāṇena daśabhis tu stanāntare
GE09ram_05_u:2264: 5.042.014a sa śaraiḥ pūritatanuḥ krodhena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2265: 5.042.014c tam eva parighaṃ gṛhya bhrāmayām āsa vegitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2266: 5.042.015a ativego 'tivegena bhrāmayitvā balotkaṭaḥ 5.042.015c parighaṃ pātayām āsa jambumāler mahorasi 5.042.016a tasya caiva śiro nāsti na bāhū na ca jānunī
GE09ram_05_u:2267: 5.042.016c na dhanur na ratho nāśvās tatrādṛśyanta neṣavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2268: 5.042.017a sa hatas tarasā tena jambumālī mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2270: 5.042.018a jambumāliṃ ca nihataṃ kiṃkarāṃś ca mahābalān
GE09ram_05_u:2273: 5.042.019c amātyaputrān ativīryavikramān; samādideśāśu niśācareśvaraḥ 5.043.001a tatas te rākṣasendreṇa coditā mantriṇaḥ sutāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2274: 5.043.001c niryayur bhavanāt tasmāt sapta saptārcivarcasaḥ 5.043.002a mahābalaparīvārā dhanuṣmanto mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2280: 5.043.005a jananyas tās tatas teṣāṃ viditvā kiṃkarān hatān
GE09ram_05_u:2286: 5.043.008a avakīrṇas tatas tābhir hanūmāñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ 5.043.008c abhavat saṃvṛtākāraḥ śailarāḍ iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ 5.043.009a sa śarān vañcayām āsa teṣām āśucaraḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2288: 5.043.010a sa taiḥ krīḍan dhanuṣmadbhir vyomni vīraḥ prakāśate
GE09ram_05_u:2289: 5.043.010c dhanuṣmadbhir yathā meghair mārutaḥ prabhur ambare
GE09ram_05_u:2290: 5.043.011a sa kṛtvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ trāsayaṃs tāṃ mahācamūm
GE09ram_05_u:2291: 5.043.011c cakāra hanumān vegaṃ teṣu rakṣaḥsu vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:2292: 5.043.012a talenābhihanat kāṃś cit pādaiḥ kāṃś cit paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2293: 5.043.012c muṣṭinābhyahanat kāṃś cin nakhaiḥ kāṃś cid vyadārayat
GE09ram_05_u:2294: 5.043.013a pramamāthorasā kāṃś cid ūrubhyām aparān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2295: 5.043.013c ke cit tasyaiva nādena tatraiva patitā bhuvi
GE09ram_05_u:2296: 5.043.014a tatas teṣv avapanneṣu bhūmau nipatiteṣu ca
GE09ram_05_u:2297: 5.043.014c tat sainyam agamat sarvaṃ diśo daśabhayārditam
GE09ram_05_u:2298: 5.043.015a vinedur visvaraṃ nāgā nipetur bhuvi vājinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2299: 5.043.015c bhagnanīḍadhvajacchatrair bhūś ca kīrṇābhavad rathaiḥ 5.043.016a sa tān pravṛddhān vinihatya rākṣasān; mahābalaś caṇḍaparākramaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2300: 5.043.016c yuyutsur anyaiḥ punar eva rākṣasais; tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma
GE09ram_05_u:2302: 5.044.001a hatān mantrisutān buddhvā vānareṇa mahātmanā 5.044.001c rāvaṇaḥ saṃvṛtākāraś cakāra matim uttamām 5.044.002a sa virūpākṣayūpākṣau durdharaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ 5.044.002c praghasaṃ bhāsakarṇaṃ ca pañcasenāgranāyakān
GE09ram_05_u:2306: 5.044.004c savājirathamātaṅgāḥ sa kapiḥ śāsyatām iti 5.044.005a yat taiś ca khalu bhāvyaṃ syāt tam āsādya vanālayam
GE09ram_05_u:2308: 5.044.006a na hy ahaṃ taṃ kapiṃ manye karmaṇā pratitarkayan 5.044.006c sarvathā tan mahad bhūtaṃ mahābalaparigraham 5.044.006e bhaved indreṇa vā sṛṣṭam asmadarthaṃ tapobalāt
GE09ram_05_u:2309: 5.044.007a sanāgayakṣagandharvā devāsuramaharṣayaḥ 5.044.007c yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvair mayā saha vinirjitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2310: 5.044.008a tair avaśyaṃ vidhātavyaṃ vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid eva naḥ 5.044.008c tad eva nātra saṃdehaḥ prasahya parigṛhyatām
GE09ram_05_u:2311: 5.044.009a nāvamanyo bhavadbhiś ca hariḥ krūraparākramaḥ 5.044.009c dṛṣṭā hi harayaḥ śīghrā mayā vipulavikramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2312: 5.044.010a vālī ca saha sugrīvo jāmbavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2313: 5.044.010c nīlaḥ senāpatiś caiva ye cānye dvividādayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2314: 5.044.011a naiva teṣāṃ gatir bhīmā na tejo na parākramaḥ 5.044.011c na matir na balotsāho na rūpaparikalpanam
GE09ram_05_u:2315: 5.044.012a mahat sattvam idaṃ jñeyaṃ kapirūpaṃ vyavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:2316: 5.044.012c prayatnaṃ mahad āsthāya kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2317: 5.044.013a kāmaṃ lokās trayaḥ sendrāḥ sasurāsuramānavāḥ 5.044.013c bhavatām agrataḥ sthātuṃ na paryāptā raṇājire
GE09ram_05_u:2318: 5.044.014a tathāpi tu nayajñena jayam ākāṅkṣatā raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:2319: 5.044.014c ātmā rakṣyaḥ prayatnena yuddhasiddhir hi cañcalā
GE09ram_05_u:2320: 5.044.015a te svāmivacanaṃ sarve pratigṛhya mahaujasaḥ 5.044.015c samutpetur mahāvegā hutāśasamatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2321: 5.044.016a rathaiś ca mattair nāgaiś ca vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ 5.044.016c śastraiś ca vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ sarvaiś copacitā balaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2322: 5.044.017a tatas taṃ dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahākapim
GE09ram_05_u:2326: 5.044.019a taṃ samīkṣyaiva te sarve dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2327: 5.044.019c tais taiḥ praharaṇair bhīmair abhipetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2328: 5.044.020a tasya pañcāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ sitāḥ pītamukhāḥ śarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2330: 5.044.021a sa taiḥ pañcabhir āviddhaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2331: 5.044.021c utpapāta nadan vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan
GE09ram_05_u:2332: 5.044.022a tatas tu durdharo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajjakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2333: 5.044.022c kirañ śaraśatair naikair abhipede mahābalaḥ 5.044.023a sa kapir vārayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravarṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2334: 5.044.023c vṛṣṭimantaṃ payodānte payodam iva mārutaḥ 5.044.024a ardyamānas tatas tena durdhareṇānilātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2335: 5.044.024c cakāra ninadaṃ bhūyo vyavardhata ca vegavān
GE09ram_05_u:2336: 5.044.025a sa dūraṃ sahasotpatya durdharasya rathe hariḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2337: 5.044.025c nipapāta mahāvego vidyudrāśir girāv iva 5.044.026a tatas taṃ mathitāṣṭāśvaṃ rathaṃ bhagnākṣakūvaram 5.044.026c vihāya nyapatad bhūmau durdharas tyaktajīvitaḥ 5.044.027a taṃ virūpākṣayūpākṣau dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ bhuvi 5.044.027c saṃjātaroṣau durdharṣāv utpetatur ariṃdamau
GE09ram_05_u:2339: 5.044.028c mudgarābhyāṃ mahābāhur vakṣasy abhihataḥ kapiḥ 5.044.029a tayor vegavator vegaṃ vinihatya mahābalaḥ 5.044.029c nipapāta punar bhūmau suparṇasamavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2340: 5.044.030a sa sālavṛkṣam āsādya samutpāṭya ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2341: 5.044.030c tāv ubhau rākṣasau vīrau jaghāna pavanātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2342: 5.044.031a tatas tāṃs trīn hatāñ jñātvā vānareṇa tarasvinā
GE09ram_05_u:2343: 5.044.031c abhipede mahāvegaḥ prasahya praghaso harim 5.044.032a bhāsakarṇaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ śūlam ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:2346: 5.044.033c bhāsakarṇaś ca śūlena rākṣasaḥ kapisattamam 5.044.034a sa tābhyāṃ vikṣatair gātrair asṛgdigdhatanūruhaḥ 5.044.034c abhavad vānaraḥ kruddho bālasūryasamaprabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2348: 5.044.035c jaghāna hanumān vīro rākṣasau kapikuñjaraḥ 5.044.036a tatas teṣv avasanneṣu senāpatiṣu pañcasu 5.044.036c balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ tu nāśayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2349: 5.044.037a aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhair yodhān rathai rathān 5.044.037c sa kapir nāśayām āsa sahasrākṣa ivāsurān
GE09ram_05_u:2350: 5.044.038a hatair nāgaiś ca turagair bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2351: 5.044.038c hataiś ca rākṣasair bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2352: 5.044.039a tataḥ kapis tān dhvajinīpatīn raṇe; nihatya vīrān sabalān
GE09ram_05_u:2354: 5.044.039c tad eva vīraḥ parigṛhya toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:2355: 5.045.001a senāpatīn pañca sa tu pramāpitān; hanūmatā sānucarān savāhanān
GE09ram_05_u:2356: 5.045.001c samīkṣya rājā samaroddhatonmukhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ prasamaikṣatākṣatam
GE09ram_05_u:2357: 5.045.002a sa tasya dṛṣṭyarpaṇasaṃpracoditaḥ; pratāpavān kāñcanacitrakārmukaḥ 5.045.002c samutpapātātha sadasy udīrito; dvijātimukhyair haviṣeva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2359: 5.045.003c rathāṃ samāsthāya yayau sa vīryavān; mahāhariṃ taṃ prati
GE09ram_05_u:2362: 5.045.004c patākinaṃ ratnavibhūṣitadhvajaṃ; manojavāṣṭāśvavaraiḥ suyojitam 5.045.005a surāsurādhṛṣyam asaṃgacāriṇaṃ; raviprabhaṃ vyomacaraṃ samāhitam
GE09ram_05_u:2364: 5.045.006a virājamānaṃ pratipūrṇavastunā; sahemadāmnā śaśisūryavarvasā 5.045.006c divākarābhaṃ ratham āsthitas tataḥ; sa nirjagāmāmaratulyavikramaḥ 5.045.007a sa pūrayan khaṃ ca mahīṃ ca sācalāṃ;
GE09ram_05_u:2366: 5.045.007c balaiḥ sametaiḥ sa hi toraṇasthitaṃ; samartham āsīnam upāgamat
GE09ram_05_u:2368: 5.045.008a sa taṃ samāsādya hariṃ harīkṣaṇo; yugāntakālāgnim iva prajākṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:2369: 5.045.008c avasthitaṃ vismitajātasaṃbhramaḥ; samaikṣatākṣo bahumānacakṣuṣā 5.045.009a sa tasya vegaṃ ca kaper mahātmanaḥ; parākramaṃ cāriṣu pārhtivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2370: 5.045.009c vicārayan khaṃ ca balaṃ mahābalo; himakṣaye sūrya ivābhivardhate
GE09ram_05_u:2371: 5.045.010a sa jātamanyuḥ prasamīkṣya vikramaṃ; sthiraḥ sthitaḥ saṃyati
GE09ram_05_u:2373: 5.045.010c samāhitātmā hanumantam āhave; pracodayām āsa śarais tribhiḥ śitaiḥ 5.045.011a tataḥ kapiṃ taṃ prasamīkṣya garvitaṃ; jitaśramaṃ śatruparājayor jitam
GE09ram_05_u:2374: 5.045.011c avaikṣatākṣaḥ samudīrṇamānasaḥ; sabāṇapāṇiḥ pragṛhītakārmukaḥ 5.045.012a sa hemaniṣkāṅgadacārukuṇḍalaḥ; samāsasādāśu parākramaḥ kapim
GE09ram_05_u:2375: 5.045.012c tayor babhūvāpratimaḥ samāgamaḥ; surāsurāṇām api saṃbhramapradaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2376: 5.045.013a rarāsa bhūmir na tatāpa bhānumān; vavau na vāyuḥ pracacāla cācalaḥ 5.045.013c kapeḥ kumārasya ca vīkṣya saṃyugaṃ; nanāda ca dyaur udadhiś ca cukṣubhe
GE09ram_05_u:2377: 5.045.014a tataḥ sa vīraḥ sumukhān patatriṇaḥ; suvarṇapuṅkhān saviṣān ivoragān
GE09ram_05_u:2378: 5.045.014c samādhisaṃyogavimokṣatattvavic; charān atha trīn kapimūrdhny apātayat 5.045.015a sa taiḥ śarair mūrdhni samaṃ nipātitaiḥ; kṣarann asṛgdigdhavivṛttalocanaḥ 5.045.015c navoditādityanibhaḥ śarāṃśumān; vyarājatāditya ivāṃśumālikaḥ 5.045.016a tataḥ sa piṅgādhipamantrisattamaḥ; samīkṣya taṃ rājavarātmajaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2381: 5.045.017a sa mandarāgrastha ivāṃśumālī; vivṛddhakopo balavīryasaṃyutaḥ 5.045.017c kumāram akṣaṃ sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ; dadāha netrāgnimarīcibhis tadā
GE09ram_05_u:2382: 5.045.018a tataḥ sa bāṇāsanaśakrakārmukaḥ; śarapravarṣo yudhi rākṣasāmbudaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2383: 5.045.018c śarān mumocāśu harīśvarācale; balāhako vṛṣṭim ivācalottame
GE09ram_05_u:2385: 5.045.019c kumāram akṣaṃ prasamīkṣya saṃyuge; nanāda harṣād ghanatulyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2386: 5.045.020a sa bālabhāvād yudhi vīryadarpitaḥ; pravṛddhamanyuḥ kṣatajopamekṣaṇaḥ 5.045.020c samāsasādāpratimaṃ raṇe kapiṃ; gajo mahākūpam ivāvṛtaṃ tṛṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2387: 5.045.021a sa tena bāṇaiḥ prasabhaṃ nipātitaiś; cakāra nādaṃ ghananādaniḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2388: 5.045.021c samutpapātāśu nabhaḥ sa mārutir; bhujoruvikṣepaṇa ghoradarśanaḥ 5.045.022a samutpatantaṃ samabhidravad balī; sa rākṣasānāṃ pravaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2390: 5.045.022c rathī rathaśreṣṭhatamaḥ kirañ śaraiḥ; payodharaḥ śailam ivāśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2391: 5.045.023a sa tāñ śarāṃs tasya vimokṣayan kapiś; cacāra vīraḥ pathi
GE09ram_05_u:2393: 5.045.023c śarāntare mārutavad viniṣpatan; manojavaḥ saṃyati caṇḍavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2394: 5.045.024a tam āttabāṇāsanam āhavonmukhaṃ; kham āstṛṇantaṃ vividhaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2396: 5.045.024c avaikṣatākṣaṃ bahumānacakṣuṣā; jagāma cintāṃ ca sa mārutātmajaḥ 5.045.025a tataḥ śarair bhinnabhujāntaraḥ kapiḥ; kumāravaryeṇa mahātmanā nadan
GE09ram_05_u:2397: 5.045.025c mahābhujaḥ karmaviśeṣatattvavid; vicintayām āsa raṇe parākramam
GE09ram_05_u:2398: 5.045.026a abālavad bāladivākaraprabhaḥ; karoty ayaṃ karma mahan mahābalaḥ 5.045.026c na cāsya sarvāhavakarmaśobhinaḥ; pramāpaṇe me matir atra jāyate 5.045.027a ayaṃ mahātmā ca mahāṃś ca vīryataḥ; samāhitaś cātisahaś ca
GE09ram_05_u:2400: 5.045.027c asaṃśayaṃ karmaguṇodayād ayaṃ; sanāgayakṣair munibhiś ca
GE09ram_05_u:2404: 5.045.028c parākramo hy asya manāṃsi kampayet; surāsurāṇām api śīghrakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2405: 5.045.029a na khalv ayaṃ nābhibhaved upekṣitaḥ; parākramo hy asya raṇe vivardhate 5.045.029c pramāpaṇaṃ tv eva mamāsya rocate; na vardhamāno 'gnir upekṣituṃ kṣamaḥ 5.045.030a iti pravegaṃ tu parasya tarkayan; svakarmayogaṃ ca vidhāya
GE09ram_05_u:2407: 5.045.030c cakāra vegaṃ tu mahābalas tadā; matiṃ ca cakre 'sya vadhe mahākapiḥ 5.045.031a sa tasya tān aṣṭahayān mahājavān; samāhitān bhārasahān vivartane
GE09ram_05_u:2408: 5.045.031c jaghāna vīraḥ pathi vāyusevite; talaprahālaiḥ pavanātmajaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2409: 5.045.032a tatas talenābhihato mahārathaḥ; sa tasya piṅgādhipamantrinirjitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2410: 5.045.032c sa bhagnanīḍaḥ parimuktakūbaraḥ; papāta bhūmau hatavājir
GE09ram_05_u:2412: 5.045.033a sa taṃ parityajya mahāratho rathaṃ; sakārmukaḥ khaḍgadharaḥ kham utpatat 5.045.033c tapo'bhiyogād ṛṣir ugravīryavān; vihāya dehaṃ marutām ivālayam
GE09ram_05_u:2413: 5.045.034a tataḥ kapis taṃ vicarantam ambare; patatrirājānilasiddhasevite
GE09ram_05_u:2414: 5.045.034c sametya taṃ mārutavegavikramaḥ; krameṇa jagrāha ca pādayor dṛḍham 5.045.035a sa taṃ samāvidhya sahasraśaḥ kapir; mahoragaṃ gṛhya ivāṇḍajeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2415: 5.045.035c mumoca vegāt pitṛtulyavikramo; mahītale saṃyati vānarottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2416: 5.045.036a sa bhagnabāhūrukaṭīśiro dharaḥ; kṣarann asṛn nirmathitāsthilocanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2417: 5.045.036c sa bhinnasaṃdhiḥ pravikīrṇabandhano; hataḥ kṣitau vāyusutena
GE09ram_05_u:2419: 5.045.037a mahākapir bhūmitale nipīḍya taṃ; cakāra rakṣo'dhipater mahad bhayam 5.045.038a maharṣibhiś cakracarair mahāvrataiḥ; sametya bhūtaiś ca
GE09ram_05_u:2421: 5.045.038c suraiś ca sendrair bhṛśajātavismayair; hate kumāre sa kapir nirīkṣitaḥ 5.045.039a nihatya taṃ vajrasutopamaprabhaṃ; kumāram akṣaṃ kṣatajopamekṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2422: 5.045.039c tad eva vīro 'bhijagāma toraṇaṃ; kṛtakṣaṇaḥ kāla iva prajākṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:2423: 5.046.001a tatas tu rakṣo'dhipatir mahātmā; hanūmatākṣe nihate kumāre
GE09ram_05_u:2424: 5.046.001c manaḥ samādhāya tadendrakalpaṃ; samādideśendrajitaṃ sa roṣāt
GE09ram_05_u:2425: 5.046.002a tvam astravic chastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ; surāsurāṇām api śokadātā
GE09ram_05_u:2427: 5.046.003a tavāstrabalam āsādya nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ 5.046.003c na kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu saṃyuge na gataśramaḥ 5.046.004a bhujavīryābhiguptaś ca tapasā cābhirakṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2429: 5.046.005a na te 'sty aśakyaṃ samareṣu karmaṇā; na te 'sty akāryaṃ matipūrvamantraṇe 5.046.005c na so 'sti kaś cit triṣu saṃgraheṣu vai; na veda yas te
GE09ram_05_u:2431: 5.046.006a mamānurūpaṃ tapaso balaṃ ca te; parākramaś cāstrabalaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:2433: 5.046.006c na tvāṃ samāsādya raṇāvamarde; manaḥ śramaṃ gacchati
GE09ram_05_u:2435: 5.046.007a nihatā iṃkarāḥ sarve jambumālī ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2436: 5.046.007c amātyaputrā vīrāś ca pañca senāgrayāyinaḥ 5.046.008a sahodaras te dayitaḥ kumāro 'kṣaś ca sūditaḥ 5.046.008c na tu teṣv eva me sāro yas tvayy ariniṣūdana
GE09ram_05_u:2437: 5.046.009a idaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā matiman mahad balaṃ; kapeḥ prabhāvaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:2438: parākramaṃ ca 5.046.009c tvam ātmanaś cāpi samīkṣya sāraṃ; kuruṣva vegaṃ svabalānurūpam
GE09ram_05_u:2439: 5.046.010a balāvamardas tvayi saṃnikṛṣṭe; yathā gate śāmyati śāntaśatrau
GE09ram_05_u:2440: 5.046.010c tathā samīkṣyātmabalaṃ paraṃ ca; samārabhasvāstravidāṃ variṣṭha 5.046.011a na khalv iyaṃ matiḥ śreṣṭhā yat tvāṃ saṃpreṣayāmy aham
GE09ram_05_u:2441: 5.046.011c iyaṃ ca rājadharmāṇāṃ kṣatrasya ca matir matā
GE09ram_05_u:2442: 5.046.012a nānāśastraiś ca saṃgrāme vaiśāradyam ariṃdama 5.046.012c avaśyam eva boddhavyaṃ kāmyaś ca vijayo raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:2443: 5.046.013a tataḥ pitus tad vacanaṃ niśamya; pradakṣiṇaṃ dakṣasutaprabhāvaḥ 5.046.013c cakāra bhartāram adīnasattvo; raṇāya vīraḥ pratipannabuddhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2444: 5.046.014a tatas taiḥ svagaṇair iṣṭair indrajit pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2447: 5.046.015c nirjagāma mahātejāḥ samudra iva parvasu 5.046.016a sa pakṣi rājopamatulyavegair; vyālaiś caturbhiḥ sitatīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2448: 5.046.016c rathaṃ samāyuktam asaṃgavegaṃ; samārurohendrajid indrakalpaḥ 5.046.017a sa rathī dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śastrajño 'stravidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2450: 5.046.018a sa tasya rathanirghoṣaṃ jyāsvanaṃ kārmukasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2452: 5.046.019a sumahac cāpam ādāya śitaśalyāṃś ca sāyakān
GE09ram_05_u:2454: 5.046.020a tasmiṃs tataḥ saṃyati jātaharṣe; raṇāya nirgacchati bāṇapāṇau
GE09ram_05_u:2455: 5.046.020c diśaś ca sarvāḥ kaluṣā babhūvur; mṛgāś ca raudrā bahudhā vineduḥ 5.046.021a samāgatās tatra tu nāgayakṣā; maharṣayaś cakracarāś ca siddhāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2456: 5.046.021c nabhaḥ samāvṛtya ca pakṣisaṃghā; vinedur uccaiḥ paramaprahṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2457: 5.046.022a āyantaṃ sarathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūrṇam indrajitaṃ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2458: 5.046.022c vinanāda mahānādaṃ vyavardhata ca vegavān 5.046.023a indrajit tu rathaṃ divyam āsthitaś citrakārmukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2460: 5.046.024a tataḥ sametāv atitīkṣṇavegau; mahābalau tau raṇanirviśaṅkau
GE09ram_05_u:2461: 5.046.024c kapiś ca rakṣo'dhipateś ca putraḥ; surāsurendrāv iva baddhavairau
GE09ram_05_u:2462: 5.046.025a sa tasya vīrasya mahārathasyā; dhanuṣmataḥ saṃyati saṃmatasya
GE09ram_05_u:2463: 5.046.025c śarapravegaṃ vyahanat pravṛddhaś; cacāra mārge pitur aprameyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2464: 5.046.026a tataḥ śarān āyatatīkṣṇaśalyān; supatriṇaḥ kāñcanacitrapuṅkhān 5.046.026c mumoca vīraḥ paravīrahantā; susaṃtatān vajranipātavegān 5.046.027a sa tasya tat syandananiḥsvanaṃ ca; mṛdaṅgabherīpaṭahasvanaṃ ca 5.046.027c vikṛṣyamāṇasya ca kārmukasya; niśamya ghoṣaṃ punar utpapāta
GE09ram_05_u:2465: 5.046.028a śarāṇām antareṣv āśu vyavartata mahākapiḥ 5.046.028c haris tasyābhilakṣasya mokṣayaṃl lakṣyasaṃgraham
GE09ram_05_u:2466: 5.046.029a śarāṇām agratas tasya punaḥ samabhivartata 5.046.029c prasārya hastau hanumān
GE09ram_05_u:2469: 5.046.031a hanūmato veda na rākṣaso 'ntaraṃ; na mārutis tasya mahātmano
GE09ram_05_u:2471: 5.046.031c parasparaṃ nirviṣahau babhūvatuḥ; sametya tau devasamānavikramau
GE09ram_05_u:2472: 5.046.032a tatas tu lakṣye sa vihanyamāne; śareṣu mogheṣu ca saṃpatatsu
GE09ram_05_u:2474: 5.046.033a tato matiṃ rākṣasarājasūnuś; cakāra tasmin harivīramukhye
GE09ram_05_u:2475: 5.046.033c avadhyatāṃ tasya kapeḥ samīkṣya; kathaṃ nigacched iti
GE09ram_05_u:2477: 5.046.034a tataḥ paitāmahāṃ vīraḥ so 'stram astravidāṃ varaḥ 5.046.034c saṃdadhe sumahātejās taṃ haripravaraṃ prati 5.046.035a avadhyo 'yam iti jñātvā tam astreṇāstratattvavit
GE09ram_05_u:2479: 5.046.036a tena baddhas tato 'streṇa rākṣasena sa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2480: 5.046.036c abhavan nirviceṣṭaś ca papāta ca mahītale
GE09ram_05_u:2481: 5.046.037a tato 'tha buddhvā sa tadāstrabandhaṃ; prabhoḥ prabhāvād vigatālpavegaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2482: 5.046.037c pitāmahānugraham ātmanaś ca; vicintayām āsa haripravīraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2483: 5.046.038a tataḥ svāyambhuvair mantrair brahmāstram abhimantritam 5.046.038c hanūmāṃś cintayām āsa varadānaṃ pitāmahāt 5.046.039a na me 'strabandhasya ca śaktir asti; vimokṣaṇe lokaguroḥ prabhāvāt
GE09ram_05_u:2484: 5.046.039c ity evam evaṃvihito 'strabandho; mayātmayoner anuvartitavyaḥ 5.046.040a sa vīryam astrasya kapir vicārya; pitāmahānugraham ātmanaś ca
GE09ram_05_u:2486: 5.046.041a astreṇāpi hi baddhasya bhayaṃ mama na jāyate
GE09ram_05_u:2488: 5.046.042a grahaṇe cāpi rakṣobhir mahan me guṇadarśanam
GE09ram_05_u:2489: 5.046.042c rākṣasendreṇa saṃvādas tasmād gṛhṇantu māṃ pare
GE09ram_05_u:2490: 5.046.043a sa niścitārthaḥ paravīrahantā; samīkṣya karī vinivṛttaceṣṭaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2491: 5.046.043c paraiḥ prasahyābhigatair nigṛhya; nanāda tais taiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2493: 5.046.044a tatas taṃ rākṣasā dṛṣṭvā nirviceṣṭam ariṃdamam
GE09ram_05_u:2494: 5.046.044c babandhuḥ śaṇavalkaiś ca drumacīraiś ca saṃhataiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2495: 5.046.045a sa rocayām āsa paraiś ca bandhanaṃ; prasahya vīrair abhinigrahaṃ ca 5.046.045c kautūhalān māṃ yadi rākṣasendro; draṣṭuṃ vyavasyed iti
GE09ram_05_u:2497: 5.046.046a sa baddhas tena valkena vimukto 'streṇa vīryavān
GE09ram_05_u:2498: 5.046.046c astrabandhaḥ sa cānyaṃ hi na bandham anuvartate
GE09ram_05_u:2499: 5.046.047a athendrajit taṃ drumacīrabandhaṃ; vicārya vīraḥ kapisattamaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2501: 5.046.047c vimuktam astreṇa jagāma cintām; anyena baddho hy anuvartate
GE09ram_05_u:2503: 5.046.048a aho mahat karma kṛtaṃ nirarthakaṃ; na rākṣasair mantragatir
GE09ram_05_u:2505: 5.046.048c punaś ca nāstre vihate 'stram anyat; pravartate saṃśayitāḥ sma
GE09ram_05_u:2507: 5.046.049a astreṇa hanumān mukto nātmānam avabudhyate 5.046.049c kṛṣyamāṇas tu rakṣobhis taiś ca bandhair nipīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2508: 5.046.050a hanyamānas tataḥ krūrai rākṣasaiḥ kāṣṭhamuṣṭibhiḥ 5.046.050c samīpaṃ rākṣasendrasya prākṛṣyata sa vānaraḥ 5.046.051a athendrajit taṃ prasamīkṣya muktam; astreṇa baddhaṃ drumacīrasūtraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2509: 5.046.051c vyadarśayat tatra mahābalaṃ taṃ; haripravīraṃ sagaṇāya rājñe
GE09ram_05_u:2510: 5.046.052a taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ baddhaṃ kapivarottamam
GE09ram_05_u:2512: 5.046.053a ko 'yaṃ kasya kuto vāpi kiṃ kāryaṃ ko vyapāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2513: 5.046.053c iti rākṣasavīrāṇāṃ tatra saṃjajñire kathāḥ 5.046.054a hanyatāṃ dahyatāṃ vāpi bhakṣyatām iti cāpare
GE09ram_05_u:2514: 5.046.054c rākṣasās tatra saṃkruddhāḥ parasparam athābruvan 5.046.055a atītya mārgaṃ sahasā mahātmā; sa tatra rakṣo'dhipapādamūle
GE09ram_05_u:2515: 5.046.055c dadarśa rājñaḥ paricāravṛddhān; gṛhaṃ mahāratnavibhūṣitaṃ ca
GE09ram_05_u:2516: 5.046.056a sa dadarśa mahātejā rāvaṇaḥ kapisattamam 5.046.056c rakṣobhir vikṛtākāraiḥ kṛṣyamāṇam itas tataḥ 5.046.057a rākṣasādhipatiṃ cāpi dadarśa kapisattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2518: 5.046.058a sa roṣasaṃvartitatāmradṛṣṭir; daśānanas taṃ kapim anvavekṣya
GE09ram_05_u:2519: 5.046.058c athopaviṣṭān kulaśīlavṛddhān; samādiśat taṃ prati mantramukhyān
GE09ram_05_u:2520: 5.046.059a yathākramaṃ taiḥ sa kapiś ca pṛṣṭaḥ; kāryārtham arthasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2521: mūlam ādau 5.046.059c nivedayām āsa harīśvarasya; dūtaḥ sakāśād aham āgato 'smi
GE09ram_05_u:2522: 5.047.001a tataḥ sa karmaṇā tasya vismito bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2526: 5.047.003a vajrasaṃyogasaṃyuktair mahārhamaṇivigrahaiḥ 5.047.003c haimair ābharaṇaiś citrair manaseva prakalpitaiḥ 5.047.004a mahārhakṣaumasaṃvītaṃ raktacandanarūṣitam 5.047.004c svanuliptaṃ vicitrābhir vividhabhiś ca bhaktibhiḥ 5.047.005a vipulair darśanīyaiś ca rakṣākṣair bhīmadarśanaiḥ 5.047.005c dīptatīkṣṇamahādaṃṣṭraiḥ pralambadaśanacchadaiḥ 5.047.006a śirobhir daśabhir vīraṃ bhrājamānaṃ mahaujasaṃ 5.047.006c nānāvyālasamākīrṇaiḥ śikharair iva mandaram
GE09ram_05_u:2536: 5.047.011c mantribhir mantratattvajñair nikumbhena ca mantriṇā 5.047.012a upopaviṣṭaṃ rakṣobhiś caturbhir baladarpitaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2537: 5.047.012c kṛtsnaiḥ parivṛtaṃ lokaṃ caturbhir iva sāgaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2538: 5.047.013a mantribhir mantratattvajñair anyaiś ca śubhabuddhibhiḥ 5.047.013c anvāsyamānaṃ sacivaiḥ surair iva sureśvaram 5.047.014a apaśyad rākṣasapatiṃ hanūmān atitejasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2539: 5.047.014c viṣṭhitaṃ meruśikhare satoyam iva toyadam 5.047.015a sa taiḥ saṃpīḍyamāno 'pi rakṣobhir bhīmavikramaiḥ 5.047.015c vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rakṣo'dhipam avaikṣata
GE09ram_05_u:2540: 5.047.016a bhrājamānaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā hanumān rākṣaseśvaram 5.047.016c manasā cintayām āsa tejasā tasya mohitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2541: 5.047.017a aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho sattvam aho dyutiḥ 5.047.017c aho rākṣasarājasya
GE09ram_05_u:2542: 5.047.018a yady adharmo na balavān syād ayaṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2543: 5.047.018c syād ayaṃ suralokasya saśakrasyāpi rakṣitā 5.047.019a tena bibhyati khalv asmāl lokāḥ sāmaradānavāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2544: 5.047.019c ayaṃ hy utsahate kruddhaḥ kartum ekārṇavaṃ jagat
GE09ram_05_u:2545: 5.047.020a iti cintāṃ bahuvidhām akaron matimān kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2547: 5.048.001a tam udvīkṣya mahābāhuḥ piṅgākṣaṃ purataḥ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:2549: 5.048.002a sa rājā roṣatāmrākṣaḥ prahastaṃ mantrisattamam 5.048.002c kālayuktam uvācedaṃ vaco vipulam arthavat 5.048.003a durātmā pṛcchyatām eṣa kutaḥ kiṃ vāsya kāraṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2550: 5.048.003c vanabhaṅge ca ko 'syārtho rākṣasīnāṃ ca tarjane
GE09ram_05_u:2551: 5.048.004a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasto vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2552: 5.048.004c samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te na bhīḥ kāryā tvayā kape 5.048.005a yadi tāvat tvam indreṇa preṣito rāvaṇālayam
GE09ram_05_u:2553: 5.048.005c tattvam ākhyāhi mā te bhūd bhayaṃ vānara mokṣyase 5.048.006a yadi vaiśravaṇasya tvaṃ yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2554: 5.048.006c cārurūpam idaṃ kṛtvā yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2555: 5.048.007a viṣṇunā preṣito vāpi dūto vijayakāṅkṣiṇā 5.048.007c na hi te vānaraṃ tejo rūpamātraṃ tu vānaram 5.048.008a tattvataḥ kathayasvādya tato vānara mokṣyase 5.048.008c anṛtaṃ vadataś cāpi durlabhaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_05_u:2556: 5.048.009a atha vā yannimittas te praveśo rāvaṇālaye
GE09ram_05_u:2557: 5.048.010a evam ukto harivaras tadā rakṣogaṇeśvaram 5.048.010c abravīn nāsmi śakrasya yamasya varuṇasya vā
GE09ram_05_u:2558: 5.048.011a dhanadena na me sakhyaṃ viṣṇunā nāsmi coditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2559: 5.048.011c jātir eva mama tv eṣā vānaro 'ham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2560: 5.048.012a darśane rākṣasendrasya durlabhe tad idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_05_u:2562: 5.048.013a tatas te rākṣasāḥ prāptā balino yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2563: 5.048.013c rakṣaṇārthaṃ ca dehasya pratiyuddhā mayā raṇe
GE09ram_05_u:2564: 5.048.014a astrapāśair na śakyo 'haṃ baddhuṃ devāsurair api
GE09ram_05_u:2567: 5.048.015c vimukto aham astreṇa rākṣasais tv atipīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2569: 5.048.016c śrūyatāṃ cāpi vacanaṃ mama pathyam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_05_u:2570: 5.049.001a taṃ samīkṣya mahāsattvaṃ sattvavān harisattamaḥ 5.049.001c vākyam arthavad avyagras tam uvāca daśānanam
GE09ram_05_u:2571: 5.049.002a ahaṃ sugrīvasaṃdeśād iha prāptas tavālayam 5.049.002c rākṣasendra harīśas tvāṃ bhrātā kuśalam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2572: 5.049.003a bhrātuḥ śṛṇu samādeśaṃ sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ 5.049.003c dharmārthopahitaṃ vākyam iha cāmutra ca kṣamam
GE09ram_05_u:2575: 5.049.005a jyeṣṭhas tasya mahābāhuḥ putraḥ priyakaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2576: 5.049.005c pitur nideśān niṣkrāntaḥ praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 5.049.006a lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā cāpi bhāryayā
GE09ram_05_u:2577: 5.049.006c rāmo nāma mahātejā dharmyaṃ panthānam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2578: 5.049.007a tasya bhāryā vane naṣṭā sītā patim anuvratā
GE09ram_05_u:2579: 5.049.007c vaidehasya sutā rājño janakasya mahātmanaḥ 5.049.008a sa mārgamāṇas tāṃ devīṃ rājaputraḥ sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2580: 5.049.008c ṛśyamūkam anuprāptaḥ sugrīveṇa ca saṃgataḥ 5.049.009a tasya tena pratijñātaṃ sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam 5.049.009c sugrīvasyāpi rāmeṇa harirājyaṃ niveditam
GE09ram_05_u:2581: 5.049.010a tatas tena mṛdhe hatvā rājaputreṇa vālinam
GE09ram_05_u:2582: 5.049.010c sugrīvaḥ sthāpito rājye haryṛkṣāṇāṃ gaṇeśvaraḥ 5.049.011a sa sītāmārgaṇe vyagraḥ sugrīvaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ 5.049.011c harīn saṃpreṣayām āsa diśaḥ sarvā harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2583: 5.049.012a tāṃ harīṇāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni niyutāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:2584: 5.049.012c dikṣu sarvāsu mārgante adhaś copari cāmbare
GE09ram_05_u:2585: 5.049.013a vainateya samāḥ ke cit ke cit tatrānilopamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2587: 5.049.014a ahaṃ tu hanumān nāma mārutasyaurasaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2588: 5.049.014c sītāyās tu kṛte tūrṇaṃ śatayojanam āyatam
GE09ram_05_u:2589: 5.049.014e samudraṃ laṅghayitvaiva tāṃ didṛkṣur ihāgataḥ 5.049.015a tad bhavān dṛṣṭadharmārthas tapaḥ kṛtaparigrahaḥ 5.049.015c paradārān mahāprājña noparoddhuṃ tvam arhasi 5.049.016a na hi dharmaviruddheṣu bahv apāyeṣu karmasu
GE09ram_05_u:2592: 5.049.017c śarāṇām agrataḥ sthātuṃ śakto devāsureṣv api
GE09ram_05_u:2593: 5.049.018a na cāpi triṣu lokeṣu rājan vidyeta kaś cana 5.049.018c rāghavasya vyalīkaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā sukham avāpnuyāt
GE09ram_05_u:2594: 5.049.019a tat trikālahitaṃ vākyaṃ dharmyam arthānubandhi ca
GE09ram_05_u:2596: 5.049.020a dṛṣṭā hīyaṃ mayā devī labdhaṃ yad iha durlabham 5.049.020c uttaraṃ karma yac cheṣaṃ nimittaṃ tatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2597: 5.049.021a lakṣiteyaṃ mayā sītā tathā śokaparāyaṇā 5.049.021c gṛhya yāṃ nābhijānāsi pañcāsyām iva pannagīm
GE09ram_05_u:2598: 5.049.022a neyaṃ jarayituṃ śakyā sāsurair amarair api
GE09ram_05_u:2599: 5.049.022c viṣasaṃsṛṣṭam atyarthaṃ bhuktam annam ivaujasā 5.049.023a tapaḥsaṃtāpalabdhas te yo 'yaṃ dharmaparigrahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2600: 5.049.023c na sa nāśayituṃ nyāyya ātmaprāṇaparigrahaḥ 5.049.024a avadhyatāṃ tapobhir yāṃ bhavān samanupaśyati 5.049.024c ātmanaḥ sāsurair devair hetus tatrāpy ayaṃ mahān
GE09ram_05_u:2601: 5.049.025a sugrīvo na hi devo 'yaṃ nāsuro na ca mānuṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2602: 5.049.025c na rākṣaso na gandharvo na yakṣo na ca pannagaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2603: 5.049.026a mānuṣo rāghavo rājan sugrīvaś ca harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2604: 5.049.026c tasmāt prāṇaparitrāṇaṃ kathaṃ rājan kariṣyasi 5.049.027a na tu dharmopasaṃhāram
GE09ram_05_u:2605: 5.049.027c tad eva phalam anveti dharmaś cādharmanāśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2606: 5.049.028a prāptaṃ dharmaphalaṃ tāvad bhavatā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2607: 5.049.028c phalam asyāpy adharmasya kṣipram eva prapatsyase
GE09ram_05_u:2608: 5.049.029a janasthānavadhaṃ buddhvā buddhvā vālivadhaṃ tathā 5.049.029c rāmasugrīvasakhyaṃ ca budhyasva hitam ātmanaḥ 5.049.030a kāmaṃ khalv aham apy ekaḥ savājirathakuñjarām
GE09ram_05_u:2609: 5.049.030c laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktas tasyaiṣa tu viniścayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2611: 5.049.031c utsādanam amitrāṇāṃ sītā yais tu pradharṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:2612: 5.049.032a apakurvan hi rāmasya sākṣād api puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2613: 5.049.032c na sukhaṃ prāpnuyād anyaḥ kiṃ punas tvadvidho janaḥ 5.049.033a yāṃ sītety abhijānāsi yeyaṃ tiṣṭhati te vaśe
GE09ram_05_u:2615: 5.049.034a tad alaṃ kālapāśena sītā vigraharūpiṇā 5.049.034c svayaṃ skandhāvasaktena kṣamam ātmani cintyatām 5.049.035a sītāyās tejasā dagdhāṃ rāmakopaprapīḍitām
GE09ram_05_u:2616: 5.049.035c dahyamanām imāṃ paśya purīṃ sāṭṭapratolikām 5.049.036a sa sauṣṭhavopetam adīnavādinaḥ; kaper niśamyāpratimo 'priyaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2618: 5.049.036c daśānanaḥ kopavivṛttalocanaḥ; samādiśat tasya vadhaṃ mahākapeḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2619: 5.050.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vānarasya mahātmanaḥ 5.050.001c ājñāpayad vadhaṃ tasya rāvaṇaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 5.050.002a vadhe tasya samājñapte rāvaṇena durātmanā 5.050.002c niveditavato dautyaṃ nānumene vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2620: 5.050.003a taṃ rakṣo'dhipatiṃ kruddhaṃ tac ca kāryam upasthitam 5.050.003c viditvā cintayām āsa kāryaṃ kāryavidhau sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2622: 5.050.004c uvāca hitam atyarthaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 5.050.005a rājan dharmaviruddhaṃ ca lokavṛtteś ca garhitam
GE09ram_05_u:2623: 5.050.005c tava cāsadṛśaṃ vīra kaper asya pramāpaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2624: 5.050.006a asaṃśayaṃ śatrur ayaṃ pravṛddhaḥ; kṛtaṃ hy anenāpriyam
GE09ram_05_u:2626: 5.050.006c na dūtavadhyāṃ pravadanti santo; dūtasya dṛṣṭā bahavo hi daṇḍāḥ 5.050.007a vairūpyām aṅgeṣu kaśābhighāto; mauṇḍyaṃ tathā lakṣmaṇasaṃnipātaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2627: 5.050.007c etān hi dūte pravadanti daṇḍān; vadhas tu dūtasya na naḥ śruto
GE09ram_05_u:2630: 5.050.008c bhavadvidhaḥ kopavaśe hi tiṣṭhet; kopaṃ niyacchanti hi
GE09ram_05_u:2632: 5.050.009a na dharmavāde na ca lokavṛtte; na śāstrabuddhigrahaṇeṣu vāpi
GE09ram_05_u:2633: 5.050.009c vidyeta kaś cit tava vīratulyas; tvaṃ hy uttamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2635: 5.050.010a na cāpy asya kaper ghāte kaṃ cit paśyāmy ahaṃ guṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2636: 5.050.010c teṣv ayaṃ pātyatāṃ daṇḍo yair ayaṃ preṣitaḥ kapiḥ 5.050.011a sādhur vā yadi vāsādhur parair eṣa samarpitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2637: 5.050.011c bruvan parārthaṃ paravān na dūto vadham arhati
GE09ram_05_u:2638: 5.050.012a api cāsmin hate rājan nānyaṃ paśyāmi khecaram
GE09ram_05_u:2639: 5.050.012c iha yaḥ punar āgacchet paraṃ pāraṃ mahodadhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2640: 5.050.013a tasmān nāsya vadhe yatnaḥ kāryaḥ parapuraṃjaya
GE09ram_05_u:2641: 5.050.013c bhavān sendreṣu deveṣu yatnam āsthātum arhati
GE09ram_05_u:2642: 5.050.014a asmin vinaṣṭe na hi dūtam anyaṃ; paśyāmi yas tau nararājaputrau
GE09ram_05_u:2643: 5.050.014c yuddhāya yuddhapriyadurvinītāv; udyojayed dīrghapathāvaruddhau 5.050.015a parākramotsāhamanasvināṃ ca; surāsurāṇām api durjayena
GE09ram_05_u:2644: 5.050.015c tvayā manonandana nairṛtānāṃ; yuddhāyatir nāśayituṃ na yuktā
GE09ram_05_u:2645: 5.050.016a hitāś ca śūrāś ca samāhitāś ca; kuleṣu jātāś ca mahāguṇeṣu
GE09ram_05_u:2646: 5.050.016c manasvinaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhāḥ; koṭyagraśaste subhṛtāś ca
GE09ram_05_u:2648: 5.050.017a tad ekadeśena balasya tāvat; ke cit tavādeśakṛto 'payāntu
GE09ram_05_u:2649: 5.050.017c tau rājaputrau vinigṛhya mūḍhau; pareṣu te bhāvayituṃ prabhāvam
GE09ram_05_u:2650: 5.051.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvo mahābalaḥ 5.051.001c deśakālahitaṃ vākyaṃ bhrātur uttamam abravīt 5.051.002a samyag uktaṃ hi bhavatā dūtavadhyā vigarhitā
GE09ram_05_u:2651: 5.051.002c avaśyaṃ tu vadhād anyaḥ kriyatām asya nigrahaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2652: 5.051.003a kapīnāṃ kila lāṅgūlam iṣṭaṃ bhavati bhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2653: 5.051.003c tad asya dīpyatāṃ śīghraṃ tena dagdhena gacchatu
GE09ram_05_u:2654: 5.051.004a tataḥ paśyantv imaṃ dīnam aṅgavairūpyakarśitam 5.051.004c samitrā jñātayaḥ sarve bāndhavāḥ sasuhṛjjanāḥ 5.051.005a ājñāpayad rākṣasendraḥ puraṃ sarvaṃ sacatvaram 5.051.005c lāṅgūlena pradīptena rakṣobhiḥ pariṇīyatām
GE09ram_05_u:2655: 5.051.006a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasāḥ kopakarkaśāḥ 5.051.006c veṣṭante tasya lāṅgūlaṃ jīrṇaiḥ kārpāsikaiḥ paṭaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2657: 5.051.007c śuṣkam indhanam āsādya vaneṣv iva hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2659: 5.051.009a lāṅgūlena pradīptena rākṣasāṃs tān apātayat 5.051.009c roṣāmarṣaparītātmā bālasūryasamānanaḥ 5.051.010a sa bhūyaḥ saṃgataiḥ krūrai rākasair harisattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2660: 5.051.010c nibaddhaḥ kṛtavān vīras tatkālasadṛśīṃ matim 5.051.011a kāmaṃ khalu na me śaktā nibadhasyāpi rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2661: 5.051.011c chittvā pāśān samutpatya hanyām aham imān punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2662: 5.051.012a sarveṣām eva paryāpto rākṣasānām ahaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_05_u:2663: 5.051.012c kiṃ tu rāmasya prītyarthaṃ viṣahiṣye 'ham īdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:2664: 5.051.013a laṅkā carayitavyā me punar eva bhaved iti
GE09ram_05_u:2665: 5.051.013c rātrau na hi sudṛṣṭā me durgakarmavidhānataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2666: 5.051.013e avaśyam eva draṣṭavyā mayā laṅkā niśākṣaye
GE09ram_05_u:2667: 5.051.014a kāmaṃ bandhaiś ca me bhūyaḥ pucchasyoddīpanena ca
GE09ram_05_u:2668: 5.051.014c pīḍāṃ kurvantu rakṣāṃsi na me 'sti manasaḥ śramaḥ 5.051.015a tatas te saṃvṛtākāraṃ sattvavantaṃ mahākapim 5.051.015c parigṛhya yayur hṛṣṭā rākṣasāḥ kapikuñjaram 5.051.016a śaṅkhabherīninādais tair ghoṣayantaḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2669: 5.051.016c rākṣasāḥ krūrakarmāṇaś cārayanti sma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_05_u:2670: 5.051.017a hanumāṃś cārayām āsa rākṣasānāṃ mahāpurīm 5.051.017c athāpaśyad vimānāni vicitrāṇi
GE09ram_05_u:2671: 5.051.018a saṃvṛtān bhūmibhāgāṃś ca suvibhaktāṃś ca catvarān
GE09ram_05_u:2672: 5.051.018c rathyāś ca gṛhasaṃbādhāḥ kapiḥ śṛṅgāṭakāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:2673: 5.051.019a catvareṣu catuṣkeṣu rājamārge tathaiva ca 5.051.019c ghoṣayanti kapiṃ sarve cārīka iti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2674: 5.051.020a dīpyamāne tatas tasya lāṅgūlāgre hanūmataḥ 5.051.020c rākṣasyas tā virūpākṣyaḥ śaṃsur devyās tad apriyam
GE09ram_05_u:2675: 5.051.021a yas tvayā kṛtasaṃvādaḥ sīte tāmramukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2676: 5.051.021c lāṅgūlena pradīptena sa eṣa pariṇīyate 5.051.022a śrutvā tad vacanaṃ krūram ātmāpaharaṇopamam 5.051.022c vaidehī śokasaṃtaptā hutāśanam upāgamat
GE09ram_05_u:2677: 5.051.023a maṅgalābhimukhī tasya sā tadāsīn mahākapeḥ 5.051.023c upatasthe viśālākṣī prayatā
GE09ram_05_u:2678: 5.051.024a yady asti patiśuśrūṣā yady asti caritaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2679: 5.051.024c yadi cāsty ekapatnītvaṃ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2680: 5.051.025a yadi kaś cid anukrośas tasya mayy asti dhīmataḥ 5.051.025c yadi vā bhāgyaśeṣaṃ me śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2682: 5.051.026c sa vijānāti dharmātmā śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2683: 5.051.027a yadi māṃ tārayaty āryaḥ sugrīvaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2684: 5.051.027c asmād duḥkhān mahābāhuḥ śīto bhava hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2686: 5.051.028c jajvāla mṛgaśāvākṣyāḥ śaṃsann iva śivaṃ kapeḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2687: 5.051.029a dahyamāne ca lāṅgūle cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2688: 5.051.029c pradīpto 'gnir ayaṃ kasmān na māṃ dahati sarvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2689: 5.051.030a dṛśyate ca mahājvālaḥ karoti ca na me rujam 5.051.030c śiśirasyeva saṃpāto lāṅgūlāgre
GE09ram_05_u:2690: 5.051.031a atha vā tad idaṃ vyaktaṃ yad dṛṣṭaṃ plavatā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:2691: 5.051.031c rāmaprabhāvād āścaryaṃ parvataḥ saritāṃ patau 5.051.032a yadi tāvat samudrasya mainākasya ca dhīmatha
GE09ram_05_u:2692: 5.051.032c rāmārthaṃ saṃbhramas tādṛk kim agnir na kariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2693: 5.051.033a sītāyāś cānṛśaṃsyena tejasā rāghavasya ca 5.051.033c pituś ca mama sakhyena na māṃ dahati pāvakaḥ 5.051.034a bhūyaḥ sa cintayām āsa muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2694: 5.051.034c utpapātātha vegena nanāda ca mahākapiḥ 5.051.035a puradvāraṃ tataḥ śrīmāñ śailaśṛṅgam ivonnatam 5.051.035c vibhaktarakṣaḥsaṃbādham āsasādānilātmajaḥ 5.051.036a sa bhūtvā śailasaṃkāśaḥ kṣaṇena punar ātmavān
GE09ram_05_u:2695: 5.051.036c hrasvatāṃ paramāṃ prāpto bandhanāny avaśātayat 5.051.037a vimuktaś cābhavac chrīmān punaḥ parvatasaṃnibhaḥ 5.051.037c vīkṣamāṇaś ca dadṛśe parighaṃ toraṇāśritam 5.051.038a sa taṃ gṛhya mahābāhuḥ kālāyasapariṣkṛtam 5.051.038c rakṣiṇas tān punaḥ sarvān sūdayām āsa mārutiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2696: 5.051.039a sa tān nihatvā raṇacaṇḍavikramaḥ; samīkṣamāṇaḥ punar eva laṅkām
GE09ram_05_u:2697: 5.051.039c pradīptalāṅgūlakṛtārcimālī; prakāśatāditya ivāṃśumālī 5.052.001a vīkṣamāṇas tato laṅkāṃ kapiḥ kṛtamanorathaḥ 5.052.001c vardhamānasamutsāhaḥ kāryaśeṣam acintayat
GE09ram_05_u:2698: 5.052.002a kiṃ nu khalv aviśiṣṭaṃ me kartavyam iha sāmpratam 5.052.002c yad eṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ bhūyaḥ saṃtāpajananaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:2699: 5.052.003a vanaṃ tāvat pramathitaṃ prakṛṣṭā rākṣasā hatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2701: 5.052.004a durge vināśite karma bhavet sukhapariśramam 5.052.004c alpayatnena kārye 'smin mama syāt saphalaḥ śramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2702: 5.052.005a yo hy ayaṃ mama lāṅgūle dīpyate havyavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2703: 5.052.005c asya saṃtarpaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ kartum ebhir gṛhottamaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2704: 5.052.006a tataḥ pradīptalāṅgūlaḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ 5.052.006c bhavanāgreṣu laṅkāyā vicacāra mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2706: 5.052.008a śvasanena ca saṃyogād ativego mahābalaḥ 5.052.008c kālāgnir iva jajvāla prāvardhata hutāśanaḥ 5.052.009a pradīptam agniṃ pavanas teṣu veśmasu cārayat
GE09ram_05_u:2708: 5.052.010c bhavanāny avaśīryanta ratnavanti mahānti ca 5.052.011a tāni bhagnavimānāni nipetur
GE09ram_05_u:2711: 5.052.012c vicitrān bhavanād dhātūn syandamānān dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2712: 5.052.013a nāgnis tṛpyati kāṣṭhānāṃ tṛṇānāṃ ca yathā tathā
GE09ram_05_u:2713: 5.052.013c hanūmān rākṣasendrāṇāṃ vadhe kiṃ cin na tṛpyati
GE09ram_05_u:2714: 5.052.014a hutāśanajvālasamāvṛtā sā; hatapravīrā parivṛttayodhā 5.052.014c hanūmātaḥ krodhabalābhibhūtā; babhūva śāpopahateva laṅkā
GE09ram_05_u:2715: 5.052.015a sasaṃbhramaṃ trastaviṣaṇṇarākṣasāṃ; samujjvalaj jvālahutāśanāṅkitām 5.052.015c dadarśa laṅkāṃ hanumān mahāmanāḥ; svayambhukopopahatām ivāvanim 5.052.016a sa rākṣasāṃs tān subahūṃś ca hatvā; vanaṃ ca bhaṅktvā
GE09ram_05_u:2716: bahupādapaṃ tat 5.052.016c visṛjya rakṣo bhavaneṣu cāgniṃ; jagāma rāmaṃ manasā mahātmā
GE09ram_05_u:2717: 5.052.017a laṅkāṃ samastāṃ saṃdīpya lāṅgūlāgniṃ mahākapiḥ 5.052.017c nirvāpayām āsa tadā samudre harisattamaḥ 5.053.001a saṃdīpyamānāṃ vidhvastāṃ trastarakṣo gaṇāṃ purīm 5.053.001c avekṣya hānumāṃl laṅkāṃ cintayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2718: 5.053.002a tasyābhūt sumahāṃs trāsaḥ kutsā cātmany ajāyata
GE09ram_05_u:2719: 5.053.002c laṅkāṃ pradahatā karma kiṃsvit kṛtam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_05_u:2720: 5.053.003a dhanyās te puruṣaśreṣṭha ye buddhyā kopam utthitam
GE09ram_05_u:2721: 5.053.003c nirundhanti mahātmāno dīptam agnim ivāmbhasā 5.053.004a yadi dagdhā tv iyaṃ laṅkā nūnam āryāpi jānakī 5.053.004c dagdhā tena mayā bhartur hataṃ kāryam ajānatā
GE09ram_05_u:2722: 5.053.005a yad artham ayam ārambhas tat kāryam avasāditam
GE09ram_05_u:2723: 5.053.005c mayā hi dahatā laṅkāṃ na sītā parirakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:2724: 5.053.006a īṣatkāryam idaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtam āsīn na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2725: 5.053.006c tasya krodhābhibhūtena mayā mūlakṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ 5.053.007a vinaṣṭā jānakī vyaktaṃ na hy adagdhaḥ pradṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:2726: 5.053.007c laṅkāyāḥ kaś cid uddeśaḥ sarvā bhasmīkṛtā purī
GE09ram_05_u:2727: 5.053.008a yadi tad vihataṃ kāryaṃ mayā prajñāviparyayāt
GE09ram_05_u:2728: 5.053.008c ihaiva prāṇasaṃnyāso mamāpi hy atirocate 5.053.009a kim agnau nipatāmy adya āhosvid vaḍavāmukhe
GE09ram_05_u:2729: 5.053.009c śarīram āho sattvānāṃ dadmi sāgaravāsinām 5.053.010a kathaṃ hi jīvatā śakyo mayā draṣṭuṃ harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2731: 5.053.011a mayā khalu tad evedaṃ roṣadoṣāt pradarśitam
GE09ram_05_u:2732: 5.053.011c prathitaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kapitam anavasthitam 5.053.012a dhig astu rājasaṃ bhāvam anīśam anavasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:2733: 5.053.012c īśvareṇāpi yad rāgān mayā sītā na rakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:2734: 5.053.013a vinaṣṭāyāṃ tu sītāyāṃ tāv ubhau vinaśiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2735: 5.053.013c tayor vināśe sugrīvaḥ sabandhur vinaśiṣyati 5.053.014a etad eva vacaḥ śrutvā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2736: 5.053.014c dharmātmā sahaśatrughnaḥ kathaṃ śakṣyati jīvitum 5.053.015a ikṣvākuvaṃśe dharmiṣṭhe gate nāśam asaṃśayam 5.053.015c bhaviṣyanti prajāḥ sarvāḥ śokasaṃtāpapīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2739: 5.053.017a iti cintayatas tasya nimittāny upapedire 5.053.017c pūram apy upalabdhāni sākṣāt punar acintayat
GE09ram_05_u:2740: 5.053.018a atha vā cārusarvāṅgī rakṣitā svena tejasā
GE09ram_05_u:2741: 5.053.018c na naśiṣyati kalyāṇī nāgnir agnau pravartate
GE09ram_05_u:2742: 5.053.019a na hi dharmān manas tasya bhāryām amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2743: 5.053.019c svacāritrābhiguptāṃ tāṃ spraṣṭum arhati pāvakaḥ 5.053.020a nūnaṃ rāmaprabhāvena vaidehyāḥ sukṛtena ca 5.053.020c yan māṃ dahanakarmāyaṃ nādahad dhavyavāhanaḥ 5.053.021a trayāṇāṃ bharatādīnāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ devatā ca yā
GE09ram_05_u:2744: 5.053.021c rāmasya ca manaḥkāntā sā kathaṃ vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2745: 5.053.022a yad vā dahanakarmāyaṃ sarvatra prabhur avyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2746: 5.053.022c na me dahati lāṅgūlaṃ katham āryāṃ pradhakṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2747: 5.053.023a tapasā satyavākyena ananyatvāc ca bhartari 5.053.023c api sā nirdahed agniṃ na tām agniḥ pradhakṣyati 5.053.024a sa tathā cintayaṃs tatra devyā dharmaparigraham
GE09ram_05_u:2748: 5.053.024c śuśrāva hanumān vākyaṃ cāraṇānāṃ mahātmanām 5.053.025a aho khalu kṛtaṃ karma durviṣahyaṃ hanūmatā
GE09ram_05_u:2751: 5.053.026c jānakī na ca dagdheti vismayo 'dbhuta eva naḥ 5.053.027a sa nimittaiś ca dṛṣṭārthaiḥ kāraṇaiś ca mahāguṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2752: 5.053.027c ṛṣivākyaiś ca hanumān abhavat prītamānasaḥ 5.053.028a tataḥ kapiḥ prāptamanorathārthas; tām akṣatāṃ rājasutāṃ viditvā
GE09ram_05_u:2753: 5.053.028c pratyakṣatas tāṃ punar eva dṛṣṭvā; pratiprayāṇāya matiṃ cakāra
GE09ram_05_u:2754: 5.054.001a tatas tu śiṃśapāmūle jānakīṃ paryavasthitām 5.054.001c abhivādyābravīd diṣṭyā paśyāmi tvām ihākṣatām 5.054.002a tatas taṃ prasthitaṃ sītā vīkṣamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2756: 5.054.003a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_05_u:2757: 5.054.003c paryāptaḥ paravīraghna yaśasyas te balodayaḥ 5.054.004a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2758: 5.054.004c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tasya tat sādṛśaṃ bhavet 5.054.005a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2760: 5.054.006a tad arthopahitaṃ vākyaṃ praśritaṃ hetusaṃhitam 5.054.006c niśamya hanumāṃs tasyā vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2761: 5.054.007a kṣipram eṣyati kākutstho haryṛkṣapravarair vṛtaḥ 5.054.007c yas te yudhi vijityārīñ śokaṃ vyapanayiṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:2762: 5.054.008a evam āśvāsya vaidehīṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ 5.054.008c gamanāya matiṃ kṛtvā vaidehīm abhyavādayat 5.054.009a tataḥ sa kapiśārdūlaḥ svāmisaṃdarśanotsukaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2765: 5.054.010c sālatālāśvakarṇaiś ca vaṃśaiś ca bahubhir vṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:2768: 5.054.013a latāpādapasaṃbādhaṃ siṃhākulitakandaram 5.054.013c vyāghrasaṃghasamākīrṇaṃ svādumūlaphaladrumam 5.054.014a tam ārurohātibalaḥ parvataṃ plavagottamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2770: 5.054.015c saghoṣāḥ samaśīryanta śilāś cūrṇīkṛtās tataḥ 5.054.016a sa tam āruhya śailendraṃ vyavardhata mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2771: 5.054.016c dakṣiṇād uttaraṃ pāraṃ prārthayaṃl lavaṇāmbhasaḥ 5.054.017a adhiruhya tato vīraḥ parvataṃ pavanātmajaḥ 5.054.017c dadarśa sāgaraṃ bhīmaṃ mīnoraganiṣevitam
GE09ram_05_u:2773: 5.054.018c prapede hariśārdūlo dakṣiṇād uttarāṃ diśam 5.054.019a sa tadā pīḍitas tena kapinā
GE09ram_05_u:2774: 5.054.019c rarāsa saha tair bhūtaiḥ prāviśad vasudhātalam
GE09ram_05_u:2775: 5.054.019e kampamānaiś ca śikharaiḥ patadbhir api ca drumaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2777: 5.054.020c nipetur bhūtale rugṇāḥ śakrāyudhahatā iva 5.054.021a kandarodarasaṃsthānāṃ pīḍitānāṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2778: 5.054.021c siṃhānāṃ ninado bhīmo nabho bhindan sa śuśruve
GE09ram_05_u:2779: 5.054.022a srastavyāviddhavasanā vyākulīkṛtabhūṣaṇā 5.054.022c vidyādharyaḥ samutpetuḥ sahasā dharaṇīdharāt
GE09ram_05_u:2782: 5.054.024a kiṃnaroragagandharvayakṣavidyādharās tathā 5.054.024c pīḍitaṃ taṃ nagavaraṃ tyaktvā gaganam āsthitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2783: 5.054.025a sa ca bhūmidharaḥ śrīmān balinā tena pīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2786: 5.054.026c dharaṇyāṃ samatāṃ yātaḥ sa babhūva dharādharaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2791: 5.055.004c harann iva sanakṣatraṃ gaganaṃ sārkamaṇḍalam 5.055.005a mārutasyālayaṃ śrīmān kapir vyomacaro mahān 5.055.005c hanūmān meghajālāni vikarṣann iva gacchati 5.055.006a pāṇḍurāruṇavarṇāni nīlamāñjiṣṭhakāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:2793: 5.055.007a praviśann abhrajālāni niṣkramaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2794: 5.055.007c pracchannaś ca prakāśaś ca candramā iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_05_u:2796: 5.055.008c ājagāma mahātejāḥ punar madhyena sāgaram 5.055.009a parvatendraṃ sunābhaṃ ca samupaspṛśya vīryavān 5.055.009c jyāmukta iva nārāco mahāvego 'bhyupāgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2797: 5.055.010a sa kiṃ cid anusaṃprāptaḥ samālokya mahāgirim
GE09ram_05_u:2799: 5.055.011a niśamya nadato nādaṃ vānarās te samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2802: 5.055.012c upāmantrya harīn sarvān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:2804: 5.055.013c na hy asyākṛtakāryasya nāda evaṃvidho bhavet
GE09ram_05_u:2805: 5.055.014a tasyā bāhūruvegaṃ ca ninādaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2806: 5.055.014c niśamya harayo hṛṣṭāḥ samutpetus tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2807: 5.055.015a te nagāgrān nagāgrāṇi śikharāc chikharāṇi ca
