GE09ram_05_u:2809: 5.055.016a te prītāḥ pādapāgreṣu gṛhya śākhāḥ supuṣpitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2812: 5.055.017c dṛṣṭvā te vānarāḥ sarve tasthuḥ prāñjalayas tadā
GE09ram_05_u:2813: 5.055.018a tatas tu vegavāṃs tasya girer girinibhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2815: 5.055.019a tatas te prītamanasaḥ sarve vānarapuṃgavāḥ 5.055.019c hanūmantaṃ mahātmānaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2816: 5.055.020a parivārya ca te sarve parāṃ prītim upāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2817: 5.055.020c prahṛṣṭavadanāḥ sarve tam arogam upāgatam 5.055.021a upāyanāni cādāya mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_05_u:2819: 5.055.022a vinedur muditāḥ ke cic cakruḥ kila kilāṃ tathā 5.055.022c hṛṣṭāḥ pādapaśākhāś ca āninyur vānararṣabhāḥ 5.055.023a hanūmāṃs tu gurūn vṛddhāñ jāmbavat pramukhāṃs tadā
GE09ram_05_u:2821: 5.055.024a sa tābhyāṃ pūjitaḥ pūjyaḥ kapibhiś ca prasāditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2822: 5.055.024c dṛṣṭā devīti vikrāntaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa nyavedayat 5.055.025a niṣasāda ca hastena gṛhītvā vālinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_05_u:2823: 5.055.025c ramaṇīye vanoddeśe mahendrasya gires tadā 5.055.026a hanūmān abravīd dhṛṣṭas tadā tān vānararṣabhān
GE09ram_05_u:2828: 5.055.028a tato dṛṣṭeti vacanaṃ mahārtham amṛtopamam 5.055.028c niśamya māruteḥ sarve muditā vānarā bhavan
GE09ram_05_u:2829: 5.055.029a kṣveḍanty anye nadanty anye garjanty anye mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2830: 5.055.029c cakruḥ kila kilām anye pratigarjanti cāpare
GE09ram_05_u:2831: 5.055.030a ke cid ucchritalāṅgūlāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ kapikuñjarāḥ 5.055.030c añcitāyatadīrghāṇi lāṅgūlāni pravivyadhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2832: 5.055.031a apare tu hanūmantaṃ vānarā vāraṇopamam 5.055.031c āplutya giriśṛṅgebhyaḥ saṃspṛśanti sma harṣitāḥ 5.055.032a uktavākyaṃ hanūmantam aṅgadas tu tadābravīt 5.055.032c sarveṣāṃ harivīrāṇāṃ madhye vācam anuttamām 5.055.033a sattve vīrye na te kaś cit samo vānaravidyate 5.055.033c yad avaplutya vistīrṇaṃ sāgaraṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2833: 5.055.034a diṣṭyā dṛṣṭā tvayā devī rāmapatnī yaśasvinī
GE09ram_05_u:2834: 5.055.034c diṣṭyā tyakṣyati kākutsthaḥ śokaṃ sītā viyogajam
GE09ram_05_u:2836: 5.055.035c parivārya pramuditā bhejire vipulāḥ śilāḥ 5.055.036a śrotukāmāḥ samudrasya laṅghanaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2837: 5.055.036c darśanaṃ cāpi laṅkāyāḥ sītāyā rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2838: 5.055.036e tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve hanūmad vadanonmukhāḥ 5.055.037a tasthau tatrāṅgadaḥ śrīmān vānarair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2839: 5.055.037c upāsyamāno vibudhair divi devapatir yathā 5.055.038a hanūmatā kīrtimatā yaśasvinā;
GE09ram_05_u:2840: 5.055.038c mudā tadādhyāsitam unnataṃ mahan; mahīdharāgraṃ jvalitaṃ śriyābhavat
GE09ram_05_u:2841: 5.056.001a tatas tasya gireḥ śṛṅge mahendrasya mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2842: 5.056.001c hanumatpramukhāḥ prītiṃ harayo jagmur uttamām 5.056.002a taṃ tataḥ pratisaṃhṛṣṭaḥ prītimantaṃ mahākapim 5.056.002c jāmbavān kāryavṛttāntam apṛcchad anilātmajam
GE09ram_05_u:2843: 5.056.003a kathaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā devī kathaṃ vā tatra vartate 5.056.003c tasyāṃ vā sa kathaṃ vṛttaḥ krūrakarmā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2844: 5.056.004a tattvataḥ sarvam etan naḥ prabrūhi tvaṃ mahākape
GE09ram_05_u:2846: 5.056.005a yaś cārthas tatra vaktavyo gatair asmābhir ātmavān
GE09ram_05_u:2847: 5.056.005c rakṣitavyaṃ ca yat tatra tad bhavān vyākarotu naḥ 5.056.006a sa niyuktas tatas tena saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ 5.056.006c namasyañ śirasā devyai sītāyai pratyabhāṣata 5.056.007a pratyakṣam eva bhavatāṃ mahendrāgrāt kham āplutaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2848: 5.056.007c udadher dakṣiṇaṃ pāraṃ kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ samāhitaḥ 5.056.008a gacchataś ca hi me ghoraṃ vighnarūpam ivābhavat
GE09ram_05_u:2849: 5.056.008c kāñcanaṃ śikharaṃ divyaṃ paśyāmi sumanoharam 5.056.009a sthitaṃ panthānam āvṛtya mene vighnaṃ ca taṃ nagam 5.056.010a upasaṃgamya taṃ divyaṃ kāñcanaṃ nagasattamam 5.056.010c kṛtā me manasā buddhir bhettavyo 'yaṃ mayeti ca 5.056.011a prahataṃ ca mayā tasya lāṅgūlena mahāgireḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2851: 5.056.012a vyavasāyaṃ ca me buddhvā sa hovāca mahāgiriḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2852: 5.056.012c putreti madhurāṃ bāṇīṃ manaḥprahlādayann iva 5.056.013a pitṛvyaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sakhāyaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2853: 5.056.013c mainākam iti vikhyātaṃ nivasantaṃ mahodadhau 5.056.014a pakṣvavantaḥ purā putra babhūvuḥ parvatottamāḥ 5.056.014c chandataḥ pṛthivīṃ cerur bādhamānāḥ samantataḥ 5.056.015a śrutvā nagānāṃ caritaṃ mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ 5.056.015c ciccheda bhagavān pakṣān vajreṇaiṣāṃ sahasraśaḥ 5.056.016a ahaṃ tu mokṣitas tasmāt tava pitrā mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:2855: 5.056.017a rāmasya ca mayā sāhye vartitavyam ariṃdama
GE09ram_05_u:2857: 5.056.018a etac chrutvā mayā tasya mainākasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2858: 5.056.018c kāryam āvedya tu girer uddhataṃ ca mano mama 5.056.019a tena cāham anujñāto mainākena mahātmanā 5.056.019c uttamaṃ javam āsthāya śeṣam adhvānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2860: 5.056.020c tataḥ paśyāmy ahaṃ devīṃ surasāṃ nāgamātaram
GE09ram_05_u:2861: 5.056.021a samudramadhye sā devī vacanaṃ mām abhāṣata
GE09ram_05_u:2862: 5.056.021c mama bhakṣyaḥ pradiṣṭas tvam amārair harisattamam
GE09ram_05_u:2863: 5.056.021e tatas tvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi vihitas tvaṃ cirasya me
GE09ram_05_u:2864: 5.056.022a evam uktaḥ surasayā prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2865: 5.056.022c vivarṇavadano bhūtvā vākyaṃ cedam udīrayam 5.056.023a rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmān praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam 5.056.023c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2866: 5.056.024a tasya sītā hṛtā bhāryā rāvaṇena durātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:2867: 5.056.024c tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ dūto 'haṃ gamiṣye rāmaśāsanāt 5.056.025a kartum arhasi rāmasya sāhyaṃ viṣayavāsini 5.056.026a atha vā maithilīṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ cākliṣṭakāriṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2868: 5.056.026c āgamiṣyāmi te vaktraṃ satyaṃ pratiśṛṇoti me
GE09ram_05_u:2869: 5.056.027a evam uktā mayā sā tu surasā kāmarūpiṇī
GE09ram_05_u:2870: 5.056.027c abravīn nātivarteta kaś cid eṣa varo mama
GE09ram_05_u:2871: 5.056.028a evam uktaḥ surasayā daśayojanam āyataḥ 5.056.028c tato 'rdhaguṇavistāro babhūvāhaṃ kṣaṇena tu
GE09ram_05_u:2872: 5.056.029a matpramāṇānurūpaṃ ca vyāditaṃ tanmukhaṃ tayā 5.056.029c tad dṛṣṭvā vyāditaṃ tv āsyaṃ hrasvaṃ hy akaravaṃ vapuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2873: 5.056.030a tasmin muhūrte ca punar babhūvāṅguṣṭhasaṃmitaḥ 5.056.030c abhipatyāśu tad vaktraṃ nirgato 'haṃ tataḥ kṣaṇāt 5.056.031a abravīt surasā devī svena rūpeṇa māṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2874: 5.056.031c arthasiddhyai hariśreṣṭha gaccha saumya yathāsukham 5.056.032a samānaya ca vaidehīṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā 5.056.032c sukhī bhava mahābāho prītāsmi tava vānara
GE09ram_05_u:2876: 5.056.033c tato 'ntarikṣaṃ vipulaṃ pluto 'haṃ garuḍo yathā 5.056.034a chāyā me nigṛhītā ca na ca paśyāmi kiṃ cana
GE09ram_05_u:2877: 5.056.034c so 'haṃ vigatavegas tu diśo daśa vilokayan 5.056.034e na kiṃ cit tatra paśyāmi yena me 'pahṛtā gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2878: 5.056.035a tato me buddhir utpannā kiṃ nāma gamane mama 5.056.035c īdṛśo vighna utpanno rūpaṃ yatra na dṛśyate
GE09ram_05_u:2879: 5.056.036a adho bhāgena me dṛṣṭiḥ śocatā pātitā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:2880: 5.056.036c tato 'drākṣam ahaṃ bhīmāṃ rākṣasīṃ salile śayām 5.056.037a prahasya ca mahānādam ukto 'haṃ bhīmayā tayā 5.056.037c avasthitam asaṃbhrāntam idaṃ vākyam aśobhanam 5.056.038a kvāsi gantā mahākāya kṣudhitāyā mamepsitaḥ 5.056.038c bhakṣaḥ prīṇaya me dehaṃ ciram āhāravarjitam
GE09ram_05_u:2881: 5.056.039a bāḍham ity eva tāṃ vāṇīṃ pratyagṛhṇām ahaṃ tataḥ 5.056.039c āsya pramāṇād adhikaṃ tasyāḥ kāyam apūrayam
GE09ram_05_u:2882: 5.056.040a tasyāś cāsyaṃ mahad bhīmaṃ vardhate mama bhakṣaṇe
GE09ram_05_u:2883: 5.056.040c na ca māṃ sā tu bubudhe mama vā vikṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:2885: 5.056.041c tasyā hṛdayam ādāya prapatāmi nabhastalam 5.056.042a sā visṛṣṭabhujā bhīmā papāta lavaṇāmbhasi 5.056.042c mayā parvatasaṃkāśā nikṛttahṛdayā satī
GE09ram_05_u:2886: 5.056.043a śṛṇomi khagatānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ cāraṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_05_u:2887: 5.056.043c rākṣasī siṃhikā bhīmā kṣipraṃ hanumatā hṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:2888: 5.056.044a tāṃ hatvā punar evāhaṃ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ smaran
GE09ram_05_u:2889: 5.056.044c gatvā ca mahad adhvānaṃ paśyāmi nagamaṇḍitam
GE09ram_05_u:2890: 5.056.044e dakṣiṇaṃ tīram udadher laṅkā yatra ca sā purī 5.056.045a astaṃ dinakare yāte rakṣasāṃ nilayaṃ purīm
GE09ram_05_u:2892: 5.056.046a tatrāhaṃ sarvarātraṃ tu vicinvañ janakātmajām 5.056.046c rāvaṇāntaḥpuragato na cāpaśyaṃ sumadhyamām
GE09ram_05_u:2893: 5.056.047a tataḥ sītām apaśyaṃs tu rāvaṇasya niveśane
GE09ram_05_u:2894: 5.056.047c śokasāgaram āsādya na pāram upalakṣaye 5.056.048a śocatā ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ prākāreṇa
GE09ram_05_u:2896: 5.056.049a sa prākāram avaplutya paśyāmi bahupādapam 5.056.050a aśokavanikāmadhye śiṃśapāpādapo
GE09ram_05_u:2897: 5.056.050c tam āruhya ca paśyāmi kāñcanaṃ kadalī vanam
GE09ram_05_u:2902: 5.056.053a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśīṃ nārīṃ rāmapatnīm aninditām
GE09ram_05_u:2903: 5.056.053c tatraiva śiṃśapāvṛkṣe paśyann aham avasthitaḥ 5.056.054a tato halahalāśabdaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2906: 5.056.055c ahaṃ ca śiṃśapāvṛkṣe pakṣīva gahane sthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2907: 5.056.056a tato rāvaṇadārāś ca rāvaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2908: 5.056.056c taṃ deśaṃ samanuprāptā yatra sītābhavat sthitā
GE09ram_05_u:2909: 5.056.057a taṃ dṛṣṭvātha varārohā sītā rakṣogaṇeśvaram 5.056.057c saṃkucyorū stanau pīnau bāhubhyāṃ parirabhya ca
GE09ram_05_u:2910: 5.056.058a tām uvāca daśagrīvaḥ sītāṃ paramaduḥkhitām 5.056.058c avākśirāḥ prapatito bahu manyasva mām iti
GE09ram_05_u:2911: 5.056.059a yadi cet tvaṃ tu māṃ darpān nābhinandasi garvite 5.056.059c dvimāsānantaraṃ sīte pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ tava 5.056.060a etac chrutvā vacas tasya rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2912: 5.056.060c uvāca paramakruddhā sītā vacanam uttamam 5.056.061a rākṣasādhama rāmasya bhāryām
GE09ram_05_u:2914: 5.056.061e avācyaṃ vadato jihvā kathaṃ na patitā tava
GE09ram_05_u:2915: 5.056.062a kiṃsvid vīryaṃ tavānārya yo māṃ bhartur asaṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:2917: 5.056.063a na tvaṃ rāmasya sadṛśo dāsye 'py asyā na yujyase
GE09ram_05_u:2918: 5.056.063c yajñīyaḥ satyavāk caiva raṇaślāghī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2919: 5.056.064a jānakyā paruṣaṃ vākyam evam ukto daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2920: 5.056.064c jajvāla sahasā kopāc citāstha iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2921: 5.056.065a vivṛtya nayane krūre muṣṭim udyamya dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:2922: 5.056.065c maithilīṃ hantum ārabdhaḥ strībhir hāhākṛtaṃ tadā
GE09ram_05_u:2923: 5.056.066a strīṇāṃ madhyāt samutpatya tasya bhāryā durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2924: 5.056.066c varā mandodarī nāma tayā sa pratiṣedhitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2925: 5.056.067a uktaś ca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tayā sa madanārditaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2926: 5.056.067c sītayā tava kiṃ kāryaṃ mahendrasamavikrama 5.056.067e mayā saha ramasvādya madviśiṣṭā na jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:2928: 5.056.068c sārdhaṃ prabho ramasveha sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:2929: 5.056.069a tatas tābhiḥ sametābhir nārībhiḥ sa mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2930: 5.056.069c utthāpya sahasā nīto bhavanaṃ svaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2931: 5.056.070a yāte tasmin daśagrīve rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ 5.056.070c sītāṃ nirbhartsayām āsur vākyaiḥ krūraiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2932: 5.056.071a tṛṇavad bhāṣitaṃ tāsāṃ gaṇayām āsa jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:2933: 5.056.071c tarjitaṃ ca tadā tāsāṃ sītāṃ prāpya nirarthakam
GE09ram_05_u:2935: 5.056.072c rāvaṇāya śaśaṃsus tāḥ sītāvyavasitaṃ mahat 5.056.073a tatas tāḥ sahitāḥ sarvā vihatāśā nirudyamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2936: 5.056.073c parikṣipya samantāt tāṃ nidrāvaśam upāgatāḥ 5.056.074a tāsu caiva prasuptāsu sītā bhartṛhite ratā
GE09ram_05_u:2937: 5.056.074c vilapya karuṇaṃ dīnā praśuśoca suduḥkhitā 5.056.075a tāṃ cāhaṃ tādṛśīṃ dṛṣṭvā sītāyā dāruṇāṃ daśām
GE09ram_05_u:2938: 5.056.075c cintayām āsa viśrānto na ca me nirvṛtaṃ manaḥ 5.056.076a saṃbhāṣaṇārthe ca mayā jānakyāś cintito vidhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2939: 5.056.076c ikṣvākukulavaṃśas tu tato mama puraskṛtaḥ 5.056.077a śrutvā tu gaditāṃ vācaṃ rājarṣigaṇapūjitām 5.056.077c pratyabhāṣata māṃ devī bāṣpaiḥ pihitalocanā 5.056.078a kas tvaṃ kena kathaṃ ceha prāpto vānarapuṃgava
GE09ram_05_u:2940: 5.056.078c kā ca rāmeṇa te prītis tan me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:2941: 5.056.079a tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā aham apy abruvaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2942: 5.056.079c devi rāmasya bhartus te sahāyo bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2943: 5.056.079e sugrīvo nāma vikrānto vānarendo mahābalaḥ 5.056.080a tasya māṃ viddhi bhṛtyaṃ tvaṃ hanūmantam ihāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:2945: 5.056.081a idaṃ ca puruṣavyāghraḥ śrīmān dāśarathiḥ svayam
GE09ram_05_u:2946: 5.056.081c aṅgulīyam abhijñānam adāt tubhyaṃ yaśasvini 5.056.082a tad icchāmi tvayājñaptaṃ devi kiṃ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_05_u:2947: 5.056.082c rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ pārśvaṃ nayāmi tvāṃ kim uttaram
GE09ram_05_u:2948: 5.056.083a etac chrutvā viditvā ca sītā janakanandinī
GE09ram_05_u:2949: 5.056.083c āha rāvaṇam utsādya rāghavo māṃ nayatv iti
GE09ram_05_u:2950: 5.056.084a praṇamya śirasā devīm aham āryām aninditām
GE09ram_05_u:2952: 5.056.085a evam uktā varārohā maṇipravaram uttamam 5.056.085c prāyacchat paramodvignā vācā māṃ saṃdideśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:2953: 5.056.086a tatas tasyai praṇamyāhaṃ rājaputryai samāhitaḥ 5.056.086c pradakṣiṇaṃ parikrāmam
GE09ram_05_u:2954: 5.056.087a uttaraṃ punar evāha niścitya manasā tadā
GE09ram_05_u:2955: 5.056.087c hanūman mama vṛttāntaṃ vaktum arhasi rāghave
GE09ram_05_u:2956: 5.056.088a yathā śrutvaiva nacirāt tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_05_u:2957: 5.056.088c sugrīvasahitau vīrāv upeyātāṃ tathā kuru 5.056.089a yady anyathā bhaved etad dvau māsau jīvitaṃ mama 5.056.089c na māṃ drakṣyati kākutstho mriye sāham anāthavat
GE09ram_05_u:2958: 5.056.090a tac chrutvā karuṇaṃ vākyaṃ krodho mām abhyavartata
GE09ram_05_u:2959: 5.056.090c uttaraṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaśeṣam anantaram
GE09ram_05_u:2961: 5.056.091c yuddhakāṅkṣī vanaṃ tac ca vināśayitum ārabhe
GE09ram_05_u:2962: 5.056.092a tad bhagnaṃ vanaṣaṇḍaṃ tu bhrāntatrastamṛgadvijam 5.056.092c pratibuddhā nirīkṣante rākṣasyo vikṛtānanāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2963: 5.056.093a māṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vane tasmin samāgamya tatas tataḥ 5.056.093c tāḥ samabhyāgatāḥ kṣipraṃ rāvaṇāyācacakṣire
GE09ram_05_u:2964: 5.056.094a rājan vanam idaṃ durgaṃ tava bhagnaṃ durātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:2965: 5.056.094c vānareṇa hy avijñāya tava vīryaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_05_u:2966: 5.056.095a durbuddhes tasya rājendra tava vipriyakāriṇaḥ 5.056.095c vadham ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ yathāsau vilayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_05_u:2967: 5.056.096a tac chrutvā rākṣasendreṇa visṛṣṭā bhṛśadurjayāḥ 5.056.096c rākṣasāḥ kiṃkarā nāma rāvaṇasya mano'nugāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2969: 5.056.097c mayā tasmin vanoddeśe parigheṇa niṣūditam 5.056.098a teṣāṃ tu hataśeṣā ye te gatā laghuvikramāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2970: 5.056.098c nihataṃ ca mayā sainyaṃ rāvaṇāyācacakṣire 5.056.099a tato me buddhir utpannā caityaprāsādam ākramam
GE09ram_05_u:2971: 5.056.100a tatrasthān rākṣasān hatvā śataṃ stambhena vai punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2972: 5.056.100c lalāma bhūto laṅkāyā mayā vidhvaṃsito ruṣā
GE09ram_05_u:2973: 5.056.101a tataḥ prahastasya sutaṃ jambumālinam ādiśat 5.056.102a tam ahaṃ balasaṃpannaṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇakovidam 5.056.102c parigheṇātighoreṇa sūdayāmi sahānugam
GE09ram_05_u:2974: 5.056.103a tac chrutvā rākṣasendras tu mantriputrān mahābalān
GE09ram_05_u:2976: 5.056.103e parigheṇaiva tān sarvān nayāmi yamasādanam 5.056.104a mantriputrān hatāñ śrutvā samare laghuvikramān 5.056.104c pañcasenāgragāñ śūrān preṣayām āsa rāvaṇaḥ 5.056.104e tān ahaṃ saha sainyān vai sarvān evābhyasūdayam
GE09ram_05_u:2977: 5.056.105a tataḥ punar daśagrīvaḥ putram akṣaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:2978: 5.056.105c bahubhī rākasaiḥ sārdhaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
GE09ram_05_u:2979: 5.056.106a taṃ tu mandodarī putraṃ kumāraṃ raṇapaṇḍitam
GE09ram_05_u:2980: 5.056.106c sahasā khaṃ samutkrāntaṃ pādayoś ca gṛhītavān
GE09ram_05_u:2982: 5.056.107a tam akṣam āgataṃ bhagnaṃ niśamya sa daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2983: 5.056.107c tata indrajitaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ sutam
GE09ram_05_u:2985: 5.056.108a tasyāpy ahaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ ca rākṣasapuṃgavam
GE09ram_05_u:2986: 5.056.108c naṣṭaujasaṃ raṇe kṛtvā paraṃ harṣam upāgamam
GE09ram_05_u:2987: 5.056.109a mahatā hi mahābāhuḥ pratyayena mahābalaḥ 5.056.109c preṣito rāvaṇenaiṣa saha vīrair madotkaṭaiḥ 5.056.110a brāhmeṇāstreṇa sa tu māṃ prabadhnāc cātivegataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2988: 5.056.110c rajjūbhir abhibadhnanti tato māṃ tatra rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2989: 5.056.111a rāvaṇasya samīpaṃ ca gṛhītvā mām upānayan
GE09ram_05_u:2990: 5.056.111c dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitaś cāhaṃ rāvaṇena durātmanā 5.056.112a pṛṣṭaś ca laṅkāgamanaṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca tad vadham
GE09ram_05_u:2991: 5.056.112c tat sarvaṃ ca mayā tatra sītārtham iti jalpitam 5.056.113a asyāhaṃ darśanākāṅkṣī prāptas tvadbhavanaṃ vibho 5.056.113c mārutasyaurasaḥ putro vānaro hanumān aham 5.056.114a rāmadūtaṃ ca māṃ viddhi sugrīvasacivaṃ kapim
GE09ram_05_u:2993: 5.056.115a śṛṇu cāpi samādeśaṃ yad ahaṃ prabravīmi te
GE09ram_05_u:2994: 5.056.115c rākṣaseśa harīśas tvāṃ vākyam āha samāhitam
GE09ram_05_u:2996: 5.056.116a vasato ṛṣyamūke me parvate vipuladrume 5.056.116c rāghavo raṇavikrānto mitratvaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:2997: 5.056.117a tena me kathitaṃ rājan bhāryā me rakṣasā hṛtā 5.056.117c tatra sāhāyyahetor me samayaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_05_u:2998: 5.056.118a vālinā hṛtarājyena sugrīveṇa saha prabhuḥ 5.056.118c cakre 'gnisākṣikaṃ sakyaṃ rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:2999: 5.056.119a tena vālinam utsādya śareṇaikena saṃyuge 5.056.119c vānarāṇāṃ mahārājaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃplavatāṃ prabhuḥ 5.056.120a tasya sāhāyyam asmābhiḥ kāryaṃ sarvātmanā tv iha
GE09ram_05_u:3000: 5.056.120c tena prasthāpitas tubhyaṃ samīpam iha dharmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3001: 5.056.121a kṣipram ānīyatāṃ sītā dīyatāṃ rāghavasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:3002: 5.056.121c yāvan na harayo vīrā vidhamanti balaṃ tava
GE09ram_05_u:3003: 5.056.122a vānarāṇāṃ prabhavo hi na kena viditaḥ purā
GE09ram_05_u:3004: 5.056.122c devatānāṃ sakāśaṃ ca ye gacchanti nimantritāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3005: 5.056.123a iti vānararājas tvām āhety abhihito mayā
GE09ram_05_u:3006: 5.056.123c mām aikṣata tato ruṣṭaś cakṣuṣā pradahann iva
GE09ram_05_u:3008: 5.056.125a tato vibhīṣaṇo nāma tasya bhrātā mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3010: 5.056.126a dūtavadhyā na dṛṣṭā hi rājaśāstreṣu rākṣasa
GE09ram_05_u:3011: 5.056.126c dūtena veditavyaṃ ca yathārthaṃ hitavādinā 5.056.127a sumahaty aparādhe 'pi
GE09ram_05_u:3013: 5.056.128a vibhīṣaṇenaivam ukto rāvaṇaḥ saṃdideśa tān 5.056.128c rākṣasān etad evādya lāṅgūlaṃ dahyatām iti
GE09ram_05_u:3014: 5.056.129a tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā mama pucchaṃ samantataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3015: 5.056.129c veṣṭitaṃ śaṇavalkaiś ca paṭaiḥ kārpāsakais tathā
GE09ram_05_u:3016: 5.056.130a rākṣasāḥ siddhasaṃnāhās tatas te caṇḍavikramāḥ 5.056.130c tad ādīpyanta me pucchaṃ hanantaḥ kāṣṭhamuṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3017: 5.056.131a baddhasya bahubhiḥ pāśair yantritasya ca rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3018: 5.056.131c na me pīḍā bhavet kā cid didṛkṣor nagarīṃ divā
GE09ram_05_u:3019: 5.056.132a tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā baddhaṃ mām agnisaṃvṛtam
GE09ram_05_u:3021: 5.056.133a tato 'haṃ sumahad rūpaṃ saṃkṣipya punar ātmanaḥ 5.056.133c vimocayitvā taṃ bandhaṃ prakṛtiṣṭhaḥ sthitaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3022: 5.056.134a āyasaṃ parighaṃ gṛhya tāni rakṣāṃsy asūdayam
GE09ram_05_u:3023: 5.056.134c tatas tan nagaradvāraṃ vegenāplutavān aham 5.056.135a pucchena ca pradīptena tāṃ purīṃ sāṭṭagopurām
GE09ram_05_u:3024: 5.056.135c dahāmy aham asaṃbhrānto yugāntāgnir iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3025: 5.056.136a dagdhvā laṅkāṃ punaś caiva śaṅkā mām abhyavartata
GE09ram_05_u:3026: 5.056.136c dahatā ca mayā laṅkāṃ daghdā sītā na saṃśayaḥ 5.056.137a athāhaṃ vācam aśrauṣaṃ cāraṇānāṃ śubhākṣarām 5.056.137c jānakī na ca dagdheti vismayodantabhāṣiṇām 5.056.138a tato me buddhir utpannā śrutvā tām adbhutāṃ giram 5.056.138c punar dṛṣṭā ca vaidehī visṛṣṭaś ca tayā punaḥ 5.056.139a rāghavasya prabhāvena bhavatāṃ caiva tejasā 5.056.139c sugrīvasya ca kāryārthaṃ mayā sarvam anuṣṭhitam
GE09ram_05_u:3027: 5.056.140a etat sarvaṃ mayā tatra yathāvad upapāditam
GE09ram_05_u:3028: 5.056.140c atra yan na kṛtaṃ śeṣaṃ tat sarvaṃ kriyatām iti
GE09ram_05_u:3029: 5.057.001a etad ākhyānaṃ tat sarvaṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3030: 5.057.001c bhūyaḥ samupacakrāma vacanaṃ vaktum uttaram 5.057.002a saphalo rāghavodyogaḥ sugrīvasya ca saṃbhramaḥ 5.057.002c śīlam āsādya sītāyā mama ca plavanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_05_u:3031: 5.057.003a āryāyāḥ sadṛśaṃ śīlaṃ sītāyāḥ plavagarṣabhāḥ 5.057.003c tapasā dhārayel lokān kruddhā vā nirdahed api
GE09ram_05_u:3032: 5.057.004a sarvathātipravṛddho 'sau rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 5.057.004c yasya tāṃ spṛśato gātraṃ tapasā na vināśitam
GE09ram_05_u:3033: 5.057.005a na tad agniśikhā kuryāt saṃspṛṣṭā pāṇinā satī
GE09ram_05_u:3036: 5.057.006c adhastāc chiṃśapāvṛkṣe sādhvī karuṇam āsthitā 5.057.007a rākṣasībhiḥ parivṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:3039: 5.057.008c pativratā ca suśroṇī avaṣṭabdhā ca jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:3040: 5.057.009a anuraktā hi vaidehī rāmaṃ sarvātmanā śubhā
GE09ram_05_u:3041: 5.057.009c ananyacittā rāme ca paulomīva puraṃdare 5.057.010a tad ekavāsaḥsaṃvītā rajodhvastā tathaiva ca 5.057.010c śokasaṃtāpadīnāṅgī sītā bhartṛhite ratā
GE09ram_05_u:3042: 5.057.011a sā mayā rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3043: 5.057.011c rākṣasībhir virūpābhir dṛṣṭā hi pramadā vane
GE09ram_05_u:3047: 5.057.013c kathaṃ cin mṛgaśāvākṣī viśvāsam upapāditā 5.057.014a tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā caiva sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
GE09ram_05_u:3048: 5.057.014c rāmasugrīvasakhyaṃ ca śrutvā prītim upāgatā 5.057.015a niyataḥ samudācāro bhaktir bhartari cottamā 5.057.016a yan na hanti daśagrīvaṃ sa mahātmā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3049: 5.057.016c nimittamātraṃ rāmas tu vadhe tasya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:3050: 5.057.017a evam āste mahābhāgā sītā śokaparāyaṇā 5.057.017c yad atra pratikartavyaṃ tat sarvam upapādyatām
GE09ram_05_u:3051: 5.058.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vālisūnur abhāṣata 5.058.001c jāmbavatpramukhān sarvān anujñāpya mahākapīn
GE09ram_05_u:3052: 5.058.002a asminn evaṃgate kārye bhavatāṃ ca nivedite
GE09ram_05_u:3053: 5.058.002c nyāyyaṃ sma saha vaidehyā draṣṭuṃ tau pārthivātmajau
GE09ram_05_u:3055: 5.058.003c tāṃ laṅkāṃ tarasā hantuṃ rāvaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:3056: 5.058.004a kiṃ punaḥ sahito vīrair balavadbhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3057: 5.058.004c kṛtāstraiḥ plavagaiḥ śaktair bhavadbhir vijayaiṣibhiḥ 5.058.005a ahaṃ tu rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe sasainyaṃ sapuraḥsaram
GE09ram_05_u:3059: 5.058.006a brāhmam aindraṃ ca raudraṃ ca vāyavyaṃ vāruṇaṃ tathā 5.058.006c yadi śakrajito 'strāṇi durnirīkṣyāṇi saṃyuge 5.058.006e tāny ahaṃ vidhamiṣyāmi nihaniṣyāmi rākṣasān 5.058.007a bhavatām abhyanujñāto vikramo me ruṇaddhi tam
GE09ram_05_u:3060: 5.058.008a mayātulā visṛṣṭā hi śailavṛṣṭir nirantarā 5.058.008c devān api raṇe hanyāt kiṃ punas tān niśācarān 5.058.009a sāgaro 'py atiyād velāṃ mandaraḥ pracaled api 5.058.009c na jāmbavantaṃ samare kampayed arivāhinī 5.058.010a sarvarākṣasasaṃghānāṃ rākṣasā ye ca pūrvakāḥ 5.058.010c alam eko vināśāya vīro vāyusutaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3062: 5.058.011c mandaro 'py avaśīryeta kiṃ punar yudhi rākṣasāḥ 5.058.012a sadevāsurayuddheṣu gandharvoragapakṣiṣu 5.058.012c maindasya pratiyoddhāraṃ śaṃsata dvividasya vā 5.058.013a aśviputrau mahāvegāv etau plavagasattamau
GE09ram_05_u:3065: 5.058.014c sarvāvadhyatvam atulam anayor dattavān purā 5.058.015a varotsekena mattau ca pramathya mahatīṃ camūm
GE09ram_05_u:3066: 5.058.015c surāṇām amṛtaṃ vīrau pītavantau plavaṃgamau 5.058.016a etāv eva hi saṃkruddhau savājirathakuñjarām 5.058.016c laṅkāṃ nāśayituṃ śaktau sarve tiṣṭhantu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3067: 5.058.017a ayuktaṃ tu vinā devīṃ dṛṣṭabadbhiḥ plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3068: 5.058.017c samīpaṃ gantum asmābhī rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 5.058.018a dṛṣṭā devī na cānītā iti tatra nivedanam
GE09ram_05_u:3069: 5.058.018c ayuktam iva paśyāmi bhavadbhiḥ khyātavikramaiḥ 5.058.019a na hi vaḥ plavate kaś cin nāpi kaś cit parākrame
GE09ram_05_u:3071: 5.058.020a teṣv evaṃ hatavīreṣu rākṣaseṣu hanūmatā 5.058.020c kim anyad atra kartavyaṃ gṛhītvā yāma jānakīm
GE09ram_05_u:3072: 5.058.021a tam evaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpaṃ jāmbavān harisattamaḥ 5.058.021c uvāca paramaprīto vākyam arthavad arthavit 5.058.022a na tāvad eṣā matir akṣamā no; yathā bhavān paśyati rājaputra
GE09ram_05_u:3073: 5.058.022c yathā tu rāmasya matir niviṣṭā; tathā bhavān paśyatu
GE09ram_05_u:3075: 5.059.001a tato jāmbavato vākyam agṛhṇanta vanaukasaḥ 5.059.001c aṅgadapramukhā vīrā hanūmāṃś ca mahākapiḥ 5.059.002a prītimantas tataḥ sarve vāyuputrapuraḥsarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3079: 5.059.004a sabhājyamānaṃ bhūtais tam ātmavantaṃ mahābalam 5.059.004c hanūmantaṃ mahāvegaṃ vahanta iva dṛṣṭibhiḥ 5.059.005a rāghave cārthanirvṛttiṃ bhartuś ca paramaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3083: 5.059.007a plavamānāḥ kham āplutya tatas te kānanaukṣakaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3085: 5.059.008a yat tan madhuvanaṃ nāma sugrīvasyābhirakṣitam 5.059.008c adhṛṣyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3086: 5.059.009a yad rakṣati mahāvīryaḥ sadā dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3088: 5.059.010a te tad vanam upāgamya babhūvuḥ paramotkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3090: 5.059.011a tatas te vānarā hṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā madhuvanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_05_u:3092: 5.059.012a tataḥ kumāras tān vṛddhāñ jāmbavatpramukhān kapīn
GE09ram_05_u:3093: 5.059.012c anumānya dadau teṣāṃ nisargaṃ madhubhakṣaṇe 5.059.013a tataś cānumatāḥ sarve saṃprahṛṣṭā vanaukasaḥ 5.059.013c muditāś ca tatas te ca pranṛtyanti tatas tataḥ 5.059.014a gāyanti ke cit praṇamanti ke cin; nṛtyanti ke cit prahasanti ke cit
GE09ram_05_u:3094: 5.059.014c patanti ke cid vicaranti ke cit; plavanti ke cit pralapanti ke cit
GE09ram_05_u:3095: 5.059.015a parasparaṃ ke cid upāśrayante; parasparaṃ ke cid atibruvante
GE09ram_05_u:3096: 5.059.015c drumād drumaṃ ke cid abhiplavante; kṣitau nagāgrān nipatanti ke cit 5.059.016a mahītalāt ke cid udīrṇavegā; mahādrumāgrāṇy abhisaṃpatante 5.059.016c gāyantam anyaḥ prahasann upaiti; hasantam anyaḥ prahasann
GE09ram_05_u:3098: 5.059.017a rudantam anyaḥ prarudann upaiti; nudantam anyaḥ praṇudann
GE09ram_05_u:3100: 5.059.017c samākulaṃ tat kapisainyam āsīn; madhuprapānotkaṭa sattvaceṣṭam 5.059.017e na cātra kaś cin na babhūva matto; na cātra kaś cin na babhūva
GE09ram_05_u:3102: 5.059.018a tato vanaṃ tat paribhakṣyamāṇaṃ; drumāṃś ca vidhvaṃsitapatrapuṣpān
GE09ram_05_u:3103: 5.059.018c samīkṣya kopād dadhivaktranāmā; nivārayām āsa kapiḥ kapīṃs tān 5.059.019a sa taiḥ pravṛddhaiḥ paribhartsyamāno; vanasya goptā harivīravṛddhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3104: 5.059.019c cakāra bhūyo matim ugratejā; vanasya rakṣāṃ prati vānarebhyaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3105: 5.059.020a uvāca kāṃś cit paruṣāṇi dhṛṣṭam; asaktam anyāṃś ca talair jaghāna 5.059.020c sametya kaiś cit kalahaṃ cakāra; tathaiva sāmnopajagāma kāṃś
GE09ram_05_u:3107: 5.059.021a sa tair madāc cāprativārya vegair; balāc ca tenāprativāryamāṇaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3108: 5.059.021c pradharṣitas tyaktabhayaiḥ sametya; prakṛṣyate cāpy anavekṣya
GE09ram_05_u:3110: 5.059.022a nakhais tudanto daśanair daśantas; talaiś ca pādaiś ca samāpnuvantaḥ 5.059.022c madāt kapiṃ taṃ kapayaḥ samagrā; mahāvanaṃ nirviṣayaṃ ca cakruḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3111: 5.060.001a tān uvāca hariśreṣṭho hanūmān vānararṣabhaḥ 5.060.001c avyagramanaso yūyaṃ madhu sevata vānarāḥ 5.060.002a śrutvā hanumato vākyaṃ harīṇāṃ pravaro 'ṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3112: 5.060.002c pratyuvāca prasannātmā pibantu harayo madhu 5.060.003a avaśyaṃ kṛtakāryasya vākyaṃ hanumato mayā 5.060.003c akāryam api kartavyaṃ kim aṅga punar īdṛśam
GE09ram_05_u:3113: 5.060.004a andagasya mukhāc chrutvā vacanaṃ vānararṣabhāḥ 5.060.004c sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭā vānarāḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_05_u:3115: 5.060.005c jagmur madhuvanaṃ yatra nadīvega iva drutam
GE09ram_05_u:3116: 5.060.006a te prahṛṣṭā madhuvanaṃ pālān ākramya vīryataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3117: 5.060.006c atisargāc ca paṭavo dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_05_u:3118: 5.060.007a utpatya ca tataḥ sarve vanapālān samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3119: 5.060.007c tāḍayanti sma śataśaḥ saktān madhuvane tadā
GE09ram_05_u:3120: 5.060.008a madhūni droṇamātrāṇi bahubhiḥ parigṛhya te 5.060.008c ghnanti sma sahitāḥ sarve bhakṣayanti tathāpare
GE09ram_05_u:3121: 5.060.009a ke cit pītvāpavidhyanti madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ 5.060.009c madhūcciṣṭena ke cic ca jaghnur anyonyam utkaṭāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3122: 5.060.010a apare vṛkṣamūleṣu śākhāṃ gṛhya vyavasthitaḥ 5.060.010c atyarthaṃ ca madaglānāḥ parṇāny āstīrya śerate
GE09ram_05_u:3123: 5.060.011a unmattabhūtāḥ plavagā madhumattāś ca hṛṣṭavat 5.060.011c kṣipanty api tathānyonyaṃ skhalanty api tathāpare
GE09ram_05_u:3124: 5.060.012a ke cit kṣveḍān prakurvanti ke cit kūjanti hṛṣṭavat 5.060.012c harayo madhunā mattāḥ ke cit suptā mahītale
GE09ram_05_u:3125: 5.060.013a ye 'py atra madhupālāḥ syuḥ preṣyā dadhimukhasya tu
GE09ram_05_u:3126: 5.060.013c te 'pi tair vānarair bhīmaiḥ pratiṣiddhā diśo gatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3127: 5.060.014a jānubhiś ca prakṛṣṭāś ca devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3128: 5.060.014c abruvan paramodvignā gatvā dadhimukhaṃ vacaḥ 5.060.015a hanūmatā dattavarair hataṃ madhuvanaṃ balāt 5.060.015c vayaṃ ca jānubhiḥ kṛṣṭā devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3129: 5.060.016a tato dadhimukhaḥ kruddho vanapas tatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3130: 5.060.016c hataṃ madhuvanaṃ śrutvā sāntvayām āsa tān harīn
GE09ram_05_u:3134: 5.060.018c punar vīrā madhuvanaṃ tenaiva sahitā yayuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3135: 5.060.019a madhye caiṣāṃ dadhimukhaḥ pragṛhya sumahātarum 5.060.019c samabhyadhāvad vegenā te ca sarve plavaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3136: 5.060.020a te śilāḥ pādapāṃś cāpi pāṣāṇāṃś cāpi vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3137: 5.060.020c gṛhītvābhyāgaman kruddhā yatra te kapikuñjarāḥ 5.060.021a te svāmivacanaṃ vīrā hṛdayeṣv avasajya tat
GE09ram_05_u:3139: 5.060.022a vṛkṣasthāṃś ca talasthāṃś ca vānarān baladarpitān
GE09ram_05_u:3140: 5.060.022c abhyakrāmanta te vīrāḥ pālās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3141: 5.060.023a atha dṛṣṭvā dadhimukhaṃ kruddhaṃ vānarapuṃgavāḥ 5.060.023c abhyadhāvanta vegena hanūmatpramukhās tadā
GE09ram_05_u:3142: 5.060.024a taṃ savṛkṣaṃ mahābāhum āpatantaṃ mahābalam 5.060.024c āryakaṃ prāharat tatra bāhubhyāṃ kupito 'ṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3143: 5.060.025a madāndhaś a na vedainam āryako 'yaṃ mameti saḥ 5.060.025c athainaṃ niṣpipeṣāśu vegavad vasudhātale
GE09ram_05_u:3144: 5.060.026a sa bhagnabāhur vimukho vihvalaḥ śoṇitokṣitaḥ 5.060.026c mumoha sahasā vīro muhūrtaṃ kapikuñjaraḥ 5.060.027a sa kathaṃ cid vimuktas tair vānarair vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3145: 5.060.027c uvācaikāntam āgamya bhṛtyāṃs tān samupāgatān 5.060.028a ete tiṣṭhantu gacchāmo bhartā no yatra vānaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3146: 5.060.028c sugrīvo vipulagrīvaḥ saha rāmeṇa tiṣṭhati 5.060.029a sarvaṃ caivāṅgade doṣaṃ śrāvayiṣyāmi pārthiva 5.060.029c amarṣī vacanaṃ śrutvā ghātayiṣyati vānarān 5.060.030a iṣṭaṃ madhuvanaṃ hy etat sugrīvasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3147: 5.060.030c pitṛpaitāmahaṃ divyaṃ devair api durāsadam 5.060.031a sa vānarān imān sarvān madhulubdhān gatāyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3149: 5.060.032a vadhyā hy ete durātmāno nṛpājñā paribhāvinaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3150: 5.060.032c amarṣaprabhavo roṣaḥ saphalo no bhaviṣyati 5.060.033a evam uktvā dadhimukho vanapālān mahābalaḥ 5.060.033c jagāma sahasotpatya vanapālaiḥ samanvitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3151: 5.060.034a nimeṣāntaramātreṇa sa hi prāpto vanālayaḥ 5.060.034c sahasrāṃśusuto dhīmān sugrīvo yatra vānaraḥ 5.060.035a rāmaṃ ca lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā sugrīvam eva ca 5.060.035c samapratiṣṭhāṃ jagatīm ākāśān nipapāta ha 5.060.036a sa nipatya mahāvīryaḥ sarvais taiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3152: 5.060.036c harir dadhimukhaḥ pālaiḥ pālānāṃ parameśvaraḥ 5.060.037a sa dīnavadano bhūtvā kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim
GE09ram_05_u:3153: 5.060.037c sugrīvasya śubhau mūrdhnā caraṇau pratyapīḍayat 5.061.001a tato mūrdhnā nipatitaṃ vānaraṃ vānararṣabhaḥ 5.061.001c dṛṣṭvaivodvignahṛdayo vākyam etad uvāca ha 5.061.002a uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha kasmāt tvaṃ pādayoḥ patito mama
GE09ram_05_u:3154: 5.061.002c abhayaṃ te bhaved vīra satyam evābhidhīyatām
GE09ram_05_u:3155: 5.061.003a sa tu viśvāsitas tena sugrīveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:3157: 5.061.004a naivarkṣarajasā rājan na tvayā nāpi vālinā
GE09ram_05_u:3158: 5.061.004c vanaṃ nisṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hi bhakṣitaṃ tat tu vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3159: 5.061.005a ebhiḥ pradharṣitāś caiva vāritā vanarakṣibhiḥ 5.061.005c madhūny acintayitvemān bhakṣayanti pibanti ca 5.061.006a śiṣṭam atrāpavidhyanti bhakṣayanti tathāpare
GE09ram_05_u:3160: 5.061.006c nivāryamāṇās te sarve bhruvau vai darśayanti hi
GE09ram_05_u:3161: 5.061.007a ime hi saṃrabdhatarās tathā taiḥ saṃpradharṣitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3162: 5.061.007c vārayanto vanāt tasmāt kruddhair vānarapuṃgavaiḥ 5.061.008a tatas tair bahubhir vīrair vānarair vānararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3164: 5.061.009a pāṇibhir nihatāḥ ke cit ke cij jānubhir āhatāḥ 5.061.009c prakṛṣṭāś ca yathākāmaṃ devamārgaṃ ca darśitāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3165: 5.061.010a evam ete hatāḥ śūrās tvayi tiṣṭhati bhartari
GE09ram_05_u:3166: 5.061.010c kṛtsnaṃ madhuvanaṃ caiva prakāmaṃ taiḥ prabhakṣyate
GE09ram_05_u:3167: 5.061.011a evaṃ vijñāpyamānaṃ tu sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham 5.061.011c apṛcchat taṃ mahāprājño lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā 5.061.012a kim ayaṃ vānaro rājan vanapaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3168: 5.061.012c kaṃ cārtham abhinirdiśya duḥkhito vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:3169: 5.061.013a evam uktas tu sugrīvo lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:3171: 5.061.014a ārya lakṣmaṇa saṃprāha vīro dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3173: 5.061.015a naiṣām akṛtakṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syād upakramaḥ 5.061.015c vanaṃ yathābhipannaṃ taiḥ sādhitaṃ karma vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3174: 5.061.016a dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
GE09ram_05_u:3175: 5.061.016c na hy anyaḥ sādhane hetuḥ karmaṇo 'sya hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3176: 5.061.017a kāryasiddhir hanumati matiś ca haripuṃgava 5.061.017c vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca śrutaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_05_u:3177: 5.061.018a jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadasya baleśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3178: 5.061.018c hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
GE09ram_05_u:3179: 5.061.019a aṅgadapramukhair vīrair hataṃ madhuvanaṃ kila 5.061.019c vicintya dakṣiṇām āśām āgatair haripuṃgavaiḥ 5.061.020a āgataiś ca praviṣṭaṃ tad yathā madhuvanaṃ hi taiḥ 5.061.020c dharṣitaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtsnam upayuktaṃ ca vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3180: 5.061.020e vāritāḥ sahitāḥ pālās tathā jānubhir āhatāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3181: 5.061.021a etadartham ayaṃ prāpto vaktuṃ madhuravāg iha
GE09ram_05_u:3182: 5.061.021c nāmnā dadhimukho nāma hariḥ prakhyātavikramaḥ 5.061.022a dṛṣṭā sītā mahābāho saumitre paśya tattvataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3183: 5.061.022c abhigamya yathā sarve pibanti madhu vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3184: 5.061.023a na cāpy adṛṣṭvā vaidehīṃ viśrutāḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:3185: 5.061.023c vanaṃ dātta varaṃ divyaṃ dharṣayeyur vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3186: 5.061.024a tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā lakṣmaṇaḥ saharāghavaḥ 5.061.024c śrutvā karṇasukhāṃ vāṇīṃ sugrīvavadanāc cyutām 5.061.025a prāhṛṣyata bhṛśaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3187: 5.061.025c śrutvā dadhimukhasyedaṃ sugrīvas tu prahṛṣya ca
GE09ram_05_u:3188: 5.061.025e vanapālaṃ punar vākyaṃ sugrīvaḥ pratyabhāṣata 5.061.026a prīto 'smi saumya yad bhuktaṃ vanaṃ taiḥ kṛtakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3189: 5.061.026c marṣitaṃ marṣaṇīyaṃ ca ceṣṭitaṃ kṛtakarmaṇām 5.061.027a icchāmi śīghraṃ hanumatpradhānān; śākhāmṛgāṃs tān mṛgarājadarpān
GE09ram_05_u:3190: 5.061.027c draṣṭuṃ kṛtārthān saha rāghavābhyāṃ; śrotuṃ ca sītādhigame
GE09ram_05_u:3192: 5.062.001a sugrīveṇaivam uktas tu hṛṣṭo dadhimukhaḥ kapiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3193: 5.062.001c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sugrīvaṃ cābhyavādayat 5.062.002a sa praṇamya ca sugrīvaṃ rāghavau ca mahābalau
GE09ram_05_u:3194: 5.062.002c vānaraiḥ sahitaiḥ śūrair divam evotpapāta ha
GE09ram_05_u:3195: 5.062.003a sa yathaivāgataḥ pūrvaṃ tathaiva tvarito gataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3196: 5.062.003c nipatya gaganād bhūmau tad vanaṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_05_u:3197: 5.062.004a sa praviṣṭo madhuvanaṃ dadarśa hariyūthapān 5.062.004c vimadān uddhatān sarvān mehamānān madhūdakam 5.062.005a sa tān upāgamad vīro baddhvā karapuṭāñjalim
GE09ram_05_u:3198: 5.062.005c uvāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam idaṃ hṛṣṭavad aṅgadam
GE09ram_05_u:3199: 5.062.006a saumya roṣo na kartavyo yad ebhir abhivāritaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3200: 5.062.006c ajñānād rakṣibhiḥ krodhād bhavantaḥ pratiṣedhitāḥ 5.062.007a yuvarājas tvam īśaś ca vanasyāsya mahābala
GE09ram_05_u:3201: 5.062.007c maurkhyāt pūrvaṃ kṛto doṣas tad bhavān kṣantum arhati 5.062.008a yathaiva hi pitā te 'bhūt pūrvaṃ harigaṇeśvaraḥ 5.062.008c tathā tvam api sugrīvo nānyas tu harisattama
GE09ram_05_u:3202: 5.062.009a ākhyātaṃ hi mayā gatvā pitṛvyasya tavānagha
GE09ram_05_u:3204: 5.062.010a sa tvadāgamanaṃ śrutvā sahaibhir hariyūthapaiḥ 5.062.010c prahṛṣṭo na tu ruṣṭo 'sau vanaṃ śrutvā pradharṣitam
GE09ram_05_u:3205: 5.062.011a prahṛṣṭo māṃ pitṛvyas te sugrīvo vānareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3206: 5.062.011c śīghraṃ preṣaya sarvāṃs tān iti hovāca pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3207: 5.062.012a śrutvā dadhimukhasyaitad vacanaṃ ślakṣṇam aṅgadaḥ 5.062.012c abravīt tān hariśreṣṭho vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 5.062.013a śaṅke śruto 'yaṃ vṛttānto rāmeṇa hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3208: 5.062.013c tat kṣamaṃ neha naḥ sthātuṃ kṛte kārye paraṃtapāḥ 5.062.014a pītvā madhu yathākāmaṃ viśrāntā vanacāriṇaḥ 5.062.014c kiṃ śeṣaṃ gamanaṃ tatra sugrīvo yatra me guruḥ 5.062.015a sarve yathā māṃ vakṣyanti sametya hariyūthapāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3209: 5.062.015c tathāsmi kartā kartavye bhavadbhiḥ paravān aham
GE09ram_05_u:3210: 5.062.016a nājñāpayitum īśo 'haṃ yuvarājo 'smi yady api 5.062.016c ayuktaṃ kṛtakarmāṇo yūyaṃ dharṣayituṃ mayā 5.062.017a bruvataś cāṅgadaś caivaṃ śrutvā vacanam avyayam
GE09ram_05_u:3211: 5.062.017c prahṛṣṭamanaso vākyam idam ūcur vanaukasaḥ 5.062.018a evaṃ vakṣyati ko rājan prabhuḥ san vānararṣabha
GE09ram_05_u:3212: 5.062.018c aiśvaryamadamatto hi sarvo 'ham iti manyate 5.062.019a tava cedaṃ susadṛśaṃ vākyaṃ nānyasya kasya cit
GE09ram_05_u:3213: 5.062.019c saṃnatir hi tavākhyāti bhaviṣyac chubhabhāgyatām 5.062.020a sarve vayam api prāptās tatra gantuṃ kṛtakṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3214: 5.062.020c sa yatra harivīrāṇāṃ sugrīvaḥ patir avyayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3215: 5.062.021a tvayā hy anuktair haribhir naiva śakyaṃ padāt padam 5.062.021c kva cid gantuṃ hariśreṣṭha brūmaḥ satyam idaṃ tu te
GE09ram_05_u:3216: 5.062.022a evaṃ tu vadatāṃ teṣām aṅgadaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE09ram_05_u:3217: 5.062.022c bāḍhaṃ gacchāma ity uktvā utpapāta mahītalāt
GE09ram_05_u:3218: 5.062.023a utpatantam anūtpetuḥ sarve te hariyūthapāḥ 5.062.023c kṛtvākāśaṃ nirākāśaṃ yajñotkṣiptā
GE09ram_05_u:3220: 5.062.024c vinadanto mahānādaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā 5.062.025a aṅgade hy ananuprāpte sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ 5.062.025c uvāca śokopahataṃ rāmaṃ kamalalocanam
GE09ram_05_u:3221: 5.062.026a samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te dṛṣṭā devī na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3222: 5.062.026c nāgantum iha śakyaṃ tair atīte samaye hi naḥ 5.062.027a na matsakāśam āgacchet kṛtye hi vinipātite
GE09ram_05_u:3224: 5.062.028a yady apy akṛtakṛtyānām īdṛśaḥ syād upakramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3227: 5.062.029c na me madhuvanaṃ hanyād ahṛṣṭaḥ plavageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3228: 5.062.030a kausalyā suprajā rāma samāśvasihi suvrata 5.062.030c dṛṣṭā devī na saṃdeho na cānyena hanūmatā
GE09ram_05_u:3229: 5.062.030e na hy anyaḥ karmaṇo hetuḥ sādhane tadvidho bhavet 5.062.031a hanūmati hi siddhiś ca matiś ca matisattama
GE09ram_05_u:3230: 5.062.031c vyavasāyaś ca vīryaṃ ca sūrye teja iva dhruvam 5.062.032a jāmbavān yatra netā syād aṅgadaś ca baleśvaraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3231: 5.062.032c hanūmāṃś cāpy adhiṣṭhātā na tasya gatir anyathā
GE09ram_05_u:3232: 5.062.033a mā bhūś cintā samāyuktaḥ saṃpraty amitavikrama
GE09ram_05_u:3233: 5.062.034a tataḥ kila kilā śabdaṃ śuśrāvāsannam ambare
GE09ram_05_u:3235: 5.062.034e kiṣkindhām upayātānāṃ siddhiṃ kathayatām iva 5.062.035a tataḥ śrutvā ninādaṃ taṃ kapīnāṃ kapisattamaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3237: 5.062.036a ājagmus te 'pi harayo rāmadarśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ 5.062.036c aṅgadaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā hanūmantaṃ ca vānaram
GE09ram_05_u:3239: 5.062.037c nipetur harirājasya samīpe rāghavasya ca 5.062.038a hanūmāṃś ca mahābahuḥ praṇamya śirasā tataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3240: 5.062.038c niyatām akṣatāṃ devīṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat 5.062.039a niścitārthaṃ tatas tasmin sugrīvaṃ pavanātmaje 5.062.039c lakṣmaṇaḥ prītimān prītaṃ bahumānād avaikṣata 5.062.040a prītyā ca ramamāṇo 'tha rāghavaḥ paravīrahā 5.062.040c bahu mānena mahatā hanūmantam avaikṣata 5.063.001a tataḥ prasravaṇaṃ śailaṃ te gatvā citrakānanam
GE09ram_05_u:3241: 5.063.001c praṇamya śirasā rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_05_u:3242: 5.063.002a yuvarājaṃ puraskṛtya sugrīvam abhivādya ca 5.063.002c pravṛttam atha sītāyāḥ pravaktum upacakramuḥ 5.063.003a rāvaṇāntaḥpure rodhaṃ rākṣasībhiś ca tarjanam 5.063.003c rāme samanurāgaṃ ca yaś cāpi samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3243: 5.063.004a etad ākhyānti te sarve harayo rāma saṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:3244: 5.063.004c vaidehīm akṣatāṃ śrutvā rāmas tūttaram abravīt
GE09ram_05_u:3245: 5.063.005a kva sītā vartate devī kathaṃ ca mayi vartate 5.063.005c etan me sarvam ākhyāta vaidehīṃ prati vānarāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3246: 5.063.006a rāmasya gaditaṃ śrutva harayo rāmasaṃnidhau 5.063.006c codayanti hanūmantaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3247: 5.063.007a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ hanūmān mārutātmajaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3248: 5.063.007c uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ sītāyā darśanaṃ yathā
GE09ram_05_u:3250: 5.063.008c agacchaṃ jānakīṃ sītāṃ mārgamāṇo didṛkṣayā 5.063.009a tatra laṅketi nagarī rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ 5.063.009c dakṣiṇasya samudrasya tīre vasati dakṣiṇe 5.063.010a tatra dṛṣṭā mayā sītā rāvaṇāntaḥpure satī
GE09ram_05_u:3251: 5.063.010c saṃnyasya tvayi jīvantī rāmā rāma manoratham
GE09ram_05_u:3252: 5.063.011a dṛṣṭā me rākṣasī madhye tarjyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3254: 5.063.012a duḥkham āpadyate devī tavāduḥkhocitā satī 5.063.012c rāvaṇāntaḥpure ruddhvā rākṣasībhiḥ surakṣitā
GE09ram_05_u:3258: 5.063.014c devī kathaṃ cit kākutstha tvanmanā mārgitā mayā
GE09ram_05_u:3260: 5.063.015c sa mayā naraśārdūla viśvāsam upapāditā 5.063.016a tataḥ saṃbhāṣitā devī sarvam arthaṃ ca darśitā
GE09ram_05_u:3261: 5.063.016c rāmasugrīvasakhyaṃ ca śrutvā prītim upāgatā 5.063.017a niyataḥ samudācāro bhaktiś cāsyās tathā tvayi
GE09ram_05_u:3262: 5.063.017c evaṃ mayā mahābhāgā dṛṣṭā janakanandinī 5.063.017e ugreṇa tapasā yuktā tvadbhaktyā puruṣarṣabha 5.063.018a abhijñānaṃ ca me dattaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tavāntike
GE09ram_05_u:3263: 5.063.018c citrakūṭe mahāprājña vāyasaṃ prati rāghava 5.063.019a vijñāpyaś ca nara vyāghro rāmo vāyusuta tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:3264: 5.063.019c akhileneha yad dṛṣṭam iti mām āha jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:3265: 5.063.020a idaṃ cāsmai pradātavyaṃ yatnāt suparirakṣitam 5.063.020c bruvatā vacanāny evaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3266: 5.063.021a eṣa cūḍāmaṇiḥ śrīmān mayā te yatnarakṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3267: 5.063.021c manaḥśilāyās tikalas taṃ smarasveti cābravīt 5.063.022a eṣa niryātitaḥ śrīmān mayā te vārisaṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3268: 5.063.022c etaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramodiṣye vyasane tvām ivānagha
GE09ram_05_u:3270: 5.063.023c ūrdhvaṃ māsān na jīveyaṃ rakṣasāṃ vaśam āgatā
GE09ram_05_u:3271: 5.063.024a iti mām abravīt sītā kṛśāṅgī dharma cāriṇī
GE09ram_05_u:3273: 5.063.025a etad eva mayākhyātaṃ sarvaṃ rāghava yad yathā
GE09ram_05_u:3275: 5.063.026a tau jātāśvāsau rājaputrau viditvā; tac cābhijñānaṃ rāghavāya
GE09ram_05_u:3277: 5.063.026c devyā cākhyātaṃ sarvam evānupūrvyād; vācā saṃpūrṇaṃ vāyuputraḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3279: 5.064.001a evam ukto hanumatā rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ 5.064.001c taṃ maṇiṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā praruroda
GE09ram_05_u:3280: 5.064.002a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ rāghavaḥ śokakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3281: 5.064.002c netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sugrīvam idam abravīt 5.064.003a yathaiva dhenuḥ sravati snehād vatsasya vatsalā
GE09ram_05_u:3282: 5.064.003c tathā mamāpi hṛdayaṃ maṇiratnasya darśanāt 5.064.004a maṇiratnam idaṃ dattaṃ vaidehyāḥ śvaśureṇa me
GE09ram_05_u:3283: 5.064.004c vadhūkāle yathā baddham adhikaṃ mūrdhni śobhate
GE09ram_05_u:3284: 5.064.005a ayaṃ hi jalasaṃbhūto maṇiḥ pravarapūjitaḥ 5.064.005c yajñe paramatuṣṭena dattaḥ śakreṇa dhīmatā 5.064.006a imaṃ dṛṣṭvā maṇiśreṣṭhaṃ tathā tātasya darśanam
GE09ram_05_u:3285: 5.064.006c adyāsmy avagataḥ saumya vaidehasya tathā vibhoḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3286: 5.064.007a ayaṃ hi śobhate tasyāḥ priyāyā mūrdhni me maṇiḥ 5.064.007c adyāsya darśanenāhaṃ prāptāṃ tām iva cintaye
GE09ram_05_u:3287: 5.064.008a kim āha sītā vaidehī brūhi saumya punaḥ punaḥ 5.064.008c parāsum iva toyena siñcantī vākyavāriṇā 5.064.009a itas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad imaṃ vārisaṃbhavam
GE09ram_05_u:3288: 5.064.009c maṇiṃ paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā
GE09ram_05_u:3289: 5.064.010a ciraṃ jīvati vaidehī yadi māsaṃ dhariṣyati
GE09ram_05_u:3290: 5.064.010c kṣaṇaṃ saumya na jīveyaṃ vinā tām asitekṣaṇām
GE09ram_05_u:3291: 5.064.011a naya mām api taṃ deśaṃ yatra dṛṣṭā mama priyā
GE09ram_05_u:3292: 5.064.011c na tiṣṭheyaṃ kṣaṇam api pravṛttim upalabhya ca
GE09ram_05_u:3293: 5.064.012a kathaṃ sā mama suśroṇi bhīru bhīruḥ satī tadā 5.064.012c bhayāvahānāṃ ghorāṇāṃ madhye tiṣṭhati rakṣasām 5.064.013a śāradas timironmukho nūnaṃ candra ivāmbudaiḥ 5.064.013c āvṛtaṃ vadanaṃ tasyā na virājati rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3294: 5.064.014a kim āha sītā hanumaṃs tattvataḥ kathayasva me
GE09ram_05_u:3295: 5.064.014c etena khalu jīviṣye bheṣajenāturo yathā 5.064.015a madhurā madhurālāpā kim āha mama bhāminī
GE09ram_05_u:3296: 5.064.015c madvihīnā varārohā hanuman kathayasva me 5.064.015e duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ prāpya kathaṃ jīvati jānakī
GE09ram_05_u:3297: 5.065.001a evam uktas tu hanumān rāghaveṇa mahātmanā
GE09ram_05_u:3298: 5.065.001c sītāyā bhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ nyavedayata rāghave 5.065.002a idam uktavatī devī jānakī puruṣarṣabha 5.065.002c pūrvavṛttam abhijñānaṃ citrakūṭe yathā tatham 5.065.003a sukhasuptā tvayā sārdhaṃ jānakī pūrvam utthitā
GE09ram_05_u:3300: 5.065.004a paryāyeṇa ca suptas tvaṃ devyaṅke bharatāgraja
GE09ram_05_u:3301: 5.065.004c punaś ca kila pakṣī sa devyā janayati vyathām 5.065.005a tataḥ punar upāgamya virarāda bhṛśaṃ kila
GE09ram_05_u:3302: 5.065.005c tatas tvaṃ bodhitas tasyāḥ śoṇitena samukṣitaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3303: 5.065.006a vāyasena ca tenaiva satataṃ bādhyamānayā 5.065.006c bodhitaḥ kila devyās tvaṃ sukhasuptaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_05_u:3304: 5.065.007a tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahābāho rāditāṃ ca stanāntare
GE09ram_05_u:3305: 5.065.007c āśīviṣa iva kruddho niḥśvasann abhyabhāṣathāḥ 5.065.008a nakhāgraiḥ kena te bhīru dāritaṃ tu stanāntaram
GE09ram_05_u:3306: 5.065.008c kaḥ krīḍati saroṣeṇa pañcavaktreṇa bhoginā 5.065.009a nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sahasā vāyasaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3307: 5.065.009c nakhaiḥ sarudhirais tīkṣṇair mām evābhimukhaṃ sthitam
GE09ram_05_u:3308: 5.065.010a sutaḥ kila sa śakrasya vāyasaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3309: 5.065.010c dharāntaracaraḥ śīghraṃ pavanasya gatau samaḥ 5.065.011a tatas tasmin mahābāho
GE09ram_05_u:3310: 5.065.011c vāyase tvaṃ kṛtvāḥ krūrāṃ matiṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_05_u:3311: 5.065.012a sa darbhaṃ saṃstarād gṛhya brahmāstreṇa nyayojayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3312: 5.065.012c sa dīpta iva kālāgnir jajvālābhimukhaḥ khagam
GE09ram_05_u:3313: 5.065.013a sa tvaṃ pradīptaṃ cikṣepa darbhaṃ taṃ vāyasaṃ prati 5.065.013c tatas tu vāyasaṃ dīptaḥ sa darbho 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_05_u:3314: 5.065.014a sa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ suraiḥ sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3315: 5.065.014c trīṃl lokān saṃparikramya trātāraṃ nādhigacchati 5.065.015a taṃ tvaṃ nipatitaṃ bhūmau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatam
GE09ram_05_u:3316: 5.065.015c vadhārham api kākutstha kṛpayā paripālayaḥ 5.065.016a mogham astraṃ na śakyaṃ tu kartum ity eva rāghava
GE09ram_05_u:3317: 5.065.016c tatas tasyākṣikākasya hinasti sma sa dakṣiṇam
GE09ram_05_u:3318: 5.065.017a rāma tvāṃ sa namaskṛtvā rājño daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_05_u:3319: 5.065.017c visṛṣṭas tu tadā kākaḥ pratipede kham ālayam
GE09ram_05_u:3320: 5.065.018a evam astravidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sattvavāñ śīlavān api
GE09ram_05_u:3321: 5.065.018c kimartham astraṃ rakṣaḥsu na yojayasi rāghava
GE09ram_05_u:3322: 5.065.019a na nāgā nāpi gandharvā nāsurā na marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3323: 5.065.019c tava rāma mukhe sthātuṃ śaktāḥ pratisamādhitum
GE09ram_05_u:3324: 5.065.020a tava vīryavataḥ kaccin mayi yady asti saṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3325: 5.065.020c kṣipraṃ suniśitair bāṇair hanyatāṃ yudhi rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3326: 5.065.021a bhrātur ādeśam ādāya lakṣmaṇo vā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3327: 5.065.021c sa kimarthaṃ naravaro na māṃ rakṣati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3329: 5.065.022c surāṇām api durdharṣau kimarthaṃ mām upekṣataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3330: 5.065.023a mamaiva duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mahad asti na saṃśayaḥ 5.065.023c samarthau sahitau yan māṃ nāpekṣete paraṃtapau
GE09ram_05_u:3331: 5.065.024a vaidehyā vacanaṃ śrutvā karuṇaṃ sāśrubhāṣitam 5.065.024c punar apy aham āryāṃ tām idaṃ vacanam abruvam 5.065.025a tvacchokavimukho rāmo devi satyena te śape
GE09ram_05_u:3332: 5.065.025c rāme duḥkhābhibhūte ca lakṣmaṇaḥ paritapyate 5.065.026a kathaṃ cid bhavatī dṛṣṭā na kālaḥ pariśocitum
GE09ram_05_u:3333: 5.065.026c imaṃ muhūrtaṃ duḥkhānām antaṃ drakṣyasi bhāmini
GE09ram_05_u:3334: 5.065.027a tāv ubhau naraśārdūlau rājaputrāv ariṃdamau 5.065.027c tvaddarśanakṛtotsāhau laṅkāṃ bhasmīkariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3335: 5.065.028a hatvā ca samare raudraṃ rāvaṇaṃ saha bāndhavam
GE09ram_05_u:3336: 5.065.028c rāghavas tvāṃ mahābāhuḥ svāṃ purīṃ nayate dhruvam
GE09ram_05_u:3337: 5.065.029a yat tu rāmo vijānīyād abhijñānam anindite
GE09ram_05_u:3338: 5.065.029c prītisaṃjananaṃ tasya pradātuṃ tattvam arhasi 5.065.030a sābhivīkṣya diśaḥ sarvā veṇyudgrathanam uttamam 5.065.030c muktvā vastrād dadau mahyaṃ maṇim etaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_05_u:3339: 5.065.031a pratigṛhya maṇiṃ divyaṃ tava heto raghūttama
GE09ram_05_u:3340: 5.065.031c śirasā saṃpraṇamyainām aham āgamane tvare 5.065.032a gamane ca kṛtotsāham avekṣya varavarṇinī 5.065.032c vivardhamānaṃ ca hi mām uvāca janakātmajā
GE09ram_05_u:3342: 5.065.033a hanuman siṃhasaṃkāśau tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau 5.065.033c sugrīvaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ sarvān brūyā anāmayam
GE09ram_05_u:3343: 5.065.034a yathā ca sa mahābāhur māṃ tārayati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3344: 5.065.034c asmād duḥkhāmbusaṃrodhāt tat samādhātum arhasi 5.065.035a imaṃ ca tīvraṃ mama śokavegaṃ; rakṣobhir ebhiḥ paribhartsanaṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3346: 5.065.035c brūyās tu rāmasya gataḥ samīpaṃ; śivaś ca te 'dhvāstu
GE09ram_05_u:3348: 5.065.036a etat tavāryā nṛparājasiṃha; sītā vacaḥ prāha viṣādapūrvam
GE09ram_05_u:3349: 5.065.036c etac ca buddhvā gaditaṃ mayā tvaṃ; śraddhatsva sītāṃ kuśalāṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3351: 5.066.001a athāham uttaraṃ devyā punar uktaḥ sasaṃbhramam
GE09ram_05_u:3352: 5.066.001c tava snehān naravyāghra sauhāryād anumānya ca
GE09ram_05_u:3353: 5.066.002a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vācyo rāmo dāśarathis tvayā
GE09ram_05_u:3354: 5.066.002c yathā mām āpnuyāc chīghraṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:3355: 5.066.003a yadi vā manyase vīra vasaikāham ariṃdama
GE09ram_05_u:3356: 5.066.003c kasmiṃś cit saṃvṛte deśe viśrāntaḥ śvo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_05_u:3357: 5.066.004a mama cāpy alpabhāgyāyāḥ sāmnidhyāt tava vānara
GE09ram_05_u:3358: 5.066.004c asya śokavipākasya muhūrtaṃ syād vimokṣaṇam 5.066.005a gate hi tvayi vikrānte punarāgamanāya vai
GE09ram_05_u:3359: 5.066.005c prāṇānām api saṃdeho mama syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3360: 5.066.006a tavādarśanajaḥ śoko bhūyo māṃ paritāpayet 5.066.006c duḥkhād duḥkhaparābhūtāṃ durgatāṃ duḥkhabhāginīm
GE09ram_05_u:3361: 5.066.007a ayaṃ tu vīrasaṃdehas tiṣṭhatīva mamāgrataḥ 5.066.007c sumahāṃs tvatsahāyeṣu haryṛkṣeṣu asaṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3362: 5.066.008a kathaṃ nu khalu duṣpāraṃ tariṣyanti mahodadhim
GE09ram_05_u:3363: 5.066.008c tāni haryṛkṣasainyāni tau vā naravarātmajau 5.066.009a trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ sāgarasyāsya laṅghane 5.066.009c śaktiḥ syād vainateyasya vāyor vā tava vānagha
GE09ram_05_u:3364: 5.066.010a tad asmin kāryaniyoge vīraivaṃ duratikrame 5.066.010c kiṃ paśyasi samādhānaṃ brūhi kāryavidāṃ vara
GE09ram_05_u:3365: 5.066.011a kāmam asya tvam evaikaḥ kāryasya parisādhane
GE09ram_05_u:3366: 5.066.011c paryāptaḥ paravīraghna yaśasyas te balodayaḥ 5.066.012a balaiḥ samagrair yadi māṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_05_u:3367: 5.066.012c vijayī svāṃ purīṃ rāmo nayet tat syād yaśaskaram 5.066.013a yathāhaṃ tasya vīrasya vanād upadhinā hṛtā
GE09ram_05_u:3368: 5.066.013c rakṣasā tad bhayād eva tathā nārhati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3369: 5.066.014a balais tu saṃkulāṃ kṛtvā laṅkāṃ parabalārdanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3370: 5.066.014c māṃ nayed yadi kākutsthas tat tasya sadṛśaṃ bhavet 5.066.015a tad yathā tasya vikrāntam anurūpaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3371: 5.066.015c bhavaty āhavaśūrasya tathā tvam upapādaya 5.066.016a tad arthopahitaṃ vākyaṃ praśritaṃ hetusaṃhitam 5.066.016c niśamyāhaṃ tataḥ śeṣaṃ vākyam uttaram abruvam
GE09ram_05_u:3372: 5.066.017a devi haryṛkṣasainyānām īśvaraḥ plavatāṃ varaḥ 5.066.017c sugrīvaḥ sattvasaṃpannas tavārthe kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3375: 5.066.019a yeṣāṃ nopari nādhastān na tiryak sajjate gatiḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3376: 5.066.019c na ca karmasu sīdanti mahatsv amitatejasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3377: 5.066.020a asakṛt tair mahābhāgair vānarair balasaṃyutaiḥ 5.066.020c pradakṣiṇīkṛtā bhūmir
GE09ram_05_u:3378: 5.066.021a madviśiṣṭāś ca tulyāś ca santi tatra vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3379: 5.066.021c mattaḥ pratyavaraḥ kaś cin nāsti sugrīvasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_05_u:3380: 5.066.022a ahaṃ tāvad iha prāptaḥ kiṃ punas te mahābalāḥ 5.066.022c na hi prakṛṣṭāḥ preṣyante preṣyante hītare janāḥ
GE09ram_05_u:3381: 5.066.023a tad alaṃ paritāpena devi manyur vyapaitu te
GE09ram_05_u:3382: 5.066.023c ekotpātena te laṅkām eṣyanti hariyūthapāḥ 5.066.024a mama pṛṣṭhagatau tau ca candrasūryāv ivoditau
GE09ram_05_u:3384: 5.066.025a arighnaṃ siṃhasaṃkāśaṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam 5.066.025c lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhanuṣpāṇiṃ laṅkā dvāram upasthitam
GE09ram_05_u:3386: 5.066.026c vānarān vānarendrābhān kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi saṃgatān 5.066.027a śailāmbudan nikāśānāṃ
GE09ram_05_u:3387: 5.066.027c nardatāṃ kapimukhyānām acirāc choṣyase svanam 5.066.028a nivṛttavanavāsaṃ ca tvayā sārdham ariṃdamam 5.066.028c abhiṣiktam ayodhyāyāṃ kṣipraṃ drakṣyasi rāghavam 5.066.029a tato mayā vāgbhir adīnabhāṣiṇī; śivābhir iṣṭābhir abhiprasāditā
GE09ram_05_u:3388: 5.066.029c jagāma śāntiṃ mama maithilātmajā; tavāpi śokena tathābhipīḍitā
